There's a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast.

column5: Siza for the People - Central Duplex with Garage
column6:
Conceived by the genius mind of the Architect Siza Vieira, one of the most awarded in the world, this originally social habitational complex is home for all kinds of people nowadays.
This modern art decorated duplex can be your home in Porto. If you come by car, you can park in the included garage and simply move around using the metro, which the nearest station (Lapa) is just a minute away from the apartment.

The space
This duplex has a double direct access from the street and is divided into two floors. The ground floor offers a double bedroom and a twin bedroom, and split bathrooms. The top floor comprises a bedroom, that can also be used as a common space, the living and dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, a laundry and an enclosed balcony, resulting in a heart-warming minimalist open plan.
This duplex apartment is meticulously decorated and fully prepared for families or groups of friends. Books, handmade sculptures and other art pieces add to t
column7:
The apartment is part of an originally social habitational complex, conceived by Siza Vieira, one of the most highly regarded architect's of its time. Nowadays, still some needy people live there, but are accompanied by art scholars and intelectuals, formind an highly heterogeneous community.
It's located in a central area on the edge of the historic center, from where you easily begin a walking visit to all the places of interest in the center of Porto, but at the same time quiet enough to allow you to do so with all the energy after a well-rested night.

It is an 8 minute walk from the Clérigos Tower, probably the most iconic building in the city, and Lello Bookstore, already distinguished as the most beautiful bookstore in the world. Also close from Avenida dos Aliados, one of the city's visiting postcards with its monumental nineteenth-century buildings.
Also close from the Boavista area, where Casa da Música (house of music) is located as well as from Rua de Sa
column14: Upon arrival, we will welcome you, check you in, and share tips on what to do or what and where to eat in the surroundings, as well as answer any other questions you may have. During your stay, we are always on hand to assist you whenever you deem necessary.

Aconchegante apartamento preparado para receber os seus hóspedes com todo o conforto, em localização privilegiada, próximo aos principais acessos e com uma vista de tirar o folego.

Distante apenas alguns minutos a pé do Cais de Gaia, podendo aproveitar de toda a sua infraestrutura e lindos passeios pelo Rio Douro.

Sem perder a vantagem da privacidade e do sossego, estará próximo de tudo o que precisará, para toda a família.

Shopping, Restaurantes, Caves do vinho do Porto, apenas a 5 minutos.

The space
Temos muito cuidado com a limpeza e com a higienização do apartamento e roupas, feito sob nossa monitorização direta.

Casa bem equipada e com todas as comodidades necessárias para umas férias despreocupadas.

Os hóspedes terão acesso a todo o apartamento, composto por 1 suite com cama de casal, 1 sala de estar com sofá-cama de 2 lugares, 1 lavabo, televisão com 100 canais e Wi-fi gratuito, 1 WC completo com seca

column6:
If you choose to stay at Oporto Covelo 1E apartment, you can benefit from an apartment that stands out for its familiar and welcoming atmosphere and its location in a very central residential area of ​​the city of Porto. The apartment has two fronts, which allows plenty of natural light, and the building has an elevator. A few kilometers from the historic area of ​​Porto (accessible by foot and public transport), Casa da Música, Fundação Serralves and even Praia.

The space
The apartment consists in a kitchen equipped with a microwave, coffee and tea maker, hob, oven, dishwasher and washing machine and fridge, the living room has a dining and living area, with a sofa bed, has two bathrooms, one private and one in the corridor, 3 bedrooms, two of which have a double bed and the other have 2 single beds that can easily be joined. You can enjoy the terrace area, common to the living room and kitchen. The apartment has two fronts which allows plenty of natural light.<
column7:
Located in a residential area, very central, with easy access to the entire city of Porto, such as the Historic Center of Porto (1.8 km), accessible by foot and with several public transport alternatives in the area, which quickly gives you access to any location at the area of ​​the city. In front of the building you have several establishments to buy whatever you need, such as a supermarket, coffee shop, laundry service and you also are within walking distance of the gardens of Quinta do Covelo and Marquês Square.
In the surroundings, you can visit Livraria Lello (2.6 km), go to a concert at Casa da Música (2.6 km), enjoy some of the art exhibitions at the Serralves Foundation Museum of Contemporary Art (2.6 km), go to Matosinhos beach to sunbathe or even try a Surf lesson (8 km).
column14:
A House Care nasce da intenção em tornar o universo da gestão de condomínios e apartamentos mais próximo de cada um de nós. Trata-se de um serviço cuja diferenciação assenta na identidade da marca criada pela Joana e pela Celeste, em que o cliente se torna amigo e o apartamento se transforma num lar. Este é um projeto que tem a assinatura de duas mulheres do norte, que pretendem marcar a diferença num mercado competitivo, em que a métrica do seu crescimento passa pela quantidade de sorrisos que impulsionam.
Poderão ver a informação mais detalhada em (Website hidden by Airbnb) ou até seguir-nos em (Website hidden by Airbnb)

column5: The Olive House Porto Centre (feel like a local)
column6:
The Olive House is located in the European’s Coolest Neighborhood - Bonfim. Right in the heart of the city, but tucked away in a calm cobblestone street. It’s just 3min distance to the metro, 5min to Santa Catarina Street (the main commercial area) and a walkable distance from all main attractions.

The romantic hue of its patio makes it a surreal place to relax. The modern kitchen and bedroom will make it hard for you to leave. Bright but cozy, central but quiet, unique but understated.

The space
The Olive House is more than a gorgeous city apartment (50sqm) with a secret balcony (9sqm), it represents the essence, freedom and natural delight of the Portuguese Douro Vineyards. This peaceful ground floor retreat was carefully conceived and decorated to offer a premium and natural comfort to make you feel at home, in the ‘coolest’ neighborhood of Europe - Bonfim.

Amenities:

• Double size bed
• Sofa bed
• 1 bathroom (with s
column7:
The Olive House is located in the European’s Coolest Neighborhood - Bonfim, behind the historic door that opens to the cobblestone street of Oliveirinhas. The flat is at a walkable distance of all the main attractions, restaurantes, bars, supermarket, pharmacies, metro and buses.

• 3 min walk to Metro Station
• 4 min walk to the bus station
• 3 min to self-service laundry
• 3 min walk to the supermarket
• 5 min walk to the trendy restaurants
• 6 min walk downtown
column14:
Co-founder of The Olive House and Mechanical Engineer, I love traveling, music and I play the guitar.
I created The Olive House as a new type of accommodation to promote retreat tourism and offer a peaceful and premium way to experience Porto and feel like a local.

I truly hope you will make great memories in this place and this amazing   city and can’t wait to hear your stories!

I hope to see you soon!

Raoul's House is located in the city center of Porto, with easy access to the most beautiful monuments and places in the city Invicta.
A wide and inviting space that allows a relaxing and comfortable stay.

The upper floor consists of a carpeted room, with two small windows of which one can see, at the bottom over the city the sea. A relaxing little getaway!

Situated on a quiet street just a short walk away from most of the main attractions that Porto has to offer - this three-bedroom mezzanine apartment comes well equipped to meet all your needs! With a well-appointed kitchen, heating, comfortable bedrooms and free parking, we are certain you will have a wonderful stay at our apartment!

Top attractions nearby:
- Igreja do Carmo: 7 min
- Livraria Lello: 9 min
- Clérigos Tower: 10 min
- Mercado do Bolhão: 13 min
- Ribeira: 24 min

» The Trindade metro station is just a quick 10-minute walk away from the apartment «

The space
Located in the city center of Porto, Baixa, this apartment is well situated for those eager to explore our UNESCO World Heritage City on foot! Perfect for families or a group of friends, This apartment is comfortable, cozy and well-equipped to meet all your needs!

KEY FEATURES:
- Two bedrooms with queen-sized beds and a bedroom with a
column7:
This apartment is situated in Baixa, right above the Ribeira. It is located right in the heart of the city and so there are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
- Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants, and cafés.
- Guindais Funicular
- Port Wine cellars

column6:
Situado em edifício histórico totalmente remodelado, este loft tem excelentes vistas sobre o Rio Douro.

The space
Alojamento em open space, com muita luz, decoração moderna e confortavel para fazer o hóspede sentir-se em casa.

Guest access
O apartamento é muito espaçoso, com muitas janelas cheias de luz, viradas a Sul e Poente com vista directa sobre o rio.
Tem cozinha equipada com tudo o que precisa para cozinhar, desde fogão, forno, maquina de lavar loiça, frigorifico, micro-ondas, chaleira, torradeira e máquina de café Nespresso. A sala de estar tem um sofá-cama, smart tv com acesso a Netflix, e acesso a uma pequena varanda sobre o rio Douro.

Other things to note
Note que o 3º hóspede ficará acomodado no sofá-cama da sala, logo para sua maior comodidade recomendo que seja utilizado principalmente por pessoas mais novas.

License number

column7: O alojamento situa-se num bairro calmo, em frente ao Rio Douro, na zona Histórica, com restaurantes, supermercado, e cafés, assim como as principais atracções da cidade.
column14:
Nasci e cresci no Porto, e apesar de adorar viajar e conhecer outros lugares, adoro viver na minha cidade!...
Quando encontrei o edifício, onde hoje se situam os “Douro River Studios”, este encontrava-se em muito mau estado, e ao projectar a sua renovação, sempre pensei que seria um local ideal para receber quem quisesse conhecer, viver e sentir o Porto e o seu querido rio Douro. 
Tentei criar dois alojamentos espaçosos, cheios de luz reflectida pelo rio,  confortáveis e modernos.
Espero que sejam o ponto de partida para que conheçam esta cidade tão bonita e singular!....

column7: São Félix da Marinha is a very quiet area in the outskirts of Porto. This beach has a train station, for between the railways and the beach, you will find several quarters with beautiful examples of summer architecture of the beginning of the 20th century.

The space
This apartment, located in Porto, is ideal for 3 vacationers. It offers a bedroom, a terrace and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including a TV with satellite channels, WiFi and a Hi-Fi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 4 or outside, on the terrace enjoying views of the city.

The apartment features central heating, ironing equipment, a desk, a dryer and cleaning products.

column5: RARE! Modern Luxe Penthouse in the Heart of Porto
column6:
This penthouse was designed to immerse you in the magic of Porto. Here, you have privileged and rare access to some of the best views of Porto. Two glass walls can disappear onto an expansive terrace to provide you a seamless indoor-outdoor living experience.

You are also steps away from Ribeira Square, great dining, shopping, and attractions. Equipped with fiber internet and top amenities, it's the perfect place for both romantics and first-class professionals.

The space
The penthouse has breathtaking views and is designed for seamless indoor-outdoor living in the heart of historic Porto. Top-to-bottom glass walls can slide away onto a wrap-around terrace for amazing views of this UNESCO world heritage site.

The main living area is beautifully furnished with modern amenities and decor. It was thoughtfully designed for romance, comfort, entertainment, and work.

Miele and Nespresso appliances support the kitchen cook while a loun
column7: Sometimes it feels as if you're at the center of the world here. Steps in any direction leads you to historic sites, great restaurants, and unique shopping. The apartment is situated on one of the main streets of historic Porto, Rua Mouzinho da Silveira, and is just a few minutes walk to São Bento station, Praça da Ribeira, and many other iconic sites of Porto.

column5: Heritage Park House w/ 4 BR & private parking
column6:
The Heritage Park House w/ 4 BR & private parking is a spacious, beautifully decorated home that can host up to 10 guests, making it perfect for families or a group of friends traveling together to our lovely city! With a blend of contemporary and antique décor, the house gives off a very homey feel and will certainly make you feel at ease during your stay.

The space
The house itself comprises of:
BEDROOMS
Four well-decorated bedrooms; three of them come with double-sized beds, whereas the other one comes with two single beds. One of the bedrooms also comes with a sofa-bed for 2 along with the double bed. All bedrooms come with comfortable linen and heaters!

OUTDOOR SPACE
Two bedrooms come with access to a big balcony where you can enjoy the warm summer sun with a glass of wine. There's also a big garden around the house for sunbathing or cozy up with a book and a cup of tea in the evening!

BATHROOMS
Three full bathroom
column7:
The house is located 5 minutes away from Porto's CBD and a 20 minute walk away from the gorgeous Foz area, known for its beaches - these beaches proudly display the blue flag eco-label, a sign of high quality unpolluted seawater - great quality of life and romantic walkways that are perfect for enjoying the evening sun. 5 minutes away from the house you can also find the Porto city park, where you can go and exercise, have a picnic, lay down and rest, observe nature etc. It's also where Primavera Sound festival is held every year.

Places worth visiting nearby:
-Fortress São João Baptista
-Passeio Alegre’s Gardens
-Promenade des Anglais
AND MORE!

column5: Stunning Views over Porto by metro station by LovelyStay
column6:
Situated in Vila Nova de Gaia, an area famous for its Port wine cellars and stunning views of the Ribeira, this apartment is perfect for those hoping to have a peaceful holiday in the north of Portugal. The metro and train station "General Torres" is just 2 minutes away and will take you to Porto downtown in less than 5 minutes.
Well-equipped to host up to 3 guests, this flat has a bedroom with two single beds put together - that you can separate if you prefer - one full bathroom and living/dining space with a sofa-bed for 1 and a balcony with a breathtaking view over Porto. Several key amenities are also provided here, including heaters, wi-fi, TV, oven and stove! We are certain you will feel right at home at our apartment and we look forward to hosting you!

Top attractions nearby; walking distance:
- Luis I Bridge: 5 min
- Jardim do Morro: 5min
- Cais de Gaia: 12 min

The space
This 1 bedroom apartment allows you to stay in Gaia's
column7:
Famous for its Port Wince Cellars and stunning views of Porto, Vila Nova de Gaia (or simply Gaia) is located on the other side of the Douro. It has a pretty promenade along the waterfront and is a great place to go for a walk and enjoy the remarkable views of the Dom Luís I Bridge and the picturesque neighborhood of Ribeira and its terraced colorful houses.

TOP ATTRACTIONS IN THE AREA:
- Mosteiro da Serra do Pilar
- Teleférico de Gaia
- Port Lodges;
A few to consider are Sandeman, Cálem, Graham’s and Quinta do Noval, and you’ll get to taste each variety to learn the difference.
- Casa-Museu Teixeira Lopes
- Douro River Trip
- Jardim do Morro
- Parque Biológico de Gaia

column14:
JGGAPARTMENTS - Alojamentos Turísticos, Lda., é uma empresa que se destina ao alojamento turístico no Porto e Norte de Portugal.
bnapartments, são apartamentos e Chalé, destinados a alojamento temporário. Neste momento, dispõe de 8 unidades, estrategicamente situadas em 8 das localizações mais interessantes na cidade do Porto e Norte de Portugal
* bnapartments Palácio - Junto ao Palácio de Cristal.
* bnapartments Rio - Entre a Cordoaria e a Alfândega,  junto à Muralha Fernandina.
* bnapartments Trindade - A 100 mts da estação de metro "Trindade" e a 200mts da Câmara Municipal e do mercado do Bolhão.
* bnapartments LoftPuzzle - No Largo dos Lóis, junto à Avenida dos Aliados, Estação S. Bento, Torres dos Clérigos, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - A 200 mts da Praça da Ribeira, mercado Ferreira Borges, Palácio da Bolsa, Igreja Monumento S. Francisco, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - Próximo de Cedofeira, a 400 mts da Torre dos Clérigos
Bagoada Shelter - Casa com 2 quartos a 3 km de Vila Nova de Cerveira, 17km das praias de Moledo, 76 km de Braga, 133 km de Santiago de Compostela, 56 km de Vigo
* bnK Sailing - Veleiro de 14 metros, com 3 quartos, habitualmente atracado na Douro Marina, na Afurada, Vila Nova de Gaia

bnapartments Loftpuzzle is well located in the center of Porto, just 100 meters from the central Avenida dos Aliados and 200 meters from the historic São Bento Railway Station. The stylish studios are 150 meters from a metro station.

The space
The studios offer views over Porto and have a living room with a flat-screen TV including national and international channels.

Each unit accommodates a maximum of 2 adults and 2 children, with 2 single beds and a double sofa bed, as well as a full kitchenette and a fully equipped private bathroom.

The historic Ribeira area offers views of the Douro River and is 600 meters away, with a wide range of traditional restaurants and cafés.

License number
956
column7: The Galerias de Paris, the main nightlife area in the city of Porto, features several bars and restaurants are at 350 meters away. The iconic Torre dos Clérigos is 180 meters from the studio. The D. Luis I Bridge is 1 km away and connects directly with the neighboring town of Vila Nova de Gaia, where the Port Wine Cellars are located.

column5: Villa with 2 bedrooms in Oliveira de Azeméis, with private pool, furnished terrace and WiFi - 20 km from the beach
column6:
This villa, located in Oliveira de Azeméis, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a private pool, a furnished terrace and WiFi.

The space
This villa, located in Oliveira de Azeméis, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a private pool open all year, a furnished terrace and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 6 or outside, on the terrace enjoying views of the swimming pool.
The villa has 2 comfortable bedrooms, 2 including a double bed and a private bathroom with a shower and toilet.
The villa features a dryer, central heating, a washing machine and ironing equipment.
Note that the cleaning, towels, bed linen and tourist tax are included in the ren
column7: This villa enjoys a privileged location that will allow you to enjoy your stay in the area. Many activities await you in the surroundings, such as Swimming and Hiking.  Furadouro-Ovar beach is 20 km away from the villa. You will also find great bars and restaurants at 2 km and a supermarket within 2 km.

column5: BonPorto 381 - Charmy Duplex w/ Stunning Courtyard
column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find an awesome duplex located in the city center in a friendly neighborhood with Free Wifi and Netflix.

It is the best option for groups of friends or families who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
Duplex apartment in the city center located in a quiet neighborhood and near metro 24 de Agosto and just 10 minutes away from São Lázaro Garden.

You have a queen bed, 2 individual beds and 2 sofa-beds to have a great night of sleep and an incredible terrace where you can enjoy the warm days and nights of the city.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country.

We have a surprise for you! Netflix to chill at the end of the day before sleeping.

Do you want to try
column7:
Bonfim has all kinds of shops nearby as it is just minutes away from the center. Lidl supermarket is a 1 minute walk away and Pingo Doce supermarket is a 7 minute walk away.

There is coffee and bakeries in the area so you can have breakfast or an afternoon snack.

You will find trash bins near the apartment.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column6:
CONTACT US FOR PRICES AND CONDITIONS FOR LONGER STAYS
A modern one bedroom apartment, furnished, equipped ready for short term stays. It is located on the fourth floor of a charming building from the 1960's. There isn't a lift, so be ready to go up those stairs!
There are buses in front, and the metro is less than 500m away. It is a great place, if you like walking and living in a more traditional Porto's atmosphere.

The space
This new apartment has been furnished and equipped with the comfort having our visitors in mind. Once you have climbed the four floors through a very beautiful staircase, you reach the open gallery from which the apartment is accessed.
This has been increased, with the entrance to the large living room with sofa (sofa bed for one person), side table and flat screen television. At the bottom left is the kitchen area, equipped with a hob, fridge, coffee machine, electric kettle and toaster, it has everything you need to prepare
column7:
This apartment is located in a central area of Porto. Very close, just across the street, is one of the best and traditional restaurants of Porto, the Portucale. When you go up the street and then to the west, you reach Praça do Marquês, after 8 minutes walking. Here you have a metro station for the line that goes from the centre to the university grounds near Hospital de São João. The nearest supermarket is also here, as well as a Post office and several other services and shops.

Going the Rua da Alegria downhill you reach the centre of Porto in less than 15 minutes walking. On the way there is ESMAE, the superior School of Arts and Music.

It's a lively area of Porto, central, with easy access to the university near Hospital de São João as well as to the centre of Porto. Ideally located for a short term stay. Erasmus post-graduates find here a good place to stay.
column14:
2004, during the Football european championship I rented out a fully furnished and equipped flat in Porto to foreign guests. It was the one in Boavista. 
The experience was great. The people who stayed loved the apartment, and I loved the concept of renting my flat to visitors. I prepared the flat not only with furniture and bed linen! I tried to gather useful information about Porto and surroundings in order to help my guests make the best of their time in town.
Then friends and family, who either got married and saw their families grow or had to move abroad, started asking me to take care of their flats, apartments or townhouses and find guests. Again, I prepared the flats so that anyone visiting Porto would feel welcome and easily integrated in Porto.
Well, now it's two of us, me and my colleague Paula (https://www.airbnb.pt/users/show/180050) and we decided to create a small company called Flat in Porto to manage all these flats and get them ready to welcome you in our city. 
All of these homes still have the owners' own touch, so you get an inside feeling of how people live in Porto. We hope you like your new temporary home in Porto, no matter if you are on holidays, studying or working here, and we do hope you enjoy your stay with us!

column6:
A cozy and modern fully equipped studio with all amenities you need including air conditioning and access to on-site parking (paid) for a perfect and comfortable stay. Located in the center of Porto, the studio is close to all the main touristic attractions and you will be just 5 minutes away from Palácio de Cristal, Porto Art District and the beautiful Douro River.
Vilar Charming Studio invites you to explore the best part of the city!

The space
￫ Building
The apartment is located on the 3rd floor with elevator. It's fully-equipped and located in a central yet lively area of Porto. It's absolutely perfect for couples or solo travellers.

￫ Bedroom
The apartment one bedroom with a double-bed.

￫ Bathroom
The apartment has a bathroom with shower.

￫ Living/Dining Room
The living room has a Smart TV, an inviting sofa next to the large windows and dining table for 4.

￫ Kitchen
Fully Equipped
column7:
Vilar Charming Studio is located in the “midtown" of Porto, also known as the "Caminhos do Romântico" area. It is a very calm and chic area with public transport to anywhere around Porto, Gaia and Matosinhos.
It is just a few meters away from the Douro River and Crystal Palace. You can reach almost every touristic sights by foot and in about 15 minutes you can get to Downtown Porto.
column14:
Founded by travel enthusiasts (just like you) BnBird wants to connect guests, with new traveling experiences in Portugal, while offering an unique hosting approach.
Being natural born Portuguese, and Lisbon lovers, we found that our country, is one of the best places in the World to do it. That’s why we founded BnBird, to give our guests the opportunity to discover our country, its history and charm, with a more local perspective.

column6:
Aproveite uma das melhores praias de Portugal!
O Loft fica a poucos metros da Praia da Sereia, em Canidelo. Existem muitos restaurantes próximos e um Supermercado Continente do outro lado da rua. O Loft tem toda a estrutura para uma ótima hospedagem, com cozinha equipada, casa de banho privada, uma cama de casal confortável, sofá, SmarTV, uma ótima varanda com linda vista e wi-fi. Além disso ainda temos uma vaga de garagem no subsolo do prédio.

The space
Nossos hóspedes poderão usar com exclusividade todas as instalações do Loft, além da vaga de garagem.

License number
109130/AL
column7: As praias na nossa região são encantadoras!

column14: Sou uma pessoa de bom relacionamento e apaixonado por viajar. Faço parte da comunidade do Airbnb desde 2017, tanto disponibilizando minhas propriedades a outros viajantes, quanto me hospedando em propriedades através do Airbnb quando viajo. É sempre um prazer receber novos membros e conhcer novas pessoas. Seja bem vindo!!!

column6:
O Apartamento Wonderful Porto Douro Mirage é composto por um quarto, uma sala, uma casa de banho e um corredor. Piso em soalho de madeira de pinho. Quarto com cama de 160 x 200. . Casas de banho em mármore de Estremoz. Cozinha lacada em branco com mármore e totalmente equipada. Ar condicionado na sala e no quarto. Tv de ecran plano 4K. Canais por cabo e Netflix. Wi-fi de alta velocidade. Entrada no prédio e no apartamento por códigos de acesso. Decoração de alta qualidade e elegância.

The space
O Apartamento Wonderful Porto, situa-se na zona histórica do Porto, a cidade Património Mundial da UNESCO. Renovado recentemente, este edifício do século XIX, oferece todo o conforto para uma óptima estadia num ambiente elegante e numa atmosfera familiar. A reforma do edifício respeitou o traço autêntico e genuíno que tanto caracteriza os edifícios antigos da cidade. Os azulejos da fachada pintados à mão, o soalho em madeira de pinho, as típicas janelas em madeira com
column7: Local com uma forte carga histórica da cidade do Porto e uma vista fantástica sobre o Rio Douro. Os apartamentos estão situados numa zona sossegada e típica do Porto a poucos minutos de vários pontos de interesse da cidade. Aproveite para fazer um passeio a pé ou de bicicleta junto ao rio e descubra toda a beleza natural desta magnifica cidade e das suas praias.

The bnapartments, with 9 spacious and modern apartments (4 studios + 4 T1 + 1 T1 with terrace), are the perfect combination for those who value the comfort of home, combined with the standards of the hotel.

Whether for leisure or for longer stays, bnapartments are the perfect solution.

These apartments are self-sufficients, with a fully equipped kitchen, flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

column7:
Located on a main street named because of the Chapel of Senhor Jesus da Boa Nova, built by the sodality of S. José and S. Brás through carpenters, sculptors, guitar makers and lathe workers in 1782 Rua Miguel Bombarda, the heart of today's culture, where dozens of art galleries attract crowds of art lovers, investors, artists and followers of an alternative lifestyle, you will find a high quality building with modern finishes. and functional decor.

The bnapartments are located just 50 meters from the beginning of Rua Miguel Bombarda, 150 meters from the entrance to the Palácio de Cristal, 250 meters from Faculdade de Farmácia e do Instituto de Ciências Biomédicas Abel Salazar (ICBAS), Universidade do Porto (3 '), 350 m (4') from Artes e Partes, 500 m from the Soares dos Reis Museum, 500 m from the Romantic Museum of Quinta da Macieirinha / Solar Port Wine / beginning of the “Caminho do Romântico ”, 850 mts (9 ') from the Faculdade de Direito da Universidade do Porto, 900 mt

column6:
bnapartments Loftpuzzle is well located in the center of Porto, just 100 meters from the central Avenida dos Aliados and 200 meters from the historic São Bento Railway Station. The modern and stylish studios are 150 meters from a metro station.

The space
The studios offer views over Porto and a living room with a flat-screen TV with national and international channels and a sofa.

Each unit accommodates a maximum of 2 adults and 2 children, with 2 single beds and a double sofa bed, as well as a full kitchenette and a fully equipped private bathroom.

The historic Ribeira area offers views of the Douro River and is 600 meters away, with a wide range of traditional restaurants and cafés.

License number
5730/AL
column7: The Galerias de Paris, the main nightlife area in the city of Porto, features several bars and restaurants are at 350 meters away. The iconic Torre dos Clérigos is 180 meters from the studio. The D. Luis I Bridge is 1 km away and connects directly with the neighboring town of Vila Nova de Gaia, where the Port Wine Cellars are located.

column6:
If you’re looking for where to stay in Porto, Kyllinga Apartment is a comfortable accommodation for 3 people in the heart of the city.

The space
Kyllinga is a cozy one-bedroom apartment, equipped and decorated to make its guests feel at home. With access to the small balcony overlooking the city, the living room features a TV, wi-fi, heating, and a kitchenette with microwave, stove, fridge, and a few other utensils and appliances allowing you to prepare quick meals in the apartment. Besides the comfortable double bedroom, the sofa in the living room turns into a sofa bed at night for one person, which makes this vacation rental in Porto a good option for up to 3 guests. And, of course, there’s also a modern bathroom available with a shower.

Guest access
Its location near the city center is pretty good too, for anyone wanting to discover Porto. The nearest metro station (Marques) is located within walking distance - 900 meters away. Santa Ca
column7: Near the heart of Porto, this is a great base to discover the city. There are restaurants, shops, and services nearby, as well as public transport - that said, you can easily pop in the metro and reach any part of the Invicta. However, some of the most popular sights are within walking distance of the apartment, such as Santa Catarina Street, Aliados, Bolhão, etc. In the city, you should also visit the Clérigos Tower, Ribeira, and Luis I Bridge, among others. Then, cross the bridge and enjoy the amazing view of Porto from Gaia.
column14:

column14: We are Sweet Inn and we offer a unique hospitality experience. We have over 400 stylish apartments for vacations and business trips in 10 incredible European cities. We’ve hosted thousands of guests since 2014 - so rest assured, you won’t have any unpleasant surprises. Spoiler Alert: Our apartments are professionally designed for the ultimate comfort - heavenly beds, the fluffiest towels, toiletries by Nuxe, a Nespresso machine, super-fast WiFi and tons of other perks; trust me, you’ll notice the difference. Two more things you should know about Sweet Inn: We have a local team in every city that will take the best care of you; we’ll even personally meet you at the apartment to show you in. And we’ll help you make the most out of your stay in Lisbon with tips only a local would know. We also offer incredible services to upgrade your stay - airport transfer, housekeeping, full fridge, private chef and many more. One last thing, download our App after booking, it’s really great; it will make your experience so much smoother.

Situated between the hills of Miragaia, bnapartments Rio offers spacious and modern accommodation.

The apartments feature wooden floors, a flat-screen TV with national and international channels and a private bathroom.
It also has a fully equipped kitchenette with dishwasher.
Wi-Fi is available free of charge.

The space
Apartment with a generous area that can accommodate up to 4 people (2 adults and 2 children). It consists in a spacious living room that includes a double sofa bed, bedroom with 2 beds, a modern bathroom complete with bathtub and a kitchenette.

License number
5761AL
column7:
Guests can enjoy local and international cuisine, as well as the famous Port Wine in the various cafes, restaurants and bars located less than 10 minutes' walk from the bnapartments Rio.

The Misericórdia Church, the Belomonte Palace and São Bento Station, with metro and train connections, are about a 15-minute walk away.

Newly renovated apartment with excellent natural light. It is perfect for your stay in Porto!
Located in the centre of Porto, in a quiet area, it's only 5 minutes away from the famous Rua Santa Catarina.
Equipped and with 2 elevators, it will accommodate up to 4 people comfortably.

We are following all the public health guidelines to ensure the apartment is properly sanitized for your arrival. All the necessary precautions have been taken in order to guarantee a clean & safe stay.

The space
Centrally located in a quiet neighbourhood, this apartment offers you everything that you need for a relaxing stay.
The apartment accommodates 4 persons very comfortably.
It has one bedroom with a double bed and two sofa-beds in the living room.
Inside the apartment you will find an open kitchen with a dishwasher, washing machine, fridge, coffee machine, toaster, kettle, oven and stove.

column6:
Located in the historic centre, 2 minutes walk from Ribeira, the quays and close to the main historical sites of the city, spend your days in Porto in the comfort and tranquility of this elegant apartment on the 4th floor with elevator.

Only a 5-minute walk away, you will find São Bento Station, Taxi Square and the metro station (yellow/D line).

From the airport it is a 40 minute direct subway ride and 20 minutes by Taxis/Uber.

The space
FR :
Appartement joliment meublé et décoré disposant de tout le nécessaire pour un séjour parfait à Porto.

L’appartement dispose d’une cuisine entièrement équipée, d’un coin salon avec un canapé convertible, ainsi qu’une partie chambre avec un lit double et d’une salle de bain.

Les clients ont un accès privé à l’appartement entier et une connexion internet gratuite et illimitée.


EN :
Beautifully furnished and decorated apartment with everything you need fo
column7:
FR :
Le centre historique de Porto est l'endroit où séjourner ! Rempli d'histoire, de monuments, boutiques et restaurants.

À pied, vous trouverez : Ribeira, la gare Sao Bento, la tour Clerigos, la cathédrale de Porto, l'avenue Aliados, la librairie Lello, le pont Dom Luis I, le palais Bolsa, l'église Saint-François, parmi bien d'autres incontournables !

Profitez de la ville comme un local !


EN :
The historic centre of Porto is the place to stay ! Filled with history, monuments, shops and restaurants.

On foot you will find : Ribeira, Sao Bento train station, Clerigos Tower, Porto Cathedral, Aliados Avenue, Lello Bookshop, Dom Luis I Bridge, Bolsa Palace, St. Francis Church, among many other must-sees !

Enjoy the city like a local !


PT :
O centro histórico do Porto é o lugar para ficar ! Cheio de história, monumentos, lojas e restaurantes.

A pé você encontrará : Ribeira, Estaçã
column14: I am Romain and I come from France. After visiting Portugal, I decided to settle in Porto. It will be a pleasure to welcome you in Porto and to share with you my love for this charming city.

column5: Livgreen apartment in the heart of Porto downtown
column6:
The apartment has a living room, with a kitchenette included, and one bedroom facing a calm street. The bedroom is separated from the living room by a corridor with a small set of steps. The living room includes a comfortable two-person sofa bed, a dining table, TV and fully equipped kitchenette with dishes, utensils, and appliances – a dishwasher, a small fridge, an induction stove, a microwave and a coffee maker. The bathroom includes a shower. The apartment is accessed using a security code.

The space
It is possible to prepare two single beds instead of a double bed.
We also have available a baby cot and a baby chair.
In both cases, please let us know when placing your reservation.

Guest access
The apartment and common entrance with seating area.

Other things to note
The apartment is in 1st floor of a recently renovated building, accessible only by stairs. The building does not have an elevator.
column7: Livgreen Clérigos apartment is located in the heart of Oporto, just around the corner from Clérigos tower and the famous Lello bookstore. The apartments are only a few minutes´ walk from Avenida dos Aliados (8 min), São Bento train station (6 min) and popular sunset viewpoint Miradouro das Virtudes (7 min). Nearby located Praça de Lisboa (3 min) is the ideal place to sit and relax with a beer or glass of port wine, or you can have a cup of coffee with the delicious Pastel de Nata.

column5: Guest H4U - Campanha 1st floor Porto center
column6:
Guest H4U - Campanha 1st floor, is an apartment completely renovated in Campanha. Our modern, elegant and air-conditioned accommodation consists of 2 bedrooms, our sofa is convertible and 1 bathroom with shower. It can accommodate up to 6 people. You can do everything on foot to visit Porto with friends or with your family. #portugal #porto #citycenter #holiday # guesth4u #weekend #romantic #sun #citybreak # family

The space
Guest H4U - Campanha 1st flor is located on the ground floor of a small traditional building completely renovated in October 2019. Guest H4U - Campanha 1st floor is fully equipped and decorated with care, in a very contemporary decoration. It has two bedrooms, one with a Queen Size bed (160 * 200) and the other consists of 2 single beds (90 * 200). Our apartment has reversible air conditioning (hot or cold depending on the seasons). It also has a beautiful room to live with a dining area with a table integrated in the kitchen and a seating ar
column7:
Guest H4U - Campanha 1st floor is located in the heart of the Campanha neighborhood. It has restaurants, bars, shops nearby and a great variety. It is close to the train and metro station Campanha, which allows you to move in the city of Porto and its surroundings: Braga, Aveiro, Guimaraes.
It is also only two stations away from the famous Bolhao market to taste the excellent
Pasteis de Nata in Mantegaria.
column14:
Bonjour à tous,
Je suis tombée amoureuse de Porto et j’ai donc décidé de venir m’y installer. Mon parcours hotelier m'a donné envie  de créer ma propre société Guest H4U.
C'est une belle aventure que je partage avec mon conjoint, Mathieu.
Nous vous accueillons comme à l'hotel dans chaque appartement. Nous avons développer des partenariats (chauffeurs privées, guide, chasse aux trésors, tour dans le Douro) qui vous permettrons de découvrir Porto comme les Portuenses!
N’hésitez pas à nous contacter pour plus d’informations
Et d'ici là faites de beaux voyages!
Isabelle & Mathieu et toute l'équipe  @GuestH4U

column5: Suite King Deluxe in ROSA ET AL Townhouse
column6:
ROSA ET AL Townhouse King Deluxe Suites overlook the Aromatic Garden and the inner quarters of Cedofeita, enjoying the sunset each day, sitting in your own varanda.

The space
ROSA ET AL is a doorway as much as a house, a place you can call home, a refuge for those who are looking for inspiration. The spirit is about being open, open-minded, inclusive, welcoming, fresh thinking, alternative and thinking out of the box. It is integrity, fun, dynamism and imagination. Of course that creativity is quite relevant.

License number
35807/AL
column7: The townhouse is surrounded by galleries, artists’ studios and concept stores. If you already enjoyed our meals in house don't miss our favourite Cafe and Restaurant EARLY, 5 minutes walking from our Townhouse
column14:
A Portuguese registered architect, from Porto, Portugal.
I love travelling around the world and I have lived in several places: Los Angeles, New York, Delft , Rotterdam, London, Montreal, among other short stays in many countries and cities. When I travel, I try to be a true local most of times, to get a grip of the dynamics of the place and the people that make that place.
I work in the fields of architecture and in theatre and the performing arts, devoting part of my time  to creative culinary arts. My five can't-live-without-things are: food, people, beauty, travel and art in-all-its-forms!
Welcome to Porto!

This sunny and brightful 2 bedroom apartment is located in the historical centre of Porto, only 5 minutes away from Sé Cathedral and the famous D. Luis bridge.
The flat is within walking distance to most Porto's landmarks. Its best feature is the magnificent view over the river and the bridge.

We are following all the public health guidelines to ensure the apartment is properly sanitized for your arrival. All the necessary precautions have been taken in order to guarantee a clean & safe stay.

The space
This is a 2 bedroom apartment with 1 full bathroom.
The apartment accommodates 4 persons very comfortably.
Inside the apartment you will find:
- Wi-Fi internet
- Cable TV
- Hairdryer
- Open kitchen with dishwasher, washing machine, fridge, coffee machine, toaster, kettle, oven and stove

column14: Hello! My name is Paulo and I live in Brasil with my wife Alessandra :) Everytime we have the chance, we come to Porto for a little vacation. We love spending time here because this is such a welcoming city. I am sure you will have the best time here!

column5: Premium Surf House in Porto- Double or Twin Room
column6:
Esta casa faz parte de um projeto de Surfcamp. Aqui o ambiente respira surf, no entanto todos serão bem-vindos mesmo que não queiram surfar. O nosso objectivo será fazer com que se sinta em casa, mas nesta cidade fantástica com tantas possibilidades. A casa tem 4 quartos podendo receber no máximo até 14 hóspedes. 3 dos quartos são privativos (1 deles com wc privativo) e há também um quarto partilhado de 1 a 6 pessoas. Poderá encontrar os outros quartos nos meus anúncios no meu perfil.

The space
Este quarto tem duas camas single super confortáveis que estando juntas se transformam numa ótima cama de casal

Guest access
Os Hóspede terão acesso a toda a casa, incluindo a sala de estar, sala de jantar, cozinha totalmente equipada, os jardins...

Other things to note
Esta casa surge no processo de rebranding da Porto Surf House que se tornará parte da marca "Cirlce Surfcamps". Tal como o nome sugere temos como principal ativ
column7: A casa está localizada num dos mais prestigiados locais da cidade do porto em plena Avenida da boavista muito próxima das praias da Foz do Douro e de Matosinhos. Zona muito calma.
column14:
Eu sou um apaixonado por surf e tenho a certeza que o farei também a si um apaixonado por este modo de vida. Caso já seja surfista compreende o que quero dizer. Comecei a dedicar a minha a vida a este projeto de surf oferecendo um conjunto de alojamento com aulas de surf. No entanto o que tenho para oferecer é muito mais do que isso. Partilho a experiência de viver no porto por uns dias do ponto de vista de um residente o mais local possivel. Poderei mostrar os melhores restaurante para um breve almoço revitalizante depois de uma aula de surf ali num pequeno mercado mesmo ao lado da Surfhouse, ou então mesmo na praia ainda com os fatos de surf vestidos..
Gostaria de saber quais os melhores spots estratégicos para beber uma cerveja ou um sumo com o pôr do sol como pano de fundo? Eu sei onde são esses sítios. Não há local do porto que eu não conheça e farei tudo para que comece a ponderar mudar-se para cá de vez:)

column5: Casa da Rita - Apartamento com terraço
column6:
A Casa da Rita foi criada e pensada para ser uma verdadeira casa longe de casa onde podemos relaxar no final de um dia de exploração. Está localizada no rés-do-chão de um edifício secular de finais do século XIX e foi objecto de uma renovação mais recentemente com a ideia e o cuidado de preservar, o mais possível, os elementos característicos da sua história que marcaram a sua arquitectura ao longo das décadas. É pois uma casa que tenta conciliar o antigo e o moderno, tal como a cidade do Porto

The space
A Casa da Rita é constituída por 2 quartos com cama de casal, uma sala de estar, uma cozinha, 2 WC (1 de serviço - apenas com sanita e lavatório) e um pequeno terraço exterior com grelhador.

Other things to note
O apartamento dispõe de TV por cabo e internet via WI-FI de acesso gratuito.

License number
106250/AL
column7: A Casa da Rita encontra-se numa zona calma e central da freguesia do Bonfim a menos de 1 km da baixa do Porto onde poderá encontrar elementos tão icónicos como o Mercado do Bolhão, o café Majestic ou mesmo a Capela das Almas na Rua de Santa Catarina. Encontrará igualmente todo o tipo de serviços disponíveis a uma distância curta a pé desde diversos supermercados (Continente Bom Dia, Lidl e Pingo Doce), cafés e padarias onde pode tomar/adquirir o seu pequeno almoço. (incluindo pão cozido em forno a lenha na padaria Santa Clara a uns meros 50 m).

column14:
Cariocas a morar no Porto e apaixonados pelos encantos desta Cidade. Esperamos que você decida se hospedar conosco e que também tenha um espetacular momento na Cidade.
Best Of Porto Apartments - BOP, situa-se no centro histórico da cidade do Porto, na Rua do Bonjardim.
Projetado para ser um apartamento bonito, confortável e acolhedor para 2 hóspedes. O apartamento dispõe de uma varanda.
A uma pequena distância a pé da propriedade você poderá visitar importantes pontos turísticos incluídos no Patrimonio Histórico da UNESCO e também os melhores pontos da vida noturna do Porto.
Estacionamento público disponível numa localização próxima, não carece de reserva e tem custos adicionais: 
Parque D.João I, aproximadamente EUR 16 diário.
Vários lugares importantes da cidade do Porto estão no centro histórico, local onde se encontra nossa propriedade. Você estará a uma pequena distância a pé dos seguintes pontos:
- 2 minutos da Av. dos Aliados/Câmara do Porto
- 5 minutos da Estação São Bento, Sé Catedral e Miradouro e do Mercado do Bolhão,
-10 minutos da Ribeira e da Ponte Dom Luís I 
-10 minutos da Torre do Clérigos , Livraria Lello e da Reitoria da Universidade do Porto, 
-10 minutos do Palacio da Bolsa. 
- 5 minutos da Rua de Santa Catarina, que é a principal rua de comércio tradicional.

Best Of Porto Apartments - BOP, está a só 20 minutos caminhando de Coliseu do Porto e de Varias Caves de Vinho do Porto, como Calém, Ferreira e Taylor’s.
Transportes
Do aeroporto do Porto é uma viagem direta de 30 minutos de metrô até a estação TRINDADE, usando a linha E.

A estação TRINDADE fica a aproximadamente 5 min a pé do apartamento, mas se preferir pode pegar outro metro na mesma estação em direção a estação ALIADOS que fica a apenas 2 minutos do apartamento. 

Apenas a 2 minutos a pé do apartamento encontra-se uma praça de táxis, a estação de metro e vários pontos de Autocarro.

column6:
bnapartments Loftpuzzle is well located in the center of Porto, just 100 meters from the central Avenida dos Aliados and 200 meters from the historic São Bento Railway Station. The stylish studios are 150 meters from a metro station.

The space
The studios offer views over Porto and have a living room with a flat-screen TV including national and international channels.

Each unit accommodates a maximum of 2 adults and 2 children, with 2 single beds and a double sofa bed, as well as a full kitchenette and a fully equipped private bathroom.

The historic Ribeira area offers views of the Douro River and is 600 meters away, with a wide range of traditional restaurants and cafés.

License number
12696/AL
column7: The Galerias de Paris, the main nightlife area in the city of Porto, features several bars and restaurants are at 350 meters away. The iconic Torre dos Clérigos is 180 meters from the studio. The D. Luis I Bridge is 1 km away and connects directly with the neighboring town of Vila Nova de Gaia, where the Port Wine Cellars are located.
column14:
JGGAPARTMENTS - Alojamentos Turísticos, Lda., é uma empresa que se destina ao alojamento turístico no Porto e Norte de Portugal.
bnapartments, são apartamentos e Chalé, destinados a alojamento temporário. Neste momento, dispõe de 8 unidades, estrategicamente situadas em 8 das localizações mais interessantes na cidade do Porto e Norte de Portugal
* bnapartments Palácio - Junto ao Palácio de Cristal.
* bnapartments Rio - Entre a Cordoaria e a Alfândega,  junto à Muralha Fernandina.
* bnapartments Trindade - A 100 mts da estação de metro "Trindade" e a 200mts da Câmara Municipal e do mercado do Bolhão.
* bnapartments LoftPuzzle - No Largo dos Lóis, junto à Avenida dos Aliados, Estação S. Bento, Torres dos Clérigos, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - A 200 mts da Praça da Ribeira, mercado Ferreira Borges, Palácio da Bolsa, Igreja Monumento S. Francisco, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - Próximo de Cedofeira, a 400 mts da Torre dos Clérigos
Bagoada Shelter - Casa com 2 quartos a 3 km de Vila Nova de Cerveira, 17km das praias de Moledo, 76 km de Braga, 133 km de Santiago de Compostela, 56 km de Vigo
* bnK Sailing - Veleiro de 14 metros, com 3 quartos, habitualmente atracado na Douro Marina, na Afurada, Vila Nova de Gaia

column13: Povoa de Varzim, Porto District, Portugal
column14:
O meu nome é João Viana, e venho de uma família onde alguns membros eram proprietários de hotéis no Porto e Póvoa de Varzim. 
A nossa empresa, A GoodPlaces PVZ, é uma empresa de alojamento local, situada na Povoa de Varzim em que a sua principal actividade é alugar apartamentos e casas para ferias de curta duração. 
Póvoa de Varzim, uma cidade à beira mar, encantadora onde pode-se fazer inúmeras coisas, a sua localização geográfica permite que conheça outras cidades do Minho  com vários acessos muito facilmente. 
Os nossos apartamentos estão todos registados no Turismo de Portugal, o que oferece uma maior confiança e segurança ao nosso hóspede. O nosso maior prazer é receber bem e proporcionar aos nossos clientes dias agradáveis e todo o conforto que necessitam durante as suas férias.

My name is João Viana, and I come from a family where some members were owners of hotels in Porto and Póvoa de Varzim.
This is what the hospitality industry has become and as we love to receive people we have created a company called GoodPlaces PVZ, where we have apartments with a local accommodation in Póvoa de Varzim.
Póvoa de Varzim is a charming seaside town where you can do countless things and of course, its geographical location allows you to get to know other cities of Minho very easily.
Our apartments are all registered in Turismo de Portugal, which offers greater confidence and security to our guest. Our greatest pleasure is to receive well and provide our guests with pleasant days and all the comfort they need during their holidays.

column5: Privacidade e calma no centro do Porto.
column6:
Casa com jardim.

The space
Renovada em 2019, a Porta Azul é uma casa típica da burguesia portuense do século XIX. Está situada em frente ao Palácio Cristal, em pleno centro do Porto. O edifício tem paredes de pedra revestidas de azulejos de padrão relevado que contrastam com o escuro do granito. No interior destacam-se os tetos estucados, os vitrais, a disposição apalaçada das divisões e a escadaria central iluminada por uma magnífica claraboia. A moradia disponibiliza um total de seis quartos, um hall de entrada com receção, sala e jardim.

Nº de quartos: 6

License number
7013
column7:
A Porta Azul fica no Bairro das Artes de Miguel Bombarda , no distrito de arte, apenas a 5 minutos a pé das melhores galerias de arte da cidade, em frente ao Jardim do Palcio de Cristal (SuperBock Arena), a 300 metros do Rio Douro e apenas a 50 metros do Museu Soares dos Reis. A Porta Azul está localizada a 1 km da Torre dos Clerigos e da Avenida dos Aliados.

Esta é a parte de Porto que os hóspedes preferem, de acordo com comentários independentes.

Os casais gostam particularmente da localização — deram uma pontuação de 9,0 para uma viagem a dois.

Falamos o seu idioma!

Porta Azul dá as boas-vindas a hóspedes de Booking.com desde 3 de Abr de 2012.

Principais comodidades

column5: Selina Porto - Bed in Large Dorm
column6:
Selina Porto is located at the center of the city, steps away from restaurants, cafés, beautiful and quirky houses, and at walking distance from Ribeira and most of the city’s points of interest. Enjoy the Selina community in the heart of all the action!

The space
This is the option for the classic hostel experience. Every bed has a light, a shelf, a locker with a USB plug inside, and a curtain when the guest wants to keep it private. The glass-wall view allows our guests to peek at everything that’s going on at our bustling patio and decide if they want to join in: a true community experience.

81558/AL
column7: Porto is one of those hidden gems in Europe that’s still largely undiscovered. Experience the true local flavor of Portugal when you stroll among the many UNESCO World Heritage sites and winding alleys of this charming city. Sample port wine straight from the source, stumble upon some amazing street art, take in views from the many lookout points, and spend the day sampling street food while meeting friendly locals. Porto gardens, coastal walks, and historic sites will keep you busy!

column5: Modern 2BED APT in Heroísmo near to Porto downtown
column6:
It's a brand-new renovated two bedroom apartment with good sound isolation. Therefore, the street sounds won't disturb your rest. Living room is open space area with fully equipped kitchen, dining/working table, sofa bed, Wi-Fi and TV with cable channels and access to Netflix. If you're traveling with toddlers, please let us know if you will need the baby crib.

The space
At check in you will receive the magnetic card. It serves to open the entrance door and also turn on the electricity supply to the whole apartment. Next to entrance door there is a slot where to insert the card. So when you're leaving and taking the card out of this slot the electricity supply automatically will be cut to the apartment. We have taken your comfort in account and all rooms are equipped with the air conditioner that in short time will bring the apartment into your preferred temperature.
Please note that this apartment is on the second floor and the building does not have an e
column7:
Porto historical center you can reach in 15-20 min walking distance or in 2-3 metro station short trip. In Heroísmo metro station you can use most of the metro lines bringing your to the city center, airport, Matosinhos beach and football stadium Dragão or shoping outlet Vila do Conde.
A nice walking path or place for jogging is Av. Gustavo Eiffel that will lead you alogside the river Douro to the Porto's historical center part of Ribeira and Port wine selling district on other side of river in Vila Nova de Gaia, and even to Foz neighborhood where river meets the ocean.

Heroísmo is vivid neighborhood where in near distance you can find grocery stores like Lidl and Minipreco, cafés, restaurants and parks. Furthermore, in the walking distance of 700m you can reach the main train station Campanha. It is connecting Porto with Lisbon and other North region cities like Braga, Aveiro, Quimbra.

column5: Duplex apartment with balcony in Heroísmo
column6:
It's a sunny two bedroom apartment with a small balcony with a view to the street. It's brand-new renovated apartment with good sound isolation. Therefore, the street sounds won't disturb your rest. Living room is open space area with fully equipped kitchen, dining/working table, sofa bed, Wi-Fi and TV with cable channels and access to Netflix. If you're traveling with toddlers, please let us know if you will need the baby crib.

The space
At check in you will receive the magnetic card. It serves to open the entrance door and also turn on the electricity supply to the whole apartment. Next to entrance door there is a slot where to insert the card. So when you're leaving and taking the card out of this slot the electricity supply automatically will be cut to the apartment. We have taken your comfort in account and all rooms are equipped with the air conditioner that in short time will bring the apartment into your preferred temperature.
Please note that this

column6:
Fully equipped and located in the heart of Porto, Chã Apartments is the ideal option for your stay in Porto.
Comfortable, practical, recently renovated in a modern perspective, the apartment is equipped with all the necessary needs (microwaves, dishwasher) to provide you the best comfort in your home. The meals that can be prepared with typical products, to be bought in the traditional grocery stores that are right next to the apartment.

The space
See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city.

This apartment is located on Rua Chã, whose name designates the fact that it is a flat street, with records of its existence back to 1293. It has gone through several phases, from the place of sale of electrical appliances, now passing through the great amount of multi-cultural supply store. There are, however, still tenuous shopkeepers, from another era, old houses of buttons and cobbler articles.

It has
column7:
3-storey building, totally rehabilitated in 2020 for touristic rental, situated in a residential area, 140m (1 minute walk) from the Porto Cathedral (Sé) and the famous Luís I bridge where you can enjoy a breathtaking and unforgettable view of the historic Ribeira and modern Cais de Gaia, divided by the imposing Douro River. You can also visit on foot the main tourist points of the city, as well as the area where are the cafes, bars and places of entertainment.
Points of interest:
- Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) (140m / 1min walk)
- Luís I bridge (350m / 3min walk)
- Rua de Santa Catarina - Majestic Café (550m / 6min walk)
- Avenida dos Aliados (400m / 5min walk)
- Ribeira (650m / 7 min walk)
- S. Francisco Church (750m / 8 min walk)
- Mercado do Bolhão (1km / 15min walk / 5 min by subway/tram)
- Torre dos Clérigos - Lello Library(650m / 7 min walk)
- Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church (900m / 12 min walk)
column14:
Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privilege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

The space
Spacious three-bedroom apartment in Porto!

Welcome to Feels Like Home Porto Family Flat!

This fantastic apartment has three bedrooms (one with a double bed, one with two single beds and one with a bunk bed) and one and half bathrooms. The kitchen is fully equipped and the modern living room has a dining area and balcony.

A confirmation voucher will be sent to your e-mail with all the important details about your reservation and Feels Like Home additional services.
Guests must pick-up the keys at the Welcome Centre located in Porto. Arrivals from 23:00 (11pm) to 06:00 (06am), a late check-in fee of EUR 30 shall be applied (paid in cash

column6:
Located close to the Miradouro da Vitória, a viewpoint that offers a romantic view of the river as well as downtown Porto, this one-bedroom apartment is perfect for your trip to our historic city! It comes fully-equipped with all the amenities you could require to make your stay pleasant and memorable. We are certain you will feel right at home here and we look forward to hosting you!

WHAT'S NEARBY:
- Miradouro da Vitória: 3 min
- Palacio da Bolsa: 7 min
- Sao Bento Train/Metro Station: 8 min
- Sé do Porto: 8 min

The space
Situated close to the heart of our historic city, this cozy apartment comprises of:
- One bedroom with a double bed and a closet for storage - the bed comes with a comfortable set of bed linen.
- One full bathroom with a spacious shower; towels and toilet paper are provided for your convenience!
- A fully-equipped kitchenette that comes with all the key appliances you could require for the prepara
column7:
This apartment is situated in Baixa, right above the Ribeira. It is located right in the heart of the city and so there are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
- Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants, and cafés.
- Guindais Funicular
- Port Wine cellars

column5: Villa 263-Moradia T3 - Piscina Privada e Vista Mar
column6:
Moradia para férias localizada na encosta de Caminha com vista ininterrupta para o mar e Espanha. Design contemporâneo muito confortável.
Ar condicionado em todas as divisões e estores elétricos em toda a casa.
De fácil acesso – a 50 minutos do aeroporto do Porto e a 5 minutos do centro da Vila de Caminha.

The space
Moradia com privacidade absoluta. Tem vista ininterrupta para o mar e rio.
Espaço exterior para churrasco e refeições ao ar livre enquanto aprecia um magnifico pôr do sol.
Ar condicionado em todas as divisões da moradia.
Sala ampla, elegante com todas a comodidades necessárias para usufruir de uns dias de férias relaxantes.

Guest access
Rés-do-Chão
Cozinha completa; Casa de banho de serviço; Sala de estar / jantar espaçosa com portas em vidro de acesso à zona da piscina e ao terraço exterior coberto mobilado ideal para refeições ao ar livre.
Andar Superior:
Quarto duplo principal co
column7:
A moradia encontra-se numa zona de privacidade total. No entanto, encontra-se a apenas 5 minutos da praia da Foz e da de Modelo e a 10 minutos da praia de Vila Praia de Âncora. Estas duas últimas praias são ideias para a prática de alguns desportos aquáticos (surf; windsurf, bodyboard, entre outros).
Nas duas vilas mais próximas, Caminha e Vila Praia de Âncora, encontra espaços de lazer, comércio local de qualidade, supermercados e bares (Caminha - Rua Direita).

column6:
Cosy and bright Apartment, located on the 2nd floor in a building with lift, 5 minutes’ walk from Bolhão metro station and Rua de Santa Catarina - the busiest pedestrian shopping street in Porto old City Centre.

The space
Guests have access to all the amenities in the apartment:
- 2 Flat-screen TVs with 121 cable channels
- DVD movie player & children's movies
- Free Wireless Internet
- Computer
- Kitchen equipments and utensils: Microwave, stove, oven, fridge, blender machine, orange squeezer machine, Nespresso coffee machine, bread toaster, food crushing machine, cooking utensils, fine cutlery and porcelain dishes
- Washing and dryer machine
- Iron and ironing board
- Hair dryer
- Set of rich towels for each individual
- Fine bath toiletry
- Comfortable sheets and pillows (100% super percale cotton)

There is also a selection of beverages and snacks at Guest’s free disposal.

THE SPACE:
column7: This neighbourhood has privileged location within walking distance to amazing restaurants, monuments, theatres, bars, shopping, cathedrals, beautiful small plazas and streets with old times flavour and much more. All this made this city a world patrimony declared by UNESCO.

column6:
Uma bela moderna casa de campo, localizada na aldeia da Felgueira, na colina da Serra da Freita e no território do Geopark Arouca, recentemente classificada como patrimônio natural da UNESCO.
Ótimo local para descansar e desfrutar do ar saudável da montanha pelos diversos percursos (PR) aí existentes. Encontrará rios com águas límpidas onde poderá nadar durante os meses quentes de verão.
Com um excelente restaurante muito perto (Mira Freita), onde pdoerá saborear os pratos típicos da região.

The space
Trata-se do 1º piso duma casa na parte "nova" da aldeia onde poderá descansar e relaxar após desfrutar dos encantos da Serra da Freita. Tem entrada independente e é composta por uma cozinha, 3 quartos, uma casa de banho, uma sala e uma varanda. Acomoda confortavelmente 5 pessoas. Tem ainda à sua disposição, na parte de trás do terreno, uma cozinha rústica .

License number
100398/AL
column7:
A Felgueira está referenciada como sendo uma das "aldeias de Portugal", fazendo parte das "Montanhas Mágicas".
Com muitos locais únicos e fantásticos para visitar nas redondezas:
Torre meteorológica
Casa das Pedras Parideiras na Castanheira
Frecha da Mizarela
Passadiços do Paiva
Trilobites em Canelas
Minas do Volfrâmio

column6:
Located in the very heart of the old historical center of Porto, Mouzinho 111 Luxury Loft gives you the experience of living in the city center with all the modern amenities that you will expect in a luxury house.

The space
Mouzinho 111 Luxury Loft is in an area classified as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO and just a few minutes’ walk from Luís I Bridge, São Bento Railway Station and Lello Bookshop. This apartment has a sophisticated and cozy decoration in a perfect location for trendy vacations.

Mouzinho 111 Luxury Loft is in the top floor (3º) of a XIX-century rehabilitated building. The site has all the security equipment of a modern building.

Interior decoration was carefully designed so that your stay in the city is welcoming and memorable. Colorful and cosmopolitan artwork give Mouzinho 111 Luxury Loft a stylish and elegant feel.

Mouzinho 111 Luxury Loft has a beautiful and spacious bedroom with comfortable bed, top-quality
column7:
Mouzinho 111 Luxury Loft is located in the are protected by UNESCO as World Heritage Site with lot's of attractions walking distance from the house.

The area also have some of the best restaurants, wine bars, cafés, concert places, local and international shops, groceries, pharmacies and hospital.
column14:
I'm a young guy from Porto and i have a great passion for traveling and getting to know new cultures and people from all over the world. 

As I travel a lot around the world I decided to share this beautiful and modern apartment with those that have the same passion. 

Mouzinho 111 Luxury Loft was created with enthusiasm, putting lots of care in deco, stylish and high-quality materials to make your stay unforgettable.

We are happy to share our well-proved insider tips with our guests. Upon check-in you will be given a map of Porto and we will answer any questions you have.

We want our guests to feel comfortable and welcome, but we also want to respect their privacy and allow them a private vacation. You are free to contact us during your stay, there will always be someone available to help you.

I have a small dog so my apartment is pet friendly!

Welcome to Porto!!!

column6:
Come and experience the tranquility and subtle charm of our rooftop garden & orchard, perched over the rooftops of Porto.

Located in the historic Rua de Santa Catarina, in a charm, historic building from the XIX century (1821), our mezzanine apartment has a countryside feel to its decor.
Seldom can you find, within a 10 minute walk of the main Porto landmarks (Majestic Café, Capela das Almas, Praça da Batalha) such a complete and idyllic space.

The space
Our apartment is a recent renovation of a Porto period townhouse, conceived by one of the city’s main architectural offices. It has been carefully decorated and equipped with no attention spared to detail and to the comfort of our Guests.
Our 171 m2 Terrace and fruit tree garden, surrounded by an ancient stone wall is the perfect place to observe nature or just have a quiet drink in a warm afternoon or evening. All in the quieter district of Porto’s main shopping district and historic center.
column7:
Inserted in historic and charismatic Santa Catarina street: Porto’s main shopping & commercial district and within short walking distance from Porto’s key landmarks, we have striven to deliver to you a luxurious experience, in a one-of-a-kind setting.
With tremendous attention to detail, we have furnished the studio to a very high standard, taking particular care to deliver amenities and comfort not commonly encountered in other similar flats.

column6:
Esta casa ampla e espaçosa numa pequena vila à beira-mar, fica a 5 minutos a pé da praia e oferece tudo o que você precisa para fazer férias em família.
Acomoda até 8 pessoas, podendo acomodar 2 famílias que viajam juntas. Existem 2 amplos espaços de refeições, um no interior, na bonita sala de jantar e outro no pátio exterior. Os pais apreciarão a proximidade da marginal marítima, ótima para uma corrida ou caminhada ao longo do passadiço de madeira que percorre 25 km da Costa Verde.

The space
Este espaço cuidadosamente decorado num estilo ao mesmo tempo tradicional, colorido e acolhedor está repleto de pequenos detalhes de design para descobrir - dos pratos de cerâmica na parede até uma vitrine de pequenos objectos e brinquedos antigos. Pleno de espaços de diversão, crianças e pais vão adorar os sacos de boxe e a mesa de bilhar e de pingue-pongue.
As paredes do quarto principal são cobertas por mapas e refletem o amor do anfitrião em viajar. Há uma in
column7:
Esta residência fica na vila costeira de Miramar, na cidade de Vila Nova de Gaia, 13 km ao sul de Porto, Portugal. A área imediata é tranquila e residencial e ao virar da esquina encontra um supermercado, peixaria, talho, tabacaria, padaria, cafés e mesmo um cabeleireiro.
Toda a diversão do mar e da areia (e aulas de surf) ficam a 3 minutos de carro ou a 15 minutos a pé. O Parque Biológico de Gaia fica a 10 minutos de carro, com seu enorme dinossauro no estacionamento e a trilha de 3 km, onde as crianças podem avistar cerca de 700 espécies de plantas e animais selvagens.
Nas proximidades, há um clube de ténis, clube de golfe e escola de surf. Apenas a 2 km encontra-se a pitoresca vila piscatória da Aguda, com peixaria, mercado aos sábados e vários restaurantes com vista para o mar.
column14:
I'm from Porto, the most beautiful city in north of Portugal.
I work as a photographer and I also love to travel. 
Gather with friends and cook for them is one of my pleasures in life.

column5: OportoStreet Sá Noronha Apt. Standard Vista Cidade
column6:
O Oporto Street Sá de Noronha oferece uma localização privilegiada, permitindo conhecer os principais pontos turísticos a pé.
A 3 minutos da Torres dos Clérigos, da Livraria Lello e da Avenida dos Aliados, permite vivenciar a cidade, toda a sua história e cultura.
Este apartamento bonito e detalhado está localizado no primeiro andar e inclui um quarto com cama de casal, casa de banho privada e cozinha totalmente equipada.

The space
Este edifício é composto por 4 andares com apartamentos incríveis totalmente equipados, oferecendo detalhes únicos. Por favor, note que não há elevador.

Os apartamentos foram projetados com precisão e com uma decoração contemporânea, oferecem casas de banho privadas, ar-condicionado (calor e frio), TV cabo e cozinha totalmente equipada. Exaltando o conforto, todos os detalhes na construção deste apartamento foram cuidadosamente selecionados.

A sua localização fantástica permite um rápido acesso a pé aos
column7:
Situado numa das mais famosas zonas da Baixa do Porto, os apartamentos estão precisamente no centro da cidade, onde a arte, a cultura, o espetáculo, a história, o comércio e a gastronomia fervilham e se cruzam. Tudo isto, sem precisar de se deslocar em qualquer transporte.

A icónica Livraria Lello e a Torre dos Clérigos estão situadas a 150 metros, a tradicional Avenida dos Aliados está situada a 500 metros e o centro da animação, as Galerias de Paris, estão localizadas a 2 minutos a pé.

Estes apartamentos estão implantados numa das mais procuradas artérias da cidade, integrados num edifício do início do século XX e rodeados da mais variada oferta de restauração, comércio e serviços. Além disso, o Oporto Street Sá de Noronha está servido por uma ligação direta ao aeroporto internacional Francisco Sá Carneiro, através da estação de metro da Trindade localizada a cerca de 10 minutos de distância.

Os apartamentos foram projetados com precisão e com uma decoração contemporânea, oferecem casas de banho privadas, ar-condicionado (calor e frio), TV cabo e cozinha totalmente equipada. Exaltando o conforto, todos os detalhes na construção deste apartamento foram cuidadosamente selecionados.

A sua localização fantástica permite um rápido acesso a pé aos p
column7:
Situado numa das mais famosas zonas da Baixa do Porto, os apartamentos estão precisamente no centro onde a arte, a cultura, o espetáculo, a história, o comércio e a gastronomia fervilham e se cruzam. Tudo isto, sem precisar de se deslocar em qualquer transporte.

A icónica Livraria Lello e a Torre dos Clérigos estão situadas a 150 metros, a tradicional Avenida dos Aliados está situada a 500 metros e o centro da animação, as Galerias de Paris, estão localizadas a 2 minutos a pé.

Estes apartamentos estão implantados numa das mais procuradas artérias da cidade, integrados num edifício do início do século XX e rodeados da mais variada oferta de restauração, comércio e serviços. Além disso, o Oporto Street Sá de Noronha está servido por uma ligação direta ao aeroporto internacional Francisco Sá Carneiro, através da estação de metro da Trindade localizada a cerca de 10 minutos de distância.
