column6:
Exquisite, glamorous studio apartment in the heart of Porto, by Geoatlântico Porto Studio Apartments.

Set in one of the main historic neighborhoods of Porto, come and experience the understated, retro glamour of our studio flat.

We are located in the heart of Porto, in the historic Rua de Santa Catarina and a short walking distance from most of the main city landmarks like the Bolhão Market, the Town Hall, the Majestic Café, the Chapel of Souls, the Clérigos Tower and many other.

The space
The building where our apartment is inserted has been standing proud, downtown Porto, since 1821. The whole building has been recently renovated to a very high standard, by one of Porto’s trendiest architectural firms.
The property was carefully decorated to an exacting vision of stylish, XX century lounge chic, making the seamless contrast to the period features of the original XIX century building.

We have, for your convenience (and compl
column7:
Inserted in historic and charismatic Santa Catarina street: Porto’s main shopping & commercial district and within short walking distance from Porto’s key landmarks, we have striven to deliver to you a luxurious experience, in a one-of-a-kind setting.
With tremendous attention to detail, we have furnished the studio to a very high standard, taking particular care to deliver amenities and comfort not commonly encountered in other similar flats.

column6:
Bright, Spacious, Modern and Clean Apartment with 4 bedrooms, all suites with bathroom, great for up to 9 guests.
Includes bedding and towels, TV and unlimited high speed WiFi internet and Air conditioning in all rooms.

It's a full apartment great for friends and family vacation or even if you need a workplace away from home. Equipped Kitchen, all you need to make your meals.

The space
You will stay in a bright, spacious and clean apartment with 4 bedrooms, each with a private bathroom. Equipped kitchen, ready to use to prepare your meals. Ideal space for up to 9 guests but with spaces that provide privacy for using 4 bathrooms.

♥ BEDROOM'S ♥

4 room's all with private bathroom, cable tv and Wi-Fi available in the bedroom. Privacy in a full space for family or friends or working travels.

★ KITCHEN ★

Full equipped kitchen a big fridge and many storage space. Coffee machine, microwave, oven, kitchen crock
column7:
The local area has every facility you might require during your visit to Oporto. Just across the street we have a pharmacy and a supermarket (Froize). Other facilities including local bars, pubs and local restaurants.

Very close to Avenida dos Aliados, the heart of the city, a sloping boulevard lined with grand buildings and a central promenade, At the other end of the avenue is Praça da Liberdade, a square adorned with a statue of King Pedro IV on a horse. There are also several cafes, including the historical Guarany.

column5: The perfect location to peaceful time by the sea.
column6:
Salty Days Lodge is a relaxed and friendly place where you can feel totally at home.

Free WiFi throughout the property, 2 private rooms (double/twin), and 3 private Double Bungalows. All rooms have their own bathrooms and a spacious shared living room and kitchen, also a really great garden! Choose to chill around the house or take off and explore.

Dinner can be prepared if guests want to join together for a meal (great value, delicious dishes) or suit yourself and cook, or go out to eat.

License number
50984/AL
column7: We are located in Vila Nova de Gaia, which is the city ritgh in front of Porto (you only have to cross the river to get Porto from Vila Nova de Gaia). We are near to the beach, some just minutes away from some of the most beautiful beached in Northern Portugal such as Praia da Madalena (Sul), Praia da Madalena and Praia de Valadares (Norte). In addition, getting Porto from our facilities is piece of cake because you only have to get the tram to go there. Here it’s the perfect location to combine peaceful time by the sea with activity and adventure. Take a sightseeing trip to the city, visit the marina, the river or nearby fisherman’s village, or stroll along the beach and eat tasty local food at the ‘tascas’ - cosy local restaurant/bars. Don’t miss out the classic local gastronomy, especially the well-known Porto ‘sandwich’, the Francesinha. Free daily transfer bus along the coast and Douro river, past marina and into the city.
column14: Gosto de conhecer e receber pessoas no meu Lodge!

Goldnature é um espaço para o hospede usufruir de um contato direto com a com a natureza e está inserido num pequeno lugar ancestral . A quinta possui horta biológica , pomar com fruta variada . temos três tanques de pedra com águas critalinas .

The space
Tem uma exposição solar única , piscina , árvores de fruto , campo cultivado , tanques de pedra com quedas de água e peixes lindíssimos . Música ambiente em toda a propriedade .

column7: Está inserido um lugar rural e ancestral  muito tranquilo  e rustico . tem o pavilhão multiusos a 1 km onde existem frequentemente concerto de musica e variados eventos. localiza-se a 1,5 km do rio Douro que tem praias fluviais como por exemplo a praia da Lomba ou a praia de Marecos.

column6:
A Quintinha de Santiago integra três suites com entrada independente, interligadas por um encantador pátio empedrado, onde o sol espreita através de uma vinha em ramada.

Dispõe de amplas zonas de estar comuns e de uma agradável piscina inserida num ambiente rústico, de comodidades para churrascos e de Wi-Fi gratuito em toda a propriedade.

Todas as suites possuem casa de banho e kitchenette privativas, para preparação de refeições ligeiras, TV de ecrã plano e ar condicionado.

The space
Alojamento Local - 77124/AL

Após ser feita a reserva, o hóspede entrará em contacto com o anfitrião, que lhe dará todas as informações sobre como ter acesso à casa.

License number
77124/AL
column7: A Quintinha de Santiago está localizada em Santiago de Riba-Ul, junto à cidade de Oliveira de Azeméis, a cerca de 30 minutos de carro das cidades do Porto e de Aveiro e das praias da Torreira, Furadouro e Esmoriz. A Quintinha situa-se a 1 hora de carro dos Passadiços do Paiva. Está a 300 metros da farmácia Santiago, a 700 metros do supermercado Lidl e de excelentes padarias e restaurantes.
column14:
Na família desde 1821... 

A Quintinha de Santiago pertence à nossa família há muitas gerações. Sempre foi para nós um refúgio, de onde trazemos tantas recordações. Lembro-me quando era pequenina, quando vínhamos de carro e entrávamos numa "ruazinha" muito estreita entre dois muros antigos de pedra e chegávamos à Quintinha. Assim que entrava nessa rua e via, ao fundo, a casa cor-de-rosa, sentia que a aventura começava... 

Hoje em dia, a Quintinha de Santiago é um projeto que levo a cabo com a colaboração dos meus familiares, em especial do meu pai Pedro, e de uma equipa profissional muito empenhada e especialmente atenta à qualidade e higiene do espaço.

Inês Colaço
column28: O. Azeméis, Riba-Ul, Ul, Macinhata da Seixa, Madail

column14: The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

As it is located downtown moving around will not be a problem. You canjust grab a map and discover this beautiful and romantic city.

The space

The kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge , microwave , toaster, tea-pot and all the kitchen utensils needed to refill your energies. There is also wireless internet and a TV.

Excelente quarto inserido numa moradia totalmente reabilitada no centro de Matosinhos. O quarto é muito espaçoso e possui minibar, microondas, fervedor e todos os utensilios necessários a pequenas refeições. A localização é excelente uma vez que está localizada a 100 metros da paragem do metro e junto de todo o tipo de serviços. No exterior poderá desfrutar de uma zona relvada equipa com mobiliário de jardim, ideal para relaxar. Dispomos ainda o serviço de pequeno-almoço servido no quarto.

column5: Lavra Sea & Sun Beach Apartment (up to 4 guests)
column6:
This bright, inviting open space plan apartment with a large terrace and view to the ocean is located in a beautiful oceanside village, only a 10 minute walk to the beach, cafes, bars, supermarkets, local fish market and excellent restaurants. This quiet condominium is immaculate with 2 pools and a lovely garden for your pleasure if you are not at the beach or walking along the endless boardwalks that line the coast, all the way to Porto.

An awesome location to relax and explore the area!

The space
This apartment is an open space plan with lots of natural light and a large terrace with an ocean view. It is fully equipped with appliances and furniture to make your stay comfortable and convenient. There are 2 pools and a garden to enjoy. This space is best for a couple or a family with children. Everything is within walking distance and easily accessible (cafes, markets, bars, grocery stores, restaurants, gyms, pharmacy, etc).

It is very
column7: This is a very safe and friendly neighbourhood. It is a beachside town with all the amenities that you need; cafés, bars, restaurants, fish and fruit markets, grocery stores, souvenir/clothing shops, a medical centre, pharmacy, gas stations, gyms and an endless boardwalk to witness the gorgeous beaches that line the Atlantic shore.
column14:
I am Canadian and have lived in Portugal since 2008 with my husband and two children. I love it here, it has it all; great weather, gorgeous beaches and a beautiful ocean, an incredible culture and history, hospitable people and delicious food & wine! 

We too, live in Lavra (where the apartment is located) and enjoy all that this area offers; endless boardwalks and biking/walking paths, Blue Flag beaches, local fish and vegetable markets, grocery stores, funky cafés and beach bars, fresh seafood restaurants and gyms.  

We travel a lot and stay in apartments all the time, so for us to share ours with guests visiting the country is a pleasure. We look forward to welcoming you!

column5: Elegant Modern Flat w/ Netflix | Ribeira
column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find a modern and elegant flat which will provide great night sessions with friends in Ribeira. You could be lost in the stunning streets of Porto and always be next to the apartment which has Free Wifi.

It's the best option for groups, families and businesses travelers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
You will stay in a well equipped and cozy apartment with the best location in the City. You are five steps away from the river and Ribeira.

You have 2 queen size beds to have a great night of sleep, an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city and a comfortable living room to have marvellous moments.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your coun
column7: You are in front of the Alfândega of Porto and very close of Ribeira. The apartment is located between the traditional streets of Ribeira and in the surroundings you could find traditional restaurants.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column13: Povoa de Varzim, Porto District, Portugal
column14:
O meu nome é João Viana, e venho de uma família onde alguns membros eram proprietários de hotéis no Porto e Póvoa de Varzim. 
A nossa empresa, A GoodPlaces PVZ, é uma empresa de alojamento local, situada na Povoa de Varzim em que a sua principal actividade é alugar apartamentos e casas para ferias de curta duração. 
Póvoa de Varzim, uma cidade à beira mar, encantadora onde pode-se fazer inúmeras coisas, a sua localização geográfica permite que conheça outras cidades do Minho  com vários acessos muito facilmente. 
Os nossos apartamentos estão todos registados no Turismo de Portugal, o que oferece uma maior confiança e segurança ao nosso hóspede. O nosso maior prazer é receber bem e proporcionar aos nossos clientes dias agradáveis e todo o conforto que necessitam durante as suas férias.

My name is João Viana, and I come from a family where some members were owners of hotels in Porto and Póvoa de Varzim.
This is what the hospitality industry has become and as we love to receive people we have created a company called GoodPlaces PVZ, where we have apartments with a local accommodation in Póvoa de Varzim.
Póvoa de Varzim is a charming seaside town where you can do countless things and of course, its geographical location allows you to get to know other cities of Minho very easily.
Our apartments are all registered in Turismo de Portugal, which offers greater confidence and security to our guest. Our greatest pleasure is to receive well and provide our guests with pleasant days and all the comfort they need during their holidays.

column6:
Probably the most stunning property in downtown Porto! Almost 1000 sqm of lush manicured gardens with tropical species, a lake, an old wine making presser, picnic tables, Brazilian nets where you can rest after a long day sightseeing through Porto, just reading or hearing the sounds of birds and water from the fountain... a Truly Heaven in downtown Porto...

The space
What makes this space unique, is the character of an old palace transformed and restored to the most luxurious standards, where no detail is left unattended. With 900 square meters of lush gardens, romantic paths, fountains, lakes right in downtown, you are transported to another era, but with all the modern commodities. Premium amenities, A/C on every room, outstanding decoration and high standards all through out...

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire property, gardens and are more than welcome to make use of all the facilities available.

License numbe
column7: This is a lovely and typical neighbourhood with lots of amenities, and facilities. Everything is within a short walking distance and as there is a metro station in the same street, even if you want to discover further parts of Porto, that will be the easiest. I recommend taking a 3 day metro card just so you make the most of it, and have the freedom of using the metro to go places. If you prefer to walk, then you couldn’t be in a better place as everything is near.

column5: DV Stays | The Crown BR2 | Private WC | Balcony
column6:
This is a unique place designed for you to have privacy within a home, but community within your reach. This is an ideal place for remote workers and digital nomads. You are booking a private room with an in suite private bathroom inside a unique apartment with three floors and 5 bedrooms.

The space
This is a special triplex apartment. The lobby, the living room and the kitchen are located in the first floor, and the rooms are in the second and the third floors.
The apartment has a homelift elevator to move from floor to floor.
This bedroom area has 12m2. It is equipped with a desk, a desk lamp and a super confortable office executive chair for prolonged working from home hours. Aside from that you also have access to a private in suite bathroom and a private balcony. The balcony has a table, for if you want to catch some sunlight and freshair while you read or for if you want to work outside.
Aditionally, a smart TV with a Netflix and HBO account
column7: The property is located in a great neighbourhood of Porto, very central. It is not Porto's downtown or immediate city center, but right after. I go everywhere walking. The city hall and main square in Porto, Aliados, is at a 15 min walking distance from my apartment.
column14:
Dear guest, Daniel here! I'm an Engineer who is investing in Real Estate. I own properties and have a company called DV Stays to manage the properties of y Real Estate partners, particularly on Airbnbs. In my free time (which is little, unfortunately) I play the guitar and go out with friends!

I just love the concept of having a home everywhere you go and that's why I'm attracted to the Airbnb life. I want to let you know that all is well planned for your stay and that I keep perfecting my systems everyday, exploring new technology and ways to communicate, in order to improve my guests' experience!

I am an avid traveler myself, so I know that we all want a nice place that feels like home while we are away. Count me in to make this experience as close to that as it can be.

All I ask from you in return of my hard work in preparring a home for you is: 
1. Please read my listing carefully.
2. Book only if my listing suits you. Better to be slective first, than disapointed later!

Thank you!
Daniel

column6:
This charming apartment it's located in the beautiful "trendy" neighborhood of Bonfim, in the center of Porto, close to the main tourist attractions.
Ideally situated to take advantage of all that the city has to offer.
The airport is 35 minutes away by metro, the closest metro station is 24 de Agosto, which is a 3 minutes walk on foot.
It is a pleasant and confortable way to start your discovery of Porto's and its surroundings.

The space
This beautiful apartment is very bright and it's located on the second floor.
Comprises a spacious bedroom with a double bed (sheets, duvets, feather pillows), a bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, a stove, a kettle, an espresso machine, an iron with table and all kinds of kitchen extensions. The living room includes a dining area, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The bathroom includes toiletries (soap, shampoo, shower gel), towels and a hairdryer.

A cozy and modern fully equipped studio with all amenities you need including air conditioning and access to on-site parking (paid) for a perfect and comfortable stay. Located in the center of Porto, the studio is close to all the main touristic attractions and you will be just 5 minutes away from Palácio de Cristal, Porto Art District and the beautiful Douro River.
Modern Studio @ Palácio de Cristal invites you to explore the best part of the city!

The space
￫ Building
The apartment is located on the 2nd floor with elevator and has direct access with the common garden of the building. It's fully-equipped and located in a central yet lively area of Porto. It's absolutely perfect for couples or solo travellers.

￫ Sleeping Area
The apartment one bedroom with a double-bed.

￫ Bathroom
The apartment has a bathroom with shower.

￫ Living / Dining Area
The living room has a Smart TV, an inviting sofa next to th
column7:
Modern Studio @ Palácio de Cristal is located in the “midtown" of Porto, also known as the "Caminhos do Romântico" area. It is a very calm and chic area with public transport to anywhere around Porto, Gaia and Matosinhos.
It is just a few meters away from the Douro River and Crystal Palace. You can reach almost every touristic sights by foot and in about 15 minutes you can get to Downtown Porto.
column14:
Founded by travel enthusiasts (just like you) BnBird wants to connect guests, with new traveling experiences in Portugal, while offering an unique hosting approach.
Being natural born Portuguese, and Lisbon lovers, we found that our country, is one of the best places in the World to do it. That’s why we founded BnBird, to give our guests the opportunity to discover our country, its history and charm, with a more local perspective.

column5: Goabio apartmento XL T3 vista de rio
column6:
Apartamento XL 3 quartos central (100 m2) com vista sobre o Douro ! Totalmente renovado. No coração do centro histórico, a 300 m da Alfandega e a 1 km da estação de São Bento - comboio e metro. Parque da cidade e praia (20 min bus)

The space
Apartamento T3 com 100 m2; Quarto 1 com cama de casal (160x200 bom colchão) e dois sofás-cama (80x200) twin, quarto 2 interior separado por parede de vidro e cortina, com cama de casal (140x200 bom colchão), sala pequena com kitchenette (pio, microondas, frigorífico e placa), mesa com quatro cadeiras, dois bancos e uma vista soberba sobre o Douro. Tem ainda um quarto de banho com duche, lavatório e sanita (secador de cabelo). Quarto 3 com cama de casal (160x200 bom colchão) , sala pequena 2 com área de estar dois sofás-cama (80x200) twin, kitchenette (pio, microondas, frigorífico e placa), mesa com quatro cadeiras, dois bancos e uma vista soberba sobre o Douro. Edifício sossegado totalmente recuperado. 2º piso com escadas.
column7: Miragaia é uma zona muito central do Porto. Está muito perto da baixa e ao mesmo é ainda uma zona sossegada, ao contrário da baixa. A presença do rio é muito forte e extremamente relaxante. É uma das freguesias mais antigas do Porto. É muito tradicional, bairrista, gente amável e prestável. Há antigos pescadores, estivadores e despachantes, uma vez que a Alfandega (actual centro de Congressos ) funciona como porto marítimo até aos anos 90. Há uma boa padaria na porta ao lado, uma mercearia a 50 metros. Há restaurantes de francesinhas, tradicionais, vegetariano e sushi num raio de 400 m. O apartamento fica no coração da "Festa de São João do Porto" na noite de 23 de Junho. Esta noite é única e memorável. A cidade não dorme e as ruas enchem-se de gente. No pátio em baixo há sardinhas.
column14: I´m from Porto, Portugal. I´m an architect. I work near Douro river for some years, and i love the area. I´d like to share it with other people.

column6:
Located near the stunning Douro River, this flat is the perfect lodging for couples/friends who wish to explore Porto!

The space
Welcome to our home!

Furnished with vibrant modern-day decors, this lovely home is fully prepped with all kinds of essentials to provide you with a pleasant stay.

The well-lit living room features a convertible sofa bed facing a big flat-screen TV, a dining area with a set of dining table and 6 chairs, as well as a balcony where you can get some fresh air!

The kitchen is fully equipped with all the necessary cookware and cutleries such as a stove, a fridge, and an oven. So, feel free and whip up some delicious homecooked meals!

There’s also a washing machine for your laundry needs.

The bedroom consists of two single beds and a wardrobe for all your belongings. Plus, complimentary hotel-quality linens will be provided upon arrival.

The bathroom has all the amenities re
column7:
Set between the city center and the stunning Douro River, Lordelo do Ouro is a quiet area where family houses share the space with luxurious hotels and condos.

Down by the riverfront, there are ferries and boats that can bring you across to Afurada, a fishing village where you’ll find various fresh fish and seafood.

While exploring the city, visit the Serralves Foundation (the Museum of Contemporary Art), which is just a 5-minute walk away, or take a walk along Foz do Douro or through the Parque da Cidade. Also, don’t forget to try the local dish - Francesinhas - at Capa Negra Restaurant. You’ll fall in love with the dish from just one bite!

Take a leisure stroll to Porto's Botanical Garden and Palácio do Cristal, where the view will take your breath away!

The flat is also within walking distance to various restaurants, pharmacies, supermarkets, and Bom Sucesso Shopping Centre.

Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 12 mins drive away
column14:
Hi there!

We're GuestReady, a professional property management company helping hosts around the world deliver outstanding experiences to their guests.

We welcome all guests, prepare our homes for your arrival and will be available 24/7, should you have any questions or requests. From the second you book with us to the moment you check-out, we’re here to make sure you have a smooth and comfortable stay!

With our years of experience in the hospitality business, you can be assured of a fantastic stay at any of GuestReady's properties. We manage multiple properties around town, so if you're looking for something specific, do let us know and we'd be happy to help you find the perfect place just for you.

We're looking forward to meeting you and are always happy to answer any of your questions!

Warm regards,
GuestReady Porto Team

column5: T3 sublime com jacuzzi e piscina - Casa Namorados
column6:
A Casa dos Namorados é um pequeno empreendimento com 5 apartamentos. Este T3 térreo, é a conjugação dos apartamentos Penelope e Ulisses e Romeu e Julieta. Acomoda confortavelmente 8 pessoas, tendo 3 suites, 2 delas quartos de casal ideais para o romance, e 1 quarto com 3 camas de solteiro. Este apartamento dispõe também de uma varanda exclusiva para fazer as refeições e relaxar.
A Casa dos Namorados tem uma piscina exterior, um jacuzzi aquecido num alpendre, churrasqueira, pomar e amplo espaço.

The space
A cozinha, totalmente equipada, e as casas de banho são modernas e confortáveis. A Casa dos Namorados foi inaugurada em 2019, procurando trazer todo o conforto e comodidade para umas férias de sonho!

Other things to note
A ligação entre os dois apartamentos é feita pelo exterior.

54708/AL

column6:
A GoodPlaces PVZ, é uma empresa de alojamento local, situada na Povoa de Varzim em que a sua principal actividade é o alojamento de apartamentos e casas para ferias. Exercemos esta actividade desde 2013, os nossos alojamentos são todos registados no Turismo de Portugal, por essa razão poderá efectuar a sua reserva com toda a segurança e profissionalismo. Queremos proporcionar aos nossos hóspedes uma estadia confortável para que desfrute da nossa cidade com toda a satisfação e prazer que nós ofer

The space
Este alojamento fica a 8 minutos a pé da praia. O Apartamento Central PVZ é um apartamento situado na Póvoa de Varzim, a 29 km do Porto.

Guimarães fica a 40 km do Apartamento Central PVZ, enquanto Viana do Castelo fica a 35 km da propriedade. A área é popular para golfe e mergulho. O aeroporto mais próximo é o Aeroporto do Porto, situado a 18 km.

O Espaço
O apartamento com 40m², oferece WiFi gratuito, cozinha completa, casa de banho co
column7:
O Apartamento Central tal como o nome indica fica situado no centro da cidade da Póvoa de Varzim
Onde pode desfrutar de toda a cidade desde gastronomia museu, praia e fica muito perto do metro para poder visitar outras localidades, como o Porto
column13: Povoa de Varzim, Porto District, Portugal
column14:
O meu nome é João Viana, e venho de uma família onde alguns membros eram proprietários de hotéis no Porto e Póvoa de Varzim. 
A nossa empresa, A GoodPlaces PVZ, é uma empresa de alojamento local, situada na Povoa de Varzim em que a sua principal actividade é alugar apartamentos e casas para ferias de curta duração. 
Póvoa de Varzim, uma cidade à beira mar, encantadora onde pode-se fazer inúmeras coisas, a sua localização geográfica permite que conheça outras cidades do Minho  com vários acessos muito facilmente. 
Os nossos apartamentos estão todos registados no Turismo de Portugal, o que oferece uma maior confiança e segurança ao nosso hóspede. O nosso maior prazer é receber bem e proporcionar aos nossos clientes dias agradáveis e todo o conforto que necessitam durante as suas férias.

My name is João Viana, and I come from a family where some members were owners of hotels in Porto and Póvoa de Varzim.
This is what the hospitality industry has become and as we love to receive people we have created a company called GoodPlaces PVZ, where we have apartments with a local accommodation in Póvoa de Varzim.
Póvoa de Varzim is a charming seaside town where you can do countless things and of course, its geographical location allows you to get to know other cities of Minho very easily.
Our apartments are all registered in Turismo de Portugal, which offers greater confidence and security to our guest. Our greatest pleasure is to receive well and provide our guests with pleasant days and all the comfort they need during their holidays.
column28: AVer-o-Mar, Amorim e Terroso

column7:
O Apartamento fica ao perto de restaurantes, discotecas, bares e claro da praia. Fica numa zona em não é necessário carro para conhecer a cidade podendo assim deslocar-se para todas as diversões tais como os bares e discotecas já referidos mas também o casino as praias e passeios a beira mar.
O Apartamento Santos Graça, esta situado numa zona prestigiada da Póvoa de Varzim. fica a 30km (20 minutos) do Porto a 40 Km (30 minutos) de Guimaraes e 48 km (35 minutos) de Braga.

column5: Charming House: two floors 7 Rooms - Backyard
column6:
Explore Porto popular sights from a stylishly renovated urban refuge. Vintage house with 7 rooms. Located in a calm and safe place. Cable TV and FREE Internet. Early drop bags available.
Situated on center of Porto. Nice as a starting point to comfortably discover the city.
Subway Station nearby (1 min.) with connection to Airport.
Full equipped kitchen and eating area with modern design, you will also have access to a outside space with garden. Air Conditioned and private bathroom in all rooms

The space
Stay in Porto like a local. You will have almost everything you need for a relaxed stay. The house is amazing with a big place to make your meals and you could appreciate the outside terrace with a garden. Early drop bags is available and also when you check-out you can leave the bags.

Guest access
You will have access to full house, 2 floors and a backyard space to relax. All rooms have private bathroom.

Other
column7: Located in Porto downtown metro in the same street (1 min walk), safe neighborhood, with restaurants and supermarket nearby. Metro in the street connects you to airport and most  of central places: Aliados, S. Bento Train Station.
column14:
Hello my name is António i live in Porto. I love my city, I work in a Hospital as a Pharmacy Technician. 
I really like the feeling of being home. I love trying to give people a space where they feel at home and can enjoy new places and meet new people.
In Portugal we appreciate good food in the company of friends.

Normally when I travel I always like to have a reference point, and using airbnb created this reference point that I needed.

I hope i can make you feel at home.

column6:
This Villa located in Ossela, county of Oliveira de Azeméis, is the perfect symbiosis between Nature and Tranquility. If you are looking to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life in the city, this classy villa is the ideal space for those looking for tranquility and privacy.

Located just a few minutes’ drive from the cities of Oliveira de Azeméis (8 minutes) and Vale de Cambra (6 minutes) and 5 minutes from the A32 access node and 30 minutes from Oporto City.

The space
Villa type T4, consisting of ground floor and 1st floor.

The ground floor of this Villa consists of a huge fully furnished living room, a fully equipped kitchen with appliances and utensils, a bathroom, laundry and a furnished suite with a private bathroom and wardrobe.

The 1st Floor consists of a kitchen with pantry fully equipped with appliances and utensils, 2 bedrooms fully furnished with built-in wardrobes (one bedroom with a double bed and the other wit
column7:
Ossela, hometown of the writer Ferreira de Castro with a river and mountain that invite to walks. Pedestrian paths based on the writer's literature.
Ossela is also well known for its craft beer (Cerveja Vadia) where it is produced.

column5: Woodseahouse! O seu paraíso junto a praia!
column6:

A 200m da praia, 700m do Golf e no meio dia frescura do verde das plantas, venha desfrutar das ferias perfeitas.
Exercite-se no ginásio, jogue tenis e termine o seu dia a relaxar num belo jaccuzi seguido de um belo churrasco na companhia as sua familia e amigos!!
Descubra a beleza de 15 Km de praias, caminhando nas dunas ou andando de bicicleta.

column6:
This apartment is within a colonial style centenary dwelling house from 1907. Hi ceilings, vintage decoration, 3 suit rooms with complete WC, one room with complete WC within the house, large living room, dining room, equipped kitchen, balcony and private garden. Metro station and buses 60 meters away.

The space
Entrance direct from the outside street. Entrance door with coded lock to allow a self-check-in. No close neighbors, except our other lower apartment, with different entrance. The number of rooms in use depends of the number of persons in the reservation. You are free to choose them before (by message) or after (by seeing them) your arrival. Some free parking place at the streets near the house.

80695/AL

O edifício possui um grande jardim onde pode desfrutar do ar livre e apanhar sol, é um edifício centenário renovado, com uma decoração moderna e minimalista.

Guest access
Acesso a todas as zonas comuns do hostel, incluindo a cozinha comunitária, ao grande jardim e sala de estar.

6686/AL

column6:
Green Villas Douro é composto por casas privadas de charme sobre a encosta do Douro, mesmo próximo ao Rio Douro.

The space
Casa acolhedora com grande espaço exterior, composta por dois quartos (suite) com WC completo, uma sala de estar e cozinha.

Excelentes áreas exteriores, com exposição solar para quem gosta de calor e com lindas paisagens que permitem ótimos momentos de descanso.

Estacionamento disponível dentro da casa.

Guest access
Todas as áreas da casa interior e exterior.

94952/AL
column7:
Ao descer a rua está de caras com vistas deslumbrantes para o Rio Douro, onde poderá fazer agradáveis caminhadas pelo passadiço, sempre com o Rio Douro como companheiro, bem como praticar exercitar o corpo no campo de voleibol de areia e nas diversas máquinas de musculação presentes ao longo do passadiço.

No mesmo local existem variados bares, onde se poderá deliciar numa esplanada e ver o pôr do sol.
A mariana do Freixo fica a 5 minutos a pé e poderá encontrar diversas lojas de comércio o que permitirá que nada lhe falte.

column5: So Cool - Grande moradia de finais do século XIX com jardim
column6:
The space
Grande moradia centenária, com um grande jardim equipado com mesas, cadeiras e espreguiçadeiras, completamente renovada em 2013 mas mantendo os seus traços originais e a sua beleza e personalidade, divisões com tetos altos trabalhados, janelões e portas exteriores de corte térmico e acústico para seu conforto noturno, com muita luz natural e uma imponente claraboia. Decoração minimalista que alia o estilo original da moradia com um estilo moderno. O espaço ideal para passar as suas férias em família ou com um grupo de amigos, situada na zona da Boavista, perto da Casa da Música, com todo o tipo de transportes públicos incluindo o Metro a 200 metros. Zona sossegada à noite, mas bastante central pois está perto de todos os pontos principais da cidade, como o quarteirão de Cedofeita com os seus magníficos bares e galerias de arte que o conduzirá à baixa do Porto.

Guest access

column6:
Fruto de uma renovação recente de um edifício antigo, os Apartamentos Castelo aliam conforto, profissionalismo e bom gosto com todas as comodidades dos tempos modernos.
Wi-fi de alta velocidade, fechaduras inteligentes, ar condicionado, máquina de lavar e de secar, são apenas algumas das comodidades que oferecemos para o fazer sentir confortável como se estivesse na sua casa.
A 150 metros da praia, a 50 metros do casino e a 2 minutos a pé da estação de metro.

The space
O edificio todo foi pensado e projectado com o objectivo de serem apartamentos de alojamento local.
Existe ar condicionado em todas as divisões, Wi-fi de alta velocidade, uma Smart TV de grande dimensão, uma cozinha muito bem equipada e com máquina de lavar loiça e máquinas de lavar e de secar roupa partilhadas no edificio.
As fechaduras funcionam por código aleatório para cada estadia, evitando assim o uso de chaves tornando com isto a sua estadia mais segura e o acesso ao edif

column14:
Olá,
Eu sou um rapaz jovem que adora viajar e conhecer novos lugares.
Sempre que viajo prefiro ficar em apartamentos visto que tem outras comodidades e possibilita um melhor convívio entre amigos se for uma viagem em grupo.
Por esse motivo decidi investir no alojamento em apartamentos visto que a Póvoa de Varzim é um óptimo destino para férias junto ao mar.
Na decoração tive o cuidado de escolher tudo como se para mim mesmo se tratasse e por isso acho que acabei com um apartamento muito acolhedor no qual se vai sentir como se estivesse na sua casa.
Estou ansioso para vos receber! :)

Apartamento com 3 quartos localizado numa zona tranquila a 10 minutos do centro de Rio Tinto. Ideal para uma família ou casais amigos que desejem passar uma estadia média a longa na área de Rio Tinto.

Guest access
Os hóspedes terão acesso a 3 quartos duplos (1 deles com varanda), a 2 casas de banho completas, a uma sala de estar com área de refeições, cozinha equipada com área de refeições e uma lavandaria.

License number
109196/AL
column7:
Rio Tinto é uma zona com uma grande dinâmica e com excelentes acessos ao centro do Porto. O apartamento está localizado numa área bastante tranquila e agradável cercada maioritariamente por campos.
Entre as principais atracções a visitar é de salientar o parque da Quintas das Freiras e o passadiço de Rio Tinto (onde começa um percurso pedonal até à ribeira do Porto)

column5: HM - Oporto Boavista Family and Friends
column6:
O apartamento encontra-se localizado numa das zonas mais emblemáticas da cidade, frente ao jardim da rotunda da Boavista. Nas imediações encontrará a Casa da Música, o mercado Bom Sucesso, o Parque da cidade, o Palácio de Cristal, entre muitos outros pontos de interesse.

Tenha a estadia perfeita no coração da cidade e desfrute do melhor que a cidade oferece.

The space
Apartamento renovado no 6º andar de um edifício com 2 elevadores. Encontra-se totalmente equipado, mobilado e decorado com tudo o que é necessário para a sua estadia na cidade do Porto. Todas as divisões têm luz natural.

Poderá contar com 4 quartos: quarto com cama de casal (2) + quarto com 2 camas de solteiro (2). Um dos quartos tem uma varanda virada para o jardim da rotunda da Boavista.
Todas as divisões têm ar condicionado ou aquecimento eléctrico. A sala é ampla e iluminada pela luz natural que entra pela longa marquise, tem dois sofás, móvel e TV cabo, sala de jan
column7:
Localização:
- 350m da Casa da Música;
- 450m da estação de metro.

Diversos serviços nas imediações (bancos, CTT, escolas, faculdades, supermercados, etc).
column14:
Somos uma empresa especializada na gestão de alojamento local. Tratamos cada propriedade como se fosse nossa, porque queremos que os hóspedes se sintam em casa – acreditamos que só assim faz sentido!

Como bons portuenses, somos excelentes anfitriões e sugerimos dicas especiais para que os nossos convidados possam aproveitar a estadia ao máximo, desde visitas a museus aos restaurantes imperdíveis. Partilhamos segredos que fazem do Porto uma cidade mágica. 

Aos proprietários, e nossos parceiros nesta aventura, prometemos experiência, conhecimento e dedicação, com o objetivo de rentabilizar ao máximo cada propriedade. 

We are a company that specialises in managing short term rental properties in Porto, Portugal.

We take care of our managed properties as if they were our own because we want our guests to feel at home and not have to worry about anything when they visit.
 
Just like the inhabitants of Porto, we are friendly hosts and can provide tips for our guests to make the most of their stay. We can recommend museums, restaurants, bars and can provide suggestions on alternative things to do (river cruises, football matches, etc...) As long term residents of the city we can share those hidden gems that make Porto such a magical city.
 
For home owners and potential business partners, we promise a professional service, expertise and dedication that will help you to maximise your returns.
Home Me – Making You Feel Good

column5: Best sensations by PCH @ Marquês metrostation
column6:
Cozy studio 2 minutes from Praça do Marquês de Pombal metro station, located on the 2nd floor with elevator, the studio has a modern full bathroom and a functional and complete kitchen with all the necessary utensils. It also offers a comfortable bed for two.

The space
Ideal for those looking to visit the city of Porto without staying in overly busy areas.
The kitchenette is well equipped with fridge, freezer, hob, coffee maker, microwave and various kitchen accessories (pots, pans, can openers, bottle openers, plates, cutlery, individual, etc.).

The apartment accommodates three people, two with all the comfort in a room with a double bed, and the third staff on a great sofa bed
It also has a full bathroom, cable TV and wireless Internet provided free of charge.

The apartment is on the second floor, so it is necessary to climb stairs.

It is a very pleasant and very original space capable of providing a pleasant stay.
column7:
Perfect space for holidays and / or for a professional stay. The apartment is located in one of the most central areas of the city, close to the shopping streets and the most popular restaurants in Porto.

It is located at Rua de Bonjardim, 800m from the most commercial and typical street in Porto (R. Santa Catarina) and 10 minutes from the City Hall and Avenida dos Aliados, with quick access to all areas of Porto.

It is located 20 minutes from Praça da Cordoaria, surrounded by the Torre dos Clérigos and the famous Livaria Lello.

On the other hand, it is also very close to Praça dos Poveiros, which is known for its excellent gastronomic offer. The famous Santiago restaurant, with the best francesinhas in Porto, Casa Guedes and the famous pork sandwiches with mountain cheese; Since 1927, Buraquinho has served potatoes, soups, rojões, chispe and sarrabulho porridge; At Plaza Caffé Prego, which has a sunny terrace throughout the day, the specialties are the
column14:
Welcome 2 Porto is a professional tourism management team. All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who receive the guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
They are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto, also UNESCO site, listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, influence for Harry Potter, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha and tripas or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.

Wi-fi de alta velocidade, fechaduras inteligentes, ar condicionado, máquina de lavar e de secar, são apenas algumas das comodidades que oferecemos para o fazer sentir confortável como se estivesse na sua casa.
A 150 metros da praia, a 50 metros do casino e a 2 minutos a pé da estação de metro.

The space
O edificio todo foi pensado e projectado com o objectivo de serem apartamentos de alojamento local.
Existe ar condicionado em todas as divisões, Wi-fi de alta velocidade, uma Smart TV de grande dimensão, uma cozinha muito bem equipada e com máquina de lavar loiça e máquinas de lavar e de secar roupa partilhadas no edificio.
As fechaduras funcionam por código aleatório para cada estadia, evitando assim o uso de chaves tornando com isto a sua estadia mais segura e o acesso ao edif
column7:

O Casino fica a 50 metros e a praia a 150 metros.
A rua de comércio da Póvoa de Varzim, a famosa Rua da Junqueira fica a 50 metros de distância.
column13: Povoa de Varzim, Porto District, Portugal
column14:
Olá,
Eu sou um rapaz jovem que adora viajar e conhecer novos lugares.
Sempre que viajo prefiro ficar em apartamentos visto que tem outras comodidades e possibilita um melhor convívio entre amigos se for uma viagem em grupo.
Por esse motivo decidi investir no alojamento em apartamentos visto que a Póvoa de Varzim é um óptimo destino para férias junto ao mar.
Na decoração tive o cuidado de escolher tudo como se para mim mesmo se tratasse e por isso acho que acabei com um apartamento muito acolhedor no qual se vai sentir como se estivesse na sua casa.
Estou ansioso para vos receber! :)

How about waking up, opening your windows and having a breathtaking view over Douro River? That is what you’ll get in Quayside Douro River. Modern, fresh and full of light, the apartment is located in an new refurbished building, in one of Porto’s most charming neighborhoods.
Just steps away from the most iconic places in the city, (such as Ribeira, D. Luis I Bridge, Lello bookshop, Aliados Av, Clerigos Tower), you can also catch the tram alongside the river to Foz to go to the sea side of town

The space
‘Quayside Douro River' is a one-bedroom apartment facing the river in Porto Downtown. It has a maximum capacity of 4 people (1 double room and a sofa-bed) and is very well equipped to receive you during your stay in Porto.
Its freshly upscale decoration will give you all the comfort for you to rest after a day touring the city while it will also give you the opportunity to enjoy a beautiful sunset over the balcony.

column7: The apartment is located in the Historic Center of Porto - the oldest area of the city and it is classified as an World Heritage Site of UNESCO since 1996. It is an area marked by the medieval origins of the city and includes some of the main and best known tourist attractions such as: The iconic São Bento Train station with its marvelous tiles, the Cathedral, Aliados Avenue, Clérigos Tower and Bolsa Palace. The apartment is also just a few steps from the Ribeira area, where you can cross the bridge to Vila Nova de Gaia.

column7:
The apartment benefits from its privileged location in the centre of Porto, and gives access by foot to all points of interest in the city downtown. It is located in Rua de Camões, one of the main streets in the city center of Porto. There are numerous clothing and shoes stores, perfectly coexisting with old bookstores, exquisite coffee shops, as well as appealing pastry shops.

Adjacent to this area, there is the old town and Ribeira area, classified as UNESCO world heritage site, full of old historical buildings, with the Porto Cathedral and amazing views of the Douro river and its bridges, among which stands the famous D. Luís I bridge. The apartment is at a short walk from Avenida dos Aliados, one of the city's most emblematic places its political and cultural center, which is filled with monumental 19th and early 20th-century’s buildings. Also close, the Clérigos Tower, probably the most iconic building of the city, and Lello Bookshop, also known as Harry Potter`s Librar

LovelyStay will also be flexible in case you need to reschedule or even cancel your booking with us. Stay safe!**

Situated right in the heart of Porto, This 1BR can comfortably accommodate up to 4 people making it perfect for families or a group of friends traveling together! São Bento metro station can be found only 2 minutes away, meaning you can rely solely on public transportation to visit the city. If you prefer to walk, the flat is also in walking distance to all the top touristic spots in Porto:
* Aliados Avenue - 3 min walking
* Sé do Porto - 3 min walking
* Luis I Bridge (iron bridge) - 4 min walking
* Ribeira (riverside) - 8 min walking
Taxis, trams, train stations, and bus stops are also a sh
column7:
Sé is a neighborhood where there are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop. São Bento metro station is also only 2 minutes away from the flat which makes visiting the city that much easier.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
- Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants, and cafés.

column6:
Probably the most stunning property in downtown Porto! Almost 1000 sqm of lush manicured gardens with tropical species, a lake, an old wine making presser, picnic tables, Brazilian nets where you can rest after a long day sightseeing through Porto, just reading or hearing the sounds of birds and the water from the fountain... a Truly Heaven in downtown Porto...

The space
What makes this space unique, is the character of an old palace transformed and restored to the most luxurious standards, where no detail is left unattended. With 900 square meters of lush gardens, romantic paths, fountains, lakes right in downtown, you are transported to another era, but with all the modern commodities. Premium amenities, outstanding decoration and high standards all through out...

Guest access

**Covid 19: If you are concerned about the coronavirus pandemic, rest assured that our cleaning teams are equipped to properly disinfect each apartment between stays. LovelyStay will also be flexible in case you need to reschedule or even cancel your booking with us. Stay safe!**

Experience Porto and all it has to offer through this lovely six bedroom flat in Cedofeita, It is located close to all the main touristic attractions worth visiting in the historic area of Porto thus you will be able to walk everywhere with ease! Perfectly suited to host up to 12 people, this spacious flat comprises of a well-equipped kitchen, comfortable bedrooms, two full bathrooms and a living room! You will certainly feel at ease here, and will have an absolutely memorable trip! We look forward to hosting you!

The space
Located close to the city center, the Heritage Collection House is spacious, nicely decorated and can host up to 12 guests, making it perfect for families
column7:
This apartment is situated right downtown, 5 minutes away from the famous Aliados Avenue. There are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop can be found here.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
- Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants, and cafés.
- Guindais Funicular
- Port Wine cellars - sit

column5: Modern Bright Studio by Host Wise
column6:
Live like a local in the heart of Porto.

Located right in the centre of the city, this fabulous studio with modern finishes is the one for you. It will provide you a lovely atmosphere to relax and to discover the city.

It is an excellent option for those who want to enjoy and discover all the best Porto has to offer.

The space
You will be staying in an excellent apartment with modern decoration and all the amenities to provide an epic stay.

The apartment has 1 double bed and 1 sofa bed for an excellent night's sleep and a kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies in the city.

In addition, you can't miss the free Wi-Fi to share all the content and keep an eye on the news.

If you arrive earlier, contact us to try to find a solution. However, there are lockers at the Trindade metro station to store your luggage.

Take the opportunity to be close to the main attractions, monuments and restaur
column7:
The apartment is located in a street full of commerce around. With an excellent pastry shop next door for breakfast and La Vie Shopping Center where traditional Porto marketers are selling fresh and typical products from the city.
Santa Catarina Street is about a 7-10 minute walk from the apartment.

There is also the Letraria pub next door excellent for a late afternoon craft beer on the back patio and Poveiros Square with great restaurants of typical Portuguese cuisine at the price of residents who escape the typical tourism which is just a few meters away.

At the time of São João, in June, and New Year the whole city comes to life. Join the residents and have a unique experience!
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

This charming apartment is located in the typical neighborhood of Fontaínhas, in the heart of Baixa do Porto, close to all the main sights.
Ideally located to enjoy all that the city has to offer, a 10-minute walk from Bolhão station (access to the airport in 35 minutes).
It is an excellent starting point, pleasant and comfortable to discover Porto and its surroundings.

The space
This beautiful apartment is spacious and very bright in a new building, on the ground floor.
It includes a spacious bedroom with a double bed (sheets, duvets, pillows included) and wardrobes, a bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, washing machine, fridge, oven, kettle, espresso machine, small vacuum cleaner, iron with your table and all types of kitchen extensions. The living room includes a dining room, a comfortable sofa bed (sheets and duvets included), a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The bathroom includes toiletries (soap, shampoo, shower gel), towels

column5: Modern 1BR Downtown - Balcony w/ great views!
column6:
Situated just a few minutes from the heart of the city, this flat is perfect for couples or friends hoping to have a relaxing stay in our historic city! Perfectly suited to accommodate up to 2 people, this 1BR apartment comes well equipped with comfortable furniture, ample amenities and a big terrace with breathtaking views over Porto. Our bright apartment is just a 5 minute walk away from the famous Aliados Avenue, 2 minutes away from Santa Catarina Street and 5 minutes away from Trindade metro station! Book now and make this lovely apartment yours for the holidays! We look forward to hosting you :)

The space
Situated in the heart of Porto, this lovely 1BR flat is cozily decorated, well-situated and perfect for your trip to our amazing city| The apartment is on the 4th floor but there is an elevator in the building.

The apartment itself comprises of:
BEDROOM
1 bedroom with a TV and a double bed and very comfortable bed linen ensuring that yo
column7:
The apartment is situated downtown where there are plenty of interesting sites to visit, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop.

Places worth visiting nearby:
*Aliados Avenue
*Tower and Church of Clérigos
*Lello bookstore
*São Bento train station – typical portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
*S. Francisco Church
*Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
*Galerias de Paris - a popular night spot, often frequented by locals.
*Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
*Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants and cafés.
*Guindais Funicular
*Port Wine cellars - situated in Gaia, on the other side of the bridge!

column6:
Fully equipped and located in the heart of Porto, Chã Apartments is the ideal option for your stay in Porto.
Comfortable, practical, recently renovated in a modern perspective, the apartment is equipped with all the necessary needs (microwaves, dishwasher) to provide you the best comfort in your home. The meals that can be prepared with typical products, to be bought in the traditional grocery stores that are right next to the apartment.

The space
See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city.

This apartment is located on Rua Chã, whose name designates the fact that it is a flat street, with records of its existence back to 1293. It has gone through several phases, from the place of sale of electrical appliances, now passing through the great amount of multi-cultural supply store. There are, however, still tenuous shopkeepers, from another era, old houses of buttons and cobbler articles.

It has
column7:
3-storey building, totally rehabilitated in 2020 for touristic rental, situated in a residential area, 140m (1 minute walk) from the Porto Cathedral (Sé) and the famous Luís I bridge where you can enjoy a breathtaking and unforgettable view of the historic Ribeira and modern Cais de Gaia, divided by the imposing Douro River. You can also visit on foot the main tourist points of the city, as well as the area where are the cafes, bars and places of entertainment.
Points of interest:
- Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) (140m / 1min walk)
- Luís I bridge (350m / 3min walk)
- Rua de Santa Catarina - Majestic Café (550m / 6min walk)
- Avenida dos Aliados (400m / 5min walk)
- Ribeira (650m / 7 min walk)
- S. Francisco Church (750m / 8 min walk)
- Mercado do Bolhão (1km / 15min walk / 5 min by subway/tram)
- Torre dos Clérigos - Lello Library(650m / 7 min walk)
- Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church (900m / 12 min walk)
column14:
Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privilege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

column7:
Located in Porto at Rua João das Rules, 107 - União de Freguesias do Centro, 4000-413, 1.9 km from Coliseu do Porto, 1.3 km from Mercado do Bolhão, 1.4 km from Torre dos Clérigos , the apartment has a balcony.
The property is 2.4 km from Livraria Lello and 2.4 km from Praça da Ribeira.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge and a bathroom.

The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Alugabem Apartment Oporto.

column6:
Fique no coração de Porto –
O ML Apartments Republic está situado no Porto, a 10 min do Mercado do Bolhão e a 15 min da Rotunda da Boavista. O acesso Wi-Fi é gratuito.
Inclui uma área de estar, um sofá, uma televisão de ecrã plano com canais por satélite e uma cozinha totalmente equipada. Um micro-ondas e uma máquina de café também são providenciados.
O Mercado Ferreira Borges e o Coliseu do Porto ficam a 2 km do apartamento. O aeroporto mais próximo é o Aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro a 15 km.

Other things to note
Em estadias de longa duração o valor da água e luz não poderá ultrapassar os 70€ mensais, caso o valor seja ultrapassado o hospede terá de pagar a diferença.

License number
90783/AL
column14:
Hello
Since I was very accustomed to traveling, my taste for discovering other cultures has made me a passionate traveler.
One day, with the growth of my hometown, I was working out a travel plan and I thought I could get the other cultures in my own space. And so began this adventure.
To receive guests in a familiar environment, to be able to share the restaurant where as always and even the bus that I use.
With the strength and help of all the guests that come to my apartments to this day, I am happy with my choice.
I have as objective to continue to discover the world and to be able to exchange the maximum of experiences.

column5: Charming studio with balcony by ML Apartments
column6:
Situado a 400 metros do Coliseu do Porto e a menos de 1 km do Mercado do Bolhão, o ML Apartments Story disponibiliza acesso Wi-Fi gratuito e unidades equipadas com uma cozinha e área de estar.

Todas as unidades estão equipadas com micro-ondas, torradeira, máquina de café, frigorífico e chaleira. Há uma casa de banho privativa totalmente equipada com chuveiro e produtos de higiene pessoal gratuitos.

Se quiser descobrir a área, é possível andar de bicicleta nos arredores.

The space
A Livraria Lello e a Rua das Galerias de Paris encontram-se a 2,3 km do apartamento. O aeroporto mais próximo é o Aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro, a 18 km da propriedade.

Other things to note
Em estadias de longa duração o valor da água e luz não poderá ultrapassar os 70€ mensais, caso o valor seja ultrapassado o hospede terá de pagar a diferença.

column6:
Silencioso apartamento, todo equipado, prédio com elevador em região nobre, próximo ao centro histórico, a 500 mts do metro Marquês. Próximo a supermercados, padarias e lojas. Com ônibus para todos os locais do Porto e para a famosa praia do Matosinhos. O metro a partir aeroporto deixa o hóspede a 500 metros do apartamento.
O centro histórico pode ser visitado à pé . Apartamento equipado com chaleira elétrica e fritadeira sem óleo. Rua plana, permite a chegada com malas, a partir do metro.

The space
Apartamento muito limpo, equipado, inclusive com extensões para uso de computador e impressora. Possui fritadeira sem óleo.

column6:
THE PERFECT ISOLATION PROPERTY! Comfortable and hidden behind the walls of manor House this garden pavilion is a perfect isolation place. It is placed in a back yard of a villa but with private entrance and a patio with outside shower, sun-beds, plants, olive tree and BBQ. Although is located only slightly out of the busy Porto center it'll feel more like your in the country! The perfect escape from the current pandemic.

The space
The garden pavilion is an elegant studio of 62 m2 with a contemporary finish with a flor made in a local stone and partialy high ceiling of 3,2m. As an open plan area, the kitchen is defined by fabulous bespoke units with a chic finish ( in brushed gold) that have been thoughtfully planned to provide good storage and ample work surfaces. The kitchen has been fitted with an integrated oven as well as a wine fridge and dishwasher. The outside space has a charming patio with an outside shower and a space for BBQ, creating a wonderful sp

column5: Jardim do Morro - Porto Je T'aime
column6:
Esta é uma daquelas "casinhas" típicas de bairro tradicionais portugueses dos anos 50" e que foi totalmente renovada e decorada de forma moderna e superconfortável.

Está equipada com todo o tipo de equipamentos novos, modernos e actuais - TV + Aquecimento e Ar Condicionado + Internet fibra óptica e uma cozinha moderna completa.

Tem um quintalzinho muito acolhedor para apanhar uns banhos de Sol ou relaxar enquanto toma um fantástico vinho do Porto.

Lindíssima e única.

The space
A proximidade com o famoso Jardim do Morro e a Serra do Pilar a a minutos a pé das incomparáveis Caves do vinho do Porto e da Ponte Luiz I, fazem da nossa casinha o local ideal para começarem a explorar os locais mais icónicos da cidade do Porto a pé.

Inserida num bairro bem tradicional do Porto e rodeada por casinhas e ruelas tão típicas do Norte de Portugal este é um daqueles locais raros e únicos para uma estadia inesquecível.

Muito
column7:
Bairro João Felix – Jardim do Morro - é um bairro muito tranquilo e onde ainda é possível sentir a verdadeira vivência do Porto antigo em toda a área envolvente e a dois passos de distância existem ruas e prédios pitorescos, bares, restaurantes, mercearias, lojas tradicionais, praças, jardins e claro o famoso rio Douro onde tudo acontece á volta da Cidade Património da Humanidade

É a apenas uma confortável viagem a pé – 10 minutos - ou de metro de casa até ao centro da cidade do Porto ou aeroporto uma vez que está servida por duas estações de Metro e Comboios bem perto da casa e inúmeras paragens de autocarros para quase todos os locais mais importantes do Norte. Muito fácil acesso.

A zona envolvente da casa também merece algumas visitas:
O mais famoso Rio de Portugal - Rio Douro - rodeado por centenas de atrações únicas como as famosas Caves de Vinho do Porto, Ribeira e os melhores restaurantes de peixe do mundo e os jardins exuberantes e monumentos ances
column14:
Temos espírito aberto, adoramos conhecer pessoas novas e as suas culturas. 

Gostamos de cinema, praia e de viajar para todo o lado.

João fala  vários idiomas - inglês - francês - espanhol e um pouco de holandês e a Zaida "pesca um pouco de inglês.

Estaremos  sempre disponíveis para o que precisarem. Mostraremos os sítios a visitar e daremos todas as informações sobre a linda cidade do Porto.

"Mi casa és su casa" e por isso gostamos de receber bem e fazer com que os nossos hospedes se sintam na sua própria casa e que apaixonem-se , pelo Porto e por tudo o que de bom podemos oferecer e mostrar. 

Temos a certeza que vai adorar a visita e voltar. 

You are wellcome . See you soon

column5: OPS Miragaia * Quarto Duplo Classico Vista Rio
column6:
Localizado no histórico bairro de Miragaia, este edifício encontra-se de frente para o rio Douro. A sua localização sobre a marginal, é ideal para quem aprecia agradáveis caminhadas ao longo do rio Douro, como também de passeios de bicicleta ou uma ida praia, uma vez que o tradicional elétrico passa mesmo em frente ao edifício.
As suites têm vistas únicas sobre o Rio Douro. Cada quarto apresenta uma decoração clean e confortável, com uma casa de banho privativa e produtos de higiene gratuitos.

The space
O BO Miragaia - Riverside Suítes , está localizado no bairro de Miragaia, tem uma localização privilegiada, onde se observa o rio, dando um encanto natural a esta zona ribeirinha permitindo aos nossos hóspedes a oportunidade de conhecer e vivenciar o cotidiano da vida urbana e cultural da Cidade. As suites têm vistas únicas sobre o Rio Douro, com uma decoração clean e confortável e uma casa de banho privativa com produtos de higiene pessoal gratuitos.
column7: Localizado no histórico bairro de Miragaia, este edifício encontra-se de frente para o rio Douro. O BO – Miragaia Riverside Suites fica a 100 metros do edifício da Alfândega, a 10 min. a pé praça da Ribeira e do edifício do Palácio da Bolsa, bem como dos principais pontos turísticos da zona ribeirinha da cidade.

column5: Spacious flat with great view in the best of Porto
column6:
Spacious 82 m2 apartment with terrace in a beautiful building with typical architecture and completely renovated in one of the main streets in the historic center. The apartment has a large living room and plenty of natural light with its beautiful stone-framed windows overlooking Mouzinho da Silveira street with its sophisticated buildings and charming shops. You will be able to explore the main tourist area of the city totally on foot.
Let us know what we can do to best welcome you!

The space
The apartment is on the 1st floor of the building with access by elevator and stairs. It consists of a kitchen and dining room integrated with the living room, a large corridor with a coat closet, 1 bedroom with access to the exclusive terrace, closet, 1 bathroom and laundry.
The room is equipped with a double bed. The living room has a Thai style double bed that can simply be used for greater comfort while the couple enjoys the beautiful view from the room. The
column7:
This is where it all happens! This apartment is located in the middle of everything, which allows you to explore the main tourist area of the city on foot. On top of that, it is located 3 min / 260m on foot from the São Bento train and metro station and 8 min / 450m on foot from the pier on the Douro River. It is in this pier where the access to the Luis I bridge is located and, when crossing it on foot, you will be in Gaia and you will be able to have the view of Porto that has become the city's postcard.
Rua Mouzinho da Silveira is one of the main streets in the historic center of the city right in the heart of the tourist area of Porto. When walking down this street towards the river, you will pass the most famous restaurants and cafes. You will be able to find a pharmacy, supermarket and everything you need near the apartment.
The São Bento station is beautiful and one of the city's tourist icons. But, enjoy being so close to the station, come in, choose one of the round
column14:
We are Paula and Rafael, a couple from Brazil. We love to travel, mostly to places we've never been before. We love that 'first time visiting" experience!
But, no matter where we are, we like to be in the best location in a comfortable and stylish place.
That's the reason why we decided to found our company, "Qualquer Destino (Meaning "Any Destination", in english).
Our goal is to provide our guests the kind of experience that we like, to make an unique and special one.
column28: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

column6:
Situada no PR4 nas cercanias da Freita, em pleno Geoparque e a 10 minutos da Vila de Arouca, a casa Aroucanatur é o sítio ideal para fazer caminhadas e explorar a flora e a fauna desfrutando da tranquilidade e do ar puro da serra. Desde os famosos passadiços e a maior ponte pedonal suspensa do mundo, na presença das límpidas águas do rio Paiva, até às tão únicas pedras parideiras e às famosas trilobites ,este será o sítio ideal para fazer férias em grupo com toda a segurança !...

The space
A casa Aroucanatur, acabada de ser restaurada com os melhores materiais, pretende ser rústica por fora mas muito confortável por dentro. É composta por quatro quartos de casal, sendo um deles duplo e ideal para um casal com 3 filhos. Tem uma grande cozinha e sala de jantar em open space, uma sala de TV e jogos de tabuleiro e um salão de jogos com bilhar livre, ténis de mesa e matraquilhos. Tem ainda um grande terraço virado a Sul-Poente com vistas deslumbrantes da Serra at
column7:
Ainda no sopé da Serra da Freita, há motivos suficientes para se deslumbrar. A paisagem é coberta por um manto verde, e há locais, como os viveiros da Granja e as bolas quatzodioríticas, que são de paragem obrigatória. As casas, que pontuam montanha pelas aldeias de AMEIXIEIRA, Chão-de-Espinho, Espinho, Povos, Forcada e St.ª Mª do Monte, como que guardam os tesouros da serra da Freita.

Altitudes: Stª Mª do Monte (460m)>-- AMEIXIEIRA (630m)--> Viveiros da Granja (840m)> Forcada (520m)

Época aconselhada: Todo o ano
column14: Sou designer, gosto de viajar, adoro a tranquilidade da natureza e o convívio saudável com a partilha de saberes e sabores!

column6:
Escrito em 1958 por Sophia de Mello Breyner Anderson, o seu primeiro conto para crianças a menina do mar descreve de forma maravilhosa a praia da Granja onde a autora costumava passar férias frequentemente.
Este Alojamento Local com o mesmo nome, a menina do mar, situa-se em frente a esta praia, usufruindo de forma privilegiada, este pequeno paraíso perdido no tempo...

The space
A casa, recentemente reconstruída de forma moderna e extremamente acolhedora, é constituída por 2 quartos, 1 com cama de casal e outro com duas camas de solteiro, Instalação Sanitária, e Sala virada para o mar, com cozinha completamente nova e totalmente equipada. No espaço exterior um amplo relvado, confortavelmente mobilado para poder usufruir da brisa do mar e assistir aos pôr do sol únicos, acompanhado por uma bela refeição de fim de tarde.

Guest access
Nos finais do séc. XIX e início do séc. XX, a Praia da Granja era a mais aristocrática estância de verane

column5: A casa da Póvoa - férias sem carro!
column6:
Apartamento T2+1 totalmente mobilado, com uma área útil de 95m2, localizado no centro da Póvoa de Varzim. O apartamento destaca-se pela sua exposição solar e pela sua localização privilegiada, numa zona tranquila (com supermercado, talho, peixaria e padaria nas imediações) a poucos metros da Praça de Touros, da praia e da marginal. Ideal para uma semana de férias em família!

The space
O imóvel encontra-se totalmente mobilado e é composto por: Hall de entrada amplo; Sala de estar e de jantar com acesso a varanda; WC completo; Cozinha mobilada com zona de lavandaria, equipada com todos os eletrodomésticos (exaustor, forno, placa em vitrocerâmica, microondas, torradeira, frigorífico, máquina de lavar roupa e loiça); quartos mobilados com cama e roupeiros; e, Lugar de garagem. O prédio dispõe de elevador.
A sua centralidade permite o acesso facilitado ao comércio local, a inúmeras opções de restauração e serviços diversos. Por outro lado, goza também de bons ace
column7: Zona calma, com espaços para desporto ao ar livre. Ginásio, piscinas (de interior e de exterior), cafés e restaurantes com vista mar nas imediações. Ideal para umas férias sem ter de pegar no carro.

column5: Bright Fresh Flat w/ Garage | Marquês
column6:
Live like a local in the heart of Porto.

Located in the centre of Porto, near Marquês, this cosy flat has a balcony which is ideal for you! It will provide you a nice atmosphere to relax and to discover the city.

It is an excellent option for solo adventurers, weekend travelers, couples, and business travelers who wish to enjoy all Porto has to offer.

The space
We are a passionate team in Porto, always excited to welcome amazing people from all over the world. Send us a message and pack your bags for an unforgettable experience.

You'll have everything ready to make sure you have a comfortable stay.

The space has both a king bed, super comfy to have a great night of sleep, as well as a kitchenette fully equipped to cook the local delicacies.

Not only do we provide Wi-Fi to share everything on social media, but, at the end of a tiring day, you can watch Netflix before going to sleep, all included, of course!
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Rooftop Balcony at Porto Historic Center
column6:
Duplex apartment with a big balcony, located in the historic center. The balcony is the perfect place to recharge your batteries after a long day visiting the city.
Completely renovated in 2020, this apartment has a modern and careful decoration, which will make your stay as comfortable and pleasant as possible. In the end you will not want to leave!
Ideal for small groups or families.

The space
The apartment has air conditioning in the bedrooms and living room, bed linen and towels, free wi-fi, TV with international channels and Netflix.
The kitchen is equipped with microwave, ceramic hob, coffee machine (Nespresso), toaster, electric kettle, fridge with frizzer and utensils necessary for making meals (pots, crockery and cutlery).
In the bathroom you will find a hairdryer, shampoo and body cream.

License number
105477/AL
column7:
The Sé district is the oldest and most emblematic neighborhood in the city, classified in 1996 by UNESCO as a World Heritage Site. Look around and be marveled by the most important monuments and historic buildings, side by side with modern restaurants coffee shops.
Discover the famous Cathedral (Sé) and Louis I bridge just around the corner. All the major touristic points are walking distance.
