column6:
In the heart of Oporto city, the Galerias apartment is a very cosy flat in the city centre. It's very well located at Rua da Galeria de Paris, the main street of Oporto's nightlife (can be noisy sometimes), and the right place to stay if you wish to have great moments with your friends or visit the city with your family! The apartment is composed by a room with double bed, one bathroom, a complete kitchen and a living room with a sofa bed for two people. You'll love it as much as we do!

The space
The Apartment Galerias has a complete Kitchen, a Living Room with a Sofa Bed for 2 persons, a Room with 1 bed and a bathroom

Guest access
The apartment Galerias is the perfect spot if you're looking for a good time in Oporto, is located at the main street of Oporto's nightlife, so yes...it can be extremely noisy, mainly on weekends and in the summer, but if you're looking for fun you get the most amazing place for it!

Other things to
column7:
The perfect place to see the city walking...
In this historical centre of the city, in one of the most popular streets of Porto (Rua da Galeria de Paris), this apartment is as central as you can get!
It has everything you need to a wonderful stay!
It is located nearby the famous "Torre dos Clérigos", "Lello" Library, "S. Bento" Railway station and the famous "Café Majestic"!
If you enjoy going out at night you certainly are in "the place", since Galerias de Paris is the main street of Oporto night life, and the centre of it's "movida"!!!

column6:
If you want to stay next to Rua de Santa Catarina, very close to numerous cafes and shops, and at the same time, have a terrace where you can relax after a day of visiting and shopping in our city, don't wait any longer! The Oporto Markets apartment is ideal for you, your family and friends!

The space
CLEANING AND HYGIENIZATION:
The cleaning and sanitizing of this apartment is carried out by a professional cleaning team before your arrival. The cleaning products used contain 10% sodium hypochlorite to prevent cross-contamination in the apartment. Our bed linen and towels are washed at high temperatures with a powerful disinfectant, to guarantee the elimination of bacteria, viruses, fungi and organic impurities. In the apartment you will also find disinfection material, such as alcohol gel.

APARTMENT DESCRIPTION:
This apartment has internet, 2 bedrooms (1 with a suite), 2 bathrooms, 1 fully equipped kitchen, living / dining room and 1 patio.
column7: Visit everything on foot and discover the most famous and typical shops, cafes and restaurants in our city; the nearest supermarket (MiniPreço) is a 4 minute walk, the nearest hospital (Hospital Santo António) is a 25 minute walk, the nearest parking (Central Car Park) is a 5 minute walk, Rua Santa Catarina it is a 5-minute walk, the Majestic cafe is a 6-minute walk, the Praça dos Poveiros is a 5-minute walk, the La Vie shopping mall (and the temporary bolhão market) is a 3-minute walk and there is a pharmacy (Pharmacy Sá da Bandeira) 6 min walk from the apartment.
column14: Being born in Lisbon and after living in 3 different countries, I chose now Porto to start a new career and life project. It's potentiality and a preservations of its people roots, made me think I could make a difference in the hospitality industry, where I started managing some Airbnb apartments. Together with an amazing team we created a brand name Tejana Flats, where we hope to share our insights and recommendations on every amazing activity Porto has to offer. We wait for you to share our vision :-)

column5: Ferienhaus Casa do mar mit seitlichem Meerblick
column6:
Das Ferienhaus „Casa do mar“ liegt in Vila Chã.
Ein Fischerdorf im Nordwesten Portugals, ca. 30 km nördlich von Porto.

Große offene Räume mit seitlichem Meerblick, Echtholzparkett mit großer Couch und WLAN (im ganzen Haus), großer Flachbildschirm mit Netflix (Wohnzimmer EG). Direkter Zugang zu Garten und großer Terrasse. Im Garten gibt es außerdem eine Grillecke mit Essbereich sowie eine Lounge-Ecke und Gartenliegen zum Entspannen.

The space
Die Küche EG ist voll ausgestattet, außerdem steht Ihnen eine Küchenmaschine, Spülmaschine und Kaffeemaschine zur Verfügung.

Es gibt 3 Doppelzimmer OG davon eine Suite mit Balkon und eigenem Bad mit Dusche. Alle Zimmer sind mit Boxspringbetten bzw. Doppelbetten (1,60m x 2m) sowie Flachbildschirmen ausgestattet. Ein weiteres Badezimmer mit Dusche und Badewanne sowie ein Gäste-WC sind vorhanden.

Bettwäsche und Handtücher (sowie Strandtücher) liegen für Sie bereit.

column5: Double Suites in the Heart of Porto
column6:
We are a small and cozy guesthouse located in the historic center of Porto, we have four very spacious double suites, with private bathroom and a view to the beautiful Clerigos Church.

We would like to highlight that cleaning has always been one of our priorities and that now more than ever due to Covid-19 we are adopting new cleaning routines that also include disinfecting the space.

The space
Our commitment is to make you feel welcomed, hosting you with dedication and sympathy in a clean and pleasant environment, making your trip a special experience.

In addition to the beautiful view of the Clérigos Church, all the comfortable and spacious rooms at the guesthouse are equipped with a private bathroom, free wifi, air conditioning / heating, cable TV and a seating area. Each room is prepared to comfortably accommodate 2 people, with a choice of a double bed or two single beds.
It is also possible to include an extra bed to accommodate
column7:
The lively and popular Galerias de Paris, well known for its nightlife, are 50 m from the unit and feature a wide range of restaurants, cafés, shops and bars. And of course the outstading Clerigos Church is a few steps away from our door beautifying the view of your bedroom window.
The famous Lello Bookstore is 100 m from the guesthouse. The Porto city centre is a UNESCO World Heritage site and features various noted landmarks, such as the Carmo Church at 300 metres, the São Bento Train Station which is within 400 m and the Porto Cathedral, which is at 650 m.
column14: Somos um casal de brasileiros que curte muito viajar e depois de morar por quase 3 anos em Dublin, e apesar de amar a Irlanda, decidiu se mudar para Portugal em busca de um pouco mais de sol no seu dia a dia. Encantados com a belíssima cidade do Porto decidimos por aqui ficar e agora realizamos o sonho de ter nosso primeiro negócio, o qual cuidamos com muito amor e carinho!

The Luiz Primeiro 00 located in the Historic Center of Porto, an area classified as World Heritage by Unesco, "glued" to the Luiz I bridge, the city's greatest icon, promotes all the essential amenities to make your stay an unforgettable experience.

The space
Luiz Primeiro 00 - Premium lofts is located in the heart of the Historic Center of Porto, an area classified as World Heritage by Unesco, next to the Douro River, "glued" to the Luís I bridge, the city's greatest icon.
It is located in a century-old building, carefully rehabilitated, where functionality, comfort and refinement were privileged, from the construction elements to the decorative details.
The space is furnished with high quality furniture, and punctuated by piece
column7:
Benefiting from a special and privileged location, this apartment is perfect for those who want to know the culture, tradition and soul of this city, which exudes a mixture of history with a cosmopolitan flair around every corner.
The city's monuments and iconic buildings located in the adjacent areas are living proof of this, such as the Luis I Bridge, the Ribeira (200m), the Sé and Paço Episcopal (300m), the São Bento Train Station (400m), the Avenida dos Aliados (500m), Port Wine Cellars (500m), Serra do Pilar (700m), Rua de Santa Catarina (700m), Torre dos Clérigos (800m), Livraria Lello (850m), etc. .
It is therefore a very central area, well equipped with public transport, good restaurants, bars and night clubs, supermarkets, shops, museums, theaters, etc.
column14:
I am from Porto, proudly! I'm an architect and I like street art, cinema, music, bodyboard, sports, travel and be with friends.
I signed up as host because I like to welcome people from all over the world who share a taste for learning about new cultures and deeply interested in discovering the sites they visit. Thus I can show them all the best that Porto has to offer, providing them a pleasant stay in a perfect location and providing them with specialized tips. Come visit Porto!

Luiz Primeiro 00 - Premium lofts is located in the heart of the Historic Center of Porto, an area classified as World Heritage by Unesco, next to the Douro River, "glued" to the Luís I bridge, the city's greatest icon.
It is located in a century-old building, carefully rehabilitated, where functionality, comfort and refinement were privileged, from the construction elements to the decorative details.
The space is furnished with high quality furniture, and punctuated by piece
column7:
Benefiting from a special and privileged location, this apartment is perfect for those who want to know the culture, tradition and soul of this city, which exudes a mixture of history with a cosmopolitan flair around every corner.
The city's monuments and iconic buildings located in the adjacent areas are living proof of this, such as the Luis I Bridge, the Ribeira (200m), the Sé and Paço Episcopal (300m), the São Bento Train Station (400m), the Avenida dos Aliados (500m), Port Wine Cellars (500m), Serra do Pilar (700m), Rua de Santa Catarina (700m), Torre dos Clérigos (800m), Livraria Lello (850m), etc. .
It is therefore a very central area, well equipped with public transport, good restaurants, bars and night clubs, supermarkets, shops, museums, theaters, etc.
column14:
I am from Porto, proudly! I'm an architect and I like street art, cinema, music, bodyboard, sports, travel and be with friends.
I signed up as host because I like to welcome people from all over the world who share a taste for learning about new cultures and deeply interested in discovering the sites they visit. Thus I can show them all the best that Porto has to offer, providing them a pleasant stay in a perfect location and providing them with specialized tips. Come visit Porto!

column7:
The village of Paradinha features fossils, and it is perfect for long walks, swimming, rafting, and snorkelling in one of the cleanest river in Europe. To fully enjoy the area it’s advisable to have your own car.
It is 8 km from the Passadiços do Paiva and within minutes walk from many unique fluvial beaches.

Alvarenga is 7 km away and offers plenty of restaurants nearby, to dine in or take away as well as a pharmacy, a gas station and supermarkets.
Porto is 89 km away, while Termas de Sao Pedro do Sul are 61 km from Paradinha, and Viseu is 80 km away. The nearest airport is Porto – Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 90 km.

It is located close to all the main touristic attractions worth visiting in the historic area of Porto thus you will be able to walk everywhere with ease! Perfectly suited to host up to 6 people, this apartment comprises of a well-equipped kitchen, two comfortable bedrooms - one of them a suite and both equipped with AC - a second full bathroom, a living room with a sofa bed and a balcony. You will certainly feel at ease here, and will have an absolutely memorable trip! We look forward to hosting you!

The space
Located right downtown, this 2BR flat is modern and well-equipped! It can comfortably accommodate up to 6 people and thus is perfect for families or a group of friends traveling to our lovely UNESCO World Heritage City Together!

EN-SUITE

column7:
This apartment is situated in Baixa, right above the Ribeira. It is located right in the heart of the city and so there are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Palácio de Cristal - beautiful gardens and river views only 8 minutes away from the flat on foot - Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto

column6:
This is a unique place designed for you to have privacy within a home, but community within your reach. This is an ideal place for remote workers and digital nomads. You are booking a private room with a private bathroom (not in suite, but right next to the room) inside a unique apartment with three floors and 4 bedrooms.

The space
This is a special triplex apartment. The unique floor plan is similar to that of a hotel: the lobby, the living room and kitchen are located in the first floor, and the rooms are in the second and the third floors.
The apartment has a homelift elevator to move from floor to floor (how cool?).
The bedrooms are located in corners of the house, all of them have a private bathroom and most of them also have a balcony.
I have equipped the bedrooms with a desk, chandelier and a super confortable office chair for prolonged working from home hours.
The space is being designed so that you can have privacy when you need priv
column7: The property is located in a great neighborhood of Porto, very central. It is not Porto's downtown or immediate city center, but right after. I go everywhere walking. The city hall and main square in Porto, Aliados, is at a 15 min walking distance from my apartment.
column14:
Dear guest, Daniel here! I'm an Engineer who is investing in Real Estate. I own properties and have a company called DV Stays to manage the properties of y Real Estate partners, particularly on Airbnbs. In my free time (which is little, unfortunately) I play the guitar and go out with friends!

I just love the concept of having a home everywhere you go and that's why I'm attracted to the Airbnb life. I want to let you know that all is well planned for your stay and that I keep perfecting my systems everyday, exploring new technology and ways to communicate, in order to improve my guests' experience!

I am an avid traveler myself, so I know that we all want a nice place that feels like home while we are away. Count me in to make this experience as close to that as it can be.

All I ask from you in return of my hard work in preparring a home for you is: 
1. Please read my listing carefully.
2. Book only if my listing suits you. Better to be slective first, than disapointed later!

Thank you!
Daniel

column6:
Sweet Bainharia, offers a new concept for your leisure or professional tourism stay, with all the comfort in the historic area of Porto, in one of the most traditional and tourist areas of the city, next to Rua das Flores and 2 min from Ribeira. The apartment is located in a historic building, fully restored in 2019, showing a symbiosis between the picturesque houses of Porto, with the most modern and comfortable that can be found in a tourist apartment. The building has an elevator.

The space
This apartment was completely renovated in a historic building in downtown Porto and completed in late 2019, combining modern equipment with typical decor.
This is on the 2nd floor with elevator and has 1 bedroom, 1 living / dining room, a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom.
Cable TV, 100 Mbps WIFi, coffee maker, stove, kettle, toaster, and a comfortable sofa.
Its fantastic location allows quick access to all of Porto's tourist attractions.

G
column14:
Porto City Hosts is a locally based tourism team consisting of proud Porto citizens. 
We receive our guests with local charm and professional quality. We make our guests feel well accompanied during their stay, helping them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!
We also are passionate travelers eager to find out new places, to know new cultures, landscapes, palates, and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, sharing suggestions with new sensations, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river walk through the old Porto streets. 
You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto!
It will be a pleasure to host you.

column6:
Set in a traditional centenary building, with Portuguese tiles, this second floor apartment, with one bedroom, offers a balcony with views of the back garden, right in the heart of Porto.

The building also has a backyard with a terrace that can be used to enjoy after visiting Porto.

With an extremely good location, we provide our guests an excellent local staying in the center of Porto.
Portugal Tourism number: 31508/AL

The space
Near the Church of Lapa, right in the heart of Porto, it was completely renovated in 2016, respecting the original features and its history.

The property includes 7 modern furnished and fully equipped apartments.

It has an unusual layout and modern furnishings, providing comfort for our guests.

The bedroom has a double bed and the living area has one sofa bed, a dining table and a flat-screen cable TV.

The bathroom comes with a shower and there is also an equipped k
column7:
The neighborhood of Lapa is charming and ideal for those looking to stay overnight or live very close to the historical city center but also in a quiet place near the authentic side of Porto. In the center, near the metro station, at only 15 minutes walk from downtown but far from the prices, crowds and nocturnal confusion of the “Porto movida”, there are still some old ladies who go to church, the young, anxious and smiling or the grandfathers with their berets in the local cafes.

Its most important era began with the construction of the Church of Lapa. Rococo and neoclassical building, the Church of Our Lady of Lapa began to be built in 1756 and finished in 1863. Beginning only with a Church, were added a College Seminary, a cemetery, and later, at the beginning of the twentieth century, a hospital.

Inside the church, the pipe organ is one of its most impressive pieces, but one of the main attractions of the church is the heart of King Pedro IV, who, since 1837,

column5: Pátio Alma - Duplex Apartment with A/C
column6:
Two bedroom duplex apartment with air conditioner and a private patio, located in one of Porto's most iconic streets, just a short walk away from the famous Aliados Avenue.
All the facilities, public transportation and essential tourist spots are within walking distance.

TRINDADE metro station (direct connection to the AIRPORT) is only 450 meters away.

The apartment is fully equipped for a comfortable stay.
Wifi available throughout the entire property.

See you soon!

The space
Double bedroom duplex apartment with a private patio, fully furnished and equipped.

Our guests will have access to:

- 2 bedrooms: 1 bedroom with a double bed w/ A/C + 1 bedroom with a single bed
- Living room with A/C and a double sofa-bed (bed linen for the sofa is available for reservations of more than 3 guests)
- 2 complete bathrooms with showers
- Totally equiped kitchenette with a washing machine
- Di
column7:
Known as the street of ironmongery, this is one of Porto's most characteristic street. Here all the history and antiquity of the local shops coexists with the reinvention of venues such as Trindade Cinema (Independent Cinema), the openning of cafés, restaurants and restored buildings (which preserve the typical facade).

Interesting tourist sites nearby:
- Aliados Avenue: 300m
- Lello Bookshop: 600m
- S. Bento Railway Station: 700m
- The Clérigos Tower: 700m
- Santa Catarina Street: 900m
- Bolhão Market: 900m
- Ribeira: 950m
- The Porto Cathedral: 1000m

Services or Facilities:
- Supermarket: 100m
- Tourism office: 200m
- Police Station: 200m
- Post office (Ctt): 600m
- Public Hospital: 1200m

Pátio Alma is in the heart of Porto. It's very close to the most iconic tourist sites and near the city's favourite nightlife hotspots. At the same time, it's an incredibly calm street and therefore you

column6:
Nestled in the heart of downtown Porto, this upscale & newly decorated apartment with a beautiful garden will provide you a pleasant and restful stay with also giving you the opportunity to be just 2 steps away from the top iconic places in the city such as the Ribeira Area, D. Luis I Bridge, Clerigos Tower, Aliados Av. and Lello Bookshop.
Inserted in the Cedofeitas quarter, its decoration creates a welcoming vibe through its mix of premium furniture, colorful artwork and botanical details.

The space
‘Bombarda Galley Yard' is a apartment located in the center of Porto. It has a maximum capacity of 4 people (2 double rooms) and is very well equipped to receive you during your stay in Porto.
Its freshly upscale decoration will give you all the comfort for you to rest after a day touring the city while it will also give you the opportunity to enjoy a beautiful sunset in the garden.
The apartment has free wi-fi, a flat-screen with cable TV, closets t
column7:
The apartment is located in one of the coolest neighborhoods in Porto, the "Bairro das Artes" ("Art's Neighborhood"), full of art galleries and concept stores. Enjoy a walk at the Crystal Palace Gardens, a sunset at Passeio das Virtues or a visit to the Museu Nacional Soares dos Reis, one of the best museums of Porto.
You'll also be walking distance from some of the best known tourist attractions such as: The iconic São Bento Train station with its marvelous tiles, the Cathedral, Aliados Avenue, Clérigos Tower and Bolsa Palace. The apartment is also just a some minutes away from the Ribeira area, where you can cross the bridge to Vila Nova de Gaia.
Advice from a local: While staying in Porto, do not also miss the opportunity to catch a tram alongside the river between Ribeira to Foz.
column14:
We are a short-term property management agency based in Lisbon with offices in Porto, Sintra and Algarve. 

All our properties are certificated with the “Clean & Safe” stamp. 

Stay with Feeling Inn at one of our properties. 
Book our top vacation rentals, serviced apartments and villas.

Feeling Inn is run by a team of specialised people from different countries and backgrounds, who love to travel and getting to know new cultures.


 - People you trust. Service you deserve. - 



CLEAN&SAFE UPDATE:

Dear Guests,

In Feeling Inn apartments, hygiene and cleanliness are always prioritized. 
Our number one priority is the well-being, health and safety of our guests and team members. In order to secure just that, we have set-up procedures, plans and routines in place, so that all of our guests can feel safe when staying with us:

- We are following the guidelines and recommendations of local health authorities;
- We increased cleaning and hygiene protocols;
- We settled a regular disinfection of exposed surfaces such as door handles and elevator buttons with anti-bacterial liquids.

We also recommend our guest to follow to following recommendations:

- Frequent hand washing;
- Have hand disinfection ready;
- Avoid unnecessary hand contact;
- Cover the mouth with the elbow when coughing and sneezing;
- Keep at least one meter away from coughing or sneezing persons.

Stay safe,
Feeling Inn staff

column14:

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

column6:
Cosy private studio apartment in a historic building perfect for a couple or individual occupancy in the heart of Porto city centre.
Nearby you'll find a range of restaurants, bars, shops and nightclubs.
We are just few steps away from Rua de Santa Catarina, Porto’s main commercial street and the city centre. It is also at walking distance to 3 central metro stations offering great day and night transport links to all over the city.

The space
The studio was completely renewed and modernized located in a 3 storey 19th century building. It can accommodate up to 2 people in a room with TV, air conditioning for heating in the winter and cooling in the summer, a comfortable double bed, linen, towels, toiletries, private bathroom, wireless internet, a separate fully equipped kitchen with fridge, microwave, kettle, coffee machine, toaster, pans and pots and also a washing machine with ironing facilities.

column7:
The neighborhood of Lapa is charming and ideal for those looking to stay overnight or live very close to the historical city center but also in a quiet place near the authentic side of Porto. In the center, near the metro station, at only 15 minutes walk from downtown but far from the prices, crowds and nocturnal confusion of the “Porto movida”, there are still some old ladies who go to church, the young, anxious and smiling or the grandfathers with their berets in the local cafes.

Its most important era began with the construction of the Church of Lapa. Rococo and neoclassical building, the Church of Our Lady of Lapa began to be built in 1756 and finished in 1863. Beginning only with a Church, were added a College Seminary, a cemetery, and later, at the beginning of the twentieth century, a hospital.

Inside the church, the pipe organ is one of its most impressive pieces, but one of the main attractions of the church is the heart of King Pedro IV, who, since 1837,

The OceanSide Guest House is located in the soul of Matosinhos, near the beach where you can enjoy one of the biggest sidewalks known as Marginal de Matosinhos. There you are able to walk, spend time with family or/and friends while you can watch the most beautiful sunset
in the world.
Matosinhos Sul Metro Station is about 500 meteres away with direct acess to Porto and the aiport Francisco Sá Carneiro is about 7 km.

The space
During your stay, you will feel the city like the locals. The apartment is located near the beach and near the center of Matosinhos. The street where The OceanSide Guest House has a lot of restaurants dedicated to sea food, shellfish and all kind of fresh fish.
P.S: THE OCEANSIDE IT is a space that can be shared with the Host in separate rooms

column6:
o nosso espaço fica em arcozelo, localidade perto da cidade do porto. aguda é a vila piscatória a poente. espinho a sul. com fáceis acessos aos transportes públicos, tem experiências para toda a família, como o golfe, o ténis, o surf, o casino, a gastronomia, passeios a pé e de bicicleta. existem bons restaurantes numa localidade muito tranquila. vais adorar o nosso espaço pela localização, pela zona exterior, pela qualidade e conforto. a praia fica a 300 m. pretendemos receber bem as pessoas.

The space
o nosso espaço é composto por uma casa principal e um pequeno loft de 60m2, com sala, cozinha, quarto, casa de banho, duche e um pátio exterior. estes espaços são totalmente privados. a zona da piscina, jardim e acessos, são partilhados com a nossa família.

somos um casal com quatro filhos, temos um gato que explora muito o espaço exterior e dois cães que raramente se cruzam com os hóspedes.

o nosso espaço faz parte de um projeto local que
column7:
arcozelo tem cerca de 14.000 pessoas. é uma localidade integrada numa das maiores cidades portuguesas - vila nova de gaia que no passado foi muito forte na produção de cerâmica, sendo hoje um ponto turístico onde reside as caves do vinho do porto. é uma região que toca no oceano atlântico e divide as margens do rio douro com a cidade do porto.

arcozelo distingue-se por uma identidade muito própria. situa-se junto à beira-mar, tem uma comunidade piscatória muito enraizada, conhecida pela sua pesca "artesanal", baseada em métodos transmitidos de geração em geração. Por volta de 1870, pescadores da afurada e de espinho instalaram-se aqui para construir os primeiros abrigos em madeira e para pescar sobretudo caranguejos “pilado" que vendiam aos lavradores locais como adubo. os campos tornaram-se mais produtivos e a pesca foi-se desenvolvendo com a crescente procura.

uma cultura religiosa muito forte, várias são as igrejas construídas neste território, é o segundo luga
column14:
olá! somos a fátima e o filipe, temos quatro filhos estamos juntos há mais de vinte anos. somos uma família que naturalmente sabe bem, como cuidar das pessoas. sabe bem como as receber, proporcionando espaços e tempos inimistas para uma boa conversa, para uma partilha autêntica criando momentos bons, entre amigos. é neste principio que surge o projeto A CASA da sogra. se o fazemos tão bem entre a família e amigos, porque não fazer do nosso espaço, um local de partilha de ideias, de experiências, de momentos de referência positiva, tornando-se num dos cluster’s dentro de um núcleo de mudança da comunidade? 

a fátima  é chamada por muitos a mãe de todos. é uma pessoa fácil e de boa conversa, é ela mesmo. 

o filipe é um verdadeiro agente de mudança. faz o que pode em tudo aquilo que lhe importa. importa-lhe cumprir-se enquanto ser humano.
column28: Arcozelo

column6:
FLORES Terrace Apartment provides an exquisite, delightful and comfortable stay.
The apartment has a great location, set right in the heart of the historical centre, in the pedestrian street Rua das Flores, one of the most historic and picturesque streets of Porto.
A 10 minute walk from the magnificent UNESCO World Heritage Ribeira area.
São Bento Metro/Train Stations are 2 minute walk and Clérigos Tower and Lello Bookstore are 5 minute walk

The space
FLORES Terrace Apartment is placed in a centenary building totally renovated in 2018, keeping the old facade.
The apartment offers a stylish, elegant and superb décor, with beautiful and unique details.
Bedding and Towels are of high quality and the bath amenities are from the lovely portuguese company- Lousani.
In the surroundings there is an amazing variety of local and high end restaurants, trendy shops and bars with terraces.

Guest access
An entire apartment
column7:
In the surroundings there is an amazing variety of local and high end restaurants, trendy shops and bars with terraces.
The apartments are a 4 minute walk from São Bento Metro and Train Stations and 6 minute walk from the iconic Clérigos Tower and Lello Bookstore.
The Porto’s nightlife is mainly in Galerias de Paris, 7 minute walk from the apartment.
A 10 minute walk from the magnificent UNESCO World Heritage Ribeira area, where you can cross the Dom Luis I Bridge and visit the famous Port Wine Cellars.
Private Parking is available 80 meters away.
column14:
Hi! I'm Joana;) 
I was born in Porto, and my passions are art, interior design and travels.
Love new cultures, meeting new people, taste new foods and sharing experiences.
Love to welcome people in Porto and share with them the best of our amazing city;)!!!!  I think the whole point of traveling is to experience the destination as a local..

And so was born BOUTIQUE RENTALS- Charming Apartments
We have been delivering high standard specialized service in interior design for 12 years and in real estate projects management for 7 years. We are a creative, dynamic and passionate team with both experience and know how.
The passion for the field of design and taste for management combined with enthusiasm for the art of hospitality has raised the Boutique Rentals whose main objective is to help and facilitate the purchase of a property for profit, offering a turnkey service.

If you live in Portugal or abroad and want to invest in real estate in our country, we can help you maximize your capital and manage your project.
We wish you make a good deal and we are committed to do the possible to ensure high profitability from the very first day. We help with acquisition, project management and consultancy, construction and interior design, renovation or improvement, short and long term renting, property management, local accommodation management and maintenance.

Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find a cozy and bright flat with Free Wifi in the city center and which will provide you a great atmosphere.

It's the best option for couples, individual adventurers, small groups and businesses travelers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
Bright and cozy flat located on the 1st floor in the city center with amazing decoration and with all the amenities for an epic stay.

You have 2 individual beds (you could join them to create a double bed as in the photos), 1 sofa-bed to have a great night of sleep and an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country.

We have a surprise for you! Netflix at
column7:
You are just 8 minutes from Batalha and Santa Catarina and 10 minutes from Clérigos and Aliados.

You are in a prime location surrounded by restaurants, supermarkets and monuments. You'll find a restaurant called Tasquinha do 70 where you can enjoy a delicious meal! You can also taste the best Francesinha at Santiago Café!
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find a cozy and bright flat with Free Wifi in the city center and which will provide you a great atmosphere.

It's the best option for couples, individual adventurers, small groups and businesses travelers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
You'll find a bright and cozy flat located on the 2nd floor in the city center with amazing decoration and with all the amenities for an epic stay.

You have 1 full bed, 1 sofa-bed to have a great night of sleep and an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country.

We have a surprise for you! Netflix at the end of the day to relax with friends or family!
column7:
You are just 8 minutes from Batalha and Santa Catarina and 10 minutes from Clérigos and Aliados.

You are in a prime location surrounded by restaurants, supermarkets and monuments. You'll find a restaurant called Tasquinha do 70 where you can enjoy a delicious meal! You can also taste the best Francesinha at Santiago Café!

column6:
Modern apartment with 4 suites and a large living area. Ideal for families or groups of friends visiting Porto who prefer a little more privacy.
The apartment is in a quiet residential area 2 minutes from Miradouro Santa Catarina which has a superb view over the Douro River (hidden gem). The Douro River is a 5-minute walk away - very convenient for long strolls to Ribeira or Foz.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the apartment consisting of: 4 suites all with full bathroom and TV; 1 living space with a living and dining area; 1 kitchen and a terrace.

License number
110690/AL
column7:
Quiet residential neighborhood, near the Miradouro Santa Catarina and also the office of one of the most famous Portuguese architects - Souto Moura.
There is a pharmacy on the corner of the street, a café next to the apartment and a supermarket 2 minutes away.

column5: A romantic attic apartment in the heart of Porto
column6:
Probably the most stunning property in downtown Porto! Almost 1000 sqm of lush manicured gardens with tropical species, a lake, an old wine making presser, picnic tables, Brazilian nets where you can rest after a long day sightseeing through Porto, just reading or hearing the sounds of birds and the water from the fountain... a Truly Heaven in downtown Porto...

License number
113898/AL

Très bien situé à 3min à pied de l’arrêt de bus qui mène directement au centre de porto . 10min du centre . Situé dans une résidence calme , agréable et en face d’un supermarché. column6:
Clean and safe in Porto's centre, is welcoming, recently refurbished, quiet apartment well equipped for up to four guest, with terrace at the back of the house where you can enjoy your coffee or porto. The sun wakes you to go for a walk to great sites like Rua de Santa Caterina, Majestic Cafe, Coliseu, Theatre, or to enjoy local shops, restaurants, bars, Library, and the Douro river.

The space
The apartment is on the second floor at the back of the house. There is no noise from the street. The high french doors open to a terrace and allow for plenty of light. This bright T1 has a lot of amenities and is ideal for short as well as long term stays. If during a long stay you need a washing machine and a dryer: these are just a few steps away in front of the house, easy to use, quick and cheap!

Other things to note
Due to the Corona Virus, we are reinforcing all extra care in hygiene and cleaning, such as disinfecting surfaces, good ventilation
column7: This is a special neighborhood. It is part of the city centre but still retains it's Portuguese feel through it's historic Ildefonso Church, local food, a small park where locals play chess or card games. Local daily life on the square is mixed with cultural life in the interesting library (with rare old manuscripts), and the theatres. The Metro station is a 3 minute walk and next to it is a big supermarket in case you have no time to stroll around the local shops.
column14: Étant moi même hôte, je cherche tout d abord à vivre des expériences dans le cadre d échanges respectueux

column5: Cozy and family apartment  - V. N. Gaia
column6:
This spacious and family apartment with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, a kitchen, and a living room is the perfect place to relax. Located 5 minutes away from the subway station "Câmara de Gaia" is perfect for visiting and enjoying all the beauty of Gaia and Porto's cities.

In just 10 minutes, you can be in Jardim do Morro and in the iconic D. Luís bridge, which allows a stunning view over the Douro river and Oporto's charismatic city.

The space
The apartment is fully available for guests. It has a fully equipped kitchen, two bathrooms (only one with shower), a large living and dining room, and two bedrooms.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the kitchen, living room, bedrooms, and bathrooms.
There's paid parking on the street and an unpaid street 300 meters from the apartment.

License number
108515/AL
column7: A quiet and serene area located in the center of Gaia city. It is only 5 minutes away from "Câmara de Gaia" subway station and 2 subway stations from S.Bento and Porto city center. In only 10 minutes walking, you can also enjoy the beautiful Jardim do Morro, the Douro river and the magnificent view over the D. Luís bridge, the ex-libris of Porto. 500 meters away, you will find a supermarket and 650 meters away from the El Corte Inglês.
column14: It all started on a 7-month trip to Asia. Throughout this great adventure, we stayed in diverse places and realized the enormous value of being well received. We had stories to tell and made valuable connections with hosts that made us discover the places with a different taste.
column27: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

column5: Casa de Cela- Casa das Cavalariças Exclusivo
column6:
As Casas das Cavalariças ficam no interior da propriedade da Casa de Cela, habitada pelos proprietários. A reserva em exclusivo, de uma casa com capacidade máxima de cinco pessoas, permite usufruir do espaço sem contacto com outros hóspedes. A casa tem wifi, 2 varandas e 2 wc's completos. A sala possui cozinha na sala, sofá-cama e TV e o quarto capacidade para 3 pessoas. No exterior, a piscina de 16x6m, campo de ténis, jardim, horta, e os animais da quinta esperam por si.

The space
A exclusividade da casa permite reunir a família, até ao máximo de 5 pessoas, sem partilhar o espaço exterior com outros hóspedes. Caso seja um grupo maior, terá a possibilidade de ocupar as 2 casas, com lotação de 10 pessoas, no total, contactando-nos diretamente para avaliar a disponibilidade.

Uma grande piscina 16mx6m, um campo de ténis, tabela de basket, raquetes de praia e de badmington permitem desftutar o espaço exterior.

A paisagem rural, verde e tranqu
column7: A igreja de S. Miguel de Urrô é um exemplar único de arquitetura, e do seu adro tem-se uma boa vista para o vale e serra da Freita.
column14:

column5: Bright Flat w/ Netflix | Bolhão City Center
column6:
Vive uma experiência como um local no coração do Porto.

Irão encontrar um apartamento aconchegante com Wi-Fi grátis e que irá proporcionar-vos uma excelente estadia. Tem um pequeno terraço para proporcionar grandes conversas ao fim do dia enquanto saboreiam um copo de vinho.

É a melhor opção para casais, aventureiros, pequenos grupos e empresários que querem aproveitar tudo o que o Porto tem para oferecer.

The space
Apartamento bem iluminado e aconchegante no centro da cidade com uma decoração moderna e com todas as comodidades para proporcionar uma estadia épica.

O apartamento tem 1 cama de casal para proporcionar uma óptima noite de sono e uma cozinha incrível para vos desafiar a cozinhar as melhores iguarias da cidade.

Tem, também, 1 pequenos terraço acolhedor para que tenham óptimas conversas com amigos e familiares enquanto bebem um copo de vinho.

Para além disso, não poderia faltar o Wi-Fi grátis para p
column7:
Prédio está localizado na zona mais comercial da baixa do Porto. Supermercados como Minipreço e Pingo Doce a apenas 5min, Rua de Santa Catarina está também a 2minutos apenas, perfeito para quem quiser explorar as pequenas lojas tradicionais e cafés emblemáticos como o Majestic.

Padarias para terem pão fresco todo o dia e confeitarias para tomarem pequeno almoço com pastéis e bolos variados, como o famoso Pastel de Nata.

Perto de todos monumentos mais emblemáticos da cidade, um sítio perfeito para explorar a cidade a pé.

column5: Quarto Privado Verão - Fique no Bella Gaia
column6:
Na vizinhança do alojamento podemos encontrar o Jardim de Soares dos Reis, Museu de Diogo Macedo, Caves do Vinho do Porto, Ponte D. Luís I, Centro Histórico do Porto, supermercados, confeitarias, farmácias, hospitais, correios, bancos, lavandarias, padarias, cafés e restaurantes.
A propriedade dispõe de acesso Wi-FI gratuito em todas as áreas. Todos os quartos possuem uma televisão de ecrã plano com canais por cabo, ar condicionado, ainda com uma casa de banho privada e equipada.

column5: Tiny Camper Life - Bruval Premium Investments
column6:
A Bruval já tem experiência no Alojamento Local no centro do Porto, sendo que agora decidiu ter a vertente do Alojamento Rural.

Este é o nosso recente lar de 2020 que transformamos num contexto ecológico e rural. Criamos um conceito de natureza para se sentir livre e estar protegido.

Valor referente a estadia local (sem deslocações).

Queremos que desfrute ao máximo no nosso lar! :)

The space
Tem 4 lugares homologados e até 4 dormidas, sendo que tem a cama de casal e um banco rebatível que faz de cama, wc completo (base de duche e sanita portátil) e a cozinha equipada com duas bocas de gás, o pio e o frigorífico.
Como é visível, tem bastante arrumação para levarem tudo a que têm direito.

Guest access
A Recolha e Entrega da Autocaravana poderá ser feita em qualquer parte do país, com uma taxa acrescida.

License number
Exempt
column13: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal
column14:
A Bruval é uma empresa de investimentos imobiliários, em que compra, reabilita e arrenda os espaços a turistas, estudantes e residentes no Porto/Gaia. É gerida por dois jovens empresários, que são irmãos (Vitor e Valter Batista).
Somos pessoas que gostamos de aprender com o cliente e temos bastante empatia com os nossos clientes, por sermos tão sociais. 
Estaremos sempre ao dispor para o esclarecimento todas e quaisquer dúvidas, bem como para a partilha de informações sobre os principais pontos turísticos. Aconselharemos também alguns dos melhores restaurantes para se comer na cidade do Porto/Gaia.
É com muito prazer que vos acomodamos nas nossas propriedades e desejamos que desfrutem :)

This beautiful and iconic XVIII century fully recovered building will make your stay in Porto unforgettable. Due to its central location, in the heart of the Art District of Porto, this apartment is just a few min walking away from the city main attraction spots, night life area and restaurants. This duplex apartment is spacious, has 2 bedrooms, 1 of them is a suit w/ a private bathroom and balcony, and an open area integrating kitchen and living room facing a 250 sq meters private garden.

The space
This shining renovated apartment was imagined to fulfill all your comfort needs and will ensure you a perfect stay in the city.

- 120 square meters inside space
- 250 square meters private garden
- Heated Floor for the cold winter days
- Air Conditioner
- 50 inches flat TV
- Fully Equipped kitchen
- Cable TV and High Speed Internet

We welcome families with children. We provide a baby cot, sitting chair and many toys,

An absolute charming and comfy apartment just a few meters away from the golden sands of Praia da Aguda. This is the perfect place to wake up with the Ocean breeze and enjoy the sunny days in Portugal. It's a two bedroom apartment with one bathroom, fully-equipped kitchen and suitable for a family or a small group of friends.
Aguda Beach Apartment invites you to have the most memorable stay!

The space
￫ Building
A modern and convenient apartment on the first floor, without elevator, and just a few steps away from the beach.

￫ Bedrooms
The apartment has 2 bedrooms, one with a Queen-Size Bed and the other with a Bunk Bed.

￫ Bathroom
The apartment has a bathroom with shower.

￫ Living Room/Dining Room
Blessed by sunlight, the living/dining area is equipped with a comfortable sofa-bed, a spacious dining table and a flat-screen TV.

￫ Kitchen
The kitchen is equipped with a fridge, washing machine
column7:
Aguda is a small village by the sea, filled with restaurants and supermarkets with fresh natural products. It has a distinctive Portuguese character and a likeable, low-key atmosphere - far from the bustle of Porto and larger resort towns.
Despite the tranquility, Aguda is easily accessible by public transport with frequent and inexpensive train service from Aveiro and Porto.
The Praia da Aguda is a beautiful sandy beach halfway between Porto and Espinho. This entire coastline is one continuous stretch of golden sand, but the Praia da Aguda is quite unique because of its seawall protecting a minor harbour. This sheltered harbour is home to a small fishing fleet who moor their boats on the beach.
column14:

Com acesso por dois elevadores, possui Wi-Fi gratuito, um quarto, uma casa de banho, uma sala de estar com televisão de ecrã plano e canais por cabo, cozinha equipada com frigorífico, micro-ondas e máquina de lavar louça, etc. Perto do apartamento pode encontrar, supermercados, cafés, restaurantes, lojas, metro e autocarro.

column7:
Leça da Palmeira, tem uma localização privilegiada entre o mar e a cidade. Permite a quem a visita, conciliar um local calmo e relaxante na praia, com possibilidade de praticar diferentes atividades lúdicas desde surf, pesca, bicicleta, caminhadas, etc, com a proximidade à grande cidade que é o Porto.
Na praia de Leça pode desfrutar da original Piscina das Marés e visitar a Casa de Chá da Boa Nova, ambas obras do ilustre arquiteto Siza Vieira.
O aeroporto do Porto fica muito próximo (7 km) e a cidade do Porto a 10 km, facilmente acessível, através de metro ou autocarro. A Exponor fica a 1,5Km. Existem bastantes cafés, pastelarias e supermercados perto do alojamento assim como restaurantes sempre com peixe fresco. Se preferir fazer compras, pode chegar rapidamente ao "Mar Shopping", onde também existe o "IKEA", ou ao "Norte Shopping".

Practical and conveniently located studio apartment, located on the second floor of a traditional centennial building, with all modern facilities for a comfortable stay. Less than 300 meters (5 minutes walk) from the “Combatentes” metro station allows quick, easy and comfortable access to the entire city. It has an outdoor space, with a private pool, covered and heated ( From mid September to May) shared with the remaining guests.

Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment.

The space
Centennial building in stone and wooden beams that includes several studio apartments, modern, furnished and fully equipped. It is centrally located and with excellent accessibility. It was completely renovated in 2017, respecting the original characteristics and its history.

It has an unusual "layout" and modern furnishings, providing comfort for our guests.

All units include a bathroom with shower and a fully equipped kitchen with fridge
column7:
Located in a quiet and central area and with excellent accessibility. The “Combatentes” Metro Station is less than 5 minutes on foot (300 meters) and with buses passing by the door. Supermarket, bakeries, restaurants, shops and cafes can all be found within walking distance.

Across the street is the "Block of Costa Cabral" that is classified as a monument of Public Interest. Designed by "Viana de Lima" and built in the 50's. Among others, notable for the sculptural relationship between the expressionist pala of entry and the staticity of the housing block.

Less than 50 meters away is the "Fernando de Castro House Museum", which houses paintings (Henrique Pousão, Silva Porto, Sousa Pinto, Malhoa, António Carneiro), sculpture (17th and 18th centuries) and ornamental arts, with special emphasis for the work of carving. It can be visited by prior appointment at the Soares dos Reis National Museum.

There are also remarkable rows of dwellings within the frame

column6:
Practical and conveniently located studio apartment, located on the first floor of a traditional centennial building, with all modern facilities for a comfortable stay. Less than 300 meters (5 minutes walk) from the “Combatentes” metro station allows quick, easy and comfortable access to the entire city. It has an outdoor space, with a private pool, covered and heated ( From mid September to May) shared with the remaining guests.

Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment.

The space
Centennial building in stone and wooden beams that includes several studios and apartments, modern, furnished and fully equipped. It is centrally located and with excellent accessibility. It was completely renovated in 2017, respecting the original characteristics and its history.

It has an unusual "layout" and modern furnishings, providing comfort for our guests.
All units include a bathroom with shower and a fully equipped kitchen with fridge,

column6:
SIZE Flats are luxury apartments, ideal for families and groups, a few meters from the Torre dos Clérigos, located in the nightlife area, right in the heart of the beautiful city of Porto. Housed in a building completely restored and refurbished in 2019, with elevator, air conditioning and all amenities.

The space
SIZE Flats - Apartment 1.2 is an apartment with a maximum capacity for 6 people, with two bedrooms (one double room, the other with two single beds). The apartment has two complete bathrooms with shower, one living / dining room with a double sofa bed and an equipped kitchen, including an oven and a dishwasher.
In the building there is also a shared laundry room with washing machine, as well as an iron and ironing board are at your disposal inside your apartment. Bed linen, towels and shampoo are included in the stay.
We can provide a bed, bath and baby chair if requested.
Air conditioning system that also provides heating of the apartmen
column7: SIZE Flats are located right in the historic center of Porto. Here you can visit some of the most important tourist spots in the city, such as the Torre dos Clérigos de Nasoni, the tiles of the Igreja do Carmo and the Livraria Lello, known for its connection to JK Rowling and its literary works Harry Potter. There is an intimate connection with the academic tradition of the city in this area of the garden and the Praça dos Leões, and it is even possible to attend different rituals and concentrations of students in their typical costumes or visit the rectory of the University of Porto. The area is also known for the numerous restaurants, bars and night clubs that give this city neighborhood a unique energy.
column14:
Proudly from Porto, love our city, our people, our history :) Love to welcome and share the best tips I know from 30 years living here.
Passionate about languages, fluent in Portuguese, English, Spanish, Italian and able to understand some French. Lived already in Milan, London and San Francisco.
Having had ocasionally hosted some groups in a family house in the Northern Portuguese countryside in the early days, hosting in Porto wasn't something completely new for me. I started hosting one apartment by the end of 2017 and now I manage more than 20 apartments in Porto! Thrilled for having made this my full-time job! You can count on me and my team 24h/7days available to help you.
Looking forward to meet you! Welcome to Porto!

column5: Liiiving in Matosinhos | Seaside Beach House
column6:
Ready to spend a few days close to the beach in a tiny sustainable surf haven? This nautical inspired two-bedroom apartment is perfect and well thought out for sea lovers.

The space
With a patio that has a shower for you to dust off that sand after an afternoon at the beach, an exterior storage space to keep your surfboard, a fully equipped kitchen, TV, WIFI, one double bed and a singled that can be converted into a double and a bathroom with a sky light illuminated shower! Come and experience this lovely spot!

Book now! Because Liiiving is easy.

Guest access
The guests have full access to the apartment.

Other things to note
We have a transfer service that will leave you at the apartment! You only need to ask it (consult us for price)

For reservations equal to or greater than 28 nights, we have a limit on the cost of water, electricity and the internet / television pack in the amount of € 190. I
column7:
Just a short walk from the beach, this house has all of the facilities such as restaurants, bars, supermarkets, metro that can take you to the downtown Porto area and a lovely atmosphere of beach life. If you want to get away from the city center and have a taste of a different side of Porto, this is the place to be!

Book now! Because Liiiving is easy.
column14:
Olá! We are Liiiving's Short Stay team!

We are looking forward to welcome you in our properties :)
We were born and we have lived in Porto. We will be happy to help you out to know and enjoy every city where we are installed !
We love to meet new people, enjoy literature, cinema, to travel, meeting other cultures, other ways of being and living life !
We are delighted to give a personal welcome to our guests and to receive them the best way we can :)
Hope to see you soon !

column6:
Trindade Alegria Loft is located in the heart of Oporto's City.

The apartment has at your disposal free wifi and is located at 600 meters from Mercado do Bolhão; 10 minutes walking distance from Rua Galeria de Paris, 5 minutes walking distance from Avenida dos Alidados and only 1 minute away from Trindade Metro Station.

Covid - 19 information: We will have available alcohol gel and disposable masks for your safety and comfort during your stay in our apartment.

The space
This is a modern one bed apartment with an open kitchen concept with a seating area, fully equiped with a dishwasher, fridge, microwave, stove and a coffee machine. In the living room area there is a sofa bed that can accommodate a child and a flat - screen TV with 140 channels at your service. In the bathroom area, you have a shower, sink with a lot of storage, including a hair dryer at your disposal.

The apartment is fully equiped for you to have a confortable,
column7:
Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 10 km away and you can use the Subway or uber to go to the apartment. If you use the subway, there is no need to change lines or vehicles to arrive to the apartment.

The apartment is located at 600 meters from Rua de Santa Catarina, where you can do shopping.

Nearby the apartment you have a grocery store called Pingo Doce, where you can buy all the things you need.

1 km away you have Clerigo's Tower, the tallest tower in Porto and where you can enjoy a panoramic view from the entire city.

column6:
Basic Studio 3 Pax Apartment Ensuite 1 Doublebed + 1pax Sofabed
The apartment is Cinema Themed and you can stay with "Batman" movies.

The space
Ribeira Cinema Apartments are the newest completely remodeled serviced apartments in Ribeira, with an astonishing first row river view. Located on the beginning of the Guindais Stairways, one of the most picturesque areas on the historical center that stays along the XIV century city wall, facing Ribeira, the Douro River, D. Luis bridge, the Port Wine Cellars and “Serra do Pilar” Monastery.
The apartments are decorated with the Cinema theme and have all the commodities needed for a memorable stay.

The apartments are decorated with the Cinema theme and you can choose Tim Burton’s “Nightmare Before Christmas”, Myasaki’s “Princess Mononoke” or George Lucas“Star Wars”. They all have equipped kitchen, with wired and wireless High Speed Internet Access , Cable TV and a LED Flat Screen Television with lat
column7: Located right on the river first row facing D. Luis I bridge, in the most pictoresque nieghborhood, you will be in the heart of historical Porto area of Ribeira.
column14:
Rivoli Cinema Hostel is the first Cinema themed Hostel in Portugal, and here you can find 13 rooms each one about a different film.You can choose a room by a Director or by a Film, and the interior of the room is decorated with things about the film. You can find movies from Tim Burton, Tarantino, Ridley Scott, Almodovar, Jean-Pierre Jeunet, Godard, Manoel de Oliveira, David Fincher, Alejandro González Iñárritu, Michael Radford, Mira Nair, Steven Spielberg, Stanley Kubrick, Jonathan Demme, Ang Lee.

The Rivoli Cinema Hostel has 12 rooms available (twin or double beds and 4 beds room), 6 shared toilets and 6 shared showers, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 lounge area where you can relax, have a drink, read books and play games, and an outside 180 m2 space where you can listen to music, barbecue, sunbath, party, or just chat with the others guests.

In the Hostel you can use free WiFi internet, and you have free maps, tourist info and guides.
Rivoli Cinema Hostel is located in the Porto historical center, right at the most important city square:  Avenida dos Aliados- where you can find streets full of monuments, restaurants, cafes, esplanades, shops, supermarkets, shoppings, tourism info spots . RCH is right in center of the cultural center of Porto near Coliseu, Cinemas, Theaters, and Art Galleries.

At the doorstep you can find metro, bus, sightseeing bus, train, taxis and tram.From here you can easily visit the most important references in the city like the Port Wine Cellars, Clerigos Tower, Serralves Museum and its beautiful gardens, go to a concert in Casa da Musica, take a walk across the bridges, take a look at a local architecture, visit the F. C. Porto stadium, travel by boat in Douro river where you can take great pictures and have a drink in one of the many bars in Ribeira.

Nightlife is around the hostel, you just have to choose between cafes, nightclubs, discos or bars where you can meet Erasmus students and locals. Right across the street you have the Rivoli Theater where you can see musicals and at February you can attend one of the best Fantastic Cinema Festival in the world – Fantasporto.

column6:

Atualmente, com o mesmo traçado de antigamente, foi convertido num moderno e requintado Hotel de Charme. Possui 5 quartos personalizados de forma elegante e atraente, projetados para um conforto singular e uma estadia única e memorável. Em local aprazível conta ainda com estacionamento privado no local, piscina, e jardim.

Live like a local in the heart of Gaia.

This cosy flat has a balcony and garage(ACCORDING TO AVAILABILITY) which is ideal for you! It will provide you a nice atmosphere to relax and discover the city.

It is an excellent option for solo adventurers, weekend travellers, couples, and business travellers .

We are a passionate team in Porto, always excited to welcome amazing people from all over the world. Send us a message and pack your bags for an unforgettable experience.

The space
You'll have everything ready to make sure you have a comfortable stay.

The space has both a king bed, super comfy to have a great night of sleep, as well as a kitchen fully equipped to cook the local delicacies.

Not only do we provide Wi-Fi to share everything on social media, but, at the end of a tiring day, you can watch Netflix before going to sleep, all included, of course!

column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Casa D'el Rey - Serra da Freita- oferta passadiços
column6:
Casa D'el Rey - Em pleno Geoparque de Arouca, a casa D'el Rey, oferece toda a paz e tranquilidade que precisa para umas férias em familia ou amigos, com a privacidade que necessita neste momento.
Fica situada em plena Serra da Freita, bem perto da maior cascata de Portugal.

The space
Usufrua de umas férias isoladas de outras pessoas, mas com segurança.
Casa com 2 quartos, WC, cozinha e sala juntas.
Com privacidade. Pode ter entrega de pão e refeições entregues em casa.
ideal para quem quer passar umas férias mais reservadas sem contacto com muita gente, desfrutando, no entanto, de umas excelentes férias.
Não alugamos para eventos como despedidas de solteiro/a, festas de aniversário ou de crianças.

A Casa oferece alojamento até 4 adultos e 2 crianças possuindo 2 quartos com cama de casal, uma sala com sofá cama, cozinha, e WC.
Outras comodidades: máquina de lavar a roupa; Tv; Wi-fi; micro-ondas; máquinas de café e todo

column5: Room 3 - Oupas House Private Room w/ Double Bed
column6:
The room is on te 2nd floor. With a common room and a private bathroom you share only the kitchen in case of the 1st floor room is also occupied.
As it is an old building, to access the kitchen and bathroom, you will have to pass the common staircase, which brings only the inconvenience of crossing with other guests if they leave.

The space
Hostel Oupas House is located in the center of Porto, downtown, and São Bento is a great location. close to the emblematic Sé Cathedral, the train station and subway S.Bento, within walking distance of all the main attractions of the city center.
It is a building, from the historic area of the city, with two floors and four rooms.
Adapted to pandemic times, you do not share your space with other guests:. Bedroom, kitchen and bathroom are independent
We try to have high standards of cleanliness, hence the simplicity of the decoration and unnecessary objects for your convenience.

column5: Oporto Home Wine Cellars - Studio with Terrace
column6:
Oporto Home Wine Cellars is a building with 7 touristic apartments, fully equipped for our guests to relax during their vacation or business trip. The building was completely rebuilt in 2019, retaining elements and historical appearance but giving it the 21st century comfort.

The space
Decoration and design aim for simplicity. The apartments are neutral enough to be appreciated by all cultures that visit them, never forgetting typical and traditional Portuguese elements.
In the past, the building was a traditional pharmacy from the time medicines were made and mixed by pharmacists inside pharmacies. We decided to keep the name of the pharmacy on the façade, remembering the importance of this place for all the inhabitants of the neighborhood.

License number
85155/AL
column7:
Located on the south side of Porto's historic center, on Vila Nova de Gaia side, these apartments are very close to Cais de Gaia, the pedestrian promenade on the south side of the Douro River. From there, the Port Wine Cellars are 2 minutes away and D. Luís I Bridge is 5 minutes away.
Just 2 minutes' walk from Oporto Home Wine Cellars you will find: restaurants, grocery stores, cafes, ATMs and tourism office.
column14:
Oporto Home Boutique Apartments are a touristic apartments chain developed by portuguese entrepreneurs that have more than 10 years of existence.  We believe that the more globalised and standardised the world becomes, the more people want to experience something authentic when they travel. Whether our guests are stopping off for a few hours or a few days, for work or for pleasure, we want to pass them the feeling and soul of a genuine Porto. We strive daily to make our guests feel welcomed, comfortable, locals, at home. 
Welcome to your Oporto Home Boutique Apartments - make yourself at Home.
column27: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

column6:
Oporto Home Wine Cellars is a building with 7 touristic apartments, fully equipped for our guests to relax during their vacation or business trip. The building was completely rebuilt in 2019, retaining elements and historical appearance but giving it the 21st century comfort.

The space
Decoration and design aim for simplicity. The apartments are neutral enough to be appreciated by all cultures that visit them, never forgetting typical and traditional Portuguese elements.
In the past, the building was a traditional pharmacy from the time medicines were made and mixed by pharmacists inside pharmacies. We decided to keep the name of the pharmacy on the façade, remembering the importance of this place for all the inhabitants of the neighborhood.

column6:
SIZE Flats are luxury apartments, ideal for families and groups, a few meters from the Torre dos Clérigos, located in the nightlife area, right in the heart of the beautiful city of Porto. Housed in a building completely restored and refurbished in 2019, with elevator, air conditioning and all amenities.

The space
SIZE Flats - Apartment 2.1 is an apartment with a maximum capacity for 4 people, with one bedroom with two single beds. The apartment has one complete bathroom with shower, one living / dining room with a double sofa bed and an equipped kitchen, including an oven and a dishwasher.
In the building there is also a shared laundry room with washing machine, as well as an iron and ironing board are at your disposal inside your apartment. Bed linen, towels and shampoo are included in the stay.
We can provide a bed, bath and baby chair if requested.
Air conditioning system that also provides heating of the apartment in winter.
TV service an
column7: SIZE Flats are located right in the historic center of Porto. Here you can visit some of the most important tourist spots in the city, such as the Torre dos Clérigos de Nasoni, the tiles of the Igreja do Carmo and the Livraria Lello, known for its connection to JK Rowling and its literary works Harry Potter. There is an intimate connection with the academic tradition of the city in this area of the garden and the Praça dos Leões, and it is even possible to attend different rituals and concentrations of students in their typical costumes or visit the rectory of the University of Porto. The area is also known for the numerous restaurants, bars and night clubs that give this city neighborhood a unique energy.
column14:
Proudly from Porto, love our city, our people, our history :) Love to welcome and share the best tips I know from 30 years living here.
Passionate about languages, fluent in Portuguese, English, Spanish, Italian and able to understand some French. Lived already in Milan, London and San Francisco.
Having had ocasionally hosted some groups in a family house in the Northern Portuguese countryside in the early days, hosting in Porto wasn't something completely new for me. I started hosting one apartment by the end of 2017 and now I manage more than 20 apartments in Porto! Thrilled for having made this my full-time job! You can count on me and my team 24h/7days available to help you.
Looking forward to meet you! Welcome to Porto!

column6:
Edifício localizado no novo “bairro das artes”, próximo da Faculdade de Belas Artes, Biblioteca Municipal, Jardim de S. Lázaro, aos ateliers de artistas juntam-se novos cafés, galerias e restaurantes de autor. As ruas são arborizadas, com texturas e cores que mudam de cor ao longo do ano, tornando este bairro uma zona única e especial no centro da cidade.

The space
Os interiores da Bonfim Business & Leisure Residence, são inspirados nas cores e texturas do bairro, alternado com um toque vintage e uma mistura de mobiliário retro. O bem estar e o conforto são as palavras chave, que combinam com uma atmosfera única.

Guest access
Os hóspedes têm acesso às áreas da sala de estar/jantar e cozinha.

License number
87304/AL
column7: Bonfim, considerado recentemente pelo jornal The Guardian como sendo um dos  bairros “mais do cool da Europa”. Lázaro, ateliers de artistas e juntam-se a este  novos cafés, galerias e restaurantes de autor. column5: Anjo Apartment - Modern place in the City Center
column6:
Anjo Apartment is placed on the 1st floor of a renovated building close to the river. The apartment has around 42m2, it's perfect for two people and has everything you'll need for your holidays as it includes a living room with kitchenette area, an independent bedroom area and a private bathroom.

The space
> Please note that the apartment does not have a reception. Guests are kindly requested to inform their estimated time of arrival in advance;
> Late check-ins (after 23:00) are subject to an additional charge payed in cash to the person that waits at the apartment;
> Please make sure you keep the gate of the street closed;
> All our guests are required by law to provide their ID/Passport to and we are obliged to communicate this information to Immigration and Borders Service (SEF).

Guest access
- Guests have private access to the entire apartment;
- There is free and unlimited internet connection.

License
column7:
Sé/Ribeira
Intimate, cozy and thoughtfully designed apartment, located in the heart of the Historic Centre of Porto - UNESCO World Heritage Site. The main city landmarks are all within a short walking distance of the apartment. A lot of amazing cafes, bars, restaurants and shops are also just around the corner.

column5: Bright Modern Duplex w/ Balcony | City Center
column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find a bright flat with free wifi located in the city center near Aliados and famous Ribeira. It has a balcony with view to the street which will provide you a great atmosphere.

It is the best option for couples, individual adventurers and business travellers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
Bright and cosy flat in the city center with all the amenities for an epic stay.

You have 1 full bed and 1 sofa-bed in order to have a great night of sleep and an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country.

We have a surprise for you! Netflix to chill at the end of the day before sleeping.
column7:
The neighborhood is full of life during the day and it is characterized for having traditional small vintage shops, so take a look! Also, you'll find a supermarket just 2 minutes away by foot.

The nightlife of Porto is just around the corner for the ones who want to have long nights of diversion.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Bright Modern Flat w/ Terrace | City Center
column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find a bright flat with free wifi located in the city center near Aliados and famous Ribeira. It has a balcony with view to the street which will provide you a great atmosphere.

It is the best option for couples, individual adventurers and business travellers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
Bright and cosy flat in the city center with all the amenities for an epic stay.

You have 1 full bed and 1 sofa-bed in order to have a great night of sleep and an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country.

We have a surprise for you! Netflix to chill at the end of the day before sleeping.
column7:
The neighborhood is full of life during the day and it is characterized for having traditional small vintage shops, so take a look! Also, you'll find a supermarket just 2 minutes away by foot.

The nightlife of Porto is just around the corner for the ones who want to have long nights of diversion.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Quinta Rural com piscina a 20 minutos do Porto
column6:
A Casa das Cavadas Quinta situa-se em plena zona Vinhos Verdes, a 1 km do centro de Paredes, e a apenas 20 minutos do Porto. Está ainda localizada dentro da Rota do Românico, com diversas atrações nas redondezas.
Piscina, BBQ e forno a lenha em conjunto com vastos jardins cuidados e salas de jogos (ténis de mesa, bilhar, mesa cartas, ...) disponíveis para utilização dos hóspedes.
Passe um excelente e tranquilo tempo de qualidade em familia ou com amigos.

License number
110508/AL
column7: A Quinta ocupa um quarteirão inteiro da freguesia de Besteiros, a cerca de 1km do centro de Paredes.
column14: Formada em Turismo na Universida Portucalence no Porto , encontro-me neste momento a acabar o mestrado em Gestão do Turismo. Encontro-me totalmente disponivel para o ajudar no que for necessário.

column5: Room 4 - Oupas House Private Room w/ Double Bed
column6:
The room is on the 3rd floor, independent, with private bathroom and kichen.
The other 3 rooms, on the 1st and 2nd floors, are independent.
As it is an old building, to access the kitchen and bathroom, you will have to pass the common staircase, which does not bring any inconvenience, since it is the complete top floor on your own.

The space
Hostel Oupas House is located in the center of Porto, downtown, and São Bento is a great location. close to the emblematic Sé Cathedral, the train station and subway S.Bento, within walking distance of all the main attractions of the city center.
It is a building, from the historic area of the city, with two floors and four rooms.
Adapted to pandemic times, you do not share your space with other guests:. Bedroom, kitchen and bathroom are independent.
We try to have high standards of cleanliness, hence the simplicity of the decoration and unnecessary objects for your convenience.

Guest a

column6:
This stylish one-bedroom with a sofa bed is located in the best part of Porto, in the neighborhood of Santa Catarina- close to great shopping, dining and many of the most famous attractions. Carefully decorated by our local interior designer to reflect the vibe of the area, you will especially appreciate the attention to detail and elegant furniture. The fully equipped kitchen is perfect for cooking a meal and the high-quality mattresses ensure you a great night’s sleep.
