column5: Morar Apartments Apartamento  1 Hab. con Terraza
column6:
Morar Apartments Oporto está situado en el centro de Oporto, a menos de 600 metros del mercado municipal de Bolhao y a menos de 400 metros del Palacio da Bolsa, y ofrece alojamientos con zona de estar y conexión WiFi gratuita.
El alojamiento está equipado con aire acondicionado, TV de pantalla plana con canales por cable, cocina equipada con microondas, frigorífico con zona de comedor y baño privado con secador de pelo. Hay microondas, nevera, hervidor de agua y cafetera.

The space
Morar Apartments Oporto está cerca de varios lugares de interés, como el mercado Ferreira Borges, la plaza Ribeira, Iglesia de los Clérigos, Torre de los Clérigos, Estación. De trenes San Benito y el coliseo de Oporto. El aeropuerto más cercano es el Francisco Sá Carneiro, situado a 17 km.

column6:
El apartamento tiene 1 habitación con una cama de 1,60 por 2,00 y el sofá cama ubicado en el salón se abre para recibir dos personas en una cama de 1,20 X 1,90. Totalmente equipado con sábanas, toallas, equipo y artefactos de cocina, vajilla y cubiertos, microonda, cafetera Nesspreso, tetera, frigorífico, aire acondicionado/Calefacción, TV y Wifi gratuito.

The space
El apartamento forma parte de un edificio recientemente restaurado y rehabilitado de manera integral, manteniendo su fachada original.
Los apartamentos están completamente amueblados y equipados con los electrodomésticos necesarios para hacer confortable la estancia. Decorados con todo lujo de detalles. Poseen una excelente terraza para disfrutar de una bella vista a la ciudad de Porto.

License number
107323/AL
column7:
Un poco fuera de lo común, el área de Vitória, en el centro de Oporto, puede pasar desapercibida por ojos menos atentos, pero tiene mucha historia que contar y un ambiente muy típico, con un alma de Oporto.
Hoy en día es un área típica de la ciudad con callejones estrechos y sombreados, con sus tendederos secos, un acento norteño bien acentuado y tabernas donde amablemente te sirven un excelente vino para complacer a tu paladar.
A pocos metros puedes encontrar la famosa Estación de tren de São Bento, una verdadera obra de arte nominada como una de las más bonitas del mundo. Con mas de 500 metros cuadrados de azulejos en sus paredes sirven de lienzos en la representación de las escenas históricas de Porto del artista Jorge Colaço. El Mercado de Bolhão. Es uno de los mercados más emblemáticos de la ciudad y se sitúa en el barrio de San Ildefonso, con su inigualable arquitectura neoclásica. Cuenta con dos pisos en los que se vende todo tipo de alimentos frescos, pescado, frutas
column14: Somos uma empresa especializada em Apartamentos Turísticos de alta qualidade onde nos empenhamos para tornar a sua estadia connosco inesquecível.

column6:
An apartment located in a privilege area and carefully design for a perfect stay:
- a Taylor-made designed kitchen fully equipped, with a dishwasher, fridge and freezer, electric stove and oven, microwave, mixer, traditional Portuguese kitchen ware.
- a bright and calm living and dining room with deluxe design furniture and a stunning view over the river Douro, equipped with high speed wifi connection.
- a conformable double bed (140x200cm), with 100% white percale cotton bed linen and towels.

The space
Embrace the architectural vision of this apartment set on the 5th floor (with elevator), in a renovated 19th century building. Refurbished by a renown Porto architect, all its details are carefully designed, featuring vintage antique furnishings, hardwood floors, and a stunning view over Passeio das Virtudes and the Douro river. Located in a privilege setting of downtown Porto, this flat combines the charm of its historical neighbourhood, with all i
column7: Passeio das Virtudes is one of the most beautiful areas of Porto. Not crossed frequently by cars, this area is vibrant during daytime and safe and quiet at night.
column14: Hi! I am Luís, i studied philosophy at Universidade do Porto and run nowadays a beautiful Yoga studio in downtown. I organize an international series of improvised music and explore twelve apartments, including 3 apartments listed in the world's best interiors by architecture and design magazine De Zeen, and one winner of Prémio João Almada, Porto's prize for best rehabilitation. I am an enthusiast of creative plant-based food and will do my best to give you a nice stay!

column5: Spacious Design Studio in Downtown Porto
column6:
Minimalist designer apartment in a boutique hotel located in the centre of Porto within walking distance of all the cities main attractions!

The space
Welcome to our place!

This beautifully renovated traditional Porto style building has been converted into boutique designer apartments and rooms especially for tourists and guests to the city. 

Embracing minimalism, the design focus of this property is creating the optimal guest experience. Maintaining all of the original charm of the historic building. Upgraded with a touch of class and luxury. Including a comfortable memory foam mattress, high-speed cable internet and a walk-in power shower.

Just a few moments stroll from the stunning Unesco world heritage old town, riverfront and many local restaurants. This is the ideal place for your stay in Porto.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire home!

Other things to note
Please
column7: Jardim Marques de Oliveira is 7 minutes walking distance. Restaurants, supermarkets, are also close to the house (Praça dos Poveiros - restaurant area - 10-15 minutes walking distance). 15 minutes walking of Batalha Square is the best choice for your vacation in Porto!
column14:
Hi there!

We're GuestReady, a professional property management company helping hosts around the world deliver outstanding experiences to their guests.

We welcome all guests, prepare our homes for your arrival and will be available 24/7, should you have any questions or requests. From the second you book with us to the moment you check-out, we’re here to make sure you have a smooth and comfortable stay!

With our years of experience in the hospitality business, you can be assured of a fantastic stay at any of GuestReady's properties. We manage multiple properties around town, so if you're looking for something specific, do let us know and we'd be happy to help you find the perfect place just for you.

We're looking forward to meeting you and are always happy to answer any of your questions!

Warm regards,
GuestReady Team

column5: Bright Modern Flats w/ Balcony | City Center
column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find 3 bright flats with free wifi located in the city center near Aliados and famous Ribeira. They all have a balcony with view to the street which will provide you a great atmosphere.

It is the best option for groups and business travelers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
Bright and cosy flats located in the city center with all the amenities for an epic stay.

You have 1 full bed, 4 individual beds and 5 sofa-beds in order to have a great night of sleep and 3 awesome kitchens to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country.

We have a surprise for you! Netflix to chill at the end of the day before sleepin
column7:
The neighborhood is full of life during the day and it is characterized for having traditional small vintage shops, so take a look! Also, you'll find a supermarket just 2 minutes away by foot.

The nightlife of Porto is just around the corner for the ones who want to have long nights of diversion.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Downtown Modern 2BR Flat w/ Free Parking
column6:
Experience Porto and all it has to offer through this lovely two bedroom apartment. It is located close to all the main touristic attractions worth visiting in the historic area of Porto thus you will be able to walk everywhere with ease! Perfectly suited to host up to 4 people, this apartment comprises of a well-equipped kitchen, two comfortable bedrooms with double beds, a bathroom with shower, and a living room with a cozy sofa where you can lay back after a long day exploring the city. There's a free parking spot available in the building's garage which is a big plus if you're coming by car. There's also an elevator in the building which is handy since the apartment is on the 5th floor. You will certainly feel at ease here, and will have an absolutely memorable trip! We look forward to hosting you!

The space
Located right downtown, this 2BR flat is modern and well-equipped! It can comfortably accommodate up to 4 people and thus is perfect for families or a gr

column5: Vitoria Douro house on the port wine cellars route
column6:
Vitoria Douro, is a modern and welcoming villa, the holiday home has 2 bedrooms, with TV with satellite channels and Wifi, a fully equipped kitchen. Situated in the heart of the historic center of Vila Nova de Gaia, in a quiet area, 700 mt port wine cellars 900 mt from Gaia pier, 1.1 km Mercado Ferreira Borges, 1.5 km from Torre dos Clérigos, the nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro is 15 km from Vitoria Douro.

The space
About the propertyThe accommodation is a modern and welcoming villa. The holiday home has 2 bedrooms, with a flat-screen TV with cable and wifi, a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and washing machine, microwave, fridge, coffee machine, 1 bathroom with a shower. This accommodation is ideal for families andgroups of up to 5 people. Located in the heart of the Historic Center ofVila Nova de Gaia, in a quiet area and just a few minutes walk from the Port Wine cellars, thecable car and also the lively pier of Gaia there you will find the best
column7: The place is inhabited by hospitable people, with very Portuguese traditions, in a quiet area and just a few minutes walk from the port wine cellars, the cable car and also to the lively pier of Gaia, there you will find the best restaurants where you can taste excellent Portuguese dishes.  traditional Portuguese food.

column6:
A Casa da Eira é um acolhedor e rústico refúgio no campo. Situado na freguesia arouquense de Mansores, a 14 km do centro de Arouca e a 11 km do rio Paiva, esta casa rasteira com uma incrível vista para a Serra da Ribeira conta com 25 m² de espaço interior com Wi-Fi gratuita, televisão por satélite, ar condicionado, cozinha equipada e casa de banho completa. O espaço exterior inclui um estacionamento individual gratuito com portão elétrico, pátio e jardim.

The space
Trata-se de um palheiro restaurado que foi transformado num espaço único com cozinha equipada com fogão, frigorífico e micro-ondas, uma pequena mesa para refeições e uma cama individual. Tem também uma casa de banho completa e uma cama de casal separada do resto da casa por um biombo. No pátio exterior o incrível cenário natural é complementado por uma mesa maior de madeira com bancos e um grelhador portátil. Espalhados pelo pátio estão ainda elementos rústicos da zona e um jardim cultivado.
column7: Embora seja um espaço sossegado, está a 200 metros do centro de Mansores, onde dispõe de mercearia, padaria, café, multibanco e farmácia.

column5: Casa de Pedra 1 - Clean and Safe - Tradition House
column6:
Our differential is the location, we are in one of the most central streets in the city of Porto. The apartment was recently opened as a local accommodation and belongs to a traditional 18th century building. We are in the old town and offer a unique experience in a genuine stone house. The building was preserved by the chamber's restoration programs and today it is the home of our family and also a space to receive and meet new people.

The space
Nuestro diferencial es la ubicación, estamos en una de las calles más céntricas de la ciudad de Oporto. El apartamento fue inaugurado recientemente como alojamiento local y pertenece a un edificio tradicional del siglo XVIII. Estamos en el casco antiguo y ofrecemos una experiencia única en una casa de piedra genuina. El edificio fue preservado por los programas de restauración del consejo y hoy es el hogar de nuestra familia y también un espacio para recibir y conocer gente nueva.

column6:
Live like a local in the heart of Gaia.

This cosy studio is ideal for you! It will provide you a nice atmosphere to relax and to discover the city.

It is an excellent option for solo adventurers, weekend travellers, couples, and business travellers who wish to enjoy all Porto has to offer.

We are a passionate team in Porto, always excited to welcome amazing people from all over the world. Send us a message and pack your bags for an unforgettable experience.

The space
You'll have everything ready to make sure you have a comfortable stay.

The space has both a king bed, super comfy to have a great night of sleep, as well as a kitchen fully equipped to cook the local delicacies.

Not only do we provide Wi-Fi to share everything on social media, but, at the end of a tiring day, you can watch Netflix before going to sleep, all included, of course!

column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: ☆NEW☆ Burgos 21: Private Suite with Free Parking
column6:
Burgos 21 is a recently renovated Guesthouse in Porto. Located on the Camino de Santiago as you leave the city, it’s just 15 minutes walking to Casa da Música and 30 minutes walking to the city centre of Porto (5 minute Uber ride).

The space
You will be booking a Private Bedroom with a dedicated Bathroom and all the amenities for a comfortable stay. Each room is equipped with Air Conditioning, TV, Fridge and a Kettle. Wifi is also available for free.

Free Parking for standard or electric car is included. This applies to electric cars as each parking space has its own power socket.

The house has a shared Living Room Area and Kitchen fully equipped for all guests.

Extremely Safe Residential Neighborhood and a 24/7 Laundry is available within a 5 minute walk.

You will be able to self check-in upon arrival if you desire.

Towels and bed linen are included.

Upon Check-In you will have at your disposal:
column7:

Extremely safe residential neighbourhood.

24/7 Laundry available within a 5 minute walk.

column5: Central and silent with a great sunset balcony
column6:
A 5th floor apartment, in a building with elevator, plenty of sunlight, with a large balcony with a wide view, which includes the line of the Atlantic Ocean and some important monuments, such as Torre dos Clérigos and Monumento aos Heróis da Guerra Peninsular.
This apartment has a beautiful wooden floor, a complete kitchen, air conditioning, and is turned to the sunset.
The location is absolutely central, at 1 minute walking to the main night life street, but absolutely silent and calm.

85641/AL
column7:
This is one of the best areas of Porto, in the beginning of the Miguel Bombarda area, where are concentrated Porto's art galleries. It's at a walking distance to the main points of Porto, such as Clérigos Tower (5 min), Lello bookshop (4 min), the City Hall (7 min), Bolhão (10 min), the riverside (12 min), Sé (8 min) or Virtudes (8 min).
It's at 1 min walking to the main area of nightlife, but it's absolutely calm and peaceful, as it's balcony turned to the opposite way, where is possible to see the line of the ocean.
column14: Hi! I am Luís, i studied philosophy at Universidade do Porto and run nowadays a beautiful Yoga studio in downtown. I organize an international series of improvised music and explore twelve apartments, including 3 apartments listed in the world's best interiors by architecture and design magazine De Zeen, and one winner of Prémio João Almada, Porto's prize for best rehabilitation. I am an enthusiast of creative plant-based food and will do my best to give you a nice stay!

column6:
Localizado numa das ruas mais emblemáticas do Porto, a Rua do Almada.
Charm Garden é uma homenagem a escritores importantes que fizeram parte da história de Portugal. Almeida Garret, Abel Salazar e Júlio Dinis são algumas das figuras que deram nome aos nossos apartamentos e suítes, decorados com inspiração nos seus trabalhos e notas peculiares.
Os apartamentos têm seu próprio terraço e acesso total ao jardim privado do edifício, um espaço onde pode relaxar e desfrutar de uma tarde ensolarada.

The space
O nosso apartamento Almeida Garret está situado numa das ruas mais conhecidas da cidade do Porto, a rua do Almada! Bem no centro do Porto, a 200 metros da Famosa Avenida dos Aliados e a 400metros da Livraria Lello. Um apartamento decorado com muito amor e dedicação que proporciona um ambiente confortável, requintado e familiar. column5: ☆NEW☆ Burgos 21: Private Suite with Free Parking
column6:
Burgos 21 is a recently renovated Guesthouse in Porto. Located on the Camino de Santiago as you leave the city, it’s just 15 minutes walking to Casa da Música and 30 minutes walking to the city centre of Porto (5 minute Uber ride).

The space
You will be booking a Private Bedroom with a dedicated Bathroom and all the amenities for a comfortable stay. Each room is equipped with Air Conditioning, TV, Fridge and a Kettle. Wifi is also available for free.

Free Parking for standard or electric car is included. This applies to electric cars as each parking space has its own power socket.

The house has a shared Living Room Area and Kitchen fully equipped for all guests.

Extremely Safe Residential Neighborhood and a 24/7 Laundry is available within a 5 minute walk.

You will be able to self check-in upon arrival if you desire.

Towels and bed linen are included.

Upon Check-In you will have at your disposal:
column7:
Burgos 21 is located on the world famous Camino de Santiago, just on the way from Porto to Santiago de Compostela as you leave the city.

Extremely safe residential neighbourhood.

24/7 Laundry available within a 5 minute walk.

column5: DV Stays | The Crown BR4 | Private WC |  Balcony
column6:
This is a unique place designed for you to have privacy within a home, but community within your reach. This is an ideal place for remote workers and digital nomads. You are booking a spacious private room with an in suite private bathroom inside a unique apartment with three floors and 4 bedrooms.

The space
This is a special triplex apartment. The unique floor plan is similar to that of a hotel: the lobby, the living room and kitchen are located in the first floor, and the rooms are in the second and the third floors.
The apartment has a homelift elevator to move from floor to floor (how cool?).
The bedrooms are located in corners of the house, all of them have a private bathroom and most of them also have a balcony.
I have equipped the bedrooms with a desk, chandelier and a super confortable office chair for prolonged working from home hours.
The space is being designed so that you can have privacy when you need privacy, and community when
column7: The property is located in a great neighborhood of Porto, very central. It is not Porto's downtown or immediate city center, but right after. I go everywhere walking. The city hall and main square in Porto, Aliados, is at a 15 min walking distance from my apartment.
column14:
Dear guest, Daniel here! I'm an Engineer who is investing in Real Estate. I own properties and have a company called DV Stays to manage the properties of y Real Estate partners, particularly on Airbnbs. In my free time (which is little, unfortunately) I play the guitar and go out with friends!

I just love the concept of having a home everywhere you go and that's why I'm attracted to the Airbnb life. I want to let you know that all is well planned for your stay and that I keep perfecting my systems everyday, exploring new technology and ways to communicate, in order to improve my guests' experience!

I am an avid traveler myself, so I know that we all want a nice place that feels like home while we are away. Count me in to make this experience as close to that as it can be.

All I ask from you in return of my hard work in preparring a home for you is: 
1. Please read my listing carefully.
2. Book only if my listing suits you. Better to be slective first, than disapointed later!

Thank you!
Daniel

Minimalist architecture with exceptional comfort and unique design.
Boomerang House is located in a peaceful residential street in the most noble area in Porto. Near the sea line with easy access to the city center. It's centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer.
Between Porto city center, at a distance of 15min by car, and the beach at 1km, with easy access to the city park at a walking distance of 100m.

Practical and conveniently located with all amenities for a comfortable stay. This house can have a maximum of 8 guests and is dog-friendly. All rooms are suites with garden view window and bathroom with opening skylight.
This house has a daily cleaning lady and a gardener 1 day per week.

+ Social living room area fitted with two large sofas and comfortable chaise longue;

column7:
Boomerang House has a privileged distance to Serralves, the only Contemporary Art Museum in town, at a 5 min car drive.
Casa da Musica, also a must see, is on the way to downtown, at a 10 min car drive.
Both destinations are really accessible by public transportation.
Driving to the other side of the city, by the sea line, in about 10 min, you get to Foz do Douro, where the river meets the sea. If you continue driving along the river side, you will enjoy a great view up to Ribeira, where the historical center begins.

column5: CASA MARIA> COZY GARDEN AMONG BEACH & PORTO
column6:
"Casa do Maria" (Maria House) is located in one of the housing conglomerates called “ilhas” ou “bairros”. Villa Santa Bárbara is one of these “ilhas”and has only three houses: Casa Antonio, Casa Maria and Casa Adriana. Casa Maria is a typical house, with old masonry walls. Its decoration is based on Portuguese tradition. It is a very charming house. It is like a secret place in the city.

The space
Just like inside the houses, the environment is very welcoming, romantic, and original. There is an open, very pleasant, unique green area with benches, swimming pool, chairs, fruit trees, an orchid greenhouse and an aromatic herb bed. During the day you can listen and watch the birds. At night, there is a charming lighting system in the whole open space.
There are more than 700 square meters that invite you to relax.
Inside Casa António there are two sleeping rooms: a private double room and a twin bedroom in an open mezzanine that can host up to four peopl
column7: The place has the genuine Portuguese spirit. The name Villa Santa Barbara comes from the name of the street where it is located and is a tribute to the patron saint of the church which is on the same street. The church is beautifully decorated with Portuguese tiles and is worth a visit. In the neighborhood there are many facilities such as: a grocery store, fruit shop, pastry shop, barber shop, bakery, coffee shop and a butchers. There are also restaurants, big markets and a shopping center, Gaia shopping, Aldi and Lidl.

column6:
Estúdio na Boavista, um espaço aconchegante projetado por designer de interiores para se viver, trabalhar e desfrutar do melhor da Cidade com tranquilidade.

The space
Estúdio open space de 38 m2 em local central, próximo de todas a facilidades de transportes e serviços - 300 m da estação do metro C. Michaelis e 600 m da Rotunda da Boavista. Está mobiliado e no mezanine há uma cama de casal - atenção que é um espaço para dormir aconchegado, onde fica-se sentado e não em pé ! Na sala há muita arrumação no armário embutido, com espaço para TV e um sofá cama casal. Cozinha integrada com placa de duas bocas, frigorífico pequeno e micro-ondas. Local com muita luz, boa vizinhança, tranquilo e sem ruídos. - logo, pede-se cuidado para que estas características sejam respeitadas. Existem muitos restaurantes nas proximidades, serviços como padarias, igreja, correios, cabelereiros, um supermercado no prédio ao lado. Possível uso de garagem no subsolo do prédio, caso necessá
column7: Há serviços no bairro como correios, supermercados, mercearias, tabacarias, padarias,  igrejas, pontos de ônibus, bares e restaurantes.  A Rua da Cedofeita está muito próxima e conta com boas  lojas, bares e locais para comer - é a segunda rua comercial mais importante !  Estamos nos limites  do centro da Cidade, a 12 minutos a pé da Baixa (o centro histórico), em local tranquilo e com  todas as comodidades.
column14: I am an  outgoing and open minded person, loving to live in this surprising city, Oporto.  I  am from Rio de Janeiro , Brazil, and as an architect  I love art, museums, movies, theater, dancing, ,reading,  gardening, treccking and meet  people.  That is the reason I have opened  my place to host people willing to get the most of this amazing city.   I also like to travel and I have lived in some  countries.  I speak Portuguese, as my mother language, Spanish and English fluently . To me, being an Airbnb member is the opportunity to meet people from other cultures, share experiences and make new friends.

column7: The house benefits from a perfect location on the Gaia hill, in the Porto-Gaia historical center. In the vicinity, you can find all the Porto wine cellars, where the Porto wine ages, and the famous cable car if you want to enjoy outstanding views over Douro River and Port's historical center. About 15 minutes walk from Ribeira (you just need to go down the street and cross the D. Luís bridge), an area full of imposing historic buildings and magnificent views to the Douro river and its bridges. Palácio da Bolsa and the Church of S. Francisco are definitely worth a visit.

column6:
This stylish one-bedroom with a sofa bed is located in the best part of Porto, in the neighborhood of Santa Catarina- close to great shopping, dining and many of the most famous attractions. Carefully decorated by our local interior designer to reflect the vibe of the area, you will especially appreciate the attention to detail and elegant furniture. The fully equipped kitchen is perfect for cooking a meal and the high-quality mattresses ensure you a great night’s sleep.

column6:
A Casa Porto São Dinis está localizada no Porto. Está perto de tudo, um lugar calmo, e acolhedor.
Possui um pátio onde os hóspedes poderão relaxar e fica a 1,3 km da Casa da Música. O acesso Wi-Fi é gratuito. Tem sempre muito estacionamento nas redondezas gratuito.

The space
A Casa Porto São Dinis está localizada no Porto, mantendo a sua arquitetura original com um design contemporâneo. Possui um pátio onde os hóspedes poderão relaxar e fica a 1,3 km da Casa da Música. O acesso Wi-Fi é gratuito.

Com uma decoração inspirada no Porto tradicional, esta casa inclui 4 quartos, 2 dos quais com casa de banhos privativa, uma sala de estar com uma televisão de ecrã plano, uma área de refeições, cozinha e uma área multifuncional com secretarias.
Tem uma WC comum. No 1° andar tem uma casa de banho partilhada para dois quartos, há uma área para crianças. Está disponível ar condicionado em toda a casa. Possui uma lavandaria toda, com máquina de lavar, se
column7: A Casa está perto de tudo. Tem transportes públicos em frente à casa  para toda o lado desde cidade, a paria, rio, baixa, shopping, entre outros.

column6:
If you are looking for comfort and charm at an acceptable price, don't waste any more time. You will find it all in this brand new mezzanine studio, plus a not-insignificant bonus: a pleasant balcony with a view of the horizon that will enchant you, the perfect setting for a peaceful tasting of Porto at sunset.
200 meters from the metro and centrally located, which allows you to walk to all places of tourist interest in the centre of Porto.

The space
Studio apartment mezzanine, on the fourth floor of a renovated building, with a fantastic view over the city of Porto. This apartment consists of two floors, on the first floor there is a complete bathroom, a living room, an equipped kitchen with a washing machine and a balcony facing Rua da Boavista. On the second floor is the bedroom with a double bed and closet.

Guest access
Guests have access to all rooms and facilities in the apartment.

Other things to note
***

column5: Trendy Cozy Studio w/ Netflix | São Lázaro
column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find a cozy and bright space with Free Wifi in the city center and which will provide you a great atmosphere.

It's the best option for couples, individual adventurers, small groups and businesses travelers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
Located right in the heart of Porto, on a pedestrian street in the trendy Sao Lazaro neighborhood, this house is set on a renovated building with a contemporary design, while maintaining its original tiled walls and other portuguese architectural elements.

The house includes 3 bedrooms and a lounge area and can accommodate up to 6 guests. Perfect for groups of friends or families.

The bedrooms feature a luxurious and modern decor with one offering a balcony with unique panoramic cit
column7:
The house is 400 metres from Oporto Coliseum, 750 metres from Avenida Aliados and 800 metres from Dom Luis I Bridge, next to Ribeira and the port wine cellars.

Francisco Sa Carneiro airport is 14 km away.

You can easily visit other areas, being well served by public transport such as metro and tram. A few minutes away you will find the Trindade metro station with access to several lines.

You are just 5 minutes from Batalha and Santa Catarina and 10 minutes from Clérigos and Aliados.

You are in a prime location surrounded by restaurants, supermarkets and monuments. You'll find a restaurant called Casa Guedes where you will eat the best pork sandwich! And also the best Francesinha at Santiago Café!
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: "Ar de Sal - Angeiras Residence"  - Front Beach
column6:
"Ar de Sal" is an apartment located on the beach of Angeiras - Vila de Lavra. 70 meters from the beach, 10 km from Porto Airport - Francisco Sá Carneiro, and 15 km from the center of Porto. It lies on the coastal route of the Santiago way.
This space is inserted in the ground floor of a house, and consists of 3 suites, living and dining room, kitchen and service toilet. All rooms have private WC with shower, TV and access to the outside. Shared outdoor area.

The space
A new space, properly equipped and with a large outdoor area.
All details have been thought to provide the greatest comfort and pleasure to our guests.

Guest access
our guests can freely use the outdoor space, namely the green area with swimming pool, table and sun loungers.
the front rooms also have a private patio.

Other things to note
In the outer space our dog - Mike and our cat - Ruca freely roam. Both are very docile and sweet.
column7:
Praia de Angeiras is located in the village of Lavra.
Our beach is known for the long sandy beach served by good infrastructure, and for the wooden walkways that allow long walks by the sea.
A historic fishing land, Praia de Angeiras attracts people from all over the place for the good fish it serves in its many restaurants.

500 meters away you will find the "CNR" mini-market and 1 km away the "Continente" supermarket.
Pharmacy, stationery, among other services less than 500 meters from the accommodation
column14: Apaixonada pela natureza, adoro viajar e explorar o mundo.  ~
column28: Perafita, Lavra e Santa Cruz do Bispo

column5: Vila na Praia Foz Apartment Balcony with RiverView
column6:
Pretende se preservar o espírito romântico do lugar. Interiores simples, relaxados com caráter artesanal, leve e divertido. Tirando partido do pé direito elevado, da relação com o Exterior e com a paisagem. Os tons pastel, as matérias naturais e as texturas agregam o Urbano e naturalista. Cozinha, parte integrante da zona social, é feita com armários de tiras de madeira entrançada, permitindo simultaneamente ventilar os interiores assim como acrescentar a textura e o padrão que se pretende.

The space
Este conceito nasce da união de dois edifícios degradados e devolutos na marginal da Foz do rio do Douro.
A intervenção foi mais além do que uma simples actualização dos espaços.
Com uma intervenção profunda de raiz, que passou pela união de dois edifícios contíguos com um programa que congrega:
Um espaço de restauração com esplanada e uma pequena loja, ao jeito de comércio tradicional, no piso de relação com a marginal ribeirinha com vista privilegi

column6:
Practical and conveniently located 1 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 4 people comfortably. 10 minutes walking distance to Trindade metro station.

Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment.
Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay.

The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience.

Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.

The space
Also I would like to inform that Portuguese immigration services, SEF, require that all non-portugese guests fill a form with some personal details such as passport number, nationality, etc..
This form will be sent through a certified program or given to you on the check in.

License number
111060/AL

column5: Vila na Praia Foz Apartment with Terrace
column6:
Pretende se preservar o espírito romântico do lugar. Interiores simples, relaxados com caráter artesanal, leve e divertido. Tirando partido do pé direito elevado, da relação com o Exterior e com a paisagem. Os tons pastel, as matérias naturais e as texturas agregam o Urbano e naturalista. Cozinha, parte integrante da zona social, é feita com armários de tiras de madeira entrançada, permitindo simultaneamente ventilar os interiores assim como acrescentar a textura e o padrão que se pretende.

The space

column5: A Cancela House - Arouca and Paiva Walkways
column6:
The Cancela House is a rural house in a green area near a sparkling stream, in the north of the municipality of Arouca and inserted in the Geopark (Passadiços do Paiva, waterfalls, traditional villages ...).
The house has a swimming pool, barbecue, and a pleasant patio to enjoy peaceful days. Hiking and rafting on the Paiva river not to be missed! Enjoy the river beaches in the summer! And our fireplaces in the coldest weather!
(Capacity for up to 8 people, exclusive use of the house)

The space
Country house set in a green area with a stream nearby, with many chestnut trees, willows ... In the stream you can see the dragonflies and the peace and quiet of the place are refreshing and inspire anyone who stops to contemplate nature.
Its symbol is the hydrangeas that greet us right at the entrance.

A place of rest, calm, harmony and tranquility, between earth and heaven.

The rental of the house is exclusive and with the use of the
column7:
The house is located in Lázaro, a small village in a valley in the north of the Municipality of Arouca, in the middle of the of the Water and Stone Route of the Montanhas Mágicas (Magic Mountains) and the Arouca Geopark (Passadiços do Paiva, Pedras Parideiras, Frecha da Mizarela waterfall, walking routes,…).

The village has neither coffee nor supermarkets, just a lot of peace and breathtaking scenery!

Very close to the house we have the Marco dos 4 Concelhos, a point of beautiful views including the Douro River, which borders 4 municipalities: Arouca, Santa Maria da Feira, Gondomar and Castelo de Paiva and from the house you can also explore the Douro área (beach in Pedorido and a brathtaking view from the viewpoint of São Domingos)

Nearby we also have our "secret" (almost private) river beach on the river Arda! (5 minutes by car from A Cancela House). Wonderful for swimming, "jacuzzi" in rapids, enjoying the trout jumping in the river and the drago
column14:
We are  longtime friends. In the beginning, it was just us. But now it is us and our great team. Passionate about Lisbon, we will welcome you with a big smile and a warm attitude. We love to travel, we love our homes, our neighbourhood and also our beautiful city! Our goal is to welcome you to the heart of Lisbon, a city with a centuries old soul and a contemporary vanguard edge. Exciting or relaxing, all we want is to create a memorable stay.

IMPORTANT: Covid-19 Special: Please notice that high cleaning standards always was a key factor in our properties: all apartments are professionally cleaned and disinfected after guests departure. Beds are freshly made before guests arrival with fresh bed linen and fresh towels. Linen is treated (washed and disinfected), after each departure by a professional company, as well. 
Our apartments are rented only on exclusive basis, which means that you do not have to share the space with anyone besides your group.
We are always available to you, before and during your stay. However as an  additional precaution due to Covid-19, we have  implemented self check-in (unless you specifically prefer having someone there waiting for you at arrival, available from 16:00-20:00h).

Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find 2 cozy and bright studios with Free Wifi in the city center and which will provide you a great atmosphere.

It's the best option for couples, individual adventurers, small groups and businesses travelers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
Located right in the heart of Porto, on a pedestrian street in the trendy Sao Lazaro neighborhood, this house is set on a renovated building with a contemporary design, while maintaining its original tiled walls and other portuguese architectural elements.

The house includes 3 bedrooms and a lounge area and can accommodate up to 6 guests. Perfect for groups of friends or families.

The bedrooms feature a luxurious and modern decor with one offering a balcony with unique panoramic c
column7:
The house is 400 metres from Oporto Coliseum, 750 metres from Avenida Aliados and 800 metres from Dom Luis I Bridge, next to Ribeira and the port wine cellars.

Francisco Sa Carneiro airport is 14 km away.

You can easily visit other areas, being well served by public transport such as metro and tram. A few minutes away you will find the Trindade metro station with access to several lines.

You are just 5 minutes from Batalha and Santa Catarina and 10 minutes from Clérigos and Aliados.

You are in a prime location surrounded by restaurants, supermarkets and monuments. You'll find a restaurant called Casa Guedes where you will eat the best pork sandwich! And also the best Francesinha at Santiago Café!

column5: Face to Porto - Rio, Mar, Natureza e Cidade
column6:
Junto à Reserva Natural Local do Estuário do Douro, em Gaia, na zona (Freguesia) de Canidelo, o apartamento oferece uma vista fantástica sobre o rio Douro e o mar, onde se avistam as várias aves que o habitam, tendo a cidade do Porto como quadro de fundo. Zona sossegada e aprazível que permite o descanso e o lazer e longos passeios em contacto com a natureza.

The space
Proximidade: Porto (3 Km), Foz do Rio Douro (0,5 Km), Praias (Lavadores 1,5 Km, Madalena, Valadares, Miramar, Aguda 11 Km), Espinho (15 Km), Área Protegida, Reserva Natural Local do Estuário do Douro (0,5 km), ciclovias e pistas pedonais (0,5 Km), Marina da Afurada (1 Km).
Arrábida Shopping (2 Km)
Ponte da Arrábida ( 2 Km)

Relax in the comfort of this luxurious 3-Bedroom Duplex apartment and sunbath by the company of a glass of Port wine in the property's private garden. This house is located in the Center of Porto and combines a premium style with contemporary amenities, such as concierge services, wi-fi and an office so you can work from home. You will be just 15 minutes away from the most emblematic places in the city, such as Ribeira, Ponte D. Luís I, Torre dos Clérigos, Avenida dos Aliados and Livraria Lello.

The space
'Porto Garden Villa 'is a duplex apartment located in the center of Porto. It has a maximum capacity of 8 people (2 double rooms and 2 sofa-beds) and is very well equipped to receive you during your stay in Porto.
Its recent decoration offers you all the comfort to rest after a day of touring the city, while also giving you the opportunity to enjoy a beautiful sunset in the apartment's garden.
The apartment has free wifi, a Plasma TV, closets to store
column7:
The apartment is located in the Historic Center of Porto - the oldest area of the city and it is classified as an World Heritage Site of UNESCO since 1996. It is an area marked by the medieval origins of the city and includes some of the main and best known tourist attractions such such as: The iconic São Bento Train station with its marvelous tiles, the Cathedral, Aliados Avenue, Clérigos Tower and Bolsa Palace. The apartment is also just a few steps from the Ribeira area, where you can cross the bridge to Vila Nova de Gaia.
Advice from a local: While staying in Porto, do not also miss the opportunity to cruise in Douro River, to visit the Port Wine cellars in Vila Nova de Gaia and to catch a tram alongside the river between Ribeira to Foz.
column14:
Hi I'm Gloria. I'm from Hong-Kong but I fell in love with Porto so I decided to share my home with other people who love to travel with the help of Feeling Inn.
Have fun exploring the city!

column5: Sunny Country House with Swimming Pool
column6:
Sunny Country House with Swimming Pool is located in a very calm and relaxing area close to Espinho (10km) and Porto (20km). It offers a swimming pool, garage, barbecue area, a small soccer field and even a swing for the kids. You will have the ideal outdoor spaces to enjoy summer days by the pool with all the fun and comfort you need!

The space
￫ Building
Marvelous country house equipped with a Swimming Pool, Barbecue Area, Soccer Field, Free Parking (1 Spot), Swing for Kids and Hammocks to enjoy the relaxing days. The property consists in two different houses attached to each other, but still independent and private. The property owners live in one of the houses, while the other house is for the exclusive use of guests.

￫ Swimming Pool
The swimming pool area has sun chairs.

￫ Barbecue Area
The barbecue area has a dining table for a perfect meal time with family or friends.

￫ Bedrooms
The house has one ensuite
column7: Grijó is a peaceful village located about 20km from Porto. It has a nice climate and pleasant beaches (like the Espinho Beach) within 10 minutes distance. You will also find supermarket, pharmacies and restaurants within walking distance and a nice park named Parque das Corgas.
column14:
Founded by travel enthusiasts (just like you) BnBird wants to connect guests, with new traveling experiences in Portugal, while offering an unique hosting approach.
Being natural born Portuguese, and Lisbon lovers, we found that our country, is one of the best places in the World to do it. That’s why we founded BnBird, to give our guests the opportunity to discover our country, its history and charm, with a more local perspective.

column6:
Practical and conveniently located 1 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer!. 5 minutes walking distance to Bolhão metro station.

Air conditioning and wifi in all areas of the apartment.
Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay.

The space
The apartment has been recently renovated and equipped in order to provide guests with the necessary functionalities for a pleasant stay.

The comfortable bedroom has a double bed and AC.
The bright living room fuses in an open space with the kitchen, in turn, fully and rigorously equipped with all the appliances required including dishwasher and washing/drying machine.

One practical bathroom with shower completes the apartment.

Guest access
Guests have access to all the divisions and amenities of the apartment.

106033/AL
column7:
The apartment is located in a central area.
Its privileged location allows you to reach Santa Catarina Street, downtown`s most important shopping street in less than five minutes. There are numerous clothing stores, with many of the international brands present, healthily coexisting with old bookstores, exquisite cafes like Café Majestic, as well as appealing pastry shops. Adjacent to this area, it`s the old town, classified as world heritage site and Ribeira, full of old historical buildings like the Porto Cathedral and amazing views to the Douro river and its bridges, of which stands the D. Luis I bridge. Also, a short walk away you will find the Clérigos Tower, probably the most iconic build of the city, and Lello Bookshop, also known as Harry Potter`s Library, classified as the most beautiful bookstore in the world. Finally the vibrant nightlife area is also nearby. There, you´ll find numerous restaurants, cafes and bars to suit all tastes.

column5: Cherry on top apartment w/ Terrace
column6:
The recently renewed apartment for up to 3 people was rigorously equipped and decorated thoroughly with the singular purpose of providing all the comfort to make out of your stay a memorable one. Two balconies stand out as one distinctive aspect of this apartment. Located 5 minutes by from the Campo 24 de Agosto or Bolhão metro station.

The space
The one-bedroom apartment has a pleasantly decorated open space, where one can find the living room, with alongside a relaxing balcony and the kitchen, rigorously equipped even for the longest stays. Still, a bedroom with an adjacent balcony and a complete bathroom completes the space.
The apartment has wi-fi and cable tv. All the rooms have ac. Towels and linens included

Guest access
Guests have access to all the rooms and amenities of the apartment.

Other things to note
*** Health and Safety ***
The cleaning service is carried out following all the rules of the OM
column7: Close to Bolhão and Rua de Santa Catarina, the city's main shopping street, it is within walking distance of all the city's sights, which you can visit without having to resort to public transport.

column5: ☆NEW☆ Burgos 21: Private Suite with Free Parking
column6:
Burgos 21 is a recently renovated Guesthouse in Porto. Located on the Camino de Santiago as you leave the city, it’s just 15 minutes walking to Casa da Música and 30 minutes walking to the city centre of Porto (5 minute Uber ride).

The space
You will be booking a Private Bedroom with a dedicated Bathroom and all the amenities for a comfortable stay. Each room is equipped with Air Conditioning, TV, Fridge and a Kettle. Wifi is also available for free.

Free Parking for standard or electric car is included. This applies to electric cars as each parking space has its own power socket.

The house has a shared Living Room Area and Kitchen fully equipped for all guests.

Extremely Safe Residential Neighborhood and a 24/7 Laundry is available within a 5 minute walk.

You will be able to self check-in upon arrival if you desire.

Towels and bed linen are included.

Upon Check-In you will have at your disposal:
column7:
Burgos 21 is located on the world famous Camino de Santiago, just on the way from Porto to Santiago de Compostela as you leave the city.

Extremely safe residential neighbourhood.

24/7 Laundry available within a 5 minute walk.

column6:
Practical and conveniently located studio apartment, located on the second floor of a traditional centennial building, with all modern facilities for a comfortable stay. Less than 300 meters (5 minutes walk) from the “Combatentes” metro station allows quick, easy and comfortable access to the entire city. It has an outdoor space, with a private pool, covered and heated ( From mid September to May) shared with the remaining guests.

The space
Centennial building in stone and wooden beams that includes several studio apartments, modern, furnished and fully equipped. It is centrally located and with excellent accessibility. It was completely renovated in 2017, respecting the original characteristics and its history.

It has an unusual "layout" and modern furnishings, providing comfort for our guests.

All units include a bathroom with shower and a fully equipped kitchen with fridge, freezer, oven, hob, coffee maker, microwave, crockery and cutler
column7:
Located in a quiet and central area and with excellent accessibility. The “Combatentes” Metro Station is less than 5 minutes on foot (300 meters) and with buses passing by the door. Supermarket, bakeries, restaurants, shops and cafes can all be found within walking distance.

Across the street is the "Block of Costa Cabral" that is classified as a monument of Public Interest. Designed by "Viana de Lima" and built in the 50's. Among others, notable for the sculptural relationship between the expressionist pala of entry and the staticity of the housing block.

Less than 50 meters away is the "Fernando de Castro House Museum", which houses paintings (Henrique Pousão, Silva Porto, Sousa Pinto, Malhoa, António Carneiro), sculpture (17th and 18th centuries) and ornamental arts, with special emphasis for the work of carving. It can be visited by prior appointment at the Soares dos Reis National Museum.

There are also remarkable rows of dwellings within the frame

column6:
Seja bem vindo ao nosso apartamento!

Está preparado de forma confortável para 6 pessoas!
Está ao lado de todos os acessos ao centro da cidade do Porto e respetivo centro histórico para que os possa visitar em 15 minutos de carro, assim como as maravilhosas praias da nossa cidade. Está situado numa zona tranquila com tudo o que necessita à volta: transportes públicos, mercearias, furtarias, padarias, restaurantes, farmácias...
É uma rua só para moradores, o estacionamento é fácil e grátis!

The space
É uma apartamento espaçoso com muita luz! Durante o dia o sol brinda a casa toda!

Guest access
O apartamento está completamente disponível para os hóspedes de cada reserva.

Other things to note
Na chegada será solicitado o pagamento da taxa de cidade (não incluído no preço para via Airbnb), para hóspedes com idade igual ou superior a 16 anos até um máximo de 7 noites seguidas:
1€/ pessoa por noite
column7:
Tem tudo o que precisa nas imediações do prédio. Restaurantes, padarias, peixarias, frutarias, farmácias, supermercados, bancos....
Fica a meio caminho entre as praias (todas de Bandeira Azul - certificação de qualidade), do centro histórico do Porto e da zona das Caves do Vinho do Porto em Gaia.
column27: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

column6:
Sinta-se em casa neste pequeno mas aconchegante e luminoso apartamento, com vista para uma das praças mais cosmopolitas da cidade. A praça tem vários cafés, bares e restaurantes, assim como lojas tradicionais. Os hóspedes têm a vantagem de poder explorar a cidade a pé pois estão muito próximos dos monumentos mais icónicos, como a Igreja do Carmo, a Livraria Lello, o Jardim das Oliveiras, a Torre dos Clérigos, a Avenida dos Aliados, a Estação de São Bento.

The space
Com capacidade para até duas pessoas, este apartamento é composto por cozinha totalmente equipada, sala/quarto e uma casa de banho com cabine de duche.
O alojamento está preparado quer para estadias curtas, quer para estadias longas.
Situado na zona histórica da cidade, permite-lhe visitar a pé os principais pontos de interesse, como a Livraria Lello, aTorre dos Clérigos, a Praça das Oliveiras, as Galerias de Paris, a Estação de S. Bento, a Ribeira.
Está inserido na zona do Pólo I da Uni
column7: O apartamento está situado numa praça cheia de dinamismo, com eventos ao fim-de-semana. Há várias opções para degustar a gastronomia portuense mesmo à porta de casa. O difícil vai ser escolher. Nas ruas contíguas à praça há também diversos bares, podendo desfrutar de uma bebida num ambiente muito acolhedor. Assim, ao alojar-se neste apartamento aproveitará em pleno a sua estadia nesta bela cidade do Porto. A rua das Galerias de Paris é um dos locais mais importantes da noite do Porto e é imperdível lá ir para tomar um copo e ouvir boa música. Fica a escassos 200 metros do apartamento.

column6:
Looking to spend the best time of your life? Porto and Granja are really the spot to stay on your next trip!

The house is ideally prepared for groups between 8 to 16 persons

#bachelorparty ; #anniversary, #familymeeting; #beachholidays; #visitPorto;

We are waiting for you!

The space
This fantastic, beautiful and cozy house is idyllically situated just in the center of the Iconic Beach of Granja, perfectly located near to all tourist attractions and with privileged access to all the perfect spots for you to visit in your next trip to Porto. This is the best place for you to gather your family and friends and enjoy the pleasure of a mix and complete holidays, where you can just relax by the beach or easily visit the city of Porto and all the outstanding attractions that all the north of Portugal and the Douro Region has to offer.

The house is a centenary building with 3 floors, all furnished and prepared with everyth
column7:
Praia da Granja is a historical and aristocratic beach, very famous since middle of century XIX, where the most important figures of that time (royalty, bankers, artists, Port wine families,...) have their holiday homes and where they pass their quality time with friends and family in a very unique and exclusive area.

Beside the beach and all the arquitectural homes along the place, you´ll find a splendid public outdoor swimming-pool with direct view to the ocean, and very near also the golf camp of Miramar, horse riding places and beautyfull paths all along the beach and nature, perfect to ride a bike or just for a walk on the sunset.

Less then 50meters from the front door you have almost everything you need, two restaurants, a mini market, a pharmacy, a fish market, a butchery, a laundry, a clothing store, a bakery and coffe shop, hairdresser, kids park, a very little cute Church,..., all this in less then 1 minute walk.

Less then 100 metres away fr

column6:
Practical and conveniently located studio apartment, located on the first floor of a traditional centennial building, with all modern facilities for a comfortable stay. Less than 300 meters (5 minutes walk) from the “Combatentes” metro station allows quick, easy and comfortable access to the entire city. It has an outdoor space, with a private pool, covered and heated ( From mid September to May) shared with the remaining guests.

The space
Centennial building in stone and wooden beams that includes several studios and apartments, modern, furnished and fully equipped. It is centrally located and with excellent accessibility. It was completely renovated in 2017, respecting the original characteristics and its history.

It has an unusual "layout" and modern furnishings, providing comfort for our guests.
All units include a bathroom with shower and a fully equipped kitchen with fridge, freezer, oven, hob, coffee maker, microwave, crockery and cutlery
column7:
Located in a quiet and central area and with excellent accessibility. The “Combatentes” Metro Station is less than 5 minutes on foot (300 meters) and with buses passing by the door. Supermarket, bakeries, restaurants, shops and cafes can all be found within walking distance.

Across the street is the "Block of Costa Cabral" that is classified as a monument of Public Interest. Designed by "Viana de Lima" and built in the 50's. Among others, notable for the sculptural relationship between the expressionist pala of entry and the staticity of the housing block.

Less than 50 meters away is the "Fernando de Castro House Museum", which houses paintings (Henrique Pousão, Silva Porto, Sousa Pinto, Malhoa, António Carneiro), sculpture (17th and 18th centuries) and ornamental arts, with special emphasis for the work of carving. It can be visited by prior appointment at the Soares dos Reis National Museum.

There are also remarkable rows of dwellings within the frame

Estúdio pequeno e completo, com uma cama alta / beliche situado no piso térreo de um edifício tradicional centenário. Esta equipado com todas as comodidades modernas para uma estadia confortável. Esta localizado a menos de 300 metros ( 5 minutos a pé ) da estação de metro “Combatentes” o que permite um rápido, fácil e confortável acesso a toda a cidade. Tem um espaço ao ar livre, com uma piscina privada, coberta e aquecida ( De meados Setembro a Maio ), partilhado com os restantes hospedes.

The space
Prédio centenário em pedra e travejamento em madeira que inclui vários apartamentos estúdio, modernos, mobilados e totalmente equipados. Fica numa localização central e com excelentes acessibilidades. Foi completamente renovado em 2017, respeitando as características originais e a sua história.

Todas as unidades incluem uma casa de banho com chuveiro e uma cozinha totalmente equipada com frigorífico, congelador, forno, fogão, máquina de café, microondas, l
column7:
Localizado numa zona calma e central e com excelentes acessibilidades. A Estação de Metro dos “Combatentes” fica a menos de 5 minutos a pé ( 300 metros ) e com autocarros a passarem à porta. Supermercado, padarias, restaurantes, lojas e cafés podem ser encontrados a uma curta distância a pé.

Do outro lado da rua fica o “Bloco de Costa Cabral” que esta classificado como monumento de Interesse Público. Desenhado por “Viana de Lima” e contruído nos anos 50. Entre outros, notável pela relação escultórica entre a expressionista pala de entrada e a estaticidade do bloco de habitações.

A menos de 50 metros encontra-se a “Casa Museu Fernando de Castro”, que reúne pintura (Henrique Pousão, Silva Porto, Sousa Pinto, Malhoa, António Carneiro), escultura (séculos XVII e XVIII ) e artes ornamentais, com especial destaque para a obra de talha. Pode ser visitada mediante marcação previa junto do Museu Nacional Soares dos Reis.

Encontram-se igualmente fileiras de habi

column5: Charming house with fantastic view-Casa Canastro
column6:
Casa do Canastro is a completely renewed stone house with a stone terrace and a large garden, benefitting from a quiet and very privileged location, benefiting from a breathtaking view of Serra da Freita and the Frecha da Mizarela waterfall.
GPS coordinates: 40°50’21”N
8°19’36”W

The space
The house is composed by one bedroom with a double bed and one bedroom with 2 single beds, a bathroom with bathtub, a large living room with a fireplace and a fully equipped modern kitchen, including a dishwasher and washing machine.
On the outside on the front of the house there is big stone terrace and a refreshing garden, where you can enjoy the beautiful landscape, enjoy a sunset, prepare a barbecue or simply relax.
The property has private parking, free Wi-Fi and cable TV.
The house is located at the bottom of the quiet village of Gatão, surrounded by fields and nature, reigning tranquility and quietness. In the village of Gatão you will find a gro

→ 40SQM apartment located in one of the best streets of the centre of Porto, with trendy and authentic shops, restaurants and bars

→ Walking distance to every attraction and public transport

→ Loft with big windows, kitchen and bathroom

The space
LOCATION
￫ Torre dos Clérigos is just a few steps away
￫ Walk everywhere: Aliados, São Bento, Bolhão and Batalha neighbourhoods
￫ Quiet area

￫ Great accessibility with buses and metro in the area of Trindade
￫ Extremely safe neighbourhood

￫ King Size bed 160cm/5.2ft wide

￫ Dry off with fluffy bath towels

column6:
Practical and conveniently located 1 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer!. 5 minutes walking distance to Bolhão metro station.

The space
The apartment has been recently renovated and equipped in order to provide guests with the necessary functionalities for a pleasant stay.

The comfortable bedroom has a double bed and AC.
The bright living room fuses in an open space with the kitchen, in turn, fully and rigorously equipped with all the appliances required including dishwasher and washing/drying machine.

One practical bathroom with shower completes the apartment.

Guest access

column7:
The apartment is located in a central area.
Its privileged location allows you to reach Santa Catarina Street, downtown`s most important shopping street in less than five minutes. There are numerous clothing stores, with many of the international brands present, healthily coexisting with old bookstores, exquisite cafes like Café Majestic, as well as appealing pastry shops. Adjacent to this area, it`s the old town, classified as world heritage site and Ribeira, full of old historical buildings like the Porto Cathedral and amazing views to the Douro river and its bridges, of which stands the D. Luis I bridge. Also, a short walk away you will find the Clérigos Tower, probably the most iconic build of the city, and Lello Bookshop, also known as Harry Potter`s Library, classified as the most beautiful bookstore in the world. Finally the vibrant nightlife area is also nearby. There, you´ll find numerous restaurants, cafes and bars to suit all tastes.

column6:
**Covid 19: If you are concerned about the coronavirus pandemic, rest assured that our cleaning teams are equipped to properly disinfect each apartment between stays and this flat has self-check in, meaning you don't physically interact with anyone. LovelyStay will also be flexible in case you need to reschedule or even cancel your booking with us. Stay safe!**

Welcome to the "Mui Nobre, Sempre Leal e Invicta Cidade do Porto"!

This apartment was inspired by the city of Porto and its greatest treasure - the heart of D. Pedro IV - that was offered to the city the day before his death as a symbol of gratitude for heroically standing with him and winning the fight for liberalism in Portugal. A brilliant story that we wish to share with the ones who visit us.

The space
Located right downtown just a 5 minute walk away from Porto's main metro station Trindade, this studio apartment flat is a new build and is equipped with everything you might need

- Guindais Funicular
- Port Wine cellars - situated in Gaia, on the other side of the bridge!

A complete apartment with a living room and a small kitchen, in a century-old reformed mansion. Located in downtown Porto, a cozy and quiet accommodation, close to bakeries, markets and public transportation (subway and buses). It is possible to park in nearby streets for free, use the also free wi-fi in all rooms and enjoy all offered services.

The space
Siza suite is a complete apartment with areas for exclusive and private use, containing two bedrooms, which one is a suite, (both with double beds), an also exclusive living room (with a sofa bed for two and TV), a second exclusive bathroom and a kitchen for private use.

Guests will also have access to the common areas of the building which includes another large kitchen, a washroom, hall and a large living room, as well as to the building's external patio.

The apartment is part of a centenary house, recently renovated, with 8 rooms in total, located in downtown Porto.

A cozy an

The space
Welcome to our place, a gorgeous triple room in a lovely guesthouse! In our homes, your health and safety comes first. We follow an enhanced cleaning protocol, with professional cleaning and strategic disinfection.

Sweet dreams and sleep tight in our gorgeous triple room in a lovely guesthouse. Not too big and not too small, just perfect for snuggling in for a restful stay! Relax with a selection of cable multi-channels on the LCD television on the three single beds that will be made up with comfy linens. Or step out to the garden to free your mind whilst taking in the sights and sounds of Vila Nova de Gaia.

On top of that, it also comes with a chest of drawers and an open wardrobe that you can use to store your clothes and belongings during your stay. There is also a small fridge in the pantry. If you
column7: The house benefits from a perfect location on the Gaia hill, in the Porto-Gaia historical center. In the vicinity, you can find all the Porto wine cellars, where the Porto wine ages, and the famous cable car if you want to enjoy outstanding views over Douro River and Porto's historical center. 8-10 minutes on foot from Ribeira (you just need to go down the street and cross the D. Luís bridge), an area full of imposing historic buildings and magnificent views to the Douro river and its bridges. Palácio da Bolsa and the Church of S. Francisco are definitely worth a visit. On the neighbourhood you will also find a great variety of English speaking bars and restaurants and a large department store (El Corte Inglês).

column5: Joyfull and cozy apartment in Gaia (Devesas)
column6:
This spacious and comfortable apartment with two bedrooms, a bathroom, a kitchen, a living room, and a balcony is the ideal place to relax and stay quiet.

Located 100 meters from the train station, "Gaia-Devesas" is only 15 minutes by train from the mythical station of S.Bento and Porto's city center.

From this station, all trains stop from and towards Lisbon - 3h, Coimbra - 1h20, and Aveiro - 45m, becoming a great starting point to know Portugal.

The space
The apartment is fully available for guests. It has a fully equipped kitchen, a bathroom, a large living and dining room, two bedrooms, and a closed balcony.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the kitchen, living room, bedrooms, bathroom, and balcony.
There is paid and unpaid parking on and around the street.

Other things to note
A quiet, peaceful, and serene area located in the center of Gaia city. It is only 1 minute away from th
column7:
A quiet, peaceful, and serene area located in the center of Gaia city.
In just 10 minutues by foot you can find yourself in "Cais de Gaia" and enjoy the most special view to the city of Porto.
It is only 1 minute away from the "Gaia-Devesas" train station, a point par excellence to get out and get to know Portugal from north to south. In only 15 minutes by train, we are in the mythical station of S. Bento and the city of Porto. In only 10 minutes by train, you will find the best beaches in the city of Gaia. In the apartment's street, you can also visit one of the main wine cellars of Porto. Still in the street, buses are leaving for Porto and the beaches of Gaia.

column6:
Located in the historic center of Porto, these apartment, offers modern accommodations with city views and free Wi-Fi. Cedofeita is an up-and-coming district now for its arty vibe, with cutting-edge contemporany galleries on Rua Miguel Bombarda.Vintage stores and down-to-earth Portuguese eateries dot the area, along with lively late-night bars and hip cafes.Nearby Museu Nacional Soares dos Reis ,has ceramics,jewelry, sculptures and paintings from the 16th to 2oth centuries.

The space
This new apartment is elegantly decorated in sober tones, with a wooden floor. It has a double bed, a TV and a dining area. It has a kitchen equipped with an oven, a stove, a dishwasher, a refrigerator and a coffee machine. It also includes basic kitchen utensils. The apartment also has a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer, shampoo and shower gel. It also offers free Wi-Fi.

Guest access
Full private apartment with private bathroom.

Other

Happy Village
Apartamento muito bonito e funcional todo renovado em 2019, apresentando todo o conforto para uma estadia memorável. Possui luz direta em todos os quartos bem como uma varanda num deles e uma marquise ampla. Perto do centro do Porto e das mais variadas atrações da cidade podendo deslocar-se de metro ou transportes públicos que poderá apanhar nas imediações do apartamento.

The space

Os hóspedes terão acesso as zonas comuns com Sala, Cozinha, WC e Marquise

Aliado a isto, o Grand Douro Apartments prima pela proximidade aos transportes públicos dos grandes centros.
Com vistas deslumbrantes sobre a cidade, a sua proximidade a todo o tipo de comércio, é de facto um dos seus grandes trunfos.

column6:
Fed up of being between walls?
Get away from the hustle and concrete cities to immerse in a "petit coin" of nature within an urban farm at the gates of Porto.
Here you can spread your eyes and thoughts in a wide and magnificent landscape. We have already created the ambience, so you can live your story!
Green Box is for those with an adventures spirit, perfect for 2 people There is a train station (Suzao) at 3min walking distance, with direct trains to Porto city center.

The space
The creation of the Green Box is based on a concept of sustainability and slow living.
Non-waste and reuse are concerns of our environmental awareness. Nature has seemed the best stage for the installation of this box, with a welcoming, unpretentious and eclectic atmosphere for you to build memories.
Have you ever imagined that you could live in a metal box that went through the oceans? Originally from South Korea, it is possible that you find marks of its sto
column7:
The Green Box is situated in a quiet and safe residential area. In the neighborhood you can find a pharmacy, supermarkets, coffees, restaurants and public transports.

Within your stay, you may enjoy the neat air from the countryside with a relaxing ecological walk, alongside the “Paleozoic Route” (Sítio Rede Natura 2000). Following this path, you will end up in the middle-aged village named “Couce” (Aldeia de Portugal), where you can experience a real time flashback. Meanwhile, you can travel over the Roman’s empire legacy, which intensively exploited this Gold enriched soil. The mines still remain as a tourist open landmark, and it’s possible to visit them in a safe and guided tour.
This city is also known for its artisanal cookies and traditional bread, "regueifa". We advise you to visit and enjoy the products of the "Paupério" and "Diogo" biscuit factories, and the traditional bakery in Suzão.
For restaurants: A Regional Valonguense; O Barril; A Taberna do Cente

column6:
Disinfection & Safe check-in guarantee

If you are looking for the BEST location to enjoy the historic center of Porto, this is it!

This loft is housed in a historic building. Recently renovated, many features have been preserved, combined with contemporary amenities to enjoy a fantastic stay.

Open the window and enjoy the architectural beauty of "Rua das Flores" - Pedestrian street with a unique vibe. It is undoubtedly one of the most special place. Here, every corner has a story to tell.

Other things to note
Please, note that the street have no access by car, being a pedestrian street.

I have a great respect and consideration for my neighbors. Therefore, one of the most important requests I make to my guests is to respect the hours of silence and to be respectful to the other residents.

column5: Deluxe Duplex no coração da cidade do Porto
column6:
Videirinha Apartments ficam no coração do Porto. A 70 metros da mitica Ponte D. Luís I e a 150 metros da Ribeira. Todo o apartamento tem magníficas vistas para o Rio Douro, nomeadamente sobre a Ponte D.Luis I. Por isso, o apartamento tem imensa luz natural. A decoração é convidativa e confortável, criando um ambiente agradável e acolhedor.

The space
Este maravilhoso Duplex tem 2 quartos, um com uma cama de casal e uma vista soberba para o Rio Douro e Ponte D. Luís I, outro com 2 camas de solteiro. Ainda no piso de cima tem uma casa de banho completa.
No piso de baixo encontramos a Sala Kitchenette, a cozinha está totalmente equipada para poder preparar as suas refeições. O sofá pode ser transformado em cama e mais uma vez consegue usufruir da vista única para o Rio.
O apartamento dispõe de Ar Condicionado, wi-fi e TV por cabo.

Guest access
Os hóspedes têm total acesso ao apartamento, não havendo qualquer zona comum.

<
column7:
Esta é a localização mais desejada por quem quer conhecer a cidade e ficar perto da zona mais bonita e importante da cidade, a Ribeira.
Temos o Funicular dos Guindais a 50 metros, Ponte D. Luís I a 75 metros, Cais da Ribeira (Barcos Rebelos) a 100 metros e Cais de Gaia (Caves do Vinho do Porto) a 300 metros.
Na rua do apartamentos temos vários cafés, restaurantes e tascas tipicos da cidade. o Super Mercado mais próximo fica a 400 metros. A 300 metros têm um parque de estacionamento.

A complete suite bedroom, with private bathroom, in a century-old reformed mansion. Located in downtown Porto, a cozy and quiet accommodation, close to bakeries, markets and public transportation (subway and buses). It is possible to park in nearby streets for free, use the also free wi-fi in all rooms and enjoy all offered services.

The space
Sculpture suite is a complete suite bedroom containing a double bed (queen-size), with a bathroom for exclusive and private use.

Guests will also have access to the common areas of the building which includes a large full-equipped kitchen, a washroom, hall and a large living room, as well as to the building's external patio.

The suite is part of a centenary house, recently renovated, with 8 rooms in total, located in downtown Porto.

A cozy and quiet accommodation, close to bakeries, markets and public transportation.

column5: Boutique Apartment with Superb view of Douro River
column6:
Videirinha Apartments are in the heart of Porto. 70 meters from the mythical Ponte D. Luís I and 150 meters from Ribeira. The whole apartment has magnificent views of the Douro River, namely over the D. Luis I Bridge. Therefore, the apartment has plenty of natural light. The decor is inviting and comfortable, creating a pleasant and welcoming atmosphere.

The space
This cozy apartment has 1 bedroom with a double bed and a complete bathroom.
In the Kitchenette Room, the kitchen is fully equipped to prepare your meals. The sofa can be transformed into a bed and once again you can enjoy the superb view of the Douro River and D. Luís I Bridge while enjoying a good glass of wine at the window.
The apartment has air conditioning, wi-fi and cable TV.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the apartment, with no common area.

Casa completamente nova, prática e só para hóspedes.
As divisões são pequenas, limpas e confortáveis.
Localizada numa zona habitacional sem trânsito (a 1,3km da autoestrada).
Mercearia na moradia mesmo ao lado.
Hipermercados Lidl e Continente a 1,5km de distância.
Paragem de autocarro a 50 metros.
Ponte D. Luis a 6,5km de distância.
Estação de Metro a 3,8km de distância.
Ideal para turistas que se deslocam de automóvel.

The space
Neste espaço vai sentir-se como em sua casa. Tem todas as comodidades necessárias para uma óptima estadia.

É uma moradia, com duas frentes e um pátio onde pode relaxar e até jantar se assim o entender. Pode estacionar um automóvel no pátio (máximo 5 metros de comprimento). Portão automático.

column7:
A Casa Vilar fica no inicio da rua que dá acesso ao Bairro da Câmara.
O Bairro da Câmara é único em V. N. Gaia no que toca ao sucesso da sua requalificação. Sofreu em 2004 uma intervenção camarária e encontra-se agora em excelente estado, com uma arquitetura limpa e moderna. O bairro é familiar, calmo e seguro, com familias trabalhadoras com a verdadeira alma tipicamente Gaiense.

column5: Casa do Pinto - Passadiços do Paiva
column6:
A Casa do Pinto é uma propriedade de turismo rural, situada na aldeia de Canelas, Arouca, a 5 minutos de carro dos Passadiços do Paiva e do Museu das Trilobites. É uma casa rural datada de 1764, reconstruída em 2008, em xisto e madeira, dotada de duas salas de estar, cozinha, seis quartos com WC, Tv, aquecimento, AC e Wi-Fi. Possui estacionamento privativo, alpendre panorâmico, jardim, espaço agrícola, que permitem actividades ao ar livre, proporcionando tranquilidade e contacto com a natureza.

3540-RNT
