column5: Double/Twin Suite in the heart of Porto
column6:
We are a small and cozy guesthouse located in the historic center of Porto, we have four very spacious double suites, with private bathroom and a view to the beautiful Clerigos Church.

We would like to highlight that cleaning has always been one of our priorities and that now more than ever due to Covid-19 we are adopting new cleaning routines that also include disinfecting the space.

The space
Our commitment is to make you feel welcomed, hosting you with dedication and sympathy in a clean and pleasant environment, making your trip a special experience.

In addition to the beautiful view of the Clérigos Church, all the comfortable and spacious rooms at the guesthouse are equipped with a private bathroom, free wifi, air conditioning / heating, cable TV and a seating area. Each room is prepared to comfortably accommodate 2 people, with a choice of a double bed or two single beds.
It is also possible to include an extra bed to accommodate
column7:
The lively and popular Galerias de Paris, well known for its nightlife, are 50 m from the unit and feature a wide range of restaurants, cafés, shops and bars. And of course the outstading Clerigos Church is a few steps away from our door beautifying the view of your bedroom window.

The famous Lello Bookstore is 100 m from the guesthouse. The Porto city centre is a UNESCO World Heritage site and features various noted landmarks, such as the Carmo Church at 300 metres, the São Bento Train Station which is within 400 m and the Porto Cathedral, which is at 650 m.
column14: Somos um casal de brasileiros que curte muito viajar e depois de morar por quase 3 anos em Dublin, e apesar de amar a Irlanda, decidiu se mudar para Portugal em busca de um pouco mais de sol no seu dia a dia. Encantados com a belíssima cidade do Porto decidimos por aqui ficar e agora realizamos o sonho de ter nosso primeiro negócio, o qual cuidamos com muito amor e carinho!

5 min away from the famous D. Luis Bridge that takes you to the heart of Oporto.

The space
The romantic athmosphere of Vila Terra Luxury Apartment is perfect for couples. Quite area in the middle of the Porto Wine Cellars and a quick Wine Tasting Offer is all you need for you relaxing holidays.
Guest Welcome Book and Offers are provided to you at the moment of check-in. We will welcome you with all the safety measures and will be avaiable to help you during your stay !

With a fully equipped kitchen, A/C and ample amenities; we are certain that your stay here will be very comfortable. Book now and make it your new home away from home!

The space
Located right downtown just a 2 minute walk away from Aliados metro station, this studio apartment flat is a new build and is equipped with everything you might need for a comfortable stay!

-A fully equipped kitchenette that comes with all the amenities you may require to prepare a delici

column5: Gorgeous triple room with private bathroom
column6:
Located in a historical district of Vila Nova de Gaia, this lovely room is part of a very cozy guesthouse, perfect for 3 guests!

The space
Welcome to our place, a cozy room for 3 guests in a lovely guesthouse! In our homes, your health and safety comes first. We follow an enhanced cleaning protocol, with professional cleaning and strategic disinfection.

Sweet dreams and sleep tight in our lovely room in a beautiful guesthouse. Not too big and not too small, just perfect for snuggling in for a restful stay! Relax with a selection of cable multi-channels on the LCD television on the double bed and single couch bed that will be made up with comfy linens. Or step out to the garden to free your mind whilst taking in the sights and sounds of Vila Nova de Gaia.

On top of that, it also comes with a chest of drawers and an open wardrobe that you can use to store your clothes and belongings during your stay. There is also a small fridge in the pantry.
column7: The house benefits from a perfect location on the Gaia hill, in the Porto-Gaia historical center. In the vicinity, you can find all the Porto wine cellars, where the Porto wine ages, and the famous cable car if you want to enjoy outstanding views over Douro River and Porto's historical center. 8-10 minutes on foot from Ribeira (you just need to go down the street and cross the D. Luís bridge), an area full of imposing historic buildings and magnificent views to the Douro river and its bridges. Palácio da Bolsa and the Church of S. Francisco are definitely worth a visit. On the neighbourhood you will also find a great variety of English speaking bars and restaurants and a large department store (El Corte Inglês).

column5: Self contained apartment in lovely guesthouse
column6:
Located in a historical district of Vila Nova de Gaia, this self contained apartment is located on the last floor of a very cozy guesthouse, perfect for couples!

The space
Welcome to our place! You will have the entire top floor of this lovely guesthouse to yourself. This includes a comfy double room, a private living room, bathroom and kitchenette! In our homes, your health and safety comes first. We follow an enhanced cleaning protocol, with professional cleaning and strategic disinfection.

Sweet dreams and sleep tight in our gorgeous double room in a lovely guesthouse. Not too big and not too small, just perfect for snuggling in for a restful stay! Relax with a selection of cable multi-channels on the LCD television on the double bed that will be made up with comfy linens. Or step out to the garden to free your mind whilst taking in the sights and sounds of Vila Nova de Gaia.

On top of that, it also comes with a chest of drawers and a war
column7: The house benefits from a perfect location on the Gaia hill, in the Porto-Gaia historical center. In the vicinity, you can find all the Porto wine cellars, where the Porto wine ages, and the famous cable car if you want to enjoy outstanding views over Douro River and Porto's historical center. 8-10 minutes on foot from Ribeira (you just need to go down the street and cross the D. Luís bridge), an area full of imposing historic buildings and magnificent views to the Douro river and its bridges. Palácio da Bolsa and the Church of S. Francisco are definitely worth a visit. On the neighbourhood you will also find a great variety of English speaking bars and restaurants and a large department store (El Corte Inglês).

Apartamento totalmente reabilitado localizado em plena Rua de Cedofeita, um rua famosa que nos leva ao centro histórico e à zona de bares (Galerias Paris). O centro desta magnífica cidade está ao virar da esquina....

The space
O "Cedofeita 342 Loft" está localizado a apenas 600 metros do centro da cidade, no 2º andar de um edifício tradicional completamente renovado! Localizado perto de tudo para que usufrua da sua estadia na cidade do Porto, mas longe o suficiente para poder dormir ou relaxar confortavelmente sem quaisquer distúrbios.

O "Cedofeita 342 Loft" é perfeito para viajantes da cidade, bem integrado no espírito da cidade do Porto, moderno, prático e confortável.

O "Cedofeita 342 Loft" é um apartamento com 2 pisos, com uma área total cerca de 60 m2. O quarto localiza-se no piso de cima e oferece uma cama king size (2.00m x 1.60m) confortável. No piso de baixo, a sala dispõe de um confortável sofá pa
column7:
Do "Cedofeita 342 Loft" poderá pode caminhar para os melhores restaurantes, concertos, museus, galerias de arte e lojas do Porto. Na redondezas do apartamento podem ser encontrados supermercados, restaurantes, cofee-shops, monumentos históricos, lojas e uma variedade de serviços.
Vai ficar num bairro central e emblemático da cidade do Porto.

O apartamento "Cedofeita 342 Loft" está localizado a apenas 600 metros do centro da cidade e a estação de metro mais próxima fica localizada a menos de 800 metros.

Sinta-se em casa neste pequeno mas aconchegante e luminoso apartamento, com terraço para que possa descansar depois de um dia de passeio. Situado numa das praças mais cosmopolitas da cidade, tem um enorme leque de opções em cafés, bares e restaurantes, assim como lojas tradicionais.

The space
Com capacidade para até duas pessoas, este apartamento é composto por cozinha totalmente equipada, sala/quarto e uma casa de banho com cabine de duche.
Tem ainda um excelente terraço onde pode relaxar depois de percorrer as belas ruas da cidade do Porto.
O alojamento está preparado quer para estadias curtas, quer para estadias longas.
Situado na zona histórica da cidade, permite-lhe visitar a pé os principais pontos de interesse, como a Livraria Lello, aTorre dos Clérigos, a Praça das Oliveiras, as Galerias de Paris, a Estação de S. Bento, a Ribeira.
Está inserido na zona do Pólo I da Universidade do Porto, constituído pela Faculdade de Belas Artes, Facu
column7: O apartamento está situado numa praça cheia de dinamismo, com eventos ao fim-de-semana. Há várias opções para degustar a gastronomia portuense mesmo à porta de casa. column6:
This is the brightest flat in Porto, the flat is conveniently located in the historical center of Porto opposite Mercado de Bolhão.
Drop your luggage and head down to the river Douro for pastel de nata or a glass of wine, everything around you is walking distance.
If you too tired, you can just enjoy the sunset on the balcony.
In this apartment,you will have the advantage to be very central without the noise, because the flat is on the back of the building on the second floor, so very quiet.

The space
I took a special care of furnishing the flat, and i try time to time to add personal pieces to make it unique.
Of course you will have the typical 4m high ceiling of the Portuense architecture, which will bring lots of sun inside the house. There are internal shutters that you can easily use at night or during the day if you need some rest.
Wooden floor, marble kitchen and bathrooms, Vitra furniture but also Bose speaker and my turntable wi
column7:
The neighbour hood of Baixa is busy, a mix of locals and tourists, they all blend together. It is pedestrian dominant, but you have bus, metro and the taxi can drop you in front of the house.
There is a supermarket at the ground floor Pingo Doce, which is convenient to get anything you need from 8am to 9pm.

You are:
1 min from Mercado do Bolhão,
3 min from the Chapel of Souls,
3 min from Via Caterina,
5 min from the São Bento train station,
7 min de Rua Das Flores,
10 min from the Lello library,


20 min from the beach of Foz do Douro (there is a bus downstairs that takes you straight there)

column5: A Modern & Homely 3 Bedroom w/ Elevator
column6:
Refurbished and renovated 3-bedroom apartment in a bright building from the 50s on the 5th floor. With elevator. 100 m2 apartment with 3 rooms with balconies, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen and two full bathrooms with shower.

The space
The apartment has been renovated, equipped and decorated for the unique purpose of providing guests with a memorable stay. The space consists of a dining room with an attached kitchen and balcony, three comfortable bedrooms: one with a double bed, a second bedroom with two single beds and a third room also with two single beds. This third room works also as a practical living room with TV and an L-shaped sofa during the day. All the bedrooms have an attached balcony. A fully equipped kitchen and two modern and practical bathrooms complete the space. It is equipped with cable TV and wi-fi. Linens and towels are provided.

Guest access
Guests have access to all rooms and facilities in the apartment.

column5: Comfortable flat, cozy balcony close to Aliados Av
column6:
Apartment with balcony on the 2nd floor of a completely renovated typical architecture building with elevator. Interior design projected to offer style, comfort and plenty of space for you. High speed wifi, Netflix, air conditioning and all the amenities you need. Located just 8 min walk from Metro Trindade and 14 min walk from Liberdade Square, the heart of the city. And, if you are a coffee lover, you'll have all you need to prepare a perfect coffee!
Tell us what we can do to best welcome you!

The space
Apartment consisting of 1 bedroom, an open space of living room, TV, dining and kitchen and 1 bathroom. The apartment has a balcony that allows plenty of light and natural ventilation in the living room and bedroom. There is a lot of closet space throughout the apartment and therefore plenty of space to store your personal belongings.
It was planned with great care so that it has the greatest possible comfort and still a lot of style.
Hot and cold
column7: O apartamento é localizado no bairro chamado Cedofeita, centro histórico do Porto. Aqui é onde tudo acontece! Neste bairro está localizado todos os pontos turísticos, restaurantes, bares, cafeterias, lojas... tudo! O apartamento é localizado a 7 minutos a pé da Rua de Santa Catarina, a principal rua de comércio da cidade, e a 11 minutos a pé da Av. dos Aliados, a avenida mais chique e importante da cidade. Neste bairro você também encontra fácil supermercados, farmácias, lavanderias self-service, enfim tudo que precisa para sua estadia.
column14:
We are Paula and Rafael, a couple from Brazil. We love to travel, mostly to places we've never been before. We love that 'first time visiting" experience!
But, no matter where we are, we like to be in the best location in a comfortable and stylish place.
That's the reason why we decided to found our company, "Qualquer Destino (Meaning "Any Destination", in english).
Our goal is to provide our guests the kind of experience that we like, to make an unique and special one.

column5: Gorgeous Designer Apartment in the Heart of Porto
column6:
Beautifully curated apartment in the heart of Porto. Designed and decorated with attention to every detail and original artworks by local Portuguese artists. Perfect for two couples or small family. Both living room and bedroom are bright and have balconies overlooking the beautiful Bolhao Market. One bedroom with a queen size bed and a couch bed that folds out to queen size.Perfectly located, near major attractions, restaurants and metro stations. This is a one-of-a-kind home!

The space
This apartment was furnished to be our home and not like a typical short-term rental unit. Every detail has been carefully thought out for those with a discerning taste.

License number
111956/AL
column7: The location is very hard to beat! One of the most emblematic neighborhood from Porto.
column13: New York, New York, United States
column14:
We're an international couple; one Portuguese & one Peruvian; both live in NYC & Porto. One is an architect and the other one has worked in hospitality for over 15 years. We love to see new places and meet new people, and think Airbnb is a great way to achieve both!
We take great pride in our work and it's reflected in our homes, which are beautifully decorated with items we have designed, purchased and collected. 
Cheers,
Ruso & Maicon

column5: Stylish Duplex with Private Balcony in Downtown Porto
column6:
A large and spacious duplex decorated in stylish mid-century furniture. Perfectly near the exciting heart of Bolhão!

The space
Welcome!

Located in a busy commercial street near Aliados, my 2 bedroom apartment is perfect for couples, families or small groups of friends wanting to be somewhere central.

Comprised of Queen-sized beds lined with hotel quality sheets in both rooms, and two bathrooms with large walk-in showers.

The main living area is divided into with the living room upstairs with a large wrap-around sofa, TV and a balcony, furnished in stylish mid-century furniture. Whilst downstairs, you'll find the kitchen that opens up to a 4-person dining table with access to a balcony as well. Equipment, utensils and plates are readily available at your convenience if you wish to cook a full meal.

Please note, that my home will be cleaned and sanitized before arrival.

Enjoy!

Guest access
column7: Picturesque Miragaia is known for cobbled streets lined with townhouses and small eateries serving classic Portuguese fare, plus views of the Douro River from its hillier parts. The Museu do Carro Eléctrico has 19th- and 20th-century trams, while jewelry, sculpture and paintings are on display at Museu Nacional Soares dos Reis. Alfândega convention center hosts large-scale historical exhibits and conferences.
column14:
Hi there!

We're GuestReady, a professional property management company helping hosts around the world deliver outstanding experiences to their guests.

We welcome all guests, prepare our homes for your arrival and will be available 24/7, should you have any questions or requests. From the second you book with us to the moment you check-out, we’re here to make sure you have a smooth and comfortable stay!

With our years of experience in the hospitality business, you can be assured of a fantastic stay at any of GuestReady's properties. We manage multiple properties around town, so if you're looking for something specific, do let us know and we'd be happy to help you find the perfect place just for you.

We're looking forward to meeting you and are always happy to answer any of your questions!

Warm regards,
GuestReady Team

column6:
Come and enjoy a beautifully renovated apartment next to the Town Hall in the city of Gaia with a decoration inspired by the elements of the sea and earth!
Relax, eat, drink and experience all that Porto has to offer you! A 2min walk will take you to the metro station and if you're up for a longer walk - of about 15min - you'll find your way to the famous Port Wine Cellars. With a short metro ride you'll get to the heart of the city where you can discover all the wonders of the old town.

The space
A kitchen equipped with all the utensils you need on your daily basis, a table for four with a garden view, a cozy reading corner and air conditioner in both sleeping areas too provide you a comfortable and cozy stay!
Shopping, supermarket, a variety of local markets, restaurants, metro and buses connecting you to the beach in less than a 5min walk.
Police department, hospital and pharmacy located in the surrounding area.

Other things to no

column6:
A complete suite bedroom, with private bathroom, in a century-old reformed mansion. Located in downtown Porto, a cozy and quiet accommodation, close to bakeries, markets and public transportation (subway and buses). It is possible to park in nearby streets for free, use the also free wi-fi in all rooms and enjoy all offered services.

The space
Cinema suite is a complete suite bedroom containing a double bed, with a bathroom for exclusive and private use.

Guests will also have access to the common areas of the building which includes a large full-equipped kitchen, a washroom, hall and a large living room, as well as to the building's external patio.

The suite is part of a centenary house, recently renovated, with 8 rooms in total, located in downtown Porto.

A cozy and quiet accommodation, close to bakeries, markets and public transportation.

It is possible to park in nearby streets free of charge, use the free wi-fi in
column7: The Lapa/Marquês neighborhood stands out for its easy access (9 min. or 750 m to the subway station), proximity to the downtown and a wide offer of shops and markets, as well as a experience of total immersion in the Portuguese lifestyle.
column14:
Um apaixonado pelo Porto!

Há 11 anos trabalhando com imóveis e hospedagens, no Brasil e em Portugal, formando uma equipe, com Juju Avellar e Ingrid Bello, que tem como meta fazer sua viagem ao Porto uma experiência agradável e divertida!

column6:
A fully renovated and modern studio in one of the most privileged areas of Porto. You will be just a few steps away from Clérigo Tower and Lello Bookstore - the place that inspired the Harry Potter's library. Also surrounded by beautiful gardens (Parque das Virtudes, Jardim da Cordoaria and Jardim do Carregal) and numerous high quality restaurants and stores. Clerigos Tower - Experience in Porto invites you to the highest quality stay.

The space
￫ Building
Brand new renovated apartment in a typical Porto building. It is located on a 2nd floor with no elevator, equipped with air conditioner, washing machine, dryer and has plenty of light throughout the day.

￫ Bed
The apartment has a comfortable double-bed.

￫ Bathroom
The apartment has a bathroom with shower.

￫ Living Room
The living room is modernly decorated and features a Smart TV, a cozy sofa, a desk/dining table and a little balcony with 2 chairs to enjoy
column7: The area where the apartment is located is surrounded by must-see tourist attractions such as the Clérigos Tower, Lello Bookstore, Majestic Café, Universidade do Porto and the famous Bolhão Market. As there are several public transportation close by (buses, metro and trains), it is easy to reach all the sights of the city. There are also plenty of restaurants and bars around the streets, including the famous Hard Rock Cafe.
column14:
Founded by travel enthusiasts (just like you) BnBird wants to connect guests, with new traveling experiences in Portugal, while offering an unique hosting approach.
Being natural born Portuguese, and Lisbon lovers, we found that our country, is one of the best places in the World to do it. That’s why we founded BnBird, to give our guests the opportunity to discover our country, its history and charm, with a more local perspective.

column6:
Apartamento fica no coração da cidade do Porto, a poucos minutos da Rua de Santa Catarina e rodeado de excelentes restaurantes e bares
A estação de metro do Bolhão fica a 5 minutos

The space
The high ceilings make this space feel really unusual - I absolutely love it and I hope you will too.
Since you´re in a very old downtown building it manages to feel both ancient and incredibly comfortable. There´r many windows and doors so you get a great sense of light and space.

There's a large dining table that comfortably accommodates 4 people around it.

And all the usual kitchen stuff, fridge, freezer, microwave, toaster and plenty of plates and cutlery - with tea, coffee and milk provided.
There is also a washer machine with free washing detergent, ironing board and iron.

The bathroom has a large shower with and lots of fluffy towels and shampoo and soap provided.

There's a free high speed Wi-Fi

Uma antiga casa de pescadores, cheia de charme e numa localização privilegiada, na Praia da Aguda, mesmo em frente ao mar, onde poderá aproveitar o vasto areal e o mar a perder de vista.
Cercada de bons restaurantes, cafés e bares, é o local ideal para usufruir de descanso.

The space
a Casa dos Peixinhos faz parte das nossas vidas, não é apenas um negócio de hospedagem. Ao longo de mais de 10 anos, aqui vivemos muitos e bons momentos com as nossas famílias e amigos. É por isso que queremos que os nossos hóspedes façam também parte desta importante experiência e comunidade de bem-estar, prazer, e acima de tudo que se sintam como em sua casa

column5: Stylish Modern City Center Apartment with Patio
column6:
Stylish modern apartment with patio, recently renovated, in Porto’s city center.

The apartment features a spacious living room and dining area, accessorized kitchen, a comfortable bedroom, and a magnificent patio ideal for a lovely breakfast or enjoying a romantic glass of wine after a day of exploring the city.

Situated in the heart of a vibrant neighborhood full of modern restaurants, local bars, bakeries, and vintage stores and galleries.

Perfect for couples and digital nomads.

The space
Situated in a restored historic building, the apartment features elegant design, modern furniture, and wall-to-wall wooden floors. Spacious and sparkling clean!
A great selection for couples looking for a romantic vacation.

In the apartment, you will find a:

SPACIOUS LIVING ROOM and dining area, flat screen TV with Netflix included and a comfortable chaise-longue sofa (opens to a double bed).

COMFORTA
column7:
The apartment is located the historic area of Porto. Walking distance from main tourist attractions, and some of the best river-view sunset lookouts in Porto.

Right down the street, you can enjoy many unique and fashionable modern restaurants, local bars, bakeries and vintage stores.

In the apartment, you will find a list of our recommendations in the area, so you can enjoy the finest Porto has to offer.

column6:
This charming studio is located in the artistic district of Miguel Bombarda, in the center of Porto, close to all the main tourist attractions.
Ideally located to take advantage of everything the city has to offer, 10 minutes walk from Lapa metro station (direct access to the airport 30 minutes)
It is an excellent, pleasant and comfortable starting point to discover Porto and its surroundings.

The space
This beautiful studio is very bright, in a new building, on the first floor.
Includes a spacious bedroom with a double bed (sheets, duvets, feather pillows), bathroom, fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, stove, kettle, an espresso machine, an iron with the table and all kinds of extensions of kitchen. The living room includes a dining area, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi connection. The bathroom includes toiletries (soap, shampoo, shower gel), towels and a hairdryer.

You can take full advantage of the terrace to rest and have lunch.
column7: Located on Rua da Torrinha, part of the artistic neighborhood of the city of Porto, known for its cultural and fashion diversity, it is an area with designer stores, art galleries and gourmet restaurants and cafes. This studio offers an excellent starting point to discover Porto: from a cultural, culinary and artistic point of view

column6:
A complete bedroom, with external private bathroom, in a century-old reformed mansion. Located in downtown Porto, a cozy and quiet accommodation, close to bakeries, markets and public transportation (subway and buses). It is possible to park in nearby streets for free, use the also free wi-fi in all rooms and enjoy all offered services.

The space
Literature room is a complete bedroom containing a double bed (Queen size), with an external bathroom for exclusive and private use.

Guests will also have access to the common areas of the building which includes a large full-equipped kitchen, a washroom, hall and a large living room, as well as to the building's external patio.

The suite is part of a centenary house, recently renovated, with 8 rooms in total, located in downtown Porto.

A cozy and quiet accommodation, close to bakeries, markets and public transportation.

It is possible to park in nearby streets free of charge,

column6:
GUESTH4U-Relax is a fully renovated apartment with modern decor, located in the heart of the famous seaside resort of Povoa de Varzim. GUESTH4U- Relax has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a kitchen that opens onto a bright living room. We can receive up to 6 people. Our apartment is decorated with care and Netflix & Wi-Fi services are included. The metro station to go to Porto is nearby. The place to be to discover Povoa !

The space
GUESTH4U- Relax is located on the 5th floor of a 5-story building with an elevator.
GUESTH4U- Relax is a fully renovated apartment with quality materials. You will have access to 2 spacious bedrooms, in which there is 1 master about 20m² bedroom with a double bed (160 * 200). The other room is about 15 m² and has a 2 single bed (90* 200) and a shared bathroom (about 5 m²) with a large shower, sink and toilet. The living room also has a comfortable sofa, which allows us to accommodate up to 6 people in the apartment. The TV has direct a
column7:
It is in the heart of Povoa.
It is just 10 minutes walk from the beautiful beaches of Póvoa de Varzim, the casino, supermarkets and the historic heart of the city. Everything you need or want can be close!
Street parking spaces are free.
In the same block as the apartment, there is a small supermarket, a butcher, a bakery, restaurants and a café.
Just 1 km from the apartment are the following supermarkets: LIDL / PINGO DOCE / CONTINENTE
The neighborhood is quiet and safe. You will have absolutely nothing to worry about.
column14:
Bonjour à tous,
Je suis tombée amoureuse de Porto et j’ai donc décidé de venir m’y installer. Mon parcours hotelier m'a donné envie  de créer ma propre société Guest H4U.
C'est une belle aventure que je partage avec mon conjoint, Mathieu.
Nous vous accueillons comme à l'hotel dans chaque appartement. Nous avons développer des partenariats (chauffeurs privées, guide, chasse aux trésors, tour dans le Douro) qui vous permettrons de découvrir Porto comme les Portuenses!
N’hésitez pas à nous contacter pour plus d’informations
Et d'ici là faites de beaux voyages!
Isabelle & Mathieu et toute l'équipe  @GuestH4U

column6:
Bem-vindo ao nosso apartamento.
Fica localizado na baixa da cidade do porto, na belíssima zona ribeirinha. Com morada na Rua Nova da Alfandega, em frente ao rio Douro com uma vista maravilhosa sobre o rio e as caves de vinho do porto em Vila Nova de Gaia.
É perfeito para duas pessoas ou para um grupo de quatro. Está devidamente equipado com tudo o que vai precisar para que esta viagem seja inesquecível.

The space
Este é um apartamento renovado do século XIX situado no segundo andar. Tem como principais características a pedra granítica na fachada do edifício.
Tem janelas características da zona histórica da cidade com vista para o rio.

- TV
- Wi-Fi

- Micro-ondas

column6:
Comfortable fully equipped beach house located in Labruge, Porto
This is a hidden gem you will love to stay at!
30 meters from the beach, restaurants mini market and laundry shop 5 min, pharmacy 12 min walking distance.
10 min from the fish market where you can find the best fish and seafood in Portugal, and the tastiest biological vegetables and fruits.

The space
Enjoy all the areas the house has to offer, with total privacy.

Guest access
We have an attic with our stuff, please don’t go there. you also may find some of our personal items as we go there sometimes to enjoy the house.

Other things to note
Check in is after 15:00/3 PM and check out is until 11:00/11PM. Arriving slightly earlier, or want that extra hour to finish packing? Please check with us first.

We charge a late check-in 15€ fee after 20:00/ 8PM and 25€ fee after 1:00/1 AM

LovelyStay will also be flexible in case you need to reschedule or even cancel your booking with us. Stay safe!**

The Pure is a studio apartment located in one of the liveliest areas in Porto, in walking distance of all the main attractions. The flat has a bunkbed, a kitchenette, a dining area with a TV and a spacious full bathroom with shower.

The space
BEDROOM
- Bunkbed with comfortable linen.

KITCHENETTE
-A kitchenette that comes with a stove, mini fridge, microwave and kitchen appliances so you can prepare a delicious homecooked meal.

BATHROOM
- A bathroom with a shower, toilet, a sink and mirror. Towels, toilet paper and a hairdryer are provided for your convenience
column7:
This apartment is located right in the heart of the city and so there are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
- Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants, and cafés.
- Guindais Funicular
- Port Wine cellars - situated in Gaia, on the other side of the brid

column6:
Dieses gemütliche Schlafzimmer hat ein Doppelbett, mit Schrank und Balkon, wo man tagsüber die Sonne und die Nächte Portos (zusammen vielleicht mit einem schönem Wein) genießen kann.
Die Küche und das Badezimmer mit Badewanne liegen neben an.
Die Einbauküche bietet alles, was Sie zum Kochen in den eigenen vier Wänden benötigen. Neben Herd mit vier Ceranfeldern & Backofen und einem Kühlschrank ist auch eine Waschmaschine vorhanden.

column5: City & the beach - lovely bedroom w/king bed
column6:
Stay in the beautiful and safe Foz do Douro, where from your bed you can see the Sea.
You have a bus stop to the city historical centre in a 3 minutes walking distance.
You have a lovely caffè where you can take breakfast in the morning and in 5 minutes you can reach the supermarket.
Stay at a walking distance from the beach, from the Serralves Modern Museum and from the City Park. Great place for who wants to surf or to relax close but not in the messy city centre

column6:

Situado na zona histórica da cidade, junto ao rio Douro e a dois passos da zona da Ribeira, de frente para a velha alfandega onde se realizam importantes congressos e eventos.
Disponível para reserva desde 1 semana até 3 meses.

column5: Douro River views - Infante D. Henrique apartment
column6:
Open the shutters to the historic D. Luis bridge and to Palácio da Bolsa. Step outside to explore the typical streets and their special restaurants and coffee shops... The Douro river is literally just around the corner.
Totally renovated one bedroom apartment, located at Ribeira (Douro river side), the most special neighborhood of Porto. All main tourist points, restaurants, bars and shops are walking distance...
You may begin to feel that you'd rather stay in Porto instead of going home.

The space
Fully renovated one bedroom apartment with river views.
The apartment can receive four guests (it has a double bed and a sofa bed). Free wi-fi, tv with international channels and Netflix. The Kitchen is equipped with microwave, ceramic hob, coffee machine (Nespresso), toaster, electric kettle, fridge with frizzier and all necessary utensils for making meals (pots, crockery and cutlery). Bed linen, towels, amenities and hair dryer will also be prov
column7: The apartment it's located at Ribeira - the oldest and typical neighborhood of Porto and the heart of the historic center. Classified in 1996 by UNESCO as a World Heritage Site, the neighborhood is known for its narrow streets and colorful houses.

column5: BOUTIQUE Rentals- THE RIBEIRA***** Apt great views
column6:
THE RIBEIRA ***** Apartment with amazing views is BRAND NEW and provides an exquisite, unique and comfortable stay in the city of Porto.
The apartment has a great location, set right in the heart of the historical centre, in the street Rua Mouzinho da Silveira, one of the most historic and picturesque streets of Porto.
Set in the magnificent UNESCO World Heritage Ribeira area and 5 minute walk from the Douro river.
Palácio da Bolsa and Rua das Flores are 2 minute walk.

The space
THE RIBEIRA ***** Apartment is placed in a centenary building totally renovated in 2019, keeping the old facade.
The apartment offers a stylish, elegant and superb décor, with beautiful and unique details and high end custom made furniture signed by the Interior Design company- Mundos Perdidos.
Bedding and Towels are of high quality of the well-known portuguese brand- Piubelle.
Bath amenities are from the lovely portuguese company- Lousani.

In
column7:
In the surroundings there is an amazing variety of local and high end restaurants, trendy shops and bars with terraces.
The apartment is situated in the magnificent UNESCO World Heritage Ribeira area and 5 minute walk from the Douro river, where you can cross the Dom Luis I Bridge and visit the famous Port Wine Cellars.
Palácio da Bolsa and Rua das Flores are 2 minute walk and Clérigos Tower and Lello Bookshop are 8 minute walk.

Private Parking is available 80 meters away.
column14:
Hi! I'm Joana;) 
I was born in Porto, and my passions are art, interior design and travels.
Love new cultures, meeting new people, taste new foods and sharing experiences.
Love to welcome people in Porto and share with them the best of our amazing city;)!!!!  I think the whole point of traveling is to experience the destination as a local..

And so was born BOUTIQUE RENTALS- Charming Apartments
We have been delivering high standard specialized service in interior design for 12 years and in real estate projects management for 7 years. We are a creative, dynamic and passionate team with both experience and know how.
The passion for the field of design and taste for management combined with enthusiasm for the art of hospitality has raised the Boutique Rentals whose main objective is to help and facilitate the purchase of a property for profit, offering a turnkey service.

If you live in Portugal or abroad and want to invest in real estate in our country, we can help you maximize your capital and manage your project.
We wish you make a good deal and we are committed to do the possible to ensure high profitability from the very first day. We help with acquisition, project management and consultancy, construction and interior design, renovation or improvement, short and long term renting, property management, local accommodation management and maintenance.

column6:
Located near the Cais de Gaia (Gaia’s wharf), a stone throw away from the World of Wine Museum, and right in a cluster of port wine cellars, this two bedroom apartment with enough berths for six offers an immersive experience in the culture of Portuguese wine and age-old traditions of the region.

In this ideal spot right by the River Douro, guests can walk down to the Cais de Gaia and then on to the Ribeira (Downtown Porto) and the old town, where they can visit the city´s most iconic monuments

The space
This apartment was renovated in August of 2020 and includes two bedrooms complete with a balcony and plenty of natural light, a living room with a kitchenette, and a beautiful garden (shared with the other apartments in the condominium), perfect for enjoying breakfast outside, reading a book, or even having a barbecue (barbecue, garden chairs and table are all provided).

With enough space for six people, this apartment comes equipped with m
column7:
This apartment is located along a quiet street in Vila Nova de Gaia and is the perfect place for you to rest and relax at any time of day. From this location next to the Cais de Gaia, guests are able to reach around 12 port wine cellars on foot, taste dozens of varieties of this Portuguese wine, and visit the World of Wine Museum. From here, you can take a cruise along the Douro River and stroll around the old town of Porto where the main monuments of the city can be found, such as the Torre dos Clérigos, the famous Livraria Lello bookshop, Porto Cathedral, the Palácio da Bolsa (the old Stock Exchange Palace), and many, many more.

After exploring the city centre, take the opportunity to take a refreshing bike ride along the river between the Cais de Gaia and the Marina da Afurada (Afurada marina), where you can taste the best in freshly caught grilled fish. To help with your digestion, continue on to Canidelo beach and then take the opportunity to go for a dip or take a su

column5: Historic house in a lovely square at city center
column6:
Cozy and extremely pleasant flat located in a quiet and wooded square in the middle of historic city center. Its main feature is its original stone wall that makes it unique. Plenty of natural lighting and ventilation through its windows in both living room and bedroom. The apartment is equipped with air conditioning (heat & cold), high speed wifi, Netflix, espresso coffee machine and all the essential amenities to make your stay very comfortable.

Let us know what we can do to best welcome you!

The space
The apartment is located in the 2nd floor of a historic house transformed into a small building.
Apartment with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and an open space with kitchen, living room, TV room and dining room.
In the bedroom there is a double bed and in the living room a sofa bed for 2 people.
Be sure to drink a Porto wine and eat a cheese from Serra da Estrela in our dining room framed by its original stone wall overlooking a pleasant square
column7:
The neighborhood is the central point of the upper part of the city in the middle of the historic center. We are located just close to Aliados Av., the most important avenue of the city, and Santa Catarina street, the main commercial street of the city.
In the neighborhood, walking distance from the apartment, there is Bolhao Market, Café Majestic, many shops, cafes and restaurants.
You are where everything happens!
column14:
We are Paula and Rafael, a couple from Brazil. We love to travel, mostly to places we've never been before. We love that 'first time visiting" experience!
But, no matter where we are, we like to be in the best location in a comfortable and stylish place.
That's the reason why we decided to found our company, "Qualquer Destino (Meaning "Any Destination", in english).
Our goal is to provide our guests the kind of experience that we like, to make an unique and special one.

column5: NEW!Central w/ sunny terrace - 9 min walk Trindade
column6:
The building is made with all the comfortability. The apartment is very well equipped to welcome you with everything needed for your stay. You will be in the middle of the most famous and busy streets, next to the historical area of Porto!

The space
Comfortable apartment in a central building in downtown Porto with a sunny private terrace. Well equipped and clean, it is the ideal place to relax after venturing through the streets of Porto.
Located on the 1st floor with an elevator, you will find a room with a double bed opened towards the living room with a sofa-bed. One bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen: all the kitchen utensils, fridge and freezer, ceramic hob, microwave, oven, kettle, coffee machine, toaster, hand blender and some spices. We will welcome you with coffee, tea, sugar and spices for the kitchen. The nearest supermarket is a 1-minute walk.

At your disposal, you have an air conditioner, high-speed Wi-Fi, TV LCD with national
column7:
Rua dos Mártires da Liberdade is located a few steps from the famous Streets of Cedofeita and Rua do Almada.
9 minutes walking from the main metro station, Trindade Station.
With great restaurants nearby, and a very rich nightlife.
There is a grocery store nearby and a grocery store just across the street.
You can visit all the main attractions of Porto on foot.
column14:
Olá!

I'm Jéssica and I love living in Porto. My entrepreneurial roots lead me to open Port'Origami, a short-term rental management company.

I am an expert in tourism and an avid traveller. Stroll through several countries in Europe and South America living, working and volunteering on projects of locals. I like the picturesque spots that only the locals know and love sharing knowledge and experiences. Photography is also part of my life.

I want you to feel very comfortable at Port'Origami homes and make your trip to Porto unforgettable. I will always be available to give you information, tips and help you with anything you need to make the most of your stay.

Looking forward to meeting you!

column6:
Paraiso means Paradise in Portuguese. Our property is situated on Paradise Street and it couldn't be a better fit, as Paraiso 331 is truly a Paradise in the city centre of Porto, just 10 minutes walk from Downtown.

Our huts are warm and cozy in the winter and cool and inviting during summer days. you can just open up the three fold doors and expand your living into the amazing surrounding garden, with hammock, lake, common and private seating area, lounge chairs, and plenty of fruit trees.

The space
Our huts are entirely made of Hemp, yes! Hemp!
It's amazing properties are a novelty as a construction material, and extremely durable, natural, soundproof and perfect for insulation. The Hut structure is made of wood and hemp blocks which are left exposed, giving it a rustic and cozy look.

But don't be fooled by the rustic looks... Once you are in, you will have the quality amenities that modern living got us used to. Fully equipped kitc
column7: Lapa, is a central and typical neighbourhood just 10 minutes walk from the city hall and main metro Hub, Trindade. We are located just beside the Lapa Cathedral and from the Hut you can actually see it just beside peecking up in between the foliage. The river side is also with walking distance and there is a metro station right on the street (Faria Guimaraes). On the street you can also find a typical portuguese supermarket with everything fresh and one of the most famous grill restaurants in Porto. All the bars and nightlife are only 10m walk.

column6:
The privileged location of Souto Apartments offers a unique opportunity to get to know the city and experience a popular culture of a Porto neighborhood, living closely its customs and traditions.

The apartment has a fully equipped kitchenette with oven, refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, coffee machine; a seating and dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, air conditioning and free wi-fi; it also includes a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer, towels and bed linen.

The space
Our concept of accommodation is part of the typical hospitality of the city.

Given the recognized historical character of the area in which it is inserted, the building, previously in ruins, has been completely restored maintaining its original volumetry, style, scale, materials and colours. It has a traditional architectural character, being integrated in the various surrounding facades, keeping wooden beams between the four floors, part of the facade
column7:
Souto Apartments, on Rua do Souto, is located in a central and privileged area of the city classified as World Heritage by UNESCO. The first references to this street date back to 1234 and is considered to be one of the oldest and longest arteries in the old city of Porto.

Situated just a few steps from the most emblematic points of the city, it is an excellent choice for enthusiasts interested in exploring the historic center on foot and visiting the secular buildings and monuments dominated by the Romanesque, Gothic and Baroque styles.

column6:
NORTESOUL MOUZINHO
Situado a 300 metros da Estação de São Bento e a 400m do Rio Douro, o NorteSoul Mouzinho apresenta apartamentos totalmente equipados de grande qualidade, beleza e conforto com pés direitos de 3.5 metros, uma decoração estilo Vintage Moderno, num dos edifícios mais carismáticos de Mouzinho da Silveira, uma das principais artérias da cidade invicta, com vista sobre a Torre dos Clérigos e com terraço e jardim que separa a zona dos apartamentos de uma zona de escritórios.

Guest access
Apartamento independente com terraço privativo: Roof Top

Other things to note
O apartamento que reservou tem no terraço um jacuzzi. A sua utilização tem um custo único por estadia de 20€, a ser pago no check-in, destinado a compensar os custos com a limpeza, mudança integral da água e aquecimento desta. Por favor, informe-nos com antecedência se pretende utilizá-lo, pois pode demorar mais de 5 horas a encher e aquecer.

column5: Stunning Metro Apartment @ Quinta das Corgas by LovelyStay
column6:
Situated in Vila Nova de Gaia, an area famous for its Port wine cellars and stunning views of the Ribeira, this apartment is perfect for those hoping to have a peaceful holiday in the north of Portugal. The metro station "Santo Ovídio" is just a 2 minute walk away from the flat and will take you to Porto downtown in less than 15 minutes.
Well-equipped to host up to 4 guests, this 75m2 apartment comes with 1 bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a separate WC, a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious living space with a sofa-bed for 2 and a lovely balcony where you can enjoy a nice breakfast before heading out to explore. Several key amenities are also provided here, including central heating/fans, fast wi-fi, TV, a washing machine, dishwasher, stove and more! We are certain you will feel right at home at our apartment and we look forward to hosting you!

The space
This 74m2 1BR apartment allows you to stay right next to Gaia's busiest and most famous avenue while also
column7:
Famous for its Port Wine Cellars and stunning views of Porto, Vila Nova de Gaia (or simply Gaia) is located on the other side of the Douro. It has a pretty promenade along the waterfront and is a great place to go for a walk and enjoy the remarkable views of the Dom Luís I Bridge and the picturesque neighborhood of Ribeira and its terraced colorful houses.

TOP ATTRACTIONS IN THE AREA:
- Mosteiro da Serra do Pilar
- Teleférico de Gaia
- Port Lodges;
A few to consider are Sandeman, Cálem, Graham’s and Quinta do Noval, and you’ll get to taste each variety to learn the difference.
- Casa-Museu Teixeira Lopes
- Douro River Trip
- Jardim do Morro
- Parque Biológico de Gaia

column6:

Proche de la place la plus prisée "Praça do Almada" et de l'église "Igreja da Matriz"
Vous vous situerez dans le centre historique de la ville, mais également proche de la mer, du marché, du métro, de plusieurs petits commerces (épicerie, boulangerie, etc). Tous vos déplacements pourront se faire à pied !

column6:

column5: Modern Designer Apartment with Terrace City Center
column6:
The apartment features a spacious living room and dining area, accessorized kitchen, a comfortable bedroom, and a magnificent terrace ideal for a morning cup of coffee before a day of exploring the city.

Situated in the heart of a vibrant neighborhood full of modern restaurants, local bars, bakeries, and vintage stores and galleries.

Perfect for couples and digital nomads, suitable up to 4 guests.

The space
Situated in a restored historic building, the apartment features elegant design, modern furniture, and wall-to-wall wooden floors. Spacious and sparkling clean!
A great selection for couples looking for a romantic vacation.

In the apartment, you will find a:

SPACIOUS LIVING ROOM and dining area, flat screen TV with Netflix included and a comfortable chaise-longue sofa (opens to a double bed).

COMFORTABLE BEDROOM overlooking the terrace. Enjoy a quiet and peaceful good night sleep.
The queen
column7:
The apartment is located the historic area of Porto. Walking distance from main tourist attractions, and some of the best river-view sunset lookouts in Porto.

Right down the street, you can enjoy many unique and fashionable modern restaurants, local bars, bakeries and vintage stores.

In the apartment, you will find a list of our recommendations in the area, so you can enjoy the finest Porto has to offer.

A toda a casa, so para os hospedes e ao quintal privado de cada casa.

No centro da Boavista, a 3 minutos a pé desta, com farmscia, cafés e supermercados, mas o sossego do campo, com a possibilidade de desfrutar da area exterior privada, soalheira e completamente abrigada.

column6:
Num vale verde e silencioso, a Quinta da Casa Nova é o sonho concretizado dos seus proprietários. Depois de uma remodelação total, a antiga casa de campo da família tornou-se num espaço único e acolhedor, de silêncio e descanso absolutos, com todos os confortos que hoje são indispensáveis.

O pôr-de-sol irrepetível, junto à piscina, num churrasco com família e amigos, entre a generosa eira agrícola e o relvado são argumentos fortes para uns dias de pausa do trabalho.

The space
No interior, contam-se quatro suites de grandes dimensões, uma cozinha totalmente equipada, sala, salão de jogos e ginásio.

Já no exterior, podem-se encontar a piscina, zona de refeições com churrasco e uma vista imperdível, jardim e área relvada e ainda horta (na época de sementeiras e colheitas).

Localizada na vila de São Mamede de Negrelos, a Quinta da Casa Nova está a apenas 20 minutos do centro histórico de Guimarães, a 30 minutos de Braga, a 15 minutos

Situated in an old squad (the fourteenth), in the heart of the historical center of Porto, which over the years maintains a unique and particular identity. A fully renovated and equipped building in a safe and quiet area, ready to receive demanding and selective visitors, seeking an attentive reception, an experience in an intimate setting, a mixture of warm and relaxed, with a nice view of the Douro river, close to some of the must-see places such as Port Wine Museum, Electric Car Museum and Alfândega (Porto Congress Centre).

The space

column7:
A rua de Santa Catarina é a artéria mais comercial da Baixa do Porto, estando grande parte dela vedada ao trânsito automóvel e reservada apenas a peões.

Esta localização é, sem dúvida, o centro de tudo. A escassos passos do prédio encontrará a Avenida dos Aliados, Trindade, o mercado do Bolhão, o mítico café Majestic, a célebre e impressionante capela das Almas, entre muitos outros pontos de interese.
column14:
Somos uma empresa especializada na gestão de alojamento local. Tratamos cada propriedade como se fosse nossa, porque queremos que os hóspedes se sintam em casa – acreditamos que só assim faz sentido!

Como bons portuenses, somos excelentes anfitriões e sugerimos dicas especiais para que os nossos convidados possam aproveitar a estadia ao máximo, desde visitas a museus aos restaurantes imperdíveis. Partilhamos segredos que fazem do Porto uma cidade mágica. 

Aos proprietários, e nossos parceiros nesta aventura, prometemos experiência, conhecimento e dedicação, com o objetivo de rentabilizar ao máximo cada propriedade. 

We are a company that specialises in managing short term rental properties in Porto, Portugal.

We take care of our managed properties as if they were our own because we want our guests to feel at home and not have to worry about anything when they visit.
 
Just like the inhabitants of Porto, we are friendly hosts and can provide tips for our guests to make the most of their stay. We can recommend museums, restaurants, bars and can provide suggestions on alternative things to do (river cruises, football matches, etc...) As long term residents of the city we can share those hidden gems that make Porto such a magical city.
 
For home owners and potential business partners, we promise a professional service, expertise and dedication that will help you to maximise your returns.
Home Me – Making You Feel Good

Mantendo muitas das características originais do edifício com características vintage e modernas, é a base perfeita para umas férias ensolaradas na cidade.


O Espaço
Este encantador apartamento com 1 quarto fica no segundo andar de um prédio renovado, numa área animada no centro do Porto. Acomoda 4 + 1 Pessoas. A propriedade é compacta e simples, mas também luminosa e divertida.

As paredes brancas e o piso de madeira criam um cenário deslumbrante para o mobiliário bonito e detalhes em madeira quente.
Os móveis antigos criam o apartamento perfeito para que possa experimentar a cidade histórica como um verdadeiro “Portuense”.

column6:
Urban Retreat is set at Canto De Luz, perhaps Porto's best Maison D'Hote. Hidden behind a tiled facade in the heart of the city, I offer families the best of both worlds - hotel service & cleanliness, with privacy & luxury to really relax.

• 2 bd aparthotel suite

• Daily Housekeeping

• 2 Sofa beds & 1 day bed

• Xbox / Netflix / Amazon Echo

The space
Welcome to Your Home in Porto – Urban Retreat at Canto De Luz !

My beautiful restored Merchant’s townhouse is the result of a loving restoration in the heart of Porto’s old down in a quiet cobbled street running parallel to the square of Porto town hall.

Behind the traditional tiled façade is a modern architectural gem, created around an atrium that floods the building with natural light. The
column7: Porto soothes the soul. The second city to Lisbon, its completely different in style and vibe. The rich history of the city is woven in to everything you come across, from the food, the wine, the docks and commerce and even its people. It’s the kind of city where people come for a weekend and stay a lifetime. Edgy yet opulent, the city has art on every corner, from galleries and museums to street art to edgy modern art and graffiti installations, each telling the story of a different time and slice of Porto living.
column14:
Travel is life ! I love to meet people and help them discover the amazing places I am lucky enough to call home in Portugal, Malta and the UK.  Maybe you will do as I did in 2009 and give up your old life to make one of these magical places home...

When travelling, I believe that paying to stay in a place is a real treat, and when you do so the very least that you should expect is for it to be as comfortable and clean as your own home, or hopefully even better.  For me, that means spaces that not only look amazing, but also cover the basics that are so often missing in AirBNB properties such as huge beds with fine linens and 100% blackout for a great nights sleep, plus Air Conditioning and Luxury amenities. It's these simple luxuries that I make sure to provide for my guests when I am hosting too.

If this is your first AirBNB trip click here for a discount  - https://www.airbnb.co.uk/c/susanb10384?currency=EUR
___

Les voyages c'est la vie ! J'aime rencontrer des gens et les aider à découvrir mon incroyable ville Lisbonne, avec sa culture, ses parcs, sa plage, ses magasins et sa gastronomie fantastique ! Peut-être ferez-vous comme moi, qui ai abandonné mon ancienne vie en 2009 pour faire de ce lieu magique mon nouveau chez-moi…

En voyage, je pense que payer pour séjourner quelque part implique d'avoir pour soi un lieu aussi confortable et propre que sa propre maison, voire même mieux. Pour moi, cela veut dire non seulement des espaces époustouflants, mais aussi des éléments de base qui font si souvent défaut aux locations AirBNB, telles que des lits énormes avec une literie fine et une isolation lumineuse parfaite pour une bonne nuit de sommeil, ainsi qu'un équipement de climatisation. Ce sont ces simples luxes que je m'assure de fournir à mes invités.
___
¡Viajar es vida! Me encanta conocer gente y ayudarles a descubrir Lisboa, mi increíble ciudad, donde se puede disfrutar de la cultura, los parques, la playa, las tiendas y la comida fantástica; ¡todo en el mismo día! Tal vez hará lo que yo hice en 2009 y dejará su antigua vida para hacer de este lugar mágico un hogar...

Creo que pagar por alojarse en un lugar mientras viaja es un verdadero placer, y cuando lo hace, lo mínimo que puede esperar es que sea tan cómodo y limpio como su propia casa, o incluso mejor. Para mí, eso significa espacios que no solo tienen un aspecto increíble, sino que también cubren los aspectos básicos que a menudo faltan en las propiedades de AirBNB, tales como camas enormes con sábanas finas y persianas 100% blackout para un buen descanso nocturno, además de aire acondicionado y amenidades lujosas. Son estos simples lujos los que me aseguro de proporcionar a mis invitados cuando soy la anfitriona también.
___
Viaggiare è vita! Amo conoscere gente nuova e aiutare la gente a scoprire Lisbona, la mia splendida città, in cui si può godere di cultura, parchi, spiagge, negozi e di cibo buonissimo – tutto in un solo giorno! 

Forse farete come me nel 2009 quando ho scelto di cambiare vita e di realizzare questo magnifico appartamento…

Quando si viaggia, credo che pagare per alloggiare in un appartamento sia l’ideale e quando lo si fa, il minimo che ci si aspetta è godere del comfort e della pulizia della propria casa o addirittura meglio. Per me significa, non solo appartamenti magnifici ma anche offrire elementi basici che spesso mancano nelle proprietà AirBNB come letti ampi con lenzuola di qualità e serrande in tutta la casa per godere di un ottimo riposo durante la notte, più aria condizionata e servizi di lusso. 

Sono questi i servizi che mi assicuro di offrire ai miei ospiti quando anch’io ospito qualcuno. 
___
Reisen ist Leben! Ich liebe es, Menschen zu treffen und ihnen zu helfen, meine tolle Stadt Lissabon zu entdecken, in der man Kultur, Parks, Strände, Geschäfte und fantastisches Essen genießen kann – alles an einem Tag! Vielleicht werden Sie das tun, was ich 2009 getan habe, und Ihr altes Leben aufgeben, um diesen magischen Ort zu Ihrem neuen Zuhause zu machen …

Wenn ich reise und für die Übernachtung in einer Unterkunft Geld bezahle, dann finde ich, dass das etwas Besonderes ist, und wenn man dies tut, sollte man davon ausgehen können, dass es mindestens so komfortabel und sauber ist wie bei sich zu Hause, oder hoffentlich noch besser. Für mich bedeutet das Räumlichkeiten, die nicht nur toll aussehen, sondern auch die grundlegenden Dinge umfassen, die so oft in Airbnb-Unterkünften fehlen, wie riesige Betten mit guter Bettwäsche und 100% Verdunkelung, um nachts super schlafen zu können, plus Klimatisierung und luxuriöse Annehmlichkeiten. Ich achte darauf, meinen Gästen diese kleinen luxuriösen Details zu bieten, wenn ich selbst Gastgeber bin.
___
Reizen is leven! Ik houd van nieuwe mensen ontmoeten en ze te helpen bij het ontdekken van Lissabon, mijn geweldige stad, een stad vol met cultuur, parken, stranden, winkeltjes en heerlijk lekker eten – en dat allemaal in een dag!!  Misschien geeft u ook wel net als mij uw oude leventje op en maakt u Lissabon tot uw nieuwe thuis… 

Als ik reis vind ik dat als je voor een plek betaald, dat je deze plek dan ten minste net zo comfortabel en schoon zou mouten zijn als je eigen huis, en misschien zelfs wel een klein beetje beter. Voor mij betekent dat plekken er niet alleen geweldig uit moeten zien, maar ook voorzien moeten zijn van de standaarddingen, dingen die vaak ontbreken bij AirBnB-plekken, zoals grote bedden met lekker beddengoed, 100% verduistering voor een goed nachtrust, airconditioning en luxe faciliteiten. Ik zorg dat mijn gasten kunnen genieten van juist deze faciliteiten. 
___
Viajar é vida! Adoro conhecer pessoas e ajudá-las a descobrir Lisboa, a minha cidade maravilhosa, onde pode desfrutar da cultura, parques, praias, lojas e comida fantástica – tudo no mesmo dia!! Talvez faça como eu em 2009 e desista da sua antiga vida para tornar este lugar mágico na sua casa...

Ao viajar, acredito que pagar para ficar num lugar é um verdadeiro benefício, e quando faz isso, o mínimo que deve esperar é que ele seja tão confortável e limpo quanto a sua própria casa ou quem sabe, melhor ainda. Para mim, isso significa sítios que não parecem apenas incríveis mas que também cubram o básico que muitas vezes falta em propriedades Airbnb como camas grandes com bons lençóis de qualidade e persianas para boas noites de sono, além de Ar condicionado e comodidades de luxo. São estes luxos simples que eu garanto aos meus hóspedes quando estou hospedando também. 
___

旅行就是生活!我喜欢结识朋友,并帮助他们发现里斯本 - 这座令我着迷的城市的魅力｡在这里,您用一天时间就可以感受当地文化,游览公园､漫步海滩､开心购物并品味美食!或许,您也会像2009年时的我一样,放弃曾经的生活,把这个梦幻般的城市作为自己的家……

旅行过程中,我认为花钱在所到的城市住店是一种真正的享受｡这样做的时候,您至少应该期待整个过程会让您享有如家般的舒服与整洁,或甚至更好｡对于我而言,花钱住店就意味着所住之处不仅布局美观,还要有爱彼迎网站旅店通常缺失的基本要素,比如放置有精致床上用品的特大号床,能为宾客带来良好夜间睡眠的100%遮光百叶窗,以及空调和豪华便利的居家设施｡而这些并不繁琐的豪华配置,也是我的公寓为宾客必备的｡
____

Podróż jest życiem! Kocham poznawać ludzi i pomagać im odkrywać Lizbonę, moje niesamowite miasto, w którym można cieszyć się kulturą, parkami, plażą, sklepami i fantastycznym jedzeniem - wszystko w tym samym dniu !! Może uczynisz tak, jak ja to zrobiłam w 2009 roku i porzucisz swoje dawne życie, aby w tym magicznym miejscu stworzyć swój dom …

Sądzę, że w trakcie podróży płacąc za miejsce, oczekujesz, że będzie ono tak komfortowe i czyste jak Twój własny dom, lub, mam nadzieję, że okaże się jeszcze lepsze. Dla mnie oznacza to przestrzenie, które nie tylko wyglądają wspaniale, ale obejmują również podstawy, których tak często brakuje w obiektach AirBNB, takich jak ogromne łóżka z cienką pościelą i 100% zaciemnienia zapewniające doskonały sen, a także klimatyzację i luksusowe udogodnienia. To te proste luksusy, które zapewniam moim gościom.
___

Путешествия - это жизнь! Я обожаю встречать новых людей и помогать им исследовать Лиссабон - мой прекрасный город, в котором вы можете насладиться культурой, парками, пляжами, магазинами и потрясающей едой - и всё это в один день! Может, всё закончится тем, что вы сделаете то же, что и я в 2009 году - оставите свою прошлую жизнь, чтобы поселиться в этом волшебном месте...

Я уверена, что платить за проживание в определённом месте в путешествии - настоящее удовольствие, и когда так поступаешь, как минимум надеешься, что это место будет таким же уютным и чистым, как твой собственный дом, если не лучше. Для меня это такое место, которое не просто выглядит потрясающе, но и снабжено всеми бытовыми удобствами, чего зачастую не хватает апартаментам на AirBNB - например, большими кроватями с высококачественным постельным бельём и возможностью полностью закрыть окна, чтобы лучше спать ночью, а также кондиционером и роскошными уборными. Эта простая роскошь - то, что я стремлюсь предоставить своим гостям, когда выступаю в роли хозяйки.

column5: Art District - Rock Apartment - Clean & Safe
column6:
O Rock Apartment está situado em pleno Bairro das Artes, na Rua Miguel Bombarda, no Porto, a zona mais efervescente da cidade. Situa-se num edifício de traça antiga, completamente recuperado, e tem todo os confortos necessários (elevador, ar condicionado, TV HD, wi-fi gratuito, cozinha totalmente equipada, máquinas de lavar louça e roupa, etc.). Um espaço verdadeiramente confortável e sossegado, para ser o seu refúgio depois de um dia a explorar a maravilhosa cidade do Porto.

The space
O Rock Apartment fica no 1º andar G e tem acesso por elevador. Tem um quarto com cama de casal e na sala há dois sofás cama (individuais), aos quais se pode acrescentar um berço. É contíguo ao Pop Apartment (1º andar H) e podem ser reservados como uma só unidade, ou seja, recebemos com conforto grupos de 2, 4, 6 ou 8 pessoas.

License number
108649/AL
column7: O Bairro das Artes (Porto Art District) é a zona culturalmente mais dinâmica e criativa  da cidade, onde poderá encontrar galerias de arte, restaurantes, cafés e casas de chá, lojas de roupa alternativa e de música, mercearias biológicas, espaços de co-working, ateliers de design, moda e arquitectura.
column14:
Hi, my name is Pedro and I’m glad to welcome you to Porto, my hometown, and to the Art District, city’s most dynamic area. 
I work with law in the banking sector, but my true passion is indie music, which has led me to be a co-founder of a cooperative promoting live events. 
Pop & Rock Apartments are two adjoining arty apartments, in a refurbished building, right at Rua Miguel Bombarda, just a 10 minutes walking distance from the main attractions and monuments. Decorated with motifs linked to music and full of details of comfort, you will find in them the deserved rest after each day of discoveries. 
Marta and the team of Welcome Services take good care of everything for me and they will do all they can to assure that you have the most pleasant stay in this lovely city! 
Welcome to Porto! Have a great time! :)

column5: Capacious Design Room 2 in Downtown Porto
column6:
Minimalist designer room in a boutique guesthouse located in the centre of Porto within walking distance of all the cities main attractions!

The space
Welcome to our place!

This beautifully renovated traditional Porto style building has been converted into boutique designer apartments and rooms especially for tourists and guests to the city. 

Embracing minimalism, the design focus of this property is creating the optimal guest experience. Maintaining all of the original charm of the historic building. Upgraded with a touch of class and luxury. Including a comfortable memory foam mattress, high-speed cable internet and a walk-in power shower.

Just a few moments stroll from the stunning Unesco world heritage old town, riverfront and many local restaurants. This is the ideal place for your stay in Porto.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire home!

Other things to note
Please

column5: GR Suites - Twin Superior Garden View Room - Nº5
column6:
O G|R Suites situa-se no centro histórico do Porto, na rua Latino Coelho. Dispomos de 7 suites independentes distribuídos por 3 andares, exibidos com uma decoração exclusiva, alguns com vista para o nosso jardim e terraço, que foram concebidos para lhe proporcionar o máximo de conforto, comodidade e tranquilidade. Oferecemos um magnifico pequeno almoço continental e dispomos de parque de estacionamento, que carece de pré-reserva.

License number
n.º 70073/AL
column14:
Bem-vindo à G|R Suites!

Localizado na parte alta da cidade do Porto, numa zona tranquila, a uma curta distância da avenida dos Aliados, do Rio Douro, Estádio do Dragão e a dois paços de todos os principais destaques culturais da nossa cidade, como monumentos, zonas históricas, restaurantes típicos, locais de divertimento noturno e ainda com excelentes acessos de transportes públicos, como o Metro.

O G|R Suites é constituído por 7 quartos distribuídos por 3 andares, exibidos com uma decoração exclusiva, alguns com vista para o nosso jardim e terraço que foram concebidos para lhe proporcionar o máximo de conforto, comodidade e tranquilidade. O nosso pequeno almoço continental, ambiente acolhedor em cada canto e o nosso emblemático jardim não o deixarão indiferente, fazendo com que se sinta verdadeiramente em sua casa.

Este espaço provem de casa centenária portuense datada em 1968, que foi completamente renovada, mas mantendo a sua essência, por forma a receber os nossos hospedes num ambiente único, simples e acolhedor.

The chef's worthy kitchen is amazing, fully equipped, and waiting for your attempts at cooking the local delicacies. The bathroom will be waiting for you after a l

column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Unique apartment with a gorgeous exclusive garden
column6:
Your secret and exclusive garden in the middle of city center!
1 bedroom apartment with 2 complete bathrooms, 1 sofa bed in the living room and a beautiful exclusive garden. Equipped with air conditioning in the bedroom and living room, high speed wifi, smart TV with access to Netflix, dishwasher and washing machine and dryer. Everything you need to have your home in Porto. Located in the historic city center and close to all attractions and restaurants.
Enjoy and relax in style and comfort!

The space
An apartment with soul and decorated to be a relaxing and welcoming environment. Take advantage of the sunny days and warm nights to have a drink in the garden. And, enjoy the rainy days to read a book and have coffee on the internal balcony. This apartment offers you the right comfort.

Guest access
All apartment is just for our guests.

Other things to note
It is just allowed to smoke in the garden.
column7: The apartment is located in the neighborhood called Cedofeita, Porto's historic center. This is where it all happens! In this neighborhood is located all the sights, restaurants, bars, cafes, shops ... everything! The apartment is located 1 km from Santa Catarina Street, the main shopping street in the city, and from Aliados Av., the most chic and important avenue in the city. In this neighborhood you will also easily find supermarkets, pharmacies, everything you need for your stay.
column14:
We are Paula and Rafael, a couple from Brazil. We love to travel, mostly to places we've never been before. We love that 'first time visiting" experience!
But, no matter where we are, we like to be in the best location in a comfortable and stylish place.
That's the reason why we decided to found our company, "Qualquer Destino (Meaning "Any Destination", in english).
Our goal is to provide our guests the kind of experience that we like, to make an unique and special one.

column6:
One bedroom apartment with balcony in rehabilitated building in the heart of the Old Porto with full view of the green park.
- Fast fiber optic internet
- Smart large flat screen TV with multi language 150 channels.
- The Apartment has elevator.
- The building has a green back garden that is 500 m2, and has a swimming pool only guests are allowed to use it.
- Kitchenette with appliances:
* Microwave, Oven, Cooking Area
* Cattle
* Toaster
* Coffee Machine
* Refrigerator with Freezer

The space
There is a comfortable living room under full daylight with fully equipped kitchen with washing machine, and a dining table that seats 4 people and comfy laptop workspace. The master bedroom has a queen size (160x200) bed and nice reading corner. Ceramic accented bathroom has a large shower cabin. There are two Air Condition unit, one in living room and the other one in bedroom.

Other things to note
Op

column5: Guest H4U Design bedroom with private bathroom
column6:
Apartment consisting of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Discover a double room with a private bathroom and common areas to share in a spacious, bright and comfortable 100m² apartment. Located near the Póvoa de Varzim metro, ideal for a business or tourism stay.
#guesth4u #instagood #feelgood #weekend #romantic #sun #beach #weekend #room #roomtorent #chambre

The space
100m² apartment with 3 bedrooms, on the 3rd floor of a small building. Our apartment has 2 bathrooms, and 3 rooms.
Your have your own private bedroom with private bathroom
You have access to all common areas, a living room with a TV (NETFLIX ACCESS), a kitchen.
Our kitchen is full equipped with a stove with 4 plates and an oven, Nespresso, a washing machine, dishwasher, Nespresso, and all the necessary utensils for cooking.
Our apartment is bright, spacious, comfortable, ideal for a short or long stay.
Sheets and towels are provided for your stay.

Guest access<
column7: At the foot of the building is a small grocery, a bakery, a cafe, a restaurant and a butcher. A 10 minute walk you can go to the market, the supermarket and the heart of the city, and beaches.
column14:
Bonjour à tous,
Je suis tombée amoureuse de Porto et j’ai donc décidé de venir m’y installer. Mon parcours hotelier m'a donné envie  de créer ma propre société Guest H4U.
C'est une belle aventure que je partage avec mon conjoint, Mathieu.
Nous vous accueillons comme à l'hotel dans chaque appartement. Nous avons développer des partenariats (chauffeurs privées, guide, chasse aux trésors, tour dans le Douro) qui vous permettrons de découvrir Porto comme les Portuenses!
N’hésitez pas à nous contacter pour plus d’informations
Et d'ici là faites de beaux voyages!
Isabelle & Mathieu et toute l'équipe  @GuestH4U

column5: BR1 | Garden House - City Centre & Metro Station
column6:
Rent a Bedroom in a beautifully renovated 2 Bedrooms House. This house is perfect for international students or workers visiting Porto. Located in the city centre, in Campanhã, train and metro stations are just 1min distance. Bus stop are around the corner too. You can be in the University District or the old town in 15min. Enjoy the garden, take sunbaths, make a barbecue or simply relax in the hammock. Live in Porto and feel at home!

87615/AL
column14:
We are Deli & André from OportoHouses. We cannot wait to meet you and help you having a great time in our beautiful city, that is Porto. At OportoHouses we have great properties to rent in Porto. Choose from beautiful river front Villas, elegant Apartments in the historic centre or city centre Studios. Check our listings on Airbnb. 

We look forward to hosting you!

See you soon,
André & Deli

column6:
Located in the historic Porto, this is the best if you are enthusiastic to breathe and experience culture, if you are looking for an intimate space with all the accommodations of a luxury apartment and you can see everything on foot. It is fully refurnished, with air conditioning and windows with thermal and acoustic insulation. Besides being in the heart of the city it is situated in a noiseless street and is a bright 2nd floor apartment, with pretty awesome views of this historic city.

The space
The apartment is designed so that you can stay single, with friends or family. It consists of a comfortable space and a large bedroom with a balcony. It's equipped with a king size bed 1.60m x 2.00m, bedside tables, large closet and a comfortable living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. A fully equipped kitchenette with oven and stove, a dishwasher, washing and drying machine, microwave, fridge, freezer
column7:
We’re in the heart of the action. You can see everything on foot and enjoy the city: 2 minutes walking to the Clérigos Tower and Lello library, Galerias de Paris Street, Porto historical downtown.
In all the hustle and bustle, sometimes you just need an escape. That’s what you can find in Sweet Home Clerigos: an urban oasis close enough to the hustle and bustle if you fancy it, but a destination in itself if you just want to be.
column14: We are Regina and Vital, a couple from Porto who wants to share the beauty of this city with people from other countries and cultures. It is an amazing vehicle to explore new worlds, our own creativity and to share stories with amazing people.
