column5: Two Cozy Duplex w/ Terrace & Pool by Host Wise
column6:
Live like a local in the heart of Gaia.

Located in the center of town, next to the Cais de Gaia, this two incredible flats are ideal for you! It will provide you a great environment to relax and discover the city. They have a terrace and swimming pool!

We are a passionate team in Porto, always excited to welcome amazing people from all over the world. We are always available and eager to give you the best tips to discover the city.

The space
You'll have everything ready to make sure you have a comfortable stay.

You will find two one bedroom apartments in the same building.The elegant space, has lots of light and accomodates 8 guests (4 on each one of the apartments). It has a two queen size beds and two pull-out couch so there will be a place for all to enjoy a lovely night of sleep. It is perfect for little groups and families.

The chef's worthy kitchen is amazing, fully equipped, and waiting for your attempts at cooki
column7:
You will be a few minutes away from Cais de Gaia and Jardim do Morro where you can see the best sunset of the city.

It is 100 m "Lagoa Azul", 500 m "World of Wine", 500 m from the train station "Estação General Torres", 500 m "Estação General Torres", 500 m "Douro", 1 km from the supermarket "Pingo Doce Avenida da Republica ", 13 km from the sandy beach" Praia do Homem do Leme ", 15 km from the airport" Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport "and located in a residential area and in the urban center.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column6:
O G|R Suites situa-se no centro histórico do Porto, na rua Latino Coelho. Dispomos de 7 suites independentes distribuídos por 3 andares, exibidos com uma decoração exclusiva, alguns com vista para o nosso jardim e terraço, que foram concebidos para lhe proporcionar o máximo de conforto, comodidade e tranquilidade. Oferecemos um magnifico pequeno almoço continental e dispomos de parque de estacionamento, que carece de pré-reserva.

The space
Excelente Jardim com acesso aos hóspedes

Guest access
Jardim e sala de estar

License number
70073/AL
column14:
Bem-vindo à G|R Suites!

Localizado na parte alta da cidade do Porto, numa zona tranquila, a uma curta distância da avenida dos Aliados, do Rio Douro, Estádio do Dragão e a dois paços de todos os principais destaques culturais da nossa cidade, como monumentos, zonas históricas, restaurantes típicos, locais de divertimento noturno e ainda com excelentes acessos de transportes públicos, como o Metro.

O G|R Suites é constituído por 7 quartos distribuídos por 3 andares, exibidos com uma decoração exclusiva, alguns com vista para o nosso jardim e terraço que foram concebidos para lhe proporcionar o máximo de conforto, comodidade e tranquilidade. O nosso pequeno almoço continental, ambiente acolhedor em cada canto e o nosso emblemático jardim não o deixarão indiferente, fazendo com que se sinta verdadeiramente em sua casa.

Este espaço provem de casa centenária portuense datada em 1968, que foi completamente renovada, mas mantendo a sua essência, por forma a receber os nossos hospedes num ambiente único, simples e acolhedor.

column5: Old Sé apartment@ Porto center. near river& metro
column6:
Located on the older neighbourhood of Porto near the Cathedral of Sé and 2min walk from the river and the S bento Train & metro station.
This apartment has 2 bedrooms: 1 double, 1 twin and there is a sofa bed so in total the apartment can acomodate up to 6 people
The kitchen is in open space with the living room and leads to a tipical balcony with a magnificent view over old Porto and Clerigos tower
Major touristic points are walking distance as restaurants, cafes and tipical comerce
19748/AL

The space
2 bedrooms:
#1- double bed
#2- twin- 2 single beds
Sofa bed- double in the living room

The kitchen is equiped for cooking meals. please notice that there is big hooven on the 2nd floor but small ont the 1st.

2 difrent decorations ! please see all the photos

Other things to note
Hot water is provided by an electrical cilinder: this means that there is enogh hot water for 2 cmfortable sho
column7: old neighborhood. people here are original Porto residents...the so called "tripeiros" for many generations! old peipople and younger but usually poor. they might not look much but they have the heart in the hands! generous and polite you'll see that you should never judge a book by  its cover;))
column14: Vivemos no Porto e adoramos a nossa cidade. Vamos fazer de tudo para que os nossos hóspedes se sintam bem e como se estivessem na sua própria casa:)

column5: Maria do Bonjardim - acolhedor e próximo de tudo
column6:
Planejamos todos os detalhes do Maria do Bonjardim para que seja um espaço acolhedor no Porto! E, como nós adoramos viajar, sabemos que o local onde nos hospedamos pode mudar nossa experiência de viagem! Por isso, oferecemos um espaço confortável e bem localizado para você não perder nada do que o Porto tem a oferecer.

Número de licença ou registro: 106484/AL

The space
Nosso estúdio foi totalmente renovado! As grandes janelas dão acesso a uma sacada e trazem muita luz natural. Todos os têxteis e utensílios são novos e cuidados para que se sinta em sua própria casa.

Importante você saber: há uma obra (em fase final) próxima que produz algum ruído entre 8h e 17h. Os mais sensíveis ao barulho podem percebe-lo mesmo com as janelas anti-ruídos fechadas. Nos desculpamos pelo possível incômodo que foge a nossa gestão, mas preferimos que você saiba o que pode encontrar ao chegar. E, sejamos otimistas, é muito bom ver o Porto passando por esse momen
column7: O Maria do Bonjardim está localizado no coração do Porto. Estamos a poucos minutos da Praça dos Aliados, onde acontecem vários eventos ao longo do ano todo, e também próximos de ótimos cafés, bares e restaurantes, além dos bons teatros da cidade.

column14:
Bem-vindo à G|R Suites!

Localizado na parte alta da cidade do Porto, numa zona tranquila, a uma curta distância da avenida dos Aliados, do Rio Douro, Estádio do Dragão e a dois paços de todos os principais destaques culturais da nossa cidade, como monumentos, zonas históricas, restaurantes típicos, locais de divertimento noturno e ainda com excelentes acessos de transportes públicos, como o Metro.

O G|R Suites é constituído por 7 quartos distribuídos por 3 andares, exibidos com uma decoração exclusiva, alguns com vista para o nosso jardim e terraço que foram concebidos para lhe proporcionar o máximo de conforto, comodidade e tranquilidade. O nosso pequeno almoço continental, ambiente acolhedor em cada canto e o nosso emblemático jardim não o deixarão indiferente, fazendo com que se sinta verdadeiramente em sua casa.

Este espaço provem de casa centenária portuense datada em 1968, que foi completamente renovada, mas mantendo a sua essência, por forma a receber os nossos hospedes num ambiente único, simples e acolhedor.

Um espaço único, que recebe até quatro pessoas, graças a uma mezzanine repleta de bom gosto. A partir daqui, poderá conhecer todo o centro histórico do Porto a pé.

Next to the mythical Batalha Cinema, in the historic center of Porto, comes the Cinema House! A unique space, which receives up to four people, thanks to a mezzanine full of taste. From here, you can get to know the entire historic center of Porto on foot.

Junto al mítico cine Batalha, en el centro histórico de Oporto, llega la Cinema House! Un espacio único, que recibe hasta cuatro personas, gracias a un altillo lleno de gustos. Desde aquí, se puede conocer todo el centro histórico de Oporto a pie.

The space

column5: Luxury Romantic apartment with Jacuzzi for 2
column6:
✔ 55m2 Luxury Apartment in an old renewed house from the last century in front of the prestigious Casa da Musica in one of the main avenues of Porto.
✔ Located centrally in Oporto between the beach (3km) and the old city center (3km).
✔ If you are looking for something different, this flat is for you.
✔ Fast Wifi
✔ AC work perfectly
✔ You will have a private garden with 15m2
✔ Fireplace
✔ Private Parking (subject to availability.)
✔ we rent bikes

The space
This Apartment is the result of an architect renovation of a historical building (a real Bourgeois House from the XIX century, completely remodeled in 2019).
It seeks a harmonious blend of the Porto tradition (such as the wooden floor and window frames) with contemporary architecture.
- Stylish and cozy apartment designed by decorators
- Garden View and quiet at night
- Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with all the amenities
- Amenities include
column7:
We are in the new center of Oporto. You will be in the main avenue of the city that connects the sea with the city center in a straight 4km line.
There are many options to eat out very near, from fast to slow, cheap to expensive, meat, fish, Portuguese, italian, Japonese, vegetarian,... a few meters away. Supermarket at 50m.
column14:
I love to travel and have been traveling for all my life. in fact i am fortunate to already have visited more then 50 different countries in 4 continents.
I started with inter-rail, when still in college then once i got a job i went o plan holidays 2 to 3 times a year, and as life progressed and money increased i started to go more far a way...
so anyway, now i can be a host and help other to spend a good time in my town, which is really fun.

column5: Art District - Pop Apartment - Clean & Safe
column6:
O Pop Apartment está situado em pleno Bairro das Artes, na Rua Miguel Bombarda, no Porto, a zona mais efervescente da cidade. Situa-se num edifício de traça antiga, completamente recuperado, e tem todos os confortos necessários (elevador, ar condicionado, TV HD, wi-fi gratuito, cozinha totalmente equipada, máquinas de lavar louça e roupa, etc.). Um espaço verdadeiramente confortável e sossegado , para ser o seu refúgio depois de um dia a explorar a maravilhosa cidade do Porto.

The space
O Pop Apartment fica no 1º andar H e tem acesso por elevador. Tem um quarto com cama de casal e na sala há dois sofás cama (individuais), aos quais se pode acrescentar um berço. É contíguo ao Rock Apartment (1º andar G) e podem ser reservados como uma só unidade, ou seja, recebemos com conforto grupos de 2, 4, 6 ou 8 pessoas.

License number
108648/AL
column7: O Bairro das Artes (Porto Art District) é a zona culturalmente mais dinâmica e criativa  da cidade, onde poderá encontrar galerias de arte, restaurantes, cafés e casas de chá, lojas de roupa alternativa e de música, mercearias biológicas, espaços de co-working, ateliers de design, moda e arquitectura.
column14:
Hi, my name is Pedro and I’m glad to welcome you to Porto, my hometown, and to the Art District, city’s most dynamic area. 
I work with law in the banking sector, but my true passion is indie music, which has led me to be a co-founder of a cooperative promoting live events. 
Pop & Rock Apartments are two adjoining arty apartments, in a refurbished building, right at Rua Miguel Bombarda, just a 10 minutes walking distance from the main attractions and monuments. Decorated with motifs linked to music and full of details of comfort, you will find in them the deserved rest after each day of discoveries. 
Marta and the team of Welcome Services take good care of everything for me and they will do all they can to assure that you have the most pleasant stay in this lovely city! 
Welcome to Porto! Have a great time! :)

column5: Bookshelf Apt by the center with A/C long term
column6:
Stylish and very central 2 bedroom new apartment near Teatro São João for long term rental!
It's inside a historical building from the 40s, that's perfectly located in the area of Batalha, close to everything in downtown, with metro 5 min. away.
Cozy ambiance for a comfortable stay!
Fast Wifi in all areas, equipped kitchen, A/C, washing + dryer machine, 1 double bed and 2 single beds.

The space
Very comfortable and new apartment suitable for max. 6 guests, with:
* One double bed in the main bedroom (1,40m x 1,90m)
* Two single beds in the second bedroom (2x 0,90m x 2,00m) with built-in wardrobe
* Fully equipped kitchen with: toaster, coffee machine, dish-washer, large fridge with freezer, stove, oven, immersion blender, kettle and microwave.
* Eating area: in the living room
* Free wireless internet
* Washing and drying machine in the common area of the building
* Iron and iron board
* LCD TV with cable te
column7:
This apartment is situated in the historical city center of Porto, close to many attractions.
From here you can easily reach:
* supermarket at 2 min. walking distance (100 meters)
* good restaurants around the building
* metro and train station (São Bento) at 5 min. walking distance (500 meters)
* city bus stop and touristic bus stop around the house (to city center, beach/river, other destinations)
* river Douro (Ribeira area) and D. Luis bridge at 650m away (10 min. walking distance)
* beach/sea at 7 km away from here (ideal for swimming, lying on the sun, esplanades, surfing, walking, …)
* Clérigos tower at 800m (10 min.)
* Casa da Música at 3,5 kms away (5 metro stops away)
* big shopping area – Via Catarina and Rua de Santa Catarina (with famous and good brands) at 8 min. walking distance (600 meters)
* Porto airport at 18 km away (you have direct connection with the metro from there to our apartment or we can provide you a d
column14:
I'm 37 and I love to know about other cultures by meeting new people in my beloved city - Porto. 
I have been working in the tourism area for more than 12 years and been also a home host for over 6 years in other properties in Porto. I am happy to help you not only with the accommodation but also with suggestions and tips during your stay. 
I can speak Portuguese, English, German, French and Spanish.
My husband Hugo is my co-host and we're both very happy to welcome you in this wonderful city!

column5: Casa na Praia - Aguda Beach Twin Houses
column6:
Situada em frente à praia, o Aguda Beach Twin Houses dispõe de uma vista privilegiada sobre o mar, oferecendo todas as comodidades para uma agradável estadia.
A poucos metros da estação de comboios da Aguda, permite com facilidade visitar as cidades do Porto ou de Aveiro - a Veneza de Portugal.
Localização perfeita para umas férias numa das melhores praias do norte de Portugal.

License number
112227/AL
column7: Uma zona tranquila na marginal da Aguda, onde pode encontrar bons restaurantes e bares para desfrutar da excelente gastronomia portuguesa, com uma vista privilegiada sobre o mar. Pode também encontrar minimercados, farmácia, padaria/confeitaria, peixaria a poucos metros da casa.

Com bons acessos e todo o conforto necessário para tornar a sua estadia na nossa amada cidade o mais perfeita possível, este apartamento dispõe de ar condicionado, Wifi, televisão com canais por cabo, bem como cozinha equipada e comodidades como champô e gel de banho.

column7:
Os alojamentos Locally Yours ficam perto de tudo.
Em frente ao alojamento depara-se com a Estação Ferroviária de São Bento. Descendo pela Rua das Flores até à Ribeira, passa pelo Palácio da Bolsa, pelo Mercado Ferreira Borges e pela Igreja de São Francisco. Já no cais da Ribeira, pode admirar o rio Douro e a Ponte Luís I, subir pelo Funicular dos Guindais até ao tabuleiro superior da Ponte e visitar a Sé do Porto. A 5 minutos de distância, poderá subir a Torre dos Clérigos e visitar a Livraria Lello. Mais acima, o Jardim do Passeio das Virtudes proporciona uma magnifica vista do pôr do sol sobre o rio Douro. A poucos metros do alojamento, chegamos à Rua de Santa Catarina, onde poderá fazer compras, visitar o Café Magestic e a Capela das Almas. O Mercado do Bolhão, o Teatro S. João, o Teatro Sá da Bandeira, a Igreja dos Congregados ficam a menos de 500 metros de distância.

Near Porto's historical center and 5 minutes from the emblematic Casa da Música, Vila Burgães is inserted in an area with a great offer of restaurants, shops and services, with colleges and hospitals nearby. Vila Burgães arises from the rehabilitation of an old worker island in Porto, now converted into 8 lofts with mezzanine and 2 T1 duplex that develop around a common outdoor patio. In a fusion of the traditional and the contemporary, the architectural design of Vila Burgães favors functionality and the careful choice of materials and finishes of excellence.

The space
Vila Burgães - Casa 3 is comprised of the following:
-A double sized bed and comfortable linen.
-A living area with a sofa for you to kick back and relax. The TV isn't functional yet but there's a hotspot modem that provides free Wi-Fi.

column6:
Apartamento T1, situado no rés do chão frente do edifício, dispõe de 1 quarto com 1 cama de casal, 1 casa de banho, uma cozinha equipada aberta para a sala de estar. Com uma decoração contemporânea e confortável, o Tawny mantém uma parede de pedra original. Ideal para famílias que desejem reservar vários apartamentos no mesmo prédio, ou para casais com filhos, a uma curta distância dos principais pontos de interesse da cidade.

License number
110780/AL
column7: Se procura conhecer a cidade mas longe da confusão, o Tawny é o apartamento ideal para si. Um prédio requalificado em meados de 2018 para Alojamento Local, com apenas seis apartamentos, a dois minutos a pé da estação de Metro "Marquês". Em menos de 5 minutos estará bem no coração da cidade "Aliados" e poderá conhecer o seu centro histórico.

column6:
91683/AL

The space
Cosy apartment, well decorated and recently renovated with a strategical location near the city centre located in an urban area, quiet and with a family atmosphere.

Apartment with one bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, a spacious living room and free parking in front of the building (on the street).

The apartment is a 5-minute walk from "Casa da Música" metro station that will take you wherever you need, including to the historical centre in 4 minutes (3 metro stops). If you prefer, you can have a walk through Rua de Cedofeita - one of the most famous streets of Porto and discover art galleries, nightlife (Galerias Paris), Main Avenue (Aliados), the Ribeira area with the famous D. Luís I Bridge and the Oporto wine cellars. Also, the modern "Casa da Música" or "Rotunda da Boavista" is just a 8-minute walk from the apartment.

Stay safe, be happy!

Guest access
Gu
column7:
The neighbourhood is incredibly central and only a few minutes from the main avenues in Porto. It is safe and very quiet allowing you to walk easily to all the main hot spots, it's also a close distance to public transport I.e bus, taxi, metro stations should you need them.
Given the privileged location, you would be within walking distance of pharmacy open 24h/day, parking, supermarket, shopping centre, restaurants, cafes, bakeries, bookstores, traditional shops ...
column14:
Hi everyone!!! I´m Filipe, i like travelling and meet other people from around the world! As a geologist, i love valleys, tall mountains, beautiful landscapes and everything related to nature. Yeah, i also love peace, freedom, friendship, joy, passion, happiness... life!!! Hope i can contribute with something good to have a pleasant stay in Porto.
Feel welcome and cherished in my home... after all it´s Lip´s Friendship Shelter!

column7:
The building, recently renovated, is located in the Vitória Street, in the historic city center, listed by UNESCO and surrounded by some of the most iconic monuments, such as “Torre dos Clérigos”, “ Livraria Lello”, “ Estação de S. Bento” and the “ Sé Catedral”. The street at night and weekends is very quiet and peaceful. During the woorking hours it is a busy street, so it can be noisy.
There are good quality restaurants, cafés and bars nearby, if you wish to eat out. The apartment is perfectly located for those who want to know the city center on foot.

column6:
**Covid 19: If you are concerned about the coronavirus pandemic, rest assured that our cleaning teams are equipped to properly disinfect each apartment between stays. LovelyStay will also be flexible in case you need to reschedule or even cancel your booking with us. Stay safe!**

____________Stunning views___________
In this newly decorated 1-bedroom apartment, you will wake up every day with stunning, bright views of the Palacio da Bolsa. Henrique and the river.

____________Centrally Located and Ideally Placed next to public transport___________
You can then walk a minute down the hill and be directly on the waterfront shops and restaurants of Ribeiral. If you want to see more of city, you are right next to several major bus stops or 600m away from the São Bento metro station that can whisk you away to other parts of the city.

_______________________________ Accommodation_______________________________
Sufficient space for 1-4 people
column7:
The apartment is located on one of the liveliest streets of Porto, right in the heart of the city. The neighborhood is also very safe and is closely located to every iconic landmark of the city.
There are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop can be found here.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto

column6:
Apartamento studio com um quarto situado num primeiro andar sem elevador, com varanda frontal. Localiza-se no coração da Baixa do Porto, em frente à emblemática estação de São Bento. Com bons acessos e todo o conforto necessário para tornar a sua estadia na nossa amada cidade o mais perfeita possível, este apartamento dispõe de ar condicionado, Wifi, televisão com canais por cabo, bem como cozinha equipada e comodidades como champô e gel de banho.

The space
Localizado num edifício de talha antiga mas remodelado para permitir o conforto dos edifícios modernos, este apartamento é amplo e espaçoso e fica localizado no centro do Porto, com excelentes acessos e todo o tipo de comércio à volta

Guest access
Apartamento inteiro

License number
110778/AL
column7:
Os alojamentos Locally Yours ficam perto de tudo.
Em frente ao alojamento depara-se com a Estação Ferroviária de São Bento. Descendo pela Rua das Flores até à Ribeira, passa pelo Palácio da Bolsa, pelo Mercado Ferreira Borges e pela Igreja de São Francisco. Já no cais da Ribeira, pode admirar o rio Douro e a Ponte Luís I, subir pelo Funicular dos Guindais até ao tabuleiro superior da Ponte e visitar a Sé do Porto. A 5 minutos de distância, poderá subir a Torre dos Clérigos e visitar a Livraria Lello. Mais acima, o Jardim do Passeio das Virtudes proporciona uma magnifica vista do pôr do sol sobre o rio Douro. A poucos metros do alojamento, chegamos à Rua de Santa Catarina, onde poderá fazer compras, visitar o Café Magestic e a Capela das Almas. O Mercado do Bolhão, o Teatro S. João, o Teatro Sá da Bandeira, a Igreja dos Congregados ficam a menos de 500 metros de distância.

column6:
The privileged location of Souto Apartments offers a unique opportunity to get to know the city and experience a popular culture of a Porto neighborhood, living closely its customs and traditions.

The apartment has a fully equipped kitchenette with oven, refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, coffee machine; a seating and dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, air conditioning and free wi-fi; it also includes a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer, towels and bed linen.

The space
Our concept of accommodation is part of the typical hospitality of the city.

Given the recognized historical character of the area in which it is inserted, the building, previously in ruins, has been completely restored maintaining its original volumetry, style, scale, materials and colours. It has a traditional architectural character, being integrated in the various surrounding facades, keeping wooden beams between the four floors, part of the facade
column7:
Souto Apartments, on Rua do Souto, is located in a central and privileged area of the city classified as World Heritage by UNESCO. The first references to this street date back to 1234 and is considered to be one of the oldest and longest arteries in the old city of Porto.

Situated just a few steps from the most emblematic points of the city, it is an excellent choice for enthusiasts interested in exploring the historic center on foot and visiting the secular buildings and monuments dominated by the Romanesque, Gothic and Baroque styles.

You have a fantastic view of the Foz Castel, the Douro River and the Ocean. See the place where the Douro River meets the Atlantic from our window.
The house has a beautiful and stylish decoration with a lot of art works.
The house is equiped with fast internet conection, cable-TV, washing machine and dryer, wine-cooler,private garage and an outdoor terrace.

column6:
Located in the heart of Porto, this 2BR Flat w/ AC in Duque de Loulé is close to all the main points of historical and touristic interest. Fully-equipped, comfortable and brand new, you will certainly be able to relax and unwind during your stay in our UNESCO World Heritage City. To top it off, the train and metro stations are located just a 10-minute walk away and this street is only 2 minutes away from Sta Catarina street and Aliados Avenue. We are certain you will enjoy your stay at our apartment which .... shhh... is right around the corner from all the typical street food restaurants!

column7:
This apartment is located in St. Ildefonso, which is a neighborhood situated right above the Fontaínhas. There are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop can be found here.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends travelling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
-Aliados Avenue
-Tower and Church of Clérigos
-Lello bookstore
-São Bento train station: typical portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
-S. Francisco Church
-Dom Luís I Bridge: an iconic symbol of Porto
-Galerias de Paris: a popular night spot, often frequented by locals.
-Majestic Café: The most historical café in Porto
-Rua de Santa Catarina: a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants and cafés.
-Guindais Funicular
-Port Wine cellars: situ

column5: Central room and free port wine tour and tasting
column6:
"Quarto grande com vistas desafogadas no coração do Porto, a 5 minutos da praça principal, Avenida dos Aliados, e da estação de metro Trindade! Muito confortável , aconchegante e sem barulho. Está próximo de bares restaurantes, pastelarias, supermercados. Dada a perfeita localização do apartamento os hóspedes quase não precisam de usar transportes públicos. Todos os hóspedes recebem uma visita e degustação de vinho gratuitas numa das caves do vinho do Porto, pelo que poupam 12 euros por pessoa.

License number
112543/AL
column14:
Hello! My name is Jorge and together with my girlfriend Dorota,  an "Airbnb superhost", we are renting 3 rooms in the center of Porto. We love to travel, to read books, to go to the theatre and to eat good food and drink good wine. 

What are the main advantages of chosing our rooms? 

- We really like meeting our guests! During the check-in we show you all the hidden gems of our city on the map, so you can use your time in Porto to the fullest. We always try to meet our guests in person, but if that is not possible, you do not have to worry! You will not miss on our tips: we will send you our "OFF THE BEATEN PATH" guide, so you know all the amazing, hidden spots. We believe Porto has so much more to discover and so many people just scratch its surface. This is why we want to share with you our insights on the city, so you can have a totally different and more genuine experience than most of the tourist.

- We offer all the guests a free visit and tasting at one of the oldest port wine cellars. Port wine cellars are one of the places you have to see in Porto, but since they are a popular tourist attraction you always have to purchase a ticket that is normally between 10 and 30 euros a person, depending on the wines you decide to try. Since our friend is the manager of one of the most famous wine cellars in the city, all our guests can have a VISIT AND A TASTING OF TWO WINES ABSOLUTELY FOR FREE!
column28: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

column5: Pleasant Design Room 3 in Downtown Porto
column6:
Minimalist designer apartment in a boutique hotel located in the centre of Porto within walking distance of all the cities main attractions!

The space
Welcome to our place!

This beautifully renovated traditional Porto style building has been converted into boutique designer apartments and rooms especially for tourists and guests to the city.

Embracing minimalism, the design focus of this property is creating the optimal guest experience. Maintaining all of the original charm of the historic building. Upgraded with a touch of class and luxury. Including a comfortable memory foam mattress, high-speed cable internet and a walk-in power shower.

Just a few moments stroll from the stunning Unesco world heritage old town, riverfront and many local restaurants. This is the ideal place for your stay in Porto.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire home!

Other things to note
Please

column5: Private House with Pool, terrace and 5 rooms
column6:
Charming historic building with 5 studios, living room/library, and a pool, designed to welcome you inside one of the most picturesque neighborhoods in Porto. Steps away from Fine Arts School and Coliseu do Porto you will be staying in the heart of the city besides locals and art students.

The space
Casa da Praça is a typical Porto house from the XIX century that was fully renovated and hides in its backyard a lovely terrace with a pool.
The house has 5 independent studios that are themed decorated around travel, sports, aircraft, and naval vintage memorabilia. All studios are equipped with a little kitchen ready to prepare simple meals, a complete bathroom, a dining/working table, and a big comfy bed (160x200).
For 4 of the guests, we provide a folding bed, suitable for children and teenagers. This bed will be placed next to the double bed.
We will be happy to show you all the special features of the house as well as provide you insider tips on
column7:
Located in front of a lovely square where you can find Maria that everyday sells their fresh vegetables. Near of one of the bridges that crosses the Douro river, from there you have one of the best views of the famous D. Luis bridge. The neighborhood is quiet and traditional, but steps away from the busy and lively Coliseu do Porto and Santa Catarina area (Majestic Cafe). There is an amazing mix between art students and locals, Loads of cool shops, nice restaurants, and artsy cafes
Every 23rd June it's time to celebrate the city festivities of S. João, expect to be in the center of the party filled with loads of music and sardines.

Near Porto's historical center and 5 minutes from the emblematic Casa da Música, Vila Burgães is inserted in an area with a great offer of restaurants, shops and services, with colleges and hospitals nearby. Vila Burgães arises from the rehabilitation of an old worker island in Porto, now converted into 8 lofts with mezzanine and 2 T1 duplex that develop around a common outdoor patio. Apartment in the center of Porto, a few meters from the Bolhão market, important historical monuments and varied points of traditional trade and services.

Rua de Santa Catarina (the city's main shopping street) is just a 5-minute walk away. Have the perfect stay in the heart of the city and enjoy the best that the city has to offer, without having to resort to transport.

The space
The apartment is on the 1st floor of a building without a lift, has a modern decor, all rooms are large and with natural lighting.

The bedroom is spacious, has a double bed, blackout curtains, a private balcony facing Fernandes Tomás street, heating and a bathroom with shower, towel dryer and washbasin.

Between the bedroom and the living room there is a corridor with a short flight of stairs and a bathroom with washbasin and toilet. Next to the entrance there is a laundry room with a washing machine, clothes line and iron.

column7:

column14:
Somos uma empresa especializada na gestão de alojamento local. Tratamos cada propriedade como se fosse nossa, porque queremos que os hóspedes se sintam em casa – acreditamos que só assim faz sentido!

Como bons portuenses, somos excelentes anfitriões e sugerimos dicas especiais para que os nossos convidados possam aproveitar a estadia ao máximo, desde visitas a museus aos restaurantes imperdíveis. Partilhamos segredos que fazem do Porto uma cidade mágica. 

Aos proprietários, e nossos parceiros nesta aventura, prometemos experiência, conhecimento e dedicação, com o objetivo de rentabilizar ao máximo cada propriedade. 

We are a company that specialises in managing short term rental properties in Porto, Portugal.

We take care of our managed properties as if they were our own because we want our guests to feel at home and not have to worry about anything when they visit.
 
Just like the inhabitants of Porto, we are friendly hosts and can provide tips for our guests to make the most of their stay. We can recommend museums, restaurants, bars and can provide suggestions on alternative things to do (river cruises, football matches, etc...) As long term residents of the city we can share those hidden gems that make Porto such a magical city.
 
For home owners and potential business partners, we promise a professional service, expertise and dedication that will help you to maximise your returns.
Home Me – Making You Feel Good

The space
This studio features facilities such as a balcony, free Wi-Fi, a well-equipped kitchen and air conditioning.

The building was completely renovated in 2019 and has an elevator from the 1st floor. The studio is located on the 2nd floor and has two large windows with access to the balcony, receiving plenty of natural light.

Kitchen equipped with basic utensils necessary for your stay, microwave oven, stove, dishwasher, washing machine, fridge and freezer, extractor hood, electric kettle, coffee machine, among other.

In the entrance hall of the apartment there is a closet where you can store your items. You will find an iron, ironing board, va
column7:
Nearby you can find Livello Lello (6 minutes on foot), Torre dos Cérigos (5 minutes on foot), the viewpoint and Jardim das Virtudes (3 minutes on foot), among many other points of interest.

Within a 10-minute walk, you will find Avenida dos Aliados and S. Bento station, where one of the city's architectural ex-libris (the work of Porto architect José Marques da Silva) and the interface of various means of transport (trains, buses and metro).

From this location, you can take historic walks throughout the city (from the city's medieval routes to the romantic paths). Do not know where to start? Don't worry, we have suggestions for you!
column14:
Somos uma empresa especializada na gestão de alojamento local. Tratamos cada propriedade como se fosse nossa, porque queremos que os hóspedes se sintam em casa – acreditamos que só assim faz sentido!

Como bons portuenses, somos excelentes anfitriões e sugerimos dicas especiais para que os nossos convidados possam aproveitar a estadia ao máximo, desde visitas a museus aos restaurantes imperdíveis. Partilhamos segredos que fazem do Porto uma cidade mágica. 

Aos proprietários, e nossos parceiros nesta aventura, prometemos experiência, conhecimento e dedicação, com o objetivo de rentabilizar ao máximo cada propriedade. 

We are a company that specialises in managing short term rental properties in Porto, Portugal.

We take care of our managed properties as if they were our own because we want our guests to feel at home and not have to worry about anything when they visit.
 
Just like the inhabitants of Porto, we are friendly hosts and can provide tips for our guests to make the most of their stay. We can recommend museums, restaurants, bars and can provide suggestions on alternative things to do (river cruises, football matches, etc...) As long term residents of the city we can share those hidden gems that make Porto such a magical city.
 
For home owners and potential business partners, we promise a professional service, expertise and dedication that will help you to maximise your returns.
Home Me – Making You Feel Good

column6:
Se aprecia a calma e o sossego no meio da cidade, este é o apartamento perfeito para a sua estadia na cidade do Porto.

Localizado na zona centro, junto à Câmara Municipal, este apartamento faz parte de um edifício típico, totalmente renovado em 2020. As zonas comuns incluem amplos espaços verdes, corredores largos e uma piscina exterior com deck de madeira e árvores de fruto e jardim. Wi-Fi gratuito, cozinha equipada e ar condicionado.

Venha conhecer o segredo do Porto!

The space
O apartamento T1 fica no rés-do-chão de um edifício com elevador. Tem um quarto com um armário espaçoso para guardar os seus itens pessoais, uma cama de casal confortável, roupa de cama em algodão, almofadas, edredão e manta, uma TV e mesa de cabeceira.

A sala de estar tem um ar condicionado, sofá e TV, uma kitchenette equipada com máquina de lavar a roupa, utensílios de cozinha, forno microondas, máquina de café.

column7:

Usufrua do melhor que oferece a cidade sem recorrer a transportes.

column6:
Modern apartment with balcony in the heart of Porto, in Sé neighborhood, that offers a tranquil residential vibe alongside quick, easy access to the downtown areas. You’ll find a great variety of restaurants, cafes, shops and all famous landmarks to visit with a small walking distances. Spend your days in Porto in the comfort and tranquility of this contemporary apartment. > From the airport: ~40 min - direct line to Bolhão > São Bento metro / train station: 7 min walk

The space
This one bedroom apartment has the capacity for 2 guests, with a fully equipped kitchen and comfy living room. The apartment is on the 1st floor of a 19th century building in a very friendly quiet street with a small chapel on the corner - Capela dos Alfaites. There is an electrical heater in the bedroom and one the living room, to keep the apartment warm and cozy. We have carefully prepared the apartment to make you feel comfortable and at home, so you can totally relax when you retu
column7: The Tiles Apartment sits in Sé, the oldest and one of the most genuine neighborhoods of the town, dating back to medieval times. Next to the lively Praça da Batalha and Santa Catarina comercial street, Ribeira neighborhood and Douro River - the location is perfect to discover the historic, cultural and cosmopolitan sides of Porto, feeling the strong character of this singular city and its welcoming people.  Some popular landmarks: - Sé do Porto / Porto Cathedral: 400 m – 6 min walk - Estação de São Bento / São Bento Train Station: 600 m – 8 min walk - Palácio da Bolsa: 900 m – 14 min walk - Igreja de São Francisco / São Francisco Church: 1 km – 15 min walk - Ribeira e Rio Douro / Ribeira and Douro River: 800 m – 15 min walk - Ponte D. Luís I / D. column5: Central room and a free wine tour at port cellars
column6:
Quarto grande com vistas desafogadas no coração do Porto, a 5 minutos da praça principal, Avenida dos Aliados, e da estação de metro Trindade! Muito confortável, aconchegante e sem barulho. Está próximo de bares restaurantes, pastelarias, supermercados. Dada a perfeita localização do apartamento os hóspedes quase não precisam de usar transportes públicos.

Todos os hóspedes recebem uma visita e degustação de vinho gratuitas numa das caves do vinho do Porto, pelo que poupam 12 euros por pessoa.

License number
112543/AL
column14:
Hello! My name is Jorge and together with my girlfriend Dorota,  an "Airbnb superhost", we are renting 3 rooms in the center of Porto. We love to travel, to read books, to go to the theatre and to eat good food and drink good wine. 

What are the main advantages of chosing our rooms? 

- We really like meeting our guests! During the check-in we show you all the hidden gems of our city on the map, so you can use your time in Porto to the fullest. We always try to meet our guests in person, but if that is not possible, you do not have to worry! You will not miss on our tips: we will send you our "OFF THE BEATEN PATH" guide, so you know all the amazing, hidden spots. We believe Porto has so much more to discover and so many people just scratch its surface. This is why we want to share with you our insights on the city, so you can have a totally different and more genuine experience than most of the tourist.

- We offer all the guests a free visit and tasting at one of the oldest port wine cellars. Port wine cellars are one of the places you have to see in Porto, but since they are a popular tourist attraction you always have to purchase a ticket that is normally between 10 and 30 euros a person, depending on the wines you decide to try. Since our friend is the manager of one of the most famous wine cellars in the city, all our guests can have a VISIT AND A TASTING OF TWO WINES ABSOLUTELY FOR FREE!

The space

- Bed linen, towels and kitchen utensils are provided, as well as crockery and cutlery

column7:
Even after the sun sets, there are good reasons for you to stay at Rua do Almada where you will be able to find cocktail bars and live music.
But, if you wish to know the nightlife in “Baixa”, you just have to follow down the street. Either you turn right to find Rua da Picaria (kind of Almada’s twin), or Rua Cândido do Reis, or you choose to go towards the river (either trough Largo dos Lóios and Rua das Flores or through Estação de S. Bento), everywere you will follow you will meet the features that have made Porto a privileged destination: amazing sites, fantastic food, nice people.

column7:
Getting around
This apartment is under a 5 minute walk from Trindade metro station. Also pretty close is Aliados metro station as well as S. Bento railway station. But you can find almost anything you can remember within a 10 minutes walking distance! Restaurants (from all kinds you can imagine - from exotic food to midnight snacks), historical sites and buildings, the Douro river, shopping centres and fancy shops (traditional and avant-garde, vintage and contemporary, design, clothing, pastry…). For your daily needs, everything is also close by: coffee shops, supermarkets, the post office… And, in case it’s needed, there are pharmacies and even several hospitals nearby. Although Porto is considered to be a safe city, it’s always good to know that Police headquarters are right down the street.

Located in one of the perpendicular streets of the Aliados' Avenue, that is to say in the center of Porto, this vintage apartment will offer you all the conveniences for your holidays or your professional stay.

The space
This vintage apartment will offer you the perfect conditions for your holidays, whatever their nature: historic (50 meters from the University and 10 minutes walk from the Douro), artistic (300 meters from the Rue Miguel Bombarda), culinary (the street of Ceuta is perpendicular to the streets of Almada and Picaria), idleness (to 200 meters of the Station São Bento which serves all the beaches of the coast) or nocturnal (to 100 meters of the Night Spot). Due to its location, it is easily accessible by metro, bus, car and train.
It is also extremely quiet since it is located on the back part of the building.

column6:
Apartamento nuevo, muy cómodo y con encanto en edificio totalmente reformado. Muy cerca de los principales monumentos y lugares de interés, transporte, supermercados, parking ...
Nuestro barrio es tradicional y animado, muy "trendy" lleno de magníficos restaurantes, tiendas vintage, excelentes cafés y lugares para el brunch.

The space
Encantador apartamento en el 3er piso (sin ascensor):
1. Cómodo salón con comedor y cocina, y baño, en la planta baja.
2. Habitación en el "mezzanine", en el piso superior, accesible por escaleras.
3. Delicioso balcón frente a los tejados en la parte trasera del edificio. Aquí encontrarás 2 rincones agradables para relajarte.
4. Cocina equipada con todo lo necesario para cocinar: vitrocerâmica de 2 fuegos, microondas / horno, lavavajillas (y detergente), tostadora, hervidor eléctrico, frigorífico.
5. Café, azúcar, té, aceite de oliva virgen extra, vinagre, sal y pimienta. También hay disponibles product
column7:
¡Estamos en el corazón de la ciudad y es el lugar más interesante para estar!
A 5 minutos a pie podrás explorar todo tipo de restaurantes, desde los más típicos hasta los más sofisticados. Los cafés más variados - cafés especiales, tortitas, con brunch, comida orgánica ... galerías de arte, tiendas vintage ... y todo a poca distancia de Torre dos Clérigos y Livraria Lello.
Hay una panadería, farmacia, supermercado también a 5 minutos a pie.
column14:
I was born and raised in Porto and I feel really lucky to live in this charming city! I also love travelling, meeting people from all over the world, and good food; Porto is full of amazing places to eat, and to go out for dining is ore of my favourite things.

column6:
Domus Duorum is a century-old house whose peculiar architecture tells a little about the history of Porto. You can easily reach the most popular places by metro, bus or on foot in a few minutes.
Here you will find a carefully decorated, private bathroom and all the comfort amenities you are looking for for your stay.
A buffet breakfast is served every morning.
You will also have at your disposal common areas, such as a dining room, a TV room and a patio to relax.

The space
Domus Duorum is located in a privileged area of ​​Porto, Boavista. Here, you are in the central point of the city, on one side the city center (Baixa) and on the other side the Atlantic Ocean.
The house is located in an old working-class neighborhood, characteristic of the city, which is called "island". The place is very quiet although it is so close to the center (Baixa). The construction dates from 1891, a time when the materials used were mostly natural, such as stone an
column7: This neighborhood is an "island", a typical neighborhood in Porto, very common in the city during the 19th and mid 20th centuries. The neighborhood consists of nine houses and is very quiet, with most residents already in a reasonably advanced age range. Everyone lives with affability and respect.

Camping Istas’ Garden is a friendly and relaxing campsite, located 2 km from the beach and 8 km from Porto. All pitches have access to water, electricity, a barbecue area, a fully equipped kitchen, a living room and a heated and salted indoor pool.
We’ll be waiting for your visit.
This is a private and small campsite, we may not have a free pitch or we may not be here to welcome you.

The space
Istas’ Garden is located 2 km from the sea and 8 km from the city of Porto. It’s a site near the city but, at the same time, it’s peaceful, small and relaxing. It’s surrounded by nature and allows visitors to go for a walk or ride with a bike.

Guest access

2 adults (+ 2 children )

column5: Lovely Spacious Apartment with shared Garden
column6:
Apartamento com Jardim partilhado, quarto privado e sofá cama, combinando equipamentos modernos e mobiliários de estilo retro. A 10 minutos a Pé da Rua de Santa Catarina e a 800 metros do Mercado do Bolhão. Estação de Metro Campo 24 de Agosto a 200m e ligação direta para Aeroporto e estação de comboio de Campanhã. Neste apartamento podem ficar confortavelmente até 3 pessoas (cama casal + sofá cama) com WiFi gratuito em toda a unidade.

The space
O Apartamento com Jardim do Bonfim 234 Townhouse está inserido num edifício remodelado dos anos 50, situado no Porto, com uma excelente localização e ligação aos principais pontos da cidade.
Este apartamento com 38m2 elegantemente decorado, com um quarto com cama de casal, cozinha kitchenette, ar condicionado, sala com sofá cama, conexão wi-fi e tv a cabo e onde com toda a privacidade pode descansar ao final do dia e usufruir de uma relaxante leitura no jardim ao som de um disco de vinil que pode retirar dos nossos
column7:
Criada na segunda metade do século XIX, a Freguesia do Bonfim nasceu do surgimento de inúmeras fabricas e manufaturas, sendo a mais recente freguesia do Porto e a que mais cresceu na 2ª metade do sec XIX.

No século XX começam a surgir os palacetes com os seus belos azulejos, que abrigavam a Burguesia portuense e casas de funcionários das fábricas. É na Rua do Bonfim, nº 234, um prédio dos anos 50 que hoje dá lugar ao Bonfim 234 Townhouse.

A área do Bonfim está a tornar-se numa área moderna onde tem surgido novos projetos entre galerias de artes, cafés, companhias de teatro. Uma zona propicia a deliciosos passeios pelas suas ruas repletas de edifícios históricos de onde sobressaem os seus azulejos.

De nomear espaços como o café Mesa 325, o Pão Nosso com o seu pão orgânico delicioso, o Mira Forum com a sua galeria de Arte, os cocktail do Terraplana ou os pratos do Chef Pedro Limão onde pode degustar uma aventura de sabores.

column6:
COVID-19 - "Clean & Safe" + “Safe Travels” apartments!

Turismo de Portugal & World Travel & Tourism Council (WTTC) have distinguished us with the "Clean & Safe" and “Safe Travels” seals respectively, reflecting all our efforts on providing a safe work environment as well as presenting our apartments in pristine conditions. From the housekeeping / laundry to the welcoming of each guest we have implemented specific qualification and are complying with all the regulations and recommendations from both DGS (National Health Authorities) and WHO (World Health Organisation).

We have a COVID-19 kit at your disposal upon check-in:
- Pair of surgical masks
- Pair of gloves
- Hands disinfectant
- Surfaces disinfectant
- Single paper wipes

Your well-being is our priority!

NOTE: We are providing full refund 1 day prior to arrival.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
column7:
The apartment is located in Foz, a very prestigious, safe and calm neighborhood and home to the Atlantic Ocean. It is ideal for those who seek a quite area in a lively city and also take advantage of the amazing Sea, just across the street and the river, a few minutes walking. In case you want to head Downtown, BUS 500 is just in front of our building and it will take you directly to the heart of town within 20min. Moreover, that same BUS, will take you to Matosinhos (the opposite route) where you can find the best fish and seafood restaurants in town in about 10min.

You can take a walk down the avenue (Avenida Brasil and Avenida Montevideu) until you reach the City Park (largest in Portugal) or head towards the river mouth, both options are just a few minutes walking up and down. Very close to us there is also the World Famous Serralves Museum and its lavish gardens!! In case you are travelling by car, just drive in and out from the garage and head towards your destination.
column28: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

column5: Sunny Bright Duplex & Pool by Host Wise
column6:
Live like a local in the heart of Gaia.

Located in the center of town, next to the Cais de Gaia and General Torres metro station (500m), this incredible flat is ideal for you! It will provide you a great environment to relax and discover the city. It has a terrace and swimming pool!

We are a passionate team in Porto, always excited to welcome amazing people from all over the world. We are always available and eager to give you the best tips to discover the city.

The space
You'll have everything ready to make sure you have a comfortable stay.

The elegant space, has lots of light and accomodates 4 guests. It has a queen size bed and a pull-out couch so there will be a place for all to enjoy a lovely night of sleep. It is perfect for little groups and families.

The chef's worthy kitchen is amazing, fully equipped, and waiting for your attempts at cooking the local delicacies. The bathroom will be waiting for you after a l
column7:
You will be a few minutes away from Cais de Gaia and Jardim do Morro where you can see the best sunset of the city.

It is 100 m "Lagoa Azul", 500 m "World of Wine", 500 m from the train station "Estação General Torres", 500 m "Estação General Torres", 500 m "Douro", 1 km from the supermarket "Pingo Doce Avenida da Republica ", 13 km from the sandy beach" Praia do Homem do Leme ", 15 km from the airport" Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport "and located in a residential area and in the urban center.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Gaia 1 - Your Best Option for Leisure & Business
column6:
Fantastic apartment, located in a quiet area and a few steps from the commercial area of ​​Vila Nova de Gaia, El Corte Inglês and the João de Deus Metro station.

Ideal for couples with or without children and executives coming to the region, for leisure or work.

Modern, airy and fully equipped, this apartment will make you feel at home.

Free private parking on site.

The space
1st floor apartment with elevator.

Very comfortable and equipped with everything you need for a wonderful stay.

It has 01 suite with double bed, 01 room with single bed and sofa bed in the living room for 2 people.

Bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen and balcony

The cleaning of the apartments follows the “Safe & Clean” certification protocol to guarantee all risk reduction processes for Covid-19

Guest access
Entire apartment and garage

Other things to note
Suppo
column7:
Vila Nova de Gaia is the municipality of the district of Porto where one of the most important Portuguese products is kept, Port Wine.

Next to the apartment are the main cellars of this wine, the Spanish warehouse El Corte Inglés, the famous Jardim do Morro with a magnificent view over the Douro River and the historic center of Porto.

There are numerous bakeries, restaurants, pharmacies, shops and supermarkets in the apartment complex.
column13: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

column6:
This brand new designer decorated apartment located just 10 minutes walking of Batalha Square is the best choice for your vacations in Porto!
One of Porto's best panoramic views - Alameda das Fontainhas - is a 5-minute walk away. Metro Heroismo is around 10 minutes from the apartment door. Restaurants, supermarkets, taxis and other means of transport (Campanhã and São Bento station around 15 minutes), are also close as well as Praça dos Poveiros - restaurant area - 10 minutes walking distance.

The space
The apartment is fully furnished, decorated and equipped. The design and functional decoration give the apartment the feeling of being at home. Kitchen and bathroom are equipped with everything you need. All sheets and towels are provided as well as amenities for the first days such as shower gel, shampoo and toilet paper. Cable TV and Wi-Fi are available free of charge in the apartment.
A double bed and a sofa bed for two gives the apartment the capacit
column7:
Either a group of friends or a family can be accommodated and can enjoy the most of Porto as this apartment is near one of the most important squares in Porto, Praça da Batalha.
If you are coming by car, do not worry, in this street the parking is not paid, and it is usual to have free parking lots!
column14:
Hi world, my name is João Figueira, founder of Meet Your Host - Local Accomodation, I am 34 years old, and counting too fast...! I was born and grew up in a small town in Alentejo region, at the age of 16, moved to Lisboa to continue my studies in Service Management.

Since I've moved to this magical city I have been collecting professional experiences, from transportation to sales, and am currently working as operations and host manager for short term rentals, what I actually love to do!

During my journey I have lived in three different locations in Portugal, from South to the North, and had a short international experience in London (6 months), which brought me fluency in English and Spanish. My favorite hobbies include several things, but what I really love to do is; travel, sports, food and spend quality time with my family and friends.

As a local and host (full time job), I look forward to connect with people traveling to Porto, aiming to provide a 5 star experience in this beautiful city  :)

column5: PortoTem 001 - Cozy Studio w/ AC Downtown
column6:
**Covid 19: If you are concerned about the coronavirus pandemic, rest assured that our cleaning teams are equipped to properly disinfect each apartment between stays and this flat has self-check in, meaning you don't physically interact with anyone. LovelyStay will also be flexible in case you need to reschedule or even cancel your booking with us. Stay safe!**

Bright, spacious and beautifully decorated, this studio apartment is located on the iconic Rua Santa Catarina in the heart of the city! Perfectly suited to accommodate up to 2 people, the apartment is perfect for couples on a romantic getaway, or best friends hoping to explore our beautiful city together! It's located in an area known for its shops, restaurants, and cultural spots, such as Coliseu do Porto, Teatro Rivoli and Majestic Café. It is also at walking distance to Torre dos Clérigos, the famous Livraria Lello, Sé and Ribeira. Book now and make this your vacation home!

The space
Located
column7:
Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
- Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants, and cafés.
- Guindais Funicular
- Port Wine cellars - situated in Gaia, on the other side of the bridge!

column6:
Casa térrea, localizada numa zona muito tranquila, com um grande espaço exterior onde poderá desfrutar da piscina e de belas árvores de fruto. Pode, ainda, usufruir de um espaço de jogo.
Situada na Estação Litoral da Aguda, a propriedade encontra-se a uns escassos 10 minutos a pé da praia e a cerca de 12 km da centro do Porto, tendo a estação de comboio a 5 minutos de distância.
O aeroporto mais próximo é o de Francisco Sá Carneiro (20 km).

License number
54162/2019

column5: Villa With Barbecue & AC - 5min Porto City Center
column6:
This typical Portuense Villa has a wonderful terrace with barbecue for socializing with your family or friends. In addition to air conditioning throughout the accommodation, despite its classic decor, there is a modern kitchen.
A 5-minute drive from Ponte do Infante, the distance to Porto is short. It is a place of easy and quick access, with plenty of parking available (and free) on the street. El Corte Inglés is located a 4-minute drive away.

The space
The apartment is fully furnished, decorated and equipped. The design and functional decoration give the apartment the feeling of being at home. Kitchen and bathroom are equipped with everything you need. All sheets and towels are provided as well as amenities for the first days such as shower gel, shampoo and toilet paper. Cable TV and Wi-Fi are available free of charge in the apartment.
Two bedrooms, one with a double bed, one with two single beds and a sofa bed for two gives the apartment the capacity
column14:
Hi world, my name is João Figueira, founder of Meet Your Host - Local Accomodation, I am 34 years old, and counting too fast...! I was born and grew up in a small town in Alentejo region, at the age of 16, moved to Lisboa to continue my studies in Service Management.

Since I've moved to this magical city I have been collecting professional experiences, from transportation to sales, and am currently working as operations and host manager for short term rentals, what I actually love to do!

During my journey I have lived in three different locations in Portugal, from South to the North, and had a short international experience in London (6 months), which brought me fluency in English and Spanish. My favorite hobbies include several things, but what I really love to do is; travel, sports, food and spend quality time with my family and friends.

As a local and host (full time job), I look forward to connect with people traveling to Porto, aiming to provide a 5 star experience in this beautiful city  :)

column5: Cool Flat | City Center near Aliados
column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Porto.

You’ll find a cozy flat with Free Wifi to make you feel Porto’s life. It’s located near public transports and in Trindade to provide you a great atmosphere.

It is the best option for families who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer and have marvelous moments and adventures.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
You will stay in a bright and cozy flat with the best location in the city.

You have 3 beds to have a great night of sleep, an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city and a modern living room to have marvelous moments.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country.

Do you have a lot of luggage? Do not worry, you do not need to climb up the stairs, you have a lift to help yo
column7:
The neighborhood is quiet, enabling a good night's rest, during the day is full of life with all the transport and supermarkets in the area.

There is even a cafe at the door where you can have a good breakfast and a supermarket to buy whatever you need.

It is only 600m from Rua de Santa Catarina for shopping and 750m from the Aliados.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

column6:
Set in peaceful Miragaia and close to the stunning Duoro River, this is the ideal home for solo travelers/couples who wish to explore Porto!

The space
Welcome to my home!

Bright and tastefully furnished with modern decors, this lovely home is close to many of Porto's top attractions!

Fitted with a convertible sofa bed, a double bed, and a TV, relax in the living room after a day of exploring Porto. There's also a balcony where you can grab some fresh air or have a barbeque night!

Upon arrival, complimentary hotel-quality linens will be provided to ensure you'll have a pleasant sleep.

The kitchen is fully equipped with essential cookware and cutleries you'll need to cook a delicious meal such as a stove, a fridge, and an oven. If you fancy dining in, there a dining area complete with a dining table and chairs where you can grab your meals.

The bathroom has all the amenities you'll need to freshen up including
column7:
Once a former home to Jewish and Armenian communities, its colorful old houses, cobbled streets, and location near the river will charm anyone who visits Miragaia. This area is also known for being particularly lively during São João, the traditional street party that takes place in Porto in June.

Moreover, Miragaia is where you can eat sardines and drink the best of Portuguese wine as you watch the sunset over the river. Don’t forget to take a walk alongside the Douro. You will not miss the Ponte Luís I, a spectacular metal arch bridge that spans the river between Porto and Vila Nova de Gaia.

You’ll see that the neo-classical Palacio da Bolsa dominates the Infante D. Henrique Square. Visit the famous Arab room inspired by the Alhambra of Grenada in Spain. Igreja de San Francisco is must visit if you want to be refresh!

After, you can either hop on the Funicular dos Guindais or stroll along Bandeirinha da Saúde (Miradouro) to get a better view of the
column14:

The apartments can provide you with a real native experience! They are all furnished and well equipped for a pleasant, yet alternative, stay compared to a traditional hotel room. They are all located near most of the main attractions in the city.

If you have any questions our staff can give you all the information.

Hope to see you here! :D

column5: Historical Porto Studios - 302 by Porto City Hosts
column6:
Studio on the 3rd floor in a restored building located in the Historic Center of Porto. Featuring a contemporary style, all rooms have a kitchenette and a modern bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Guests can use the fully equipped kitchenette to prepare their meals. The back of the building is in contact with the ancient wall of Fernandina, which is the untouchable UNESCO heritage.

The space
All rooms have a kitchenette and a modern bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Guests can use the fully equipped kitchenette to prepare their meals.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire room independently, with their own private kitchen and private bathroom.

Other things to note
WORKING NOISE MAY BE POINTING IN THE SURROUNDING AREA

We appreciate your cooperation to make your stay more pleasant:

- We all have an environmental concern. Turn off the lights before leaving the apartment. The world th
column7: The building is located in the historic city center of Porto, in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Center. It is five minutes to the river Douro, and very close to monuments such as Palácio da Bolsa, São Francisco Church, D. Luís I Bridge (made by Gustavo Eiffel), among others. It is close to all major attractions of the city, such as the Port Wine Cellars, the Tower of Clérigos (100m), the Lello bookstore that inspired J.K. Rowling in his Harry Potter books (150m) and more. But do not worry, upon your arrival we will give you the best tips you can get about the city.

Near Porto's historical center and 5 minutes from the emblematic Casa da Música, Vila Burgães is inserted in an area with a great offer of restaurants, shops and services, with colleges and hospitals nearby. Vila Burgães arises from the rehabilitation of an old worker island in Porto, now converted into 8 lofts with mezzanine and 2 T1 duplex that develop around a common outdoor patio. In a fusion of the traditional and the contemporary, the architectural design of Vila Burgães favors functionality and the careful choice of materials and finishes of excellence.

column6:
Apartamento Studio Superior é uma das tipologias dos 16 apartamentos, totalmente equipados, que existem S.Bento Residences, unidade hoteleira no coração da cidade do Porto. Este edifício de exterior minimalista contrasta com o conforto dos seus interiores, decorados e equipados a pensar nas suas necessidades. Com entrega de box de pequeno almoço e serviço Concierge 24h, poderá personalizar a sua estadia, disfrutando de todas as comodidades e serviços de hotel na autonomia dos seu apartamento.

The space
O nosso Estúdio Superior com cerca de 42m2, dispõe quarto, sala de estar e de refeições independentes e estão totalmente equipados para seu conforto. A possibilidade do apartamento ser comunicante com a tipologia Estúdio, apresenta-se como uma solução ideal para famílias. Poderá disfrutar das incríveis vistas panorâmicas da cidade em qualquer uma das varandas do seu apartamento. Todos os apartamentos têm uma decoração única, contemporânea e acolhedora, onde pode e
column7:
Criámos 16 apartamentos para aqueles que querem conhecer o Porto pela sua história e cultura, bem como pelo estilo de vida contemporâneo e diferenciador. Este arrojado edifício emerge no coração do Porto, numa zona classificada pela Unesco, e foi projetado pela Pedra Líquida, gabinete liderado pelo reconhecido arquiteto Nuno Grande. Nasce a partir de um prédio em ruínas e surge como um prolongamento da própria escarpa, fundindo-se assim com a paisagem histórica em que se insere. O exterior minimalista contrasta com o conforto do interior destes apartamentos que estão totalmente equipados e prontos para lhe dar as boas vindas.
Situado no epicentro da cidade, S.Bento Residences encontra-se ao lado da icónica Estação de S.Bento, com vistas deslumbrantes da Sé do Porto, da Torre dos Clérigos e do característico casario da baixa Portuense. Com praça de táxis, estação de metro e paragens de autocarros diretamente à porta, não terá problema em se deslocar.
column14: 16 amazing, comfortable self-catered apartments in downtown Oporto! Stay at the perfect location! We are ready to welcome you for a deserved getaway!

column14:
Hello! 
AccommodationInPortoⓇ was created by Miguel that loves Porto and to host travellers that want to discover the hidden secrets, oportunities and get the best that Porto as to offer.
Miguel is a young traveller (too) that always want to get the best of the places, so he will try to give (you) that oportunity. Please share your experiences when arrive! :)
Andreia, Helder, Luís, Nicolau, Pamela, Tiago and Rui are fun and helpful, they have graduation in Tourism and are now helping Miguel, you will love them for sure!
Join us and find out how to LOVE PORTO!

column6:
Este apartamento estúdio é confortável e acolhedor, foi completamente renovado em 2020.

Todos os apartamentos nesta propriedade dispõem de ar condicionado e todos os utensílios de cozinha.

Está situado no centro Histórico do Porto entre a “Avenida dos Aliados” e a “Sé Catedral”, ao lado da principal estação de comboios e metro de “São Bento”.

Próximo existem vários estabelecimentos comercias.

The space
Este apartamento moderno tem 1 cama de casal.

A casa de banho está equipada com um secador de cabelo.

A cozinha tem frigorífico, forno, placa vitrocerâmica e micro-ondas.

Todos os hospedes têm acesso a um jardim nas traseiras do edifício.

O apartamento é perfeito para 2 pessoas.

Guest access
Os Hóspedes têm acesso total ao apartamento.

License number
113252/AL
column7:
Edifício do séc IXX, restaurado, situado na zona histórica da cidade. Pertenceu ao Mosteiro de S. Bento de Avé Maria.
Nas imediações encontrará todo o tipo de restaurantes, cafés e lojas. Perto dos principais pontos de interesse: Rua das Flores, estação de S. Bento, Sé Catedral.... Poderá ir ao teatro ou cinema a pé.
A 20 minutos a pé das caves do vinho do Porto e da zona da Ribeira. Realmente tudo a uma curta distância, dia e noite!
column14:
Hi, I’m Diogo Silva and I was born in the heart of Porto city, 24 years ago. Airplanes and flying have always been my biggest passions, that’s why i love travelling.

I’m looking forward to welcoming you in this awesome city!

column5: Historical Porto Studios - 102 by Porto City Hosts
column6:
Studio on the 1st floor in a restored building located in the Historic Center of Porto. Featuring a contemporary style, all rooms have a kitchenette and a modern bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Guests can use the fully equipped kitchenette to prepare their meals. The back of the building is in contact with the ancient wall of Fernandina, which is the untouchable UNESCO heritage.

The space
All rooms have a kitchenette and a modern bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Guests can use the fully equipped kitchenette to prepare their meals.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire room independently, with their own private kitchen and private bathroom.

Other things to note
WORKING NOISE MAY BE POINTING IN THE SURROUNDING AREA

We appreciate your cooperation to make your stay more pleasant:

- We all have an environmental concern. Turn off the lights before leaving the apartment. The world tha
column7: The building is located in the historic city center of Porto, in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Center. It is five minutes to the river Douro, and very close to monuments such as Palácio da Bolsa, São Francisco Church, D. Luís I Bridge (made by Gustavo Eiffel), among others. It is close to all major attractions of the city, such as the Port Wine Cellars, the Tower of Clérigos (100m), the Lello bookstore that inspired J.K. Rowling in his Harry Potter books (150m) and more. But do not worry, upon your arrival we will give you the best tips you can get about the city.
column14:
Welcome 2 Porto is a professional tourism management team. All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who receive the guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
They are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto, also UNESCO site, listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, influence for Harry Potter, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha and tripas or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.

column5: The Porto Concierge - Back to Wooden in Boavista
column6:
Practical and conveniently located 3 bedrooms flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 6 people comfortably. 5 minutes walking distance to Casa da Musica metro station.

Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment.
Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay.

The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience.

Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center

The space
Apartamento com 3 quartos ideal para 6 pessoas com todas as comodidades para uma optima estadia. Com uma localização central para usufruir de toda que a cidade tem para oferecer, turismo, compras, visitas historicas ou na famosa Movida do Porto.
Situado a 60 metros do Mercado do Bom Sucesso, o TPC - Wooden Boavista está situado junto á Rotunda da Boavista, onde se situa a Casa da Música distando 400m da mesma, zona priveligiada

column5: 3 Restfull Cozy Flats w/ Balcony | Gaia
column6:
Live like a local in the heart of Gaia.

This building with 3 flats has 3 balconies and garage (ACCORDING TO AVAILABILITY) which is ideal for you! It will provide you a nice atmosphere to relax and to discover the city.

It is an excellent option for big groups who wish to enjoy all Gaia has to offer.

We are a passionate team in Porto, always excited to welcome amazing people from all over the world. Send us a message and pack your bags for an unforgettable experience.

The space
You'll have everything ready to make sure you have a comfortable stay.

You will have 3 flats in the same building. The space has both 3 king beds, super comfy to have a great night of sleep, as well as 3 kitchens fully equipped to cook the local delicacies.

Not only do we provide Wi-Fi to share everything on social media, but, at the end of a tiring day, you can watch Netflix before going to sleep, all included, of course!

Al

column5: Lovely Cozy Flat w/ Balcony | Jardim do Morro
column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Gaia.

You’ll find a great big flat with excellent details and which has Free Wifi, AC and Netflix to provide you a great atmosphere. It’s located in front of the metro.

It has one balcony for you to enjoy a glass of wine while you see the sunset.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
You will stay in a fresh and luxurious flat in a great location in the city and with modern decoration.

You have 2 queen beds, 2 individual beds and a comfortable sofa to have a great night of sleep, an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city and a modern living room to have marvelous moments.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country.

You have AC to be warm in cold days and fresh in hot ones. The AC is only loca
column7:
The apartment is just a 2-minute walk from Jardim do Morro, Serra do Pilar Monastery, and Ponte Luis I, some of Porto's main postcards. Also, you are 2 minutes away from Porto if you take the Metro!

It is also close to supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, and all kinds of shops to make your stay as comfortable as possible.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!
column27: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
