column5: MyStay Bolhão - Pool & Garden - Ap. vista piscina
column6:
Situado a 300 metros do Coliseu do Porto, o mystay Porto Bolhão - Pool & Garden disponibiliza uma piscina exterior, um jardim e acomodações climatizadas com uma varanda e acesso Wi-Fi gratuito.

The space
Cada unidade tem uma cozinha totalmente equipada com um micro-ondas, uma área de estar com um sofá, uma televisão de ecrã plano e uma casa de banho privativa com chuveiro e secador de cabelo. Um frigorífico, um forno, uma placa de fogão, uma chaleira e uma máquina de café também estão disponíveis.

Other things to note
É necessário fornecer o documento de identificação no momento em que faz a reserva, ao anfitrião.

License number
75641/AL
column7: Os locais de interesse populares perto do alojamento incluem o Mercado do Bolhão, o Mercado Ferreira Borges e a Torre dos Clérigos. O aeroporto mais próximo é o Aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro, a 18 km do MyStay Porto Bolhão - Pool & Garden.

column5: Guest H4U-Povoa vacation twinbedwith shared bath
column6:
Apartment composed of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Discover a twin bedroom with 2 bed 90*200 with bathroom and common area to share in a spacious, bright and comfortable 100m² apartment. Located close to the Povoa de Varzim metro, ideal for a business or tourist stay.
Let yourself be carried away by the sweetness of Portugal! #portugal #porto #povoa #citycenter #holiday #vacance # guesth4u #instagood #feelgood #weekend #romantic #sun #beach #weekend #room #roomtorent #bedroom

The space
Apartment of 100m² with 3 bedrooms, on the 3rd floor of a small building without lift. The apartment has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, you share the bathroom and the WC with another bedroom.
You have access to all common areas namely: a living room, dining room, a kitchen.
Our kitchen is equipped with 4 hotplates and an oven, Nespresso, a washing machine, a dishwasher and all the necessary utensils for cooking.
The living room has a flat screen connected to Netflix
column7: At the foot of the building is a small grocery, a bakery, a cafe, a restaurant and a butcher. A 10 minute walk you can go to the market, the supermarket and the heart of the city, and beaches.
column14:
Bonjour à tous,
Je suis tombée amoureuse de Porto et j’ai donc décidé de venir m’y installer. Mon parcours hotelier m'a donné envie  de créer ma propre société Guest H4U.
C'est une belle aventure que je partage avec mon conjoint, Mathieu.
Nous vous accueillons comme à l'hotel dans chaque appartement. Nous avons développer des partenariats (chauffeurs privées, guide, chasse aux trésors, tour dans le Douro) qui vous permettrons de découvrir Porto comme les Portuenses!
N’hésitez pas à nous contacter pour plus d’informations
Et d'ici là faites de beaux voyages!
Isabelle & Mathieu et toute l'équipe  @GuestH4U

column5: House with 2 bedrooms in São Félix da Marinha, with terrace and WiFi
column6:
This house, located in São Félix da Marinha, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a terrace and WiFi.

The space
This house, located in São Félix da Marinha, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a terrace and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 4 or outside, on the terrace.
The house has 2 comfortable bedrooms, 1 including a double bed and 1 including 2 single beds and a private bathroom with a shower. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and a toilet.
The house features a dressing room and central heating.
Note that towels, bed linen and tourist tax are included in the rental fee. Final cleaning must be done by the guests or can be available wi
column7: This house enjoys a privileged location that will allow you to enjoy your stay in the area. Many activities await you in the surroundings, such as Cycling, Swimming, Golfing, Windsurfing and Mountain biking.  You will find a supermarket at 600 m.  Miramar golf club  golf course is 3 km away from the house.

column5: 3 Restfull Cozy Flats w/ Balcony | Gaia
column6:
Live like a local in the heart of Gaia.

This building with 3 flats has 3 balconies and garage (ACCORDING TO AVAILABILITY) which is ideal for you! It will provide you a nice atmosphere to relax and to discover the city.

It is an excellent option for big groups who wish to enjoy all Gaia has to offer.

We are a passionate team in Porto, always excited to welcome amazing people from all over the world. Send us a message and pack your bags for an unforgettable experience.

The space
You'll have everything ready to make sure you have a comfortable stay.

You will have 3 flats in the same building. The space has both 3 king beds, super comfy to have a great night of sleep, as well as 3 kitchens fully equipped to cook the local delicacies.

Not only do we provide Wi-Fi to share everything on social media, but, at the end of a tiring day, you can watch Netflix before going to sleep, all included, of course!

Al
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Janelas São Bento 3 w/ Garden by Porto City Hosts
column6:
Right next to the amazing São Bento train station, you will find a renovated apartment where you can enjoy your rest in the best way. Recover your energy in the beautiful artificial grass garden.
You can visit the Torre dos Clérigos and Livraria Lello in just 5 minutes as well as night spots on Galerias de Paris street.
The beautiful Ribeira is just 15 minutes away.
There is also a wide gastronomic offer to make the most of what the city has to offer.

The space
With a modern design combined with comfort, this apartment is ideal for those looking to relax in the city center.
It is located on the 1st floor without a lift and has 1 bedroom with a double bed and a bedroom with a child's bed, 1 living / dining room and a fully equipped kitchen.
Cable TV with NETFLIX, internet, coffee machine, stove, kettle, toaster, and a comfortable sofa.
Its fantastic location allows quick access to all tourist attractions in Porto.

Guest
column7:
The apartment is located in the city center, next to one of the main attractions, São Bento Station.
It is a quiet area despite being central that provides harmony for guests.
It is also close to Livraria Lello and Torre dos Clérigos.
The Douro and Ribeira River, one of the most beautiful and colorful areas of the city, is just 15 minutes away. From there, you can cross the Luís Bridge to Gaia, where you will have the best view of Porto. In addition, this is where all Port Wine cellars are located.
An excellent choice for those coming for a vacation or business.
column14:
Porto City Hosts is a locally based tourism team consisting of proud Porto citizens. 
We receive our guests with local charm and professional quality. We make our guests feel well accompanied during their stay, helping them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!
We also are passionate travelers eager to find out new places, to know new cultures, landscapes, palates, and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, sharing suggestions with new sensations, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river walk through the old Porto streets. 
You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto!
It will be a pleasure to host you.

column5: Bellevue Porto | City Center Tranquility & Charm
column6:
Welcome! Bellevue is a beautiful and luminous apartment located in Porto city center. It is perfect for couples or families that want comfort and tranquility whilst visiting Porto. Enjoy the city view and the sun in the two balconies of the apartment. Explore the main touristic attractions, shops and great restaurants just by walking. Metro station is at 7min distance. Travel to and from the airport is easy and fast by metro. Travelling by car, there is parking at the street.

The space
This luminous apartment comprises one bedroom, a kitchen, the living room and one bathroom. Plus, it has two fantastic balconies ideal to relax and enjoy a glass wine.

Bedroom:
Modern furniture with a couple size bed and a large size wardrobe. Beddings are cleaned & changed by cleaning company after every check-out.

Bathroom
Large shower cabin. Freshly cleaned towels (one big & one small) are provided to each guest, as well liquid soap for hand wa
column14:
We are Deli & André from OportoHouses. We cannot wait to meet you and help you having a great time in our beautiful city, that is Porto. At OportoHouses we have great properties to rent in Porto. Choose from beautiful river front Villas, elegant Apartments in the historic centre or city centre Studios. Check our listings on Airbnb. 

We look forward to hosting you!

André & Deli

column5: Gorgeous flat with balcony facing Flores Street
column6:
Stay on the most charming street in the city in a beautiful apartment with a balcony overlooking the street located on the 1st floor of a completely renovated building.
The apartment has windows and balconies on all sides, offering excellent lighting and natural ventilation.
Comfort and style, high speed wifi, wide variety of TV channels, high quality bed and bath linens and all the amenities you need to have a great stay.

Let us know if you have any special need or request. We love to help!

The space
Apartment with 1 suite with balcony, 1 complete social bathroom (with shower) and an open area integrating the living room, TV, dining and kitchen. There is a very comfortable sofa bed in the living room for accommodation of up to 4 people.
The best part is the balcony overlooking Flores Street that extends throughout the room. So be sure to enjoy a wine and cheese from Serra da Estrela in your next home in Porto!

Guest access
column7: This is where it all happens! This apartment is located in the middle of everything, which allows you to explore the main tourist area of the city on foot. On top of that, it is located 3 min / 260m on foot from the São Bento train and metro station and 8 min / 450m on foot from the pier on the Douro River. It is in this pier where the access to the Luis I bridge is located and, when crossing it on foot, you will be in Gaia and you will be able to have the view of Porto that has become the city's postcard. Flores Street / Rua das Flores is one of the main streets in the historic center of the city right in the heart of the tourist area of Porto. It is a pedestrian way with restaurants, cafes, stores... When walking down this street and the street beside (Mouzinho da Silveira) towards the river, you will pass by the most famous restaurants and cafes. You will be able to find a pharmacy, supermarket and everything you need near the apartment. The São Bento station is beautiful and one of
column14:
We are Paula and Rafael, a couple from Brazil. We love to travel, mostly to places we've never been before. We love that 'first time visiting" experience!
But, no matter where we are, we like to be in the best location in a comfortable and stylish place.
That's the reason why we decided to found our company, "Qualquer Destino (Meaning "Any Destination", in english).
Our goal is to provide our guests the kind of experience that we like, to make an unique and special one.

column5: Charming flat w. balcony on the most iconic street
column6:
Stay on the most charming street in the city in a beautiful apartment with a balcony overlooking the street located on the 2nd floor of a completely renovated building.
The apartment has windows and balconies on all sides, offering excellent lighting and natural ventilation.
Comfort and style, high speed wifi, wide variety of TV channels, high quality bed and bath linens and all the amenities you need to have a great stay.

Let us know if you have any special need or request. We love to help!

The space
Apartment with 1 suite with balcony, 1 complete social bathroom (with shower) and an open area integrating the living room, TV, dining and kitchen. There is a very comfortable sofa bed in the living room for accommodation of up to 4 people.
The best part is the balcony overlooking Flores Street that extends throughout the room. So be sure to enjoy a wine and cheese from Serra da Estrela in your next home in Porto!

Guest access
column7: This is where it all happens! This apartment is located in the middle of everything, which allows you to explore the main tourist area of the city on foot. On top of that, it is located 3 min / 260m on foot from the São Bento train and metro station and 8 min / 450m on foot from the pier on the Douro River. It is in this pier where the access to the Luis I bridge is located and, when crossing it on foot, you will be in Gaia and you will be able to have the view of Porto that has become the city's postcard. Flores Street / Rua das Flores is one of the main streets in the historic center of the city right in the heart of the tourist area of Porto. It is a pedestrian way with restaurants, cafes, stores... When walking down this street and the street beside (Mouzinho da Silveira) towards the river, you will pass by the most famous restaurants and cafes. You will be able to find a pharmacy, supermarket and everything you need near the apartment. The São Bento station is beautiful and one of
column14:

But, no matter where we are, we like to be in the best location in a comfortable and stylish place.
That's the reason why we decided to found our company, "Qualquer Destino (Meaning "Any Destination", in english).
Our goal is to provide our guests the kind of experience that we like, to make an unique and special one.

This charming studio is located in the artistic district of Miguel Bombarda, in the center of Porto, close to all the main tourist attractions.
Ideally located to take advantage of everything the city has to offer, 10 minutes walk from Lapa metro station (direct access to the airport 30 minutes)
It is an excellent, pleasant and comfortable starting point to discover Porto and its surroundings.

The space
This beautiful studio is very bright, in a new building, on the ground floor.
Includes a spacious bedroom with a double bed (sheets, duvets, feather pillows), bathroom, fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, stove, kettle, an espresso machine, an iron with the table and all kinds of extensions of kitchen. The living room includes a dining area, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi connection. The bathroom includes toiletries (soap, shampoo, shower gel), towels and a hairdryer.
You can take full advantage of the terrace to rest and have lunch.

column5: Modern 1BR Duplex w/ Pool & AC by LovelyStay
column6:
Situated in Vila Nova de Gaia, an area famous for its Port wine cellars and stunning views of the Ribeira, this apartment is perfect for those hoping to have a peaceful holiday in the north of Portugal. The metro station "General Torres" is just 500m away from the flat and will take you to Porto downtown in less than 5 minutes.
Well-equipped to host up to 2 guests and with a shared pool in the building, this cozy duplex comes with 1 bedroom with en-suite bathroom upstairs and a fully equipped kitchenette and spacious living space downstairs. Several key amenities are also provided here, including AC, fast wi-fi, TV, a washing machine, oven, stove and more! We are certain you will feel right at home at our apartment and we look forward to hosting you!

The space
With the metro at a 5 minute (uphill) walk away from the flat, you can easily visit the main touristic attractions in both Porto and Gaia. Porto downtown is less than 5 minutes away. It can comfortabl
column7:
Famous for its Port Wine Cellars and stunning views of Porto, Vila Nova de Gaia (or simply Gaia) is located on the other side of the Douro. It has a pretty promenade along the waterfront and is a great place to go for a walk and enjoy the remarkable views of the Dom Luís I Bridge and the picturesque neighborhood of Ribeira and its terraced colorful houses.

TOP ATTRACTIONS IN THE AREA:
- Mosteiro da Serra do Pilar
- Teleférico de Gaia
- Port Lodges;
A few to consider are Sandeman, Cálem, Graham’s and Quinta do Noval, and you’ll get to taste each variety to learn the difference.
- Casa-Museu Teixeira Lopes
- Douro River Trip
- Jardim do Morro
- Parque Biológico de Gaia

column5: Casa da Viela - oferta bilhetes passadiços
column6:
Casa da Viela - oferecemos bilhetes para os passadiços

The space
A Casa da Viela, fica situada no sopé da Serra da Freita, em Adaufe, Moldes, Arouca.
Em pleno Geoparque de Arouca, a Casa da Viela, oferece toda a paz e tranquilidade que precisa para umas férias em familia ou amigos, com a privacidade que necessita neste momento.
Usufrua de umas férias isoladas de outras pessoas, mas com segurança.
Casa com 2 quartos, 2 WC, cozinha e sala.
Possui uma churrasqueira e um forno a lenha.
A Casa oferece alojamento até 4 adultos e 2 crianças.
Proporciona a tranquilidade e a privacidade, para um descanso revigorante, sem nunca perder a proximidade de reconhecidos lugares e monumentos.
A região possui uma enorme riqueza gastronómica e a paisagem envolvente fornece o cenário perfeito para uma gama enorme de atividades de aventura, como Caminhada, BTT, Pesca, Rafting, Canoagem, Fotografia, Geocaching,

Guest access

column5: Apartment with one bedroom in Porto, with WiFi
column6:
This apartment, located in Porto, is ideal for 5 vacationers. It offers a bedroom and WiFi.

The space
This apartment, located in Porto, is ideal for 5 vacationers. It offers a bedroom and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi and a Hi-Fi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 4.
The apartment has a comfortable bedroom with a single bed and a double bed. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and a toilet.
The apartment features a fan.
Note that the cleaning, towels, bed linen and tourist tax are included in the rental fee.
Smoking inside is not allowed. Pets are allowed. Parties are not allowed.

Other things to note
WE LOVE
• The Wifi connection
• The well furnished kitchen<

It is an excellent, pleasant and comfortable starting point to discover Porto and its surroundings.

The living room includes a dining area, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi connection. The bathroom includes toiletries (soap, shampoo, shower gel), towels and a hairdryer.

Fully-equipped to the highest standards and brand new, you will certainly be able to relax and unwind during your stay in our UNESCO World Heritage City. We are certain you will enjoy your stay at our apartment which .... shhh... is right around the corner from all the typical street food restaurants.

column7:
This apartment is located right in the heart of the city and so there are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
- Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants, and cafés.
- Guindais Funicular
- Port Wine cellars - situated in Gaia, on the other side of the brid

column5: 2 Spacious Modern Flats w/ Balcony | Jardim Morro
column6:
Live a local's life in the heart of Gaia.

You’ll find 2 great big flats with excellent details and which each one has Free Wifi, AC and Netflix to provide you a great atmosphere. It’s located in front of the metro.

Each apartment has one balcony for you to enjoy a glass of wine while you see the sunset.

I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

The space
You will stay in 2 fresh and luxurious flats in a great location in the city and with modern decoration.

The apartments are located in the same floor, in front of each other.

For each apartment you have 2 queen beds, 2 individual beds and a comfortable sofa to have a great night of sleep, an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city and a modern living room to have marvelous moments.

Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be atten
column7:
The apartment is just a 2-minute walk from Jardim do Morro, Serra do Pilar Monastery, and Ponte Luis I, some of Porto's main postcards. Also, you are 2 minutes away from Porto if you take the Metro!

It is also close to supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, and all kinds of shops to make your stay as comfortable as possible.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Picasso Suites 1T by Porto City Hosts
column6:
Bright and cozy studio, rebuilt in 2019, decorated with the refinement of wood and granite, original to the building with more than a century, maintaining the unique charm and character.
Relax in the tranquility of the balcony.
Equipped with full kitchen.
Quiet area but with excellent accessibility.
Metro do Marquês and Faria Guimarães 4 minutes walk, with direct connection to Trindade station. Historic center 15 minutes walk
In the quiet residential area of Bonjardim.

The space
Ideal for those looking to visit the city of Porto without staying in overly busy areas.
The kitchen is well equipped with fridge, freezer, hob, toaster, coffee maker, microwave and various kitchen accessories (pots, pans, can openers, bottle openers, dishes, cutlery, individual, etc.). It also has a washing machine and dryer.

The apartment accommodates three people in comfort in a bedroom with a double bed, and a sofa bed for the third person.
column7:
Perfect space for holidays and / or for a professional stay. The apartment is located in one of the most central areas of the city, close to the shopping streets and the most popular restaurants in Porto.

It is located at Rua de Bonjardim, 800m from the most commercial and typical street in Porto (R. Santa Catarina) and 10 minutes from the City Hall and Avenida dos Aliados, with quick access to all areas of Porto.

It is located 20 minutes from Praça da Cordoaria, surrounded by the Torre dos Clérigos and the famous Livaria Lello.

On the other hand, it is also very close to Praça dos Poveiros, which is known for its excellent gastronomic offer. The famous Santiago restaurant, with the best francesinhas in Porto, Casa Guedes and the famous pork sandwiches with mountain cheese; Since 1927, Buraquinho has served potatoes, soups, rojões, chispe and sarrabulho porridge; At Plaza Caffé Prego, which has a sunny terrace throughout the day, the specialties are the
column14:
Porto City Hosts is a locally based tourism team consisting of proud Porto citizens. 
We receive our guests with local charm and professional quality. We make our guests feel well accompanied during their stay, helping them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!
We also are passionate travelers eager to find out new places, to know new cultures, landscapes, palates, and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, sharing suggestions with new sensations, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river walk through the old Porto streets. 
You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto!
It will be a pleasure to host you.

column6:
Located in the quiet neighborhood of Boavista, this 3BR Flat with two full bathrooms with shower is fully-equipped to host up to 6 people, making it perfect for families or a group of friends travelling together. With AC in 2 of the 3 bedrooms and living room and a lovely balcony, you will certainly be able to relax and unwind during your stay in our UNESCO World Heritage City.

The space
This apartment provides all the comfort of a modern house while maintaining its beautiful original architectural style. It was specially designed and decorated to ensure you have a fantastic stay in Porto!

The apartment itself comprises of:
- Two bedrooms with a double bed with a closet, a comfortable mattress, clean linen and AC.
- A third bedroom with 2 single beds, comfortable mattress and clean linen.
- Two full bathrooms with shower. Toilet paper and towels are provided for your convenience!
- A living room/dining area with a sofa and a TV with
column7:
This apartment is located in the safe and quiet neighborhood of Boavista. You can find great places to visit in the area such as the modern Casa da Música and the contemporary art museum Serralves (designed by the famous architect Siza Vieira). Another great spot is the Gallery of Biodiversity, the best museum for children in Porto. Due to the fact that this is a residential neighborhood, supermarkets, pharmacies and parking lots can be found literally a few meters away from the apartment!

From Boavista you have a subway connection to the city centre at Casa da Musica. There you’ll find also plenty of bus lines.

column6:
With the Clérigos Church as your neighbor, step into the heart of the historical center in Porto. It is walking distance the city’s major attractions: enter the imaginary world of Harry Potter’s bookshop, stroll the banks of the Rio Douro, explore ancient churches and sample the wine the city is famous for.
Retaining many of the building’s original features with vintage and modern features, it is a perfect base for a sunny, city vacation.

The space
This charming 1-bedroom apartment is on the second floor of a renovated building in a lively area at the center of Porto. It sleeps 4 + 1. The property is compact and simple, but also bright and fun.

The white walls and wood floors create a stunning backdrop for the beautiful furnishings and warm wooden accents.
Paired with antique Vintage furniture they create a perfect apartment for you to experience this historical city like a true “Portuense”.
The green velvet sofa will welcome you after

The space

column5: Clotilde Apartment - Com vista para o mar
column6:
Apartamento localizado na primeira linha em frente à praia de Lavadores e acomoda 4 pessoas .Ampla sala e cozinha, ambas partilhando um terraço de frente para o mar, onde pode relaxar, fazer um churrasco, apanhar sol nas espreguiçadeiras, admirar o pôr do sol e fazer as suas refeições. Cozinha equipada com todos os eletrodomésticos. Dispõe de aquecimento em todas a divisões. Oferecemos todas as condições para lhe proporcionar o melhor conforto.

The space
A sala está equipada com cómodos sofás, tem uma TV com Wi-Fi .A cozinha está equipada com forno, placa, frigorifico, micro-ondas, máquina de lavar roupa, torradeira e todos os utensílios de cozinha. Tem um amplo terraço de frente para o mar com mesa, cadeiras e espreguiçadeiras com acesso pela cozinha e sala. Tem 2 quartos (1 com cama de casal e o outro com 2 camas de solteiro). Há duas casas de banho, uma completa e outra de serviço com duche - Tolhas, lençóis e cobertores são fornecidos. Está localizado no r/c
column7: O apartamento situa-se numa zona de praias de areia branca numa extensão de 15 km com pistas de ciclismo e "jogging" ao longo da praia que podem levá-lo até às caves do mundialmente famoso "Vinho do Porto", apenas a 6 km do apartamento. Aproveite para se misturar com a população local, sentir o bater do coração da cidade, experimentar os seus costumes, a sua comida e vinhos típicos, bem como apreciar a sua vincada cultura.

column6:
Apartamento Studio Superior é uma das tipologias dos 16 apartamentos, totalmente equipados, que existem S.Bento Residences, unidade hoteleira no coração da cidade do Porto. Este edifício de exterior minimalista contrasta com o conforto dos seus interiores, decorados e equipados a pensar nas suas necessidades. Com entrega de box de pequeno almoço e serviço Concierge 24h, poderá personalizar a sua estadia, disfrutando de todas as comodidades e serviços de hotel na autonomia dos seu apartamento.

The space
O nosso Estúdio Superior com cerca de 42m2, dispõe quarto, sala de estar e de refeições independentes e estão totalmente equipados para seu conforto. A possibilidade do apartamento ser comunicante com a tipologia Estúdio, apresenta-se como uma solução ideal para famílias. Poderá disfrutar das incríveis vistas panorâmicas da cidade em qualquer uma das varandas do seu apartamento. Todos os apartamentos têm uma decoração única, contemporânea e acolhedora, onde pode e
column7:
Criámos 16 apartamentos para aqueles que querem conhecer o Porto pela sua história e cultura, bem como pelo estilo de vida contemporâneo e diferenciador. Este arrojado edifício emerge no coração do Porto, numa zona classificada pela Unesco, e foi projetado pela Pedra Líquida, gabinete liderado pelo reconhecido arquiteto Nuno Grande. Nasce a partir de um prédio em ruínas e surge como um prolongamento da própria escarpa, fundindo-se assim com a paisagem histórica em que se insere. O exterior minimalista contrasta com o conforto do interior destes apartamentos que estão totalmente equipados e prontos para lhe dar as boas vindas.
Situado no epicentro da cidade, S.Bento Residences encontra-se ao lado da icónica Estação de S.Bento, com vistas deslumbrantes da Sé do Porto, da Torre dos Clérigos e do característico casario da baixa Portuense. Com praça de táxis, estação de metro e paragens de autocarros diretamente à porta, não terá problema em se deslocar.
column14: 16 amazing, comfortable self-catered apartments in downtown Oporto! Stay at the perfect location! We are ready to welcome you for a deserved getaway!

column6:
Located close to the Miradouro da Vitória, a viewpoint that offers a romantic view of the river as well as downtown Porto, this studio apartment is inserted in a modern building and is perfect for your trip to our historic city! Well-equipped to host up to 2 guests, this cozy flat comes with a double bed, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area and a full bathroom with shower (and heated floors!). Several key amenities are provided including AC, fast wi-fi, TV, a washing machine, dishwasher, oven, stove and more.

WHAT'S NEARBY:
- Miradouro da Vitória: 2 min
- Palacio da Bolsa: 5 min
- Sao Bento Train/Metro Station: 10 min
- Sé do Porto: 10 min

The space
- A comfortable double bed and a full bathroom with a shower. Linens, towels and toilet paper are provided for your convenience.
- A tastefully decorated living area/dining space with a TV and an AC unit.
- A kitchenette that comes well-equipped with all the appliances
column7:
This apartment is situated in Baixa, right above the Ribeira. It is located right in the heart of the city and so there are plenty of interesting sites to visit around the area, such as Mercado do Bolhão (the last traditional market of Porto), São Bento train station and Lello bookshop.
It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
- Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants, and cafés.
- Guindais Funicular
- Port Wine cellars

column5: Apartment with one bedroom in Sra. da Hora, with enclosed garden and WiFi - 4 km from the beach
column6:
This apartment, located in Sra. da Hora, is ideal for 2 vacationers. It offers a bedroom, an enclosed garden and WiFi.

The space
This apartment, located in Sra. da Hora, is ideal for 2 vacationers. It offers a bedroom, an enclosed garden and WiFi.
It is perfect for unwinding after a day in the sun.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 6 or outside, on the balcony or in the garden.
The apartment has a comfortable bedroom with a double bed. The bathroom is fitted with a bathtub, a shower and a toilet.
The apartment features cleaning products, ironing equipment, a washing machine, central heating, a desk and a vacuum cleaner.
Note that the cleaning, towels and bed linen are included in the rental fee.
Parking is available onsite. Smoking inside is not allowed. Pets are not allowed. Parties are not allowed.

Other things to note
column7: This apartment enjoys a privileged location that will allow you to enjoy your stay in the area. Many activities await you in the surroundings, such as Fishing, Roller skating, Tennis, Jet-Skiing, Windsurfing, Water sports, Surfing, Scuba diving, Hiking, Cycling, Golfing, Snorkelling, Swimming, Water skiing, Sailing and Horse riding.  Praia de Matosinhos beach is 4 km away from the apartment. You will also find great bars and restaurants at 4 km and a supermarket within 1000 m.

column7:
The apartment is located in the heart of the city center, between Aliados Avenue and Cedofeita, in one of the most typical and oldest street in the city.

In the neighborhood you can find an historical, cultural, musical and artistic Harbour, set in cosmopolitan young art district, surrounded by restaurants (typical or sophisticated), shops, art galleries and coffees.
You also willl find all type of services, like supermarket (Praça da República), grocery stores, bakeries, pharmacy, ATMs, etc.

Far-flung from our place you can find some cultural appeals such as São Bento Station, Coliseu do Porto, Majestic Café situated in one of most well-known streets of Porto - Rua de Santa Catarina, and Mercado do Bolhão our best traditional market.

If you prefer, you can easily reach the Art District in a few minutes walk through Cedofeita and Miguel Bombarda street and feel the atmosphere of the alternative shops, art galleries and restaurants.

column7:
Located in the heart of downtown Porto, in a fully reconstructed building.
This Porto apartment location is perfect, in Almada Street, parallel to the Avenida dos Aliados where is the City Hall, 10 minutes walking distance from the main interesting points of the city and its main bars and restaurants.
On one side of the Avenida dos Aliados we have the center of all the everyday bustle, the Santa Catarina street, where you can find the typical coffees shops and pastries from Porto, such as the café Majestic, also old bookstores.
On the other hand, near Rua do Almada, you find Livraria Lello and Torre dos Clérigos as well as the Paris Galleries, known for its variety of bars and restaurants.

This brand new designer decorated apartment located just 10 minutes walking of Batalha Square is the best choice for your vacations in Porto!
One of Porto's best panoramic views - Alameda das Fontainhas - is a 5-minute walk away. Metro Heroismo is around 10 minutes from the apartment door. Restaurants, supermarkets, taxis and other means of transport (Campanhã and São Bento station around 15 minutes), are also close as well as Praça dos Poveiros - restaurant area - 10 minutes walking distance.

The space
The apartment is fully furnished, decorated and equipped. The design and functional decoration give the apartment the feeling of being at home. Kitchen and bathroom are equipped with everything you need. All sheets and towels are provided as well as amenities for the first days such as shower gel, shampoo and toilet paper. Cable TV and Wi-Fi are available free of charge in the apartment.
A double bed and a sofa bed for two gives the apartment the capacit
column7:
Either a group of friends or a family can be accommodated and can enjoy the most of Porto as this apartment is near one of the most important squares in Porto, Praça da Batalha.
If you are coming by car, do not worry, in this street the parking is not paid, and it is usual to have free parking lots!
column14:
Hi world, my name is João Figueira, founder of Meet Your Host - Local Accomodation, I am 34 years old, and counting too fast...! I was born and grew up in a small town in Alentejo region, at the age of 16, moved to Lisboa to continue my studies in Service Management.

Since I've moved to this magical city I have been collecting professional experiences, from transportation to sales, and am currently working as operations and host manager for short term rentals, what I actually love to do!

During my journey I have lived in three different locations in Portugal, from South to the North, and had a short international experience in London (6 months), which brought me fluency in English and Spanish. My favorite hobbies include several things, but what I really love to do is; travel, sports, food and spend quality time with my family and friends.

As a local and host (full time job), I look forward to connect with people traveling to Porto, aiming to provide a 5 star experience in this beautiful city  :)

The space

Quarto grande com vistas desafogadas no coração do Porto, a 5 minutos da praça principal, Avenida dos Aliados, e da estação de metro Trindade! Muito confortável , aconchegante e sem barulho. Está próximo de bares restaurantes, pastelarias, supermercados. Dada a perfeita localização do apartamento os hóspedes quase não precisam de usar transportes públicos. column14:
Hello! My name is Jorge and together with my girlfriend Dorota,  an "Airbnb superhost", we are renting 3 rooms in the center of Porto. We love to travel, to read books, to go to the theatre and to eat good food and drink good wine. 

What are the main advantages of chosing our rooms? 

- We really like meeting our guests! During the check-in we show you all the hidden gems of our city on the map, so you can use your time in Porto to the fullest. We always try to meet our guests in person, but if that is not possible, you do not have to worry! You will not miss on our tips: we will send you our "OFF THE BEATEN PATH" guide, so you know all the amazing, hidden spots. We believe Porto has so much more to discover and so many people just scratch its surface. This is why we want to share with you our insights on the city, so you can have a totally different and more genuine experience than most of the tourist.

- We offer all the guests a free visit and tasting at one of the oldest port wine cellars. Port wine cellars are one of the places you have to see in Porto, but since they are a popular tourist attraction you always have to purchase a ticket that is normally between 10 and 30 euros a person, depending on the wines you decide to try. Since our friend is the manager of one of the most famous wine cellars in the city, all our guests can have a VISIT AND A TASTING OF TWO WINES ABSOLUTELY FOR FREE!

column7: Located in the city of Porto, the area of Fontaínhas is known especially for being a mandatory crossing point on the night of S. João (this party is a celebration for Porto's patron saint, São João) celebrated during midsummer on the 23rd of June. At Alameda das Fontaínhas, the famous market “Feira da Vandoma” was held on Saturdays in the morning. It is one of the oldest areas of the city in the historic center, classified by UNESCO as a Cultural Heritage of Humanity and has exclusive views over the Douro River, the D. Luís bridge, Vila Nova de Gaia and the city of Porto itself. The viewpoint “Miradouro das Fontaínhas” is an unavoidable point of visit, where you can enjoy relaxing moments full of breath-taking landscapes. It is a unique opportunity to feel Porto as if you were living there! This area has not yet been gentrified, which means that those who live there are the genuine inhabitants of this area, guardians of all kinds of stories and this may be your opportunity to create yo

column7: Located in the city of Porto, the area of Fontaínhas is known especially for being a mandatory crossing point on the night of S. João (this party is a celebration for Porto's patron saint, São João) celebrated during midsummer on the 23rd of June. At Alameda das Fontaínhas, the famous market “Feira da Vandoma” was held on Saturdays in the morning. It is one of the oldest areas of the city in the historic center, classified by UNESCO as a Cultural Heritage of Humanity and has exclusive views over the Douro River, the D. Luís bridge, Vila Nova de Gaia and the city of Porto itself. The viewpoint “Miradouro das Fontaínhas” is an unavoidable point of visit, where you can enjoy relaxing moments full of breath-taking landscapes. It is a unique opportunity to feel Porto as if you were living there! This area has not yet been gentrified, which means that those who live there are the genuine inhabitants of this area, guardians of all kinds of stories and this may be your opportunity to create yo

column6:
Se aprecia a calma e o sossego no meio da cidade, este é o apartamento perfeito para a sua estadia na cidade do Porto.

Localizado na praça do Marquês, na zona alta da cidade, este apartamento faz parte de um edifício típico, totalmente renovado. As zonas comuns incluem um pátio interior, corredores amplos, um pé direito alto e elevador. O apartamento mezanine tem uma decoração moderna, mobiliário confortável, wi-fi gratuito, cozinha equipada, máquina de lavar roupa e louça.

The space
O apartamento fica no 2º andar de um edifício com elevador.
A sala de estar tem um confortável sofá, móvel com TV, janelas altas com vidros duplos, cortinas blackout, uma varanda com vista para a praça do Marquês. A cozinha é equipada com máquina de lavar a louça, utensílios de cozinha, forno microondas, máquina de café, chaleira elétrica, entre outras comodidades. Existe um armário na entrada do apartamento com espaço para arrumação e com uma máquina de lavar a roup
column7: A zona do Marquês tem tudo o que necessita para usufruir de uma estadia perfeita no Porto: transportes, restaurantes, lojas, serviços CTT, multibanco, pastelarias, entre muitos outros.
column14:
Somos uma empresa especializada na gestão de alojamento local. Tratamos cada propriedade como se fosse nossa, porque queremos que os hóspedes se sintam em casa – acreditamos que só assim faz sentido!

Como bons portuenses, somos excelentes anfitriões e sugerimos dicas especiais para que os nossos convidados possam aproveitar a estadia ao máximo, desde visitas a museus aos restaurantes imperdíveis. Partilhamos segredos que fazem do Porto uma cidade mágica. 

Aos proprietários, e nossos parceiros nesta aventura, prometemos experiência, conhecimento e dedicação, com o objetivo de rentabilizar ao máximo cada propriedade. 

We are a company that specialises in managing short term rental properties in Porto, Portugal.

We take care of our managed properties as if they were our own because we want our guests to feel at home and not have to worry about anything when they visit.
 
Just like the inhabitants of Porto, we are friendly hosts and can provide tips for our guests to make the most of their stay. We can recommend museums, restaurants, bars and can provide suggestions on alternative things to do (river cruises, football matches, etc...) As long term residents of the city we can share those hidden gems that make Porto such a magical city.
 
For home owners and potential business partners, we promise a professional service, expertise and dedication that will help you to maximise your returns.
Home Me – Making You Feel Good

Moradia com 3 quartos a 600 metros do mar, 100 metros do combóio e a 8 km do Centro do Porto e 6 km das caves de Vinho do Porto. Tem golfe de Miramar a 2 km e vários locais de lazer como piscinas, campos de golfe num raio de 6 km. Casa "retro" decorada de acordo com a época de construção e para quem gosta de reviver o "passado" da década de 60/70/80 da burguesia do Grande Porto. Quinta com 2.000 m2 e animais que são tratados por 2 pessoas e mais uma pequena horta, além dos frondosos jardins.

column5: Apartment with 2 bedrooms in Vila do Conde, with wonderful sea view, furnished balcony and WiFi - 200 m from the beach
column6:
This apartment, located in Vila do Conde, is ideal for 5 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a furnished balcony and WiFi.

The space
This apartment, located in Vila do Conde, is ideal for 5 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, a furnished balcony and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day in the sun. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book in front of the fireplace or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi and a Hi-Fi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 8 or outside, on the balcony enjoying views of the garden, the sea and the city.
The apartment has 2 comfortable bedrooms, 1 including a double bed and a private bathroom with a bath tub, a shower and toilet and 1 including a double bed. The bathroom is fitted with a bathtub, a shower and a toilet.
The apartment features cleaning products, ironing equipment and a
column7: This apartment enjoys a privileged location that will allow you to enjoy your stay in the area. Many activities await you in the surroundings, such as Sailing, Fishing, Golfing, Swimming, Tennis, Cycling, Windsurfing, Surfing and Water sports.  Praia do Turismo beach is 200 m away from the apartment. You will also find great bars and restaurants at 200 m and a supermarket within 750 m.  Estela Golf Club golf course is 13 km away from the apartment.

column6:
Indulge in the comfort and tranquility of this contemporary Village. The space features an unusual open-concept layout, monochromatic color schemes with stark contrasts, wood surfaces, and tasteful furnishings and decor. These bright and cozy homes are located in a renovated property converted into a small Village right in the center of Porto. The apartments are fully equipped, including coffee machine, WIFI and TV. There are also terraces and a backyard for you to relax after your day in Porto.

The space
*EARLY CHECKIN and LATE CHECKOUT may be possible, just ask us. Nevertheless, we have SAFE DEPOSITS where you can leave your luggage for free.

* FULLY EQUIPPED kitchens, with fridge, freezer, oven, stove, microwave, kitchenware, kettle, coffee EXPRESSO MACHINE...

* COMFORTABLE BEDS and HIGH QUALITY LINEN to provide a great night of sleep.

* All AMENITIES, baby cot, high chair, are provided for free as well.

* Cable TV a
column7: The Village is located in the pedestrian zone of Cedofeita street, an open sky "shopping mall", with many shops, pharmacy, supermarket, cafés, restaurants, and near (5 min walk) to the art galleries as well, Torre dos Clérigos, Galerias de Paris night life of bars and discos and many other historical places and monuments.
column14:
Hi,
I'm Marisa and I'm an Airbnb member since 2015. Since then I've been receiving guests in my apartments at Cedofeita Village and I will continue to do my best, together with my team, to guarantee you have the best Porto experience. 
I'll do my best to make your stay pleasant and unforgettable.
See you soon

Olá,
O meu nome é Marisa e sou membro do Airbnb desde 2015. Desde aí que recebo hóspedes nos meus apartamentos Cedofeita Village e garanto que vocês serão muito bem recebidos nos meus apartamentos pela minha equipa, Fábio, Mariana, Luísa e Diogo, que os gerem em conjunto comigo da melhor forma. 
Sejam bem vindos e espero que gostem.

Casa do Cativo is a beautiful 19th century guest house that has been reimagined as a modern and luxurious boutique hotel in the heart of the historical center of Porto, Portugal. The property features six suites with custom furnishings, and guests will enjoy city views, an outdoor swimming pool, family rooms, a shared lounge and kitchen, onsite dining, private parking, and a garden.

column6:
Paraiso means Paradise in Portuguese. Our property is situated on Paradise Street and it couldn't be a better fit, as Paraiso 331 is truly a Paradise in the city centre of Porto, just 10 minutes walk from Downtown.
Our huts are warm and cozy in the winter and cool and inviting during summer days. you can just open up the three fold doors and expand your living into the amazing surrounding garden, with hammock, lake, common and private seating area, lounge chairs, and plenty of fruit trees.
Hide

The space
Our huts are entirely made of Hemp, yes! Hemp!
It's amazing properties are a novelty as a construction material, and extremely durable, natural, soundproof and perfect for insulation. The Hut structure is made of wood and hemp blocks which are left exposed, giving it a rustic and cozy look.

But don't be fooled by the rustic looks... Once you are in, you will have the quality amenities that modern living got us used to. Fully equipped kit

column5: Property with one bedroom in Porto, with wonderful lake view and terrace - 14 km from the beach
column6:
This property, located in Porto, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers a bedroom and a terrace.

The space
This property, located in Porto, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers a bedroom and a terrace.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including a radio and video games.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 4 or outside, on the terrace or on the balcony enjoying views of the lake.
The property has a comfortable bedroom with a double bed. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and a toilet.
The property features a dryer, mosquito nets, a safe, a vacuum cleaner and air conditionning.
Note that the cleaning, towels, bed linen and tourist tax are included in the rental fee.
Parking is available onsite and is private. Smoking is
column7: This property enjoys a privileged location that will allow you to enjoy your stay in the area. Many activities await you in the surroundings, such as Sailing, Jet-Skiing, Hiking, Swimming, Fishing, Water skiing, Scuba diving and Water sports.  Leça da Palmeira beach is 14 km away from the property. Quinta do Fojo golf course is 7 km away from the property.
column14:
¡ Expertos en la gestión de alquileres vacacionales y apasionados por el sector del turismo durante muchos años, nuestra agencia ofrece alojamiento de calidad que cumplirá con sus expectativas !
Nuestro equipo internacional responderá a todas sus preguntas y lo asesorará durante la reserva.

Nuestro objetivo: ofrecerle unas vacaciones inolvidables y el deseo de volver.

------------------------------

Spécialistes de la gestion de location de vacances et passionnés du secteur du tourisme depuis de nombreuses années, notre agence vous propose des logements de qualité qui sauront satisfaire vos attentes !
Notre équipe d’ambassadeurs internationaux saura répondre à vos questions et vous accompagner tout au long de votre réservation.

Notre objectif : vous offrir des vacances réussies et l’envie de revenir !

column6:
Apartamento localizado em zona residencial a cerca de 2 km da Av. dos Aliados, bem servido de transportes públicos e perto dos acessos á autoestrada. Rodeado de supermercados, lojas de comércio tradicional, farmácia, cafés e restaurantes. O apartamento, foi totalmente remodelado e está equipado com todas as comodidades necessárias a uma estadia comoda e tranquila. Dispõe de um amplo terraço, ótimo para fazer refeições ao ar livre e relaxar. Ideal para famílias ou grupos de amigos.

The space
Apartamento localizado no 1ª andar de um edifício residencial de 3 andares, com duas frentes, zona social orientada a sudoeste com um amplo terraço, apartamento muito luminoso. Decoração simples e prática que proporciona um ambiente acolhedor. Dispõe de um quarto com casa de banho privativa com banheira, os outros dois quartos dispõe de uma outra casa de banho de apoio com base de duche. A zona social constituída por sala comum e cozinha têm ainda um wc de serviço com lavat
column7: Zona residencial rodeada de lojas de comércio tradicional, restaurantes, cafés, farmácia, mercearias e supermercados. Parques públicos a menos de 500 m, Jardim da Arca de Água e Quinta do Covelo.

This charming four-storey house is located in one of the most emblematic and historic streets of Porto, Rua de Trás overlooking the Rua dos Clérigos, in the center of Porto, close to all the main tourist attractions.
Ideally located to enjoy everything that the city has to offer, 5 minutes walk from S. Bento metro station (access to the airport 30 minutes)
It is an excellent, pleasant and comfortable starting point to discover Porto and its surroundings.

The space

It includes five spacious rooms with a flat-screen TV - three of them with a private bathroom - each one with two single beds (sheets, duvets, feather pillows) a common bathroom with two shower booths, a fully equipped kitchen with a washing machine , fridge, ceramic hob, kettle, an espresso machine, an iron with table and all types of kitchen extensions. column6:
This apartment, located in Canidelo, is ideal for 8 vacationers. It offers 3 bedrooms, a balcony and WiFi.

The space
This apartment, located in Canidelo, is ideal for 8 vacationers. It offers 3 bedrooms, a balcony and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day in the sun. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi.
The apartment has 3 comfortable bedrooms, 1 including a double bed and a private bathroom with a shower and toilet and 2 including a single bed. The bathroom is fitted with a bathtub, a shower and a toilet.
The apartment features a washing machine, a fan, cleaning products, a vacuum cleaner, ironing equipment and a dryer.
Note that the cleaning, towels, bed linen and tourist tax are included in the rental fee.
Parking is available onsite and is private. Smoking is allowed. Pets are allowed. Parties are not allowed.
Bikes are at your dis
column7: This apartment enjoys a privileged location that will allow you to enjoy your stay in the area. Many activities await you in the surroundings, such as Horse riding, Cycling, Fishing, Sailing, Water sports, Scuba diving, Tennis, Windsurfing, Rafting, Hiking, Caving, Swimming, Golfing and Snorkelling.  Canidelo beach is 2 km away from the apartment. You will also find great bars and restaurants at 200 m and a supermarket within 500 m.  Fojo golf course is 2 km away from the apartment.

column5: Colorful Bright Flat w/ Balcony by Host Wise
column6:
Live like a local in the heart of Porto.

Located in the city center, this cozy and modern apartment that has been renewed, balcony and capacity for 5 is ideal for you!

It is an excellent option for those who want to enjoy all the best that Porto has to offer.

We are a team passionate about Porto, always excited to receive fantastic people from all over the world. Send us a message and prepare your bags for an unforgettable experience.

The space
You will have everything at your disposal to make your stay more comfortable.

The apartment, fantastic, is bright and has plenty of space to socialize. It has 1 double bed, 2 singles and 1 sofa bed, perfect for groups and families. There will be space for everyone to enjoy a beautiful night's sleep in this T1 + 1.

The kitchen is fantastic, fully equipped and waiting to cook the best local dishes.

Not only do we offer Wi-Fi to share everything on social netwo
column7: The apartment is located in downtown Porto. It is 5 minutes from the famous Torre dos Clérigos and the Lello bookshop. 10 minutes from Avenida dos Aliados and São Bento train station. In addition, it is in an area with many options for cafes, restaurants and supermarkets.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

JGGAPARTMENTS - Alojamentos Turísticos, Lda., é uma empresa que se destina ao alojamento turístico no Porto e Norte de Portugal.
bnapartments, são apartamentos e Chalé, destinados a alojamento temporário. Neste momento, dispõe de 8 unidades, estrategicamente situadas em 8 das localizações mais interessantes na cidade do Porto e Norte de Portugal
* bnapartments Palácio - Junto ao Palácio de Cristal.
* bnapartments Rio - Entre a Cordoaria e a Alfândega,  junto à Muralha Fernandina.
* bnapartments Trindade - A 100 mts da estação de metro "Trindade" e a 200mts da Câmara Municipal e do mercado do Bolhão.
* bnapartments LoftPuzzle - No Largo dos Lóis, junto à Avenida dos Aliados, Estação S. Bento, Torres dos Clérigos, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - A 200 mts da Praça da Ribeira, mercado Ferreira Borges, Palácio da Bolsa, Igreja Monumento S. Francisco, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - Próximo de Cedofeira, a 400 mts da Torre dos Clérigos
Bagoada Shelter - Casa com 2 quartos a 3 km de Vila Nova de Cerveira, 17km das praias de Moledo, 76 km de Braga, 133 km de Santiago de Compostela, 56 km de Vigo
* bnK Sailing - Veleiro de 14 metros, com 3 quartos, habitualmente atracado na Douro Marina, na Afurada, Vila Nova de Gaia

column5: Guest H4U - Porto Fontainhas, Romantic place
column6:
Guest H4U - Porto Fontainhas is located next to the Douro, in a typical Portuguese building, yet renovated. This charming studio is the ideal place to discover and live Porto life! It is close to the city center, the Ponte do Infante, the typical area of the São João festival, a weekly fair on Saturday and 10 minutes walk from the Ponte Dom Luis and the Port wine cellars. It is the perfect place for a romantic stay.

The space
Guest H4U - Porto Fontainhas, is a renovated studio in the city center. Our studio is in a typical Portuguese building with its antiquity to seduce you, however it has been completely renovated. It has a fully equipped kitchen: oven, hob, fridge, microwave, Nespresso coffee machine. It has a bathroom with Italian shower and toilet. The bed is a double 140*190, the living room has a sofa to receive a child, a table with 4 chairs.
The Internet connection works very well, the TV is connected to more than 150 channels (multi-languages). We
column7:
Guest H4U - Porto Fontainhas is located next to the Douro, in a typical Portuguese building, yet renovated. The ideal place to discover and live Porto life! It is close to the city center, the Ponte do Infante, the typical area of the São João festival, a weekly fair on Saturday and 10 minutes walk from the Ponte Dom Luis and the Port wine cellars. It is the perfect place for a romantic stay.
The Sé cathedral, Rua Santa Catarina, the Ponte Dom Luis, the Port wine cellars are not far away.
column14:
Bonjour à tous,
Je suis tombée amoureuse de Porto et j’ai donc décidé de venir m’y installer. Mon parcours hotelier m'a donné envie  de créer ma propre société Guest H4U.
C'est une belle aventure que je partage avec mon conjoint, Mathieu.
Nous vous accueillons comme à l'hotel dans chaque appartement. Nous avons développer des partenariats (chauffeurs privées, guide, chasse aux trésors, tour dans le Douro) qui vous permettrons de découvrir Porto comme les Portuenses!
N’hésitez pas à nous contacter pour plus d’informations
Et d'ici là faites de beaux voyages!
Isabelle & Mathieu et toute l'équipe  @GuestH4U

It is ideal for a quiet stay of up to four people, with a bedroom with a double bed and a mezzanine with two single beds.
The neighborhood is characterized by the hustle and bustle of a location in the heart of Porto, where within a radius of 800 meters are places of enormous cultural interest.

The space
The apartment is fully available for guests. It has a fully equipped kitchen, two complete bathrooms, a living room, a bedroom with a double bed, a mezzanine with two beds that can be together for a couple, and a balcony overlooking Porto's city's bustle.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the kitchen, living room, bedrooms, bathrooms, and balcony.
There is paid parking on and around the street.

column7:
The neighborhood is characterized by the bustle of a location in the heart of the city of Porto. Located next to the mythical Batalha Cinema and the splendid building of the S. João National Theater. Next to it, we have one of the busiest shopping streets, Rua de Santa Catarina, and the famous Bolhão market.
The S. Bento station and Avenida dos Aliados are only a 5 minute walk away and the Torre dos Clérigos and Livraria Lello are only a 10 minute walk away. To Ribeira and to cross the illustrious D. Luis bridge a 10 minute walk is enough.
It is an area that still has a wide variety of bars and restaurants to choose from, finding the most varied options.
For evening entertainment, we recommend the area of Rua Galerias de Paris, which is 10 minutes walk away.

column6:
The space
With the Palácio da Bolsa as your neighbor, step into Bourgeoisie luxury and sophistication in the heart of the historical centre in Porto. Situated in the Ribeira and close to many attractions, the Modern Chic provides all the stylish essentials for the world traveller. A bright space filled with fabulous amenities and modern décor. Located just minutes from the Dom Luis Bridge, São Bento Train Station and the Lello Bookshop, it’s perfectly poised for a trendy Porto vacation.

At Modern Chic, you will be struck by the open and airy space. The white walls and wood floors create a stunning backdrop for the beautiful furnishings and warm wooden accents. The living room is bathed in light thanks to the expansive windows that compose an entire wall. High-ceilings and large windows adorn your abode. Paired with antique Vintage furniture they create a perfect apartment for you to experience this historical city like a true Portuense.

column6:
Cozy apartment in the city center, next to the Bolhão metro!
Fully equipped apartment with 2 bedrooms and air conditioning, located 2 minutes from Rua de Santa Catarina and 10 minutes from Avenida dos aliados. It privileges very fast access to public transport, such as Bolhão station, which is 2 minutes away, and 5 minutes from Trindade central metro station. The ideal fusion of comfort and tranquility in downtown Porto.

The space
Located on the 5th floor of a building located on the historic Rua de Fernandes Tomás, along with all the comfort and its excellent location, also provides everything needed for a better stay.
It has pleasant areas with two very cozy bedrooms with twin beds each.
Bolhão 424 is equipped with air conditioning for warmer days, and central heating for the more rigorous winter days.

The apartment has at your disposal a fully equipped and functional kitchen with fridge and freezer, microwave, hob, kitchen counter, t
column7:
The neighborhood is marked by the proximity of the market of Bolhão, the most typical place of Porto, where you can find the real Oporto and its customs.
The street has a large variety of traditional and historical shops in Porto.
In addition to the Bolhão market, the "Casa Chinesa" with Portuguese specialties, "Casa Natal", the famous "confeitaria Imprério", and the space of great reference of the traditional Pastel de Nata of "A Manteigaria".

There are several patisseries and cafés on the street where breakfast and other meals are served.
Speaking of gastronomy, the offer is very varied: "O Buraco" restaurant,
confectionery / restaurant "A Cunha", "A Taberna do Doutor", all typical places of Porto.

Theexclusive restaurant and rooftop bar of Hotel D. Henrique has one of the best views over the Port; "Bull BBGourmet Bolhão"; "Champanheria da Baixa", among others.
The area is very well served by supermarkets and convenience stores: P
column14:
Welcome 2 Porto is a professional tourism management team. All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who receive the guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
They are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto, also UNESCO site, listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, influence for Harry Potter, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha and tripas or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.

column6:
Apartment completely renovated in the historical center of Porto, in Unesco World Heritage Site! With a privileged location and vintage decor.
Inserted in Ribeira do Porto, a 2-minute walk from the Douro River. The apartment retains all the original structure of the building, UNESCO World Heritage. Very spacious, comfortable and quiet. Perfect for accommodating 2 people with every comfort, combining tranquility and proximity to the main attractions of the city.
Charm in the historical center.

The space
This is a one bedroom apartment host up to 2 people.
Apartment is completely renovated, spacious and very comfortable.
The kitchenette is well equipped with fridge, freezer, hob, toaster, coffee maker, microwave and various kitchen accessories (pots, pans, can opener, bottle opener, dishes, cutlery, individual, etc.).
Here sleeps two people with every comfort in bedroom with double bed.

column7:
The building is located on the historical center of Porto, in the heart of UNESCO World Heritage Center.
It's one minute away from the river side, and in the same street you have monuments like Palácio da Bolsa, S. Francisco church, among others.
Is close by to all the city's major attractions such as the Port Wine Cellars, Clérigos Tower, Lello book store which inspired J.K. Rowling in her Harry Potter books, and so much more. 5 min from S.Bento Station and from Alfândega Porto Congress Center.

Located in Av. Boavista, the most iconic Av. in Porto, just 15min walk (5min drive) from Serralves & Casa da Música, is a perfect location to explore Porto.

Hop-On-Hop-Off bus is just 400 meters away so couldn’t be easier to explore the highlights of the city.

Parking space available, so it's also an excellent option to use as base for exploring North Portugal, with fantastic one-day trips to explore the best hidden treasures of Portugal.

Fully renovated in 2019.

Other things to note
There is a 3rd room that is locked and not accessible.

column7:
The apartment is located in the heart of the city, in one of the most historical areas of Porto. Right next to the emblematic Porto Cathedral (Porto Cathedral), it is also close to the famous D.Luis I bridge, S. Bento Station and all the historical center of the city. It combines tranquility and security with a premium location. all important monuments, squares and picturesque places of the city just 5 minutes walk away.
The river Douro and Ribeira, one of the most beautiful and colorful areas of the city, is only 10 minutes away. From there, you can cross the Ponte Luís to Gaia, where you will have the best view of Porto. In addition, this is where all the wineries of Port Wine.
Just 5 minutes from the apartment you can also find the most modern nightclub (Paris Galleries) of the city with all kinds of bars and restaurants.
An excellent choice for those who come for a holiday or work.
column14:
Welcome 2 Porto is a professional tourism management team. All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who receive the guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
They are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto, also UNESCO site, listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, influence for Harry Potter, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha and tripas or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.

It is an excellent choice for those who come for a family or business trip.

column7:
The apartment is in the heart of the city, just 10 minutes from the historical center.
Its privileged location allows you in just 5 minutes to be in the Church of Our Lady of Lapa (landmark of the locality) and also in Praça da República where you can find the perfect spaces for your shopping, from the supermarket (Pingo Doce, Praça da Republica 58), as well as the traditional grocery stores of the city that sell a little of everything.
It is also 10 minutes from Rua do Almada and Rua da Picaria. The two streets are distinguished by the quality of the restaurant offerings from the more traditional gastronomy such as the typical ham sandwiches from Taxca (Rua da Picaria, 26) to the famous hamburgers of De Gema (Rua do Almada 249) or the "francesinhas" Coat of arms in the Rua de Ramalho Ortigão (28). Continuing down to Ceuta Street, always very busy to walk and shop by day and have fun in the evening.

column6:
Vive uma experiência como um local no coração do Porto!

Vão encontrar um apartamento acolhedor localizado no centro da cidade numa vizinhança amigável com Wi-Fi grátis, Netflix, Garagem e Varanda.

É a melhor opção para casais, aventureiros, pequenos grupos e viajantes de negócios que querem aproveitar tudo o que o Porto tem para oferecer.

Estou sempre ansioso para receber pessoas fantásticas. Enviem-me uma mensagem e preparem-se para a melhor experiência de sempre!

The space
Apartamento acolhedor no centro da cidade localizado numa vizinhança tranquila, está a 5 minutos da estação de metro 24 de Agosto e apenas a 10 minutos do Jardim de São Lázaro.

O apartamento tem 2 quartos sendo o primeiro com 1 cama de casal e o segundo com 2 camas de solteiro para vos proporcionar uma óptima noite de sono. Há também uma varanda para aproveitar o sol e tomar um café enquanto desfrutam da vista na cidade.

Para além disso
column7:
O apartamento está a apenas 10 minutos da Praça dos Poveiros e 5 de Santa Catarina.

Está numa localização privilegiada, rodeada por restaurantes, supermercados e monumentos. Vão encontrar um restaurante chamado Brasão, onde podem comer a melhor sandes de carne de porco! E também a melhor Francesinha no Café Santiago!

column5: GuestReady - Stylish Apartment with Private Balcony in Gaia
column6:
A 1-bedroom apartment located in picturesque Gaia, just right across the Douro River. My apartment is perfect for couples and solo travelers alike!

The space
Welcome to my home!

Located along the cobble-stoned streets of Rua Pinhal, you will be minutes away from the picturesque views of Porto and Douro River. Here, you will be steps away from various small coffee-shops, restaurants and wine-speciality stores.

My apartment is comprised of a single bedroom, bathroom and open living area. Here you will find a small sitting area with a flat-screen TV, a dining table with high-bar stools, and fully-equipped open kitchen with an electric hob, kettle and washing machine. Feel free and enjoy the complimentary Nespresso pods provided in my home. There's also a balcony outside that's easily accessible, with a small table, chairs and a street view -- perfect for people watching.

The bedroom comes with a double-bed lined in hotel quality line
column7: A hub of the port wine industry, Vila Nova de Gaia is peppered with cellars offering tours and tastings. It’s also known for sandy beaches like Praia da Madalena, and the scenic riverside road Cais de Gaia, with its cafe terraces and expansive views across the Douro. Small restaurants serve grilled fish and seafood in the old fishing village of Afurada, where picturesque tiled houses line narrow streets.

column5: Liiiving in Porto | Santa Catarina Boutique
column6:
Welcome to our Santa Catarina Boutique, where you'll blend with Porto, finding a charming and cozy place which will become your own getaway spot to relax.

The space
You'll have a one bedroom apartment, with a double bed; one bathroom, with shower; a living room with a flat screen TV, with cable channels and a sofa bed for an extra person; the kitchen has all the essentials for your stay, including an espresso machine and a dishwasher, so you can feel yourself at home.

We are committed to you comfort and entertainment, so you'll have air conditioning and free WiFi. The apartment is easily accessible by elevator.

Want to meet us? Book now! Because Liiiving is easy!

Guest access
The guests have full access to the apartment.

Other things to note
In order to make Porto more attractive, the municipal tourist tax came into effect.
The rate of € 2.00 included in the price of stay, is for guests over
column7:
You'll be at the heart of the city, right at Rua de Santa Catarina, which is the main street for commerce and lets you be just minutes away from everything you might need for a stay without worries. And if you want to explore further, the Bolhão metro station is just a 5 minutes walk from the apartment.

You won’t have a shortage of places to check, from the Majestic Café to the São João theatre, there are many iconic places to leave you in awe. And to make sure you have your belly full to have the energy to walk around, there are great restaurants nearby, from the typical Francesinha at Café Santiago to the more classic Portuguese food at Abadia.

For more suggestions, install our app "Liiiving" (available for Android and iOS).

We'd love to welcome you... Book now! Because Liiiving is easy!
column14:
Olá! We are Liiiving's Short Stay team!

We are looking forward to welcome you in our properties :)
We were born and we have lived in Porto. We will be happy to help you out to know and enjoy every city where we are installed !
We love to meet new people, enjoy literature, cinema, to travel, meeting other cultures, other ways of being and living life !
We are delighted to give a personal welcome to our guests and to receive them the best way we can :)
Hope to see you soon !

column5: Apartment with one bedroom in Porto, with furnished terrace and WiFi - 2 km from the beach
column6:
This apartment, located in Porto, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers a bedroom, a furnished terrace and WiFi.

The space
This apartment, located in Porto, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers a bedroom, a furnished terrace and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day in the sun. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi and a Hi-Fi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 4 or outside, on the balcony or on the terrace enjoying views of the garden.
The apartment has a comfortable bedroom with 2 single beds. The bathroom is fitted with a bathtub and a toilet.
The apartment features cleaning products, a jacuzzi, a dryer, a washing machine, ironing equipment and a vacuum cleaner.
Note that the cleaning, towels and bed linen are included in the rental fee. A tourist tax of
column7: This apartment enjoys a privileged location that will allow you to enjoy your stay in the area. Many activities await you in the surroundings, such as Horse riding, Surfing, Scuba diving, Hiking, Fishing, Snorkelling, Cycling, Swimming, Tennis, Golfing, Windsurfing, Jet-Skiing, Sailing and Water sports.  Ribeira do Porto beach is 2 km away from the apartment. You will also find great bars and restaurants at 300 m and a supermarket within 300 m.  CityGolfe golf course is 10 km away from the apartment.
