column5: Trendy Studio w/Balcony in Great Location! 3.1
column6:
The creatively designed studio features a cosy living space, a modern bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for 4 guests.

The space
Welcome to Un-Almada House! A trendy building located in the heart of Porto, just 5 minutes from Porto São Bento station and other attractions in the city! Newly renovated, it’s the perfect mix of modern and classic. This uniquely designed and brightly coloured studio has all the necessities for a great stay in Porto. The spacious layout makes it comfortable for all 4 guests. The living space is fitted with a double bed, a sofa which extends to a double sofa bed and a dining table for 4. There is a TV for guests to enjoy a relaxing evening in as well.

The modern tiled bathroom is fitted with a shower, sink and toilet, along with a hairdryer for your use.

A fully equipped kitchen with stove, oven, microwave, toaster and refrigerator will allow you to prepare any meal at home if you don’t plan to go out
column7:
Porto is an amazing city to explore by foot, with many attractions within walking distance. There are hundreds of restaurants, bars and cafes in the area - you will never get bored! If you would like to utilize the kitchen, you can grab some groceries at the store down the street.

Plenty of attractions are just minutes away, including São Bento Train Station, Clérigos Tower and the famous Lello bookstore!
column14:
We manage several apartments in Oporto's Historic centre. If you are searching for the best place to rest after exploring this amazing city, we can help you with that :)

The apartments can provide you with a real native experience! They are all furnished and well equipped for a pleasant, yet alternative, stay compared to a traditional hotel room. They are all located near most of the main attractions in the city.

If you have any questions our staff can give you all the information.

Hope to see you here! :D

column5: Charming Room with Double Bed in Communa Garage
column6:
Cool and well equipped residential house in the heart of Bonfim neighborhood in PORTO. The house consists 8 rooms in different sizes, a communal area with a large and equipped kitchen, laundry dryer machine, strong WIFI, green and cozy patio and lots of good vibes!
The house is located in the most artistic neighborhood in Porto, near the metro station and the city center.
The Communa Garage community is hosting once every two weeks some cool events, such as workshops, galleries, lectures..

The space
The XX century house with amazing location, recently refurbished. It was done taking into account of modern times comfort standards. It's facing calm street, so we wish you a inspired stay!

Guest access
The house has one large fully equipped kitchen/living room with sofas and working spaces, eight light and airy bedrooms, four bathrooms with showers, one toilet, little garden with pátio and a laundry place.

Other things t
column7: Porto is blooming, and this is the center of it all! Nearby our house there is the best viewpoint to the riverside, it is awesome. You will be in the middle of the everything, but in a peaceful place!

column14:
Hello, I am responsible for the reservations of my family properties. 
The apartments are very clean and well equipped; however feel free to ask any item you could miss, or cannot find. We will try to provided it during your stay. 
The properties are rented in whole, No sharing with other guests or owner. 
My family lives in O Porto and one family member will be always available to take care of your check in and assist you during your stay. 
Looking forward to have the pleasure to welcome you and provide you a memorable stay!

I speak fluently English, Portuguese and a little bit of french and Spanish. 
I take your reservation very seriously and I never cancel. 
Please make first an inquiry clicking on the button: "contact me" 
Than I will reply to your request with a accurate offer. At this point you are free to book it on line. 
I do not advise you to press the button "book it" because some dates may have 5 nights minimum stay policy or are on hold. 
I did decline some reservations 24 hours after the guest book it, but I never cancelled it. 
Kind regards, Joana Fontes

column6:
`*Please note that there's some temporary renovations being done in the building during the day*

Near Porto's historical center and 5 minutes from the emblematic Casa da Música, Vila Burgães is inserted in an area with a great offer of restaurants, shops and services, with colleges and hospitals nearby. Vila Burgães arises from the rehabilitation of an old worker island in Porto, now converted into 8 lofts with mezzanine and 2 T1 duplex that develop around a common outdoor patio. In a fusion of the traditional and the contemporary, the architectural design of Vila Burgães favors functionality and the careful choice of materials and finishes of excellence.

The space
Vila Burgães - Casa 4 is comprised of the following:
-A double sized bed and comfortable linen.
-A living area with a sofa for you to kick back and relax. The TV isn't functional yet but there's a hotspot modem that provides free Wi-Fi.
-A fully equipped kitchenette that com
column7:
Places worth visiting nearby:
- Aliados Avenue
- Tower and Church of Clérigos
- Lello bookstore
- São Bento train station – typical Portuguese tiles can be found on the inside
- S. Francisco Church
- Dom Luís I Bridge – an iconic symbol of Porto
- Galerias de Paris - a popular nightspot, often frequented by locals.
- Majestic Café - The most historical café in Porto
- Rua de Santa Catarina - a popular shopping spot filled with international stores, amazing restaurants, and cafés.
- Guindais Funicular
- Port Wine cellars - situated in Gaia, on the other side of the bridge!

column6:
Pine Lodge is a luxurious bungalow on nature, designed by experienced hosts and based on a concept of sustainability, giving new life to materials full of stories and inspired by our local experiences of passionate trips to Africa.
Located in an urban farm at the gates of Porto, it has the mountain and the train station at 2 steps.
Its tree deck, its amazing views and facilities, make this place a movie scene. Perfect for two who look for a good time connected w/ nature, yet w/ all the comfort!

The space
This perfect location makes possible to have the best of both worlds, between the tranquility of the nature and the cultural wealth of the magnificent city of Porto.
Pine Lodge is full of great amenities to make the most of your stay in nature. Douzens of idyllic scenarios are possible here. Imagine yourself relaxing at the top of a centenary pine tree, under a starry sky or staring a sunny end of day. Or snuggled by the fireplace while watching N
column7:
Valongo is a valley nestled between mountains, historically linked to the extraction of gold in Roman times and, in modern times, to the exploration of the slate and the production of artisanal bread and biscuits.
Porto Natura House is situated in a quiet and safe residential area with supermarket, restaurants, shopping center, pharmacy and train station at a walking distance.
You may enjoy the neat air from the countryside with a relaxing ecological walk, alongside the “Paleozoic Route” (Sítio Rede Natura 2000), that will take you to an "Aldeia de Portugal", next to the river, between mountains. For the more adventurous, it is also possible to visit the Roman gold mines!!
You can take a stroll along the old axis of the city where you will find the famous Fábrica Paupério with an open shop to buy their delicious biscuits, museums, pleasure grounds and several restaurants and bars.

The space
This house, located in Guilhabreu, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers 2 bedrooms, an enclosed garden and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi, a radio and a CD player.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 4 or outside, on the terrace, in the garden or in the garden.
The house has 2 comfortable bedrooms, 1 including a double bed and 1 including 2 single beds. The bathroom is fitted with a bathtub, a toilet and a shower. A separate toilet is available

- Port Wine

column14:
Welcome 2 Porto is a professional tourism management team. All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who receive the guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
They are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto, also UNESCO site, listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, influence for Harry Potter, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha and tripas or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.

column5: Cozy flat with balcony view at Sé & Luis I Bridge
column6:
Pleasant flat located just a few steps from São Bento train station, Sé Cathedral and Porto's most iconic scenic view: The Luis I Bridge. The apartment is equipped with high speed wifi, Netflix, espresso coffee machine and all the essential amenities to make your stay very comfortable.

Let us know what we can do to best welcome you!

The space
The apartment is located in the 2nd floor of a historic house transformed into a small building.
Apartment with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and an open space with kitchen, living room, TV room and dining room and a balcony with a view to the historical part of the city and Sé Cathedral, with a table for 2.
In the bedroom there is a Queen bed a wardrobe and a table that may be very helpful if you want to open your notebook or read. In the living room there's a sofa bed for 2 people.
Be sure to drink a Porto wine and eat a cheese from Serra da Estrela in our balcony facing the historical Porto.
column7:
This is where it all happens! This apartment is located in the heart of the historical city, in the middle of everything, which allows you to explore the main tourist area of the city on foot. On top of that, it is located 3 min / 170m on foot from the São Bento train and metro station, 2 min / 150m to the Sé Cathedral and 4 min / 280m on foot from Luis I Bridge. When crossing it on foot, you will be astonished by it's view (to both Porto and Gaia) and in Gaia and you will be able to have the view of Porto that has become the city's postcard.
And just behind of you there are the iconics streets, Mouzinho da Silveira and Rua das Flores (pedestrian). These main streets of the historical center are home to most famous restaurantes and cafés . You will be able to find a pharmacy, supermarket and everything you need near the apartment.
The São Bento station is beautiful and one of the city's tourist icons. Enjoy being so close to the station, come in, choose one of the round trip
column14:
We are Paula and Rafael, a couple from Brazil. We love to travel, mostly to places we've never been before. We love that 'first time visiting" experience!
But, no matter where we are, we like to be in the best location in a comfortable and stylish place.
That's the reason why we decided to found our company, "Qualquer Destino (Meaning "Any Destination", in english).
Our goal is to provide our guests the kind of experience that we like, to make an unique and special one.

column5: Stunning Modern Flat w/ Terrace Miramar  | Gaia
column6:
Live like a local in Gaia.

This cosy apartment is ideal for you! It will provide you a nice atmosphere to relax. It has 2 double beds and a terrace with a lot of sun light.

It is an excellent option for solo adventurers, weekend travellers, couples, and business travellers who wish to enjoy all Porto and Gaia has to offer.

We are a passionate team in Porto, always excited to welcome amazing people from all over the world. Send us a message and pack your bags for an unforgettable experience.

The space
You'll have everything ready to make sure you have a comfortable stay.

The space has both a double bed, super comfy to have a great night of sleep, as well as a kitchen fully equipped to cook the local delicacies. Moreover, there is a big terrace with a lot of sun light where you can enjoy to grab a cup of coffe or wine and have a better experience of the city. The property accomodates 4 adults and 1 child in a smaller bed.
column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column14:
Hi world, my name is João Figueira, founder of Meet Your Host - Local Accomodation, I am 34 years old, and counting too fast...! I was born and grew up in a small town in Alentejo region, at the age of 16, moved to Lisboa to continue my studies in Service Management.

Since I've moved to this magical city I have been collecting professional experiences, from transportation to sales, and am currently working as operations and host manager for short term rentals, what I actually love to do!

During my journey I have lived in three different locations in Portugal, from South to the North, and had a short international experience in London (6 months), which brought me fluency in English and Spanish. My favorite hobbies include several things, but what I really love to do is; travel, sports, food and spend quality time with my family and friends.

As a local and host (full time job), I look forward to connect with people traveling to Porto, aiming to provide a 5 star experience in this beautiful city  :)

column6:
Fantastic 1 bedroom Duplex apartment in Largo da Fontinha.
Fully renovated building. A cozy and very comfortable space, perfect for a comfortable stay. Equipped with air conditioning in both bedroom and living room, and washing machine.
The ideal fusion between comfort and tranquility, just a few minutes walk from the center of Porto. An excellent option both for those on vacation and for business travelers.

The space
1 bedroom duplex apartment on the ground floor of a recently renovated building.
Located next to Rua de Santa Catarina, and close to the center of Porto.
The living room is equipped with a flat screen Smart TV, air conditioning, and a very comfortable sofa bed.
The bedroom has a double bed, air conditioning, and bathed in natural light.
The kitchen is fully equipped, with a coffee machine, kettle, toaster, microwave with grill and washing machine.
It has a bathroom with shower, toilet and washbasin.
The whole
column7:
The apartment is less than 15 minutes from the city center of Porto.

Located parallel to Rua de Santa Catarina, you quickly access this famous shopping street, where in addition to several shops of the most varied types, you will also find typical attractions of the city, such as the Mercado do Bolhão (typical market, recently remodeled), the cafe Majestic (cafe with classic decoration and architecture) and Capela das Almas (known for its Portuguese tile facade).

It is also 15 minutes from Rua do Almada and Rua da Picaria. The two streets are distinguished by the quality of the restaurant offer, from the most traditional gastronomy such as the typical Taxca ham sandwiches (Rua da Picaria, 26) to the famous De Gema hamburgers (Rua do Almada 249) or the "francesinhas" of Brasão on Rua de Ramalho Ortigão (28). Continuing down to Rua De Ceuta, always very busy to stroll and shop by day and have fun at night.

The location of the apartment stands out for its
column14:
Porto City Hosts is a locally based tourism team consisting of proud Porto citizens. 
We receive our guests with local charm and professional quality. We make our guests feel well accompanied during their stay, helping them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!
We also are passionate travelers eager to find out new places, to know new cultures, landscapes, palates, and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, sharing suggestions with new sensations, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river walk through the old Porto streets. 
You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto!
It will be a pleasure to host you.

column14:

column6:
This villa, located in Porto, is ideal for 12 vacationers. It offers 5 bedrooms, a private pool, a furnished balcony and WiFi.

The space
This villa, located in Porto, is ideal for 12 vacationers. It offers 5 bedrooms, a private pool open all year, a furnished balcony and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book in front of the fireplace or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 14 or outside, on the balcony enjoying views of the garden, the swimming pool, the mountains and the city.

column6:
Fantastic 2 bedroom Duplex apartment with garden, in Largo da Fontinha.
Fully renovated building. A cozy and very comfortable space, perfect for a comfortable stay.
Equipped with air conditioning in both bedrooms and living room, and washing machine.
The ideal fusion between comfort and tranquility, just a few minutes walk from the center of Porto.
An excellent option both for those on vacation and for business travelers.

The space
T2 duplex apartment on the ground floor of a recently renovated building.
Located next to Rua de Santa Catarina, and close to the center of Porto.
The living room is equipped with a flat screen Smart TV, air conditioning, and a very comfortable sofa bed.
The apartment has two bedrooms, both with a double bed and air conditioning. One of the bedrooms is a suite, and the other has a TV.
The kitchen is fully equipped, with a coffee machine, kettle, toaster, microwave with grill and washing machi
column7:
The apartment is less than 15 minutes from the city center of Porto.

Located parallel to Rua de Santa Catarina, you quickly access this famous shopping street, where in addition to several shops of the most varied types, you will also find typical attractions of the city, such as the Mercado do Bolhão (typical market, recently remodeled), the cafe Majestic (cafe with classic decoration and architecture) and Capela das Almas (known for its Portuguese tile facade).

It is also 15 minutes from Rua do Almada and Rua da Picaria. The two streets are distinguished by the quality of the restaurant offer, from the most traditional gastronomy such as the typical Taxca ham sandwiches (Rua da Picaria, 26) to the famous De Gema hamburgers (Rua do Almada 249) or the "francesinhas" of Brasão on Rua de Ramalho Ortigão (28). Continuing down to Rua De Ceuta, always very busy to stroll and shop by day and have fun at night.

The location of the apartment stands out for its
column14:
Porto City Hosts is a locally based tourism team consisting of proud Porto citizens. 
We receive our guests with local charm and professional quality. We make our guests feel well accompanied during their stay, helping them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!
We also are passionate travelers eager to find out new places, to know new cultures, landscapes, palates, and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, sharing suggestions with new sensations, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river walk through the old Porto streets. 
You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto!
It will be a pleasure to host you.

column6:
Unique, exquisite and original beachfront house that pairs a traditional architecture with a sleek modern aesthetic, inside a vast garden with a patio that features outdoor seating. Upon walking to the entrance, guests are greeted by a double ceiling main room with plentiful windows that welcome in abundant natural light. The bedroom overlooks the main room and faces the sea. A rooftop with extraordinary ocean views is ideal for late afternoon relaxation, while enjoying the sunset.

The space
Newly remodelled and exclusive house in Porto, Portugal, that maintains the uniqueness of the original building’s architecture, while its modern aesthetic provides maximum comfort and functionality.

Located on a beachfront lot in Foz, 20 minutes from downtown and a 1 minute walk to the ocean.

The main living room upon entering the building boasts a double ceiling height, welcoming plenty of natural light, a comfortable sitting area by the fireplace, and
column7:
Porto won the best urban destination in the World Travel Awards.
Foz is Porto's most privileged neighbourhood, located in front if the sea and a short distance form the heart of downtown and many of Porto's main attractions. It is a safe residential area, full of wonderful restaurants and shops. Right in front of the house you have the Foz gardens, a wonderful area to walk or exercise in, right on top of the beach. There is a plentitude of beaches to choose from all within a couple minutes walk.

column6:
bnapartments Loftpuzzle is well located in the center of Porto, just 100 meters from the central Avenida dos Aliados and 200 meters from the historic São Bento Railway Station. The modern and stylish studios are 150 meters from a metro station.

The space
The studios offer views over Porto and a living room with a flat-screen TV with national and international channels and a sofa.

Each unit accommodates a maximum of 2 adults and 2 children, with 2 single beds and a double sofa bed, as well as a full kitchenette and a fully equipped private bathroom.

The historic Ribeira area offers views of the Douro River and is 600 meters away, with a wide range of traditional restaurants and cafés.

License number
5725/AL
column7: The Galerias de Paris, the main nightlife area in the city of Porto, features several bars and restaurants are at 350 meters away. The iconic Torre dos Clérigos is 180 meters from the studio. The D. Luis I Bridge is 1 km away and connects directly with the neighboring town of Vila Nova de Gaia, where the Port Wine Cellars are located.
column14:
JGGAPARTMENTS - Alojamentos Turísticos, Lda., é uma empresa que se destina ao alojamento turístico no Porto e Norte de Portugal.
bnapartments, são apartamentos e Chalé, destinados a alojamento temporário. Neste momento, dispõe de 8 unidades, estrategicamente situadas em 8 das localizações mais interessantes na cidade do Porto e Norte de Portugal
* bnapartments Palácio - Junto ao Palácio de Cristal.
* bnapartments Rio - Entre a Cordoaria e a Alfândega,  junto à Muralha Fernandina.
* bnapartments Trindade - A 100 mts da estação de metro "Trindade" e a 200mts da Câmara Municipal e do mercado do Bolhão.
* bnapartments LoftPuzzle - No Largo dos Lóis, junto à Avenida dos Aliados, Estação S. Bento, Torres dos Clérigos, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - A 200 mts da Praça da Ribeira, mercado Ferreira Borges, Palácio da Bolsa, Igreja Monumento S. Francisco, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - Próximo de Cedofeira, a 400 mts da Torre dos Clérigos
Bagoada Shelter - Casa com 2 quartos a 3 km de Vila Nova de Cerveira, 17km das praias de Moledo, 76 km de Braga, 133 km de Santiago de Compostela, 56 km de Vigo
* bnK Sailing - Veleiro de 14 metros, com 3 quartos, habitualmente atracado na Douro Marina, na Afurada, Vila Nova de Gaia

In the center of the city and on a 2,500 m2 plot, the 17th century mansion that belonged to the Viscounts of Vilarinho de São Romão, was rehabilitated and now has 16 studios, carefully decorated, self-sufficient, with fully equipped kitchenettes, air conditioning, linen bed linen and towels, flat screen TV's and free Wi-Fi.

For sanitary reasons the pool and gym are temporarily closed.

The space
Open space with 25 m2, ideal for 1 or 2 people.
It has a fully equipped kitchenette, a king size double bed and a modern and complete bathroom.

Bathroom with shower, high quality amenities, hairdryer, kitchenette with refrigerator, stove, microwave, dishwasher, electric kettle, toaster, coffee machine, kitchen utensils, flat screen TV, cable tv, wi-fi, air conditioning.

O Parque de Campismo fica localizado a aproximadamente 600 m da praia de Angeiras Norte, numa localidade que tem vários traços que a tornam única. Lavra é, atualmente, formada por oito lugares: Pampelido (com o desenvolvimento da orla costeira, hoje em dia, identificam-se, informalmente, outros dois lugares: Agudela e Marreco), Avilhoso, Cabanelas, Paiço, Antela, Lavra, Angeiras e a Praia de Angeiras, que constituem a única comunidade de pesca artesanal do concelho. column7: Zona típica, povoada por pescadores gentes ligadas ao mar onde é possível deliciar-se com peixe acabado de pescar. A proximidade à praia permite não só a prática de vários desportos, mas também nos presenteia com paisagens únicas.

column6:
This apartment, located in Porto, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers a bedroom, a terrace and WiFi.

The space
This apartment, located in Porto, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers a bedroom, a terrace and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including a TV with satellite channels, WiFi and a Hi-Fi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 4 or outside, on the terrace.
The apartment has a comfortable bedroom with a double bed. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and a toilet.
The apartment features a fan.
Note that the cleaning, towels, bed linen and tourist tax are included in the rental fee.
Smoking inside is not allowed. Pets are allowed. Parties are not allowed.

Other things to note

column6:
Fantastic 1 bedroom Duplex apartment with garden, in Largo da Fontinha.
Fully renovated building. A cozy and very comfortable space, perfect for a comfortable stay. Equipped with air conditioning in both bedroom and living room, and washing machine.
The ideal fusion between comfort and tranquility, just a few minutes walk from the center of Porto. An excellent option both for those on vacation and for business travelers.

The space
1 bedroom duplex apartment on the first floor of a recently renovated building.
Located next to Rua de Santa Catarina, and close to the center of Porto.
The living room is equipped with a flat screen Smart TV, air conditioning, and a very comfortable sofa bed.
The bedroom has a double bed, air conditioning, and bathed in natural light.
The kitchen is fully equipped, with a coffee machine, kettle, toaster, microwave with grill and washing machine.
It has a bathroom with shower, toilet and washbasin.
column7:
The apartment is less than 15 minutes from the city center of Porto.

Located parallel to Rua de Santa Catarina, you quickly access this famous shopping street, where in addition to several shops of the most varied types, you will also find typical attractions of the city, such as the Mercado do Bolhão (typical market, recently remodeled), the cafe Majestic (cafe with classic decoration and architecture) and Capela das Almas (known for its Portuguese tile facade).

It is also 15 minutes from Rua do Almada and Rua da Picaria. The two streets are distinguished by the quality of the restaurant offer, from the most traditional gastronomy such as the typical Taxca ham sandwiches (Rua da Picaria, 26) to the famous De Gema hamburgers (Rua do Almada 249) or the "francesinhas" of Brasão on Rua de Ramalho Ortigão (28). Continuing down to Rua De Ceuta, always very busy to stroll and shop by day and have fun at night.

The location of the apartment stands out for its
column14:
Porto City Hosts is a locally based tourism team consisting of proud Porto citizens. 
We receive our guests with local charm and professional quality. We make our guests feel well accompanied during their stay, helping them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!
We also are passionate travelers eager to find out new places, to know new cultures, landscapes, palates, and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, sharing suggestions with new sensations, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river walk through the old Porto streets. 
You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto!
It will be a pleasure to host you.

column7:
Cafés, bars and restaurants - 50 meters Tourist Bus - 50 meters; Metro Station - 300 meters; Cruises on the Douro River - 200 meters; Wine cellars of the Port - 200 meters; Historic Area of the City of Porto - 400 meters.

Some attractions of the city of Porto that you can not miss: Church of Cedofeita, Lello Bookstore, Tower of the Clergy, symbol of our city (Nicolau Nasoni century eighteen) and the church with the same name, the Church of San Francisco, of Roman origin and with its interior decorated with gilded carving. There are also several museums that you can visit: Soares dos Reis, Casa de Serralves and Guerra Junqueiro. You can not miss visiting the Port Wine Cellars where, in addition to a guided tour, you can also taste and taste various types of wines that are characteristic of the Douro region.

column14:
Olá!

I'm Jéssica and I love living in Porto. My entrepreneurial roots lead me to open Port'Origami, a short-term rental management company.

I am an expert in tourism and an avid traveller. Stroll through several countries in Europe and South America living, working and volunteering on projects of locals. I like the picturesque spots that only the locals know and love sharing knowledge and experiences. Photography is also part of my life.

I want you to feel very comfortable at Port'Origami homes and make your trip to Porto unforgettable. I will always be available to give you information, tips and help you with anything you need to make the most of your stay.

Looking forward to meeting you!

Several key amenities are also provided here, including heating, fast wi-fi, TV, a washing machine, dishwasher, stove and more! There's also a fre
column7:
Famous for its Port Wine Cellars and stunning views of Porto, Vila Nova de Gaia (or simply Gaia) is located on the other side of the Douro. It has a pretty promenade along the waterfront and is a great place to go for a walk and enjoy the remarkable views of the Dom Luís I Bridge and the picturesque neighborhood of Ribeira and its terraced colorful houses.

TOP ATTRACTIONS IN THE AREA:
- Mosteiro da Serra do Pilar
- Teleférico de Gaia
- Port Lodges;
A few to consider are Sandeman, Cálem, Graham’s and Quinta do Noval, and you’ll get to taste each variety to learn the difference.
- Casa-Museu Teixeira Lopes
- Douro River Trip
- Jardim do Morro
- Parque Biológico de Gaia

column6:
Recently renovated, our apartment is a combination of modernism with a “Porto touch”. All was thought to make you feel at home and, give you the best experience of living in Porto. Our stylish apartment stands out by its inviting terrace and brightness coming from the big windows in the rooms and living room.

The space
Awakening with the smell of fresh white sheets in a comfortable double bed, you will feel restored and full of energy to face the day.
Open the big windows, and allow the room to breathe. Coffee time? No problem, there's an espresso machine available. Breakfast will be easy to prepare in our complete kitchen, where you will find all the equipment and appliances available for you.

Feel free to enjoy your morning coffee from our lovely terrace, where you can relax and forget that you are in the city center.
Getting out you will see that you're in the middle of the action, steps away from the metro and bus stop, plenty of shops
column7:
The apartment is located in a very lively location, it's walking distance from bus and metro stops. It's 12 min walking to the main shopping street "Rua Santa Catarina" and the most charming cafe Majestic.
In the neighborhood, you will find a lot of good and traditional restaurants - where they all fight to have the best "Francesinha", cozy cafes - perfect for breakfast and bars where you can have a drink at the end of the day.
If you choose to cook in the apartment there's also a supermarket 2 minutes away, here you can buy everything you might need.

JGGAPARTMENTS - Alojamentos Turísticos, Lda., é uma empresa que se destina ao alojamento turístico no Porto e Norte de Portugal.
bnapartments, são apartamentos e Chalé, destinados a alojamento temporário. Neste momento, dispõe de 8 unidades, estrategicamente situadas em 8 das localizações mais interessantes na cidade do Porto e Norte de Portugal
* bnapartments Palácio - Junto ao Palácio de Cristal.
* bnapartments Rio - Entre a Cordoaria e a Alfândega,  junto à Muralha Fernandina.
* bnapartments Trindade - A 100 mts da estação de metro "Trindade" e a 200mts da Câmara Municipal e do mercado do Bolhão.
* bnapartments LoftPuzzle - No Largo dos Lóis, junto à Avenida dos Aliados, Estação S. Bento, Torres dos Clérigos, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - A 200 mts da Praça da Ribeira, mercado Ferreira Borges, Palácio da Bolsa, Igreja Monumento S. Francisco, etc.

column5: Apartment with one bedroom in Porto, with balcony and WiFi
column6:
This apartment, located in Porto, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers a bedroom, a balcony and WiFi.

The space
This apartment, located in Porto, is ideal for 4 vacationers. It offers a bedroom, a balcony and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 4 or outside, on the balcony enjoying views of the garden.
The apartment has a comfortable bedroom with a double bed. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and a toilet.
The apartment features a dressing room, ironing equipment, a vacuum cleaner, cleaning products and a fan.
Note that the cleaning, towels and bed linen are included in the rental fee. A tourist tax of 2 euros per person per night will be required upon arrival.
column7: This apartment enjoys a privileged location that will allow you to enjoy your stay in the area. Many activities await you in the surroundings, such as Swimming and Cycling.

column6:
Blue is all about urban feeling mixed with the relaxed lifestyle by the ocean. A fully renovated building, that combines modern simplicity with the fresh ocean breeze and sound. It is located in Praia da Aguda, a charming fishing village, 50m away from an amazing beach and very close to the train station. There are plenty of trains that will take you to the fussy Porto center in just 15 min and to Espinho in just 5 min (Surf destination spot). This way you can enjoy the best of both worlds.

The space
Blue has 2 suites on the second floor, both with private bathroom and a balcony: one with a sea view, the other with a village view, so you can choose between savouring breathtaking sunsets and admire day life in the particularly delightful village center. There are two more rooms on the first floor and where you can admire a mural created by a local street artist OKER. In Blue ground floor, you can also find an open space with a chilling living room and a kitchen w
column7: Always in a short walk distance, you can find some Time Out recommended restaurants and all sorts of commercial and cultural services: cafés and bars, supermarkets and others; Fishery museum and “Estação Litoral da Aguda” aquarium which displays around 60 species of the local aquatic fauna and flora.

column6:
Modern, clean, and homey apartment in the heart of Porto that sleeps up to 4 people. Building is well-maintained and even has an elevator (a rarity in Porto!) Located walking distance from all the sights that Porto has to offer as well as local neighborhoods. Close proximity to public transit (Marques metro stop is a 7 minute walk), grocery stores, and restaurants.

The space
Alegria Delight has a spacious bedroom with a European double bed, plenty of hangers and space for luggage, an ironing board, and iron. The living room has a door and can be closed off for privacy with a sofa bed that can be made up to sleep an additional 2, for a capacity of 4 guests. The living area also comes complete with a flatscreen TV with cable and Alexa (a digital assistant) to play music or learn some basic Portuguese. Wifi is available throughout the apartment. Kitchen/Dining are fully equipped with fridge, microwave, tea kettle, toaster, electric stove/stovetop, espresso maker, wa
column14:
Hi world, my name is João Figueira, founder of Meet Your Host - Local Accomodation, I am 34 years old, and counting too fast...! I was born and grew up in a small town in Alentejo region, at the age of 16, moved to Lisboa to continue my studies in Service Management.

Since I've moved to this magical city I have been collecting professional experiences, from transportation to sales, and am currently working as operations and host manager for short term rentals, what I actually love to do!

During my journey I have lived in three different locations in Portugal, from South to the North, and had a short international experience in London (6 months), which brought me fluency in English and Spanish. My favorite hobbies include several things, but what I really love to do is; travel, sports, food and spend quality time with my family and friends.

As a local and host (full time job), I look forward to connect with people traveling to Porto, aiming to provide a 5 star experience in this beautiful city  :)

column6:
How about waking up, opening the windows and having an incredible view over the Douro River? At Duplex Douro River you will not need to imagine. Modern and full of light, the apartment is located in a recently renovated building, in one of the most charming neighborhoods in Porto. Just a few steps away from the most iconic places in the city (such as Ribeira, Ponte D. Luis I, Aliados, Clerigos, Livraria Lello), you can also take the tram at the foot of Rio to Foz to be in the beach area of City.

The space
'Duplex Douro River' is a 2 bedroom apartment overlooking the River, in downtown Porto.
It has a maximum capacity of 4 people (a room with two single beds and a room with a double bed) and is fully equipped to receive you during your stay in Porto.
Its simple but classy decor will allow you to relax after a day of walking around the city, while also giving you the possibility to enjoy a beautiful sunset from the balcony.
The apartment has Wi-Fi, a
column7:
The apartment is located in the Historic Center of Porto - the oldest area of the city, which has been classified as a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 1996. It is an area marked by the medieval origins of the city and includes some of the main tourist attractions, such as: The iconic São Bento train station, with its wonderful tiles, the Cathedral, Avenida dos Aliados, Torre dos Clérigos and Palácio da Bolsa. The apartment is also just a few steps from the Ribeira area, where you can cross Ponte D. Luis to Vila Nova de Gaia.
Advice from a local: While staying in Porto, do not miss the opportunity to take a boat trip in the Douro, to visit the Port wine cellars in Vila Nova de Gaia and to take a tram by the river between Ribeira and to Foz.

column6:
Live like a local in the heart of Porto.

Located right in the centre of the city, in front of Hospital São João, this great modern house with modern finishes, garage, balcony and space for 5 is the one for you.

It is an excellent option for those who want to enjoy and discover all the best Porto has to offer.

We are a passionate team in Porto, always excited to welcome amazing people from all over the world. Send us a message and pack your bags for an unforgettable experience.

The space
WARNING: The flat is located in a residential area, thus it is forbidden to make any noise after 10PM.

You'll have everything ready to make sure you have a comfortable stay.

The amazing space, is luminous and very spacious. It has a queen size bed, two single beds and one pull-out couch so there is a place for all to enjoy a lovely night of sleep. It is perfect for groups and families.

column14:
Founded in 2016 by two travel enthusiast, Host Wise aims to contribute to a local and enriching travel experience by providing our guests with a local, authentic and unique stay.

All our homes are situated downtown, walking distance from the main attractions at the city center. Decorated with a diverse and authentic style, we hope our home makes you feel our culture and tradition.

We are also concerned with helping each guest with the right tips and hints for a joyful stay in Porto. Thanks to our experienced staff and partnerships established, Host Wise will be able to arrange a personalized pack of activities for your interest.

Be welcome, enjoy your stay and embrace yourself for the best experience ever!

column5: Salgueiros Haven - Beach 1 Bedroom Apart w/ Garage
column6:
Located about 7 minutes walk from the beach, this beautiful apartment recently renovated, with garage, has all the tools to provide you with a pleasant stay. It is an excellent option for a beach vacation or simply to take a few days away from the worries of the daily routine.
Start your morning with breakfast on the balcony and lose your gaze on a landscape that gets lost to the horizon or end your day watching the sunset on the beach.

The space
Equipped for up to four people, the apartment was recently renovated to provide you with the necessary conditions for a comfortable stay. It consists of a beautiful living room with sofa bed and dining area, a spacious bedroom, a generous storage area, a fully equipped kitchen with all the essential appliances for a pleasant stay - a large refrigerator, stove with oven , microwave, dishwasher, toaster and electric kettle - and a modern bathroom with a spa bath. It has a garage in the building with use for 1 vehicle
column7:
Located in a residential area, the apartment offers you peace and tranquility allowing you to enjoy your vacation.
Easily walks to the beach (7 minutes walking distance) and if you want to visit the historic center of Porto, it takes about 20 minutes by car.

You can also travel by bus, using numbers 902 and 207, with connection (902) Picão - Massarelos, (207) Massarelos - São Bento Station.

column7:

It is the best neighborhood in Porto for: solo travelers; young couples; or groups of friends traveling together.

column6:
Located in a building with elevator, the apartment is completely new, has two bedrooms and has a spacious and comfortable area. It is located in one of the most modern and charismatic areas of Porto, Bonfim. It is a short distance from the famous Igreja do Bonfim and you can easily get to the center on foot or by public transport. Bonfim Perfect Stays invites you to a pure Porto experience.

The space
￫ Building
The apartment is on the first floor of a building with elevator, completely renovated, with a modern and contemporary vibe.

￫ Bedrooms
The apartment has two bedrooms with air conditioning, one with a double bed and the other with two single beds.

￫ Bathrooms
The apartment has two bathrooms with a shower.

￫ Living Room
The living room has a flat-screen TV, a writing desk, an inviting sofa bed and offers plenty of sunlight.

￫ Kitchen
The kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge, washing mac
column7:
The parish of Bonfim is the latest in the city of Porto, strongly marked by the industrialization of the century XIX, being an area with a large agglomeration of factories and workers, still maintains the industrial environment.
A short distance from the apartment you can find, the Church of Bonfim or Church Senhor do Bonfim, is an old chapel being nowadays one of the most beautiful and emblematic churches in Porto. It is located on Bonfim Hill, where the old Roman road that used to connect Porto to Valongo passed.
The church is located on a high point, so do not miss the opportunity to be dazzled by the view over Lezíria.
column14:
Founded by travel enthusiasts (just like you) BnBird wants to connect guests, with new traveling experiences in Portugal, while offering an unique hosting approach.
Being natural born Portuguese, and Lisbon lovers, we found that our country, is one of the best places in the World to do it. That’s why we founded BnBird, to give our guests the opportunity to discover our country, its history and charm, with a more local perspective.

column14:
JGGAPARTMENTS - Alojamentos Turísticos, Lda., é uma empresa que se destina ao alojamento turístico no Porto e Norte de Portugal.
bnapartments, são apartamentos e Chalé, destinados a alojamento temporário. Neste momento, dispõe de 8 unidades, estrategicamente situadas em 8 das localizações mais interessantes na cidade do Porto e Norte de Portugal
* bnapartments Palácio - Junto ao Palácio de Cristal.
* bnapartments Rio - Entre a Cordoaria e a Alfândega,  junto à Muralha Fernandina.
* bnapartments Trindade - A 100 mts da estação de metro "Trindade" e a 200mts da Câmara Municipal e do mercado do Bolhão.
* bnapartments LoftPuzzle - No Largo dos Lóis, junto à Avenida dos Aliados, Estação S. Bento, Torres dos Clérigos, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - A 200 mts da Praça da Ribeira, mercado Ferreira Borges, Palácio da Bolsa, Igreja Monumento S. Francisco, etc.
* bnapartments Ribeira - Próximo de Cedofeira, a 400 mts da Torre dos Clérigos
Bagoada Shelter - Casa com 2 quartos a 3 km de Vila Nova de Cerveira, 17km das praias de Moledo, 76 km de Braga, 133 km de Santiago de Compostela, 56 km de Vigo
* bnK Sailing - Veleiro de 14 metros, com 3 quartos, habitualmente atracado na Douro Marina, na Afurada, Vila Nova de Gaia

column5: Baron House - 3 Bedroom Duplex w/ Garden and Park
column6:
This duplex house, typical of Oporto's Architecture, was recently renovated and decorated in a modern style. Enjoy the peaceful and sunny garden or have a relaxing reading on the interior terrace. This house has been fully equipped to make you feel immediately at home and provide you with a memorable stay. Located in Gaia City, you can reach Porto's Downtown in a few minutes by car.

The space
The house has two floors. On the ground floor, you will enter in a nice library space, where you can read a book or have a nice conversation with your companion. An adjacent open space opens to a nice and large living room and dining room. From there, you have access to a quiet and peaceful private garden, perfect for some sunbaths. A fully equipped kitchen with all the essential appliances for a pleasant stay - a large refrigerator, stove with oven, microwave, dishwasher, toaster and electric kettle and a modern service toilet completes the space.

column5: Porto by Douro - 2 Bedroom Apart w/ Alfandega view
column6:
Located on the riverfront of the Douro River, overlooking the emblematic 'Alfândega do Porto', the apartment has been recently renovated and decorated in a modern style and fully equipped to make you feel immediately at home and provide you with a memorable stay.
Start your morning with breakfast on the balcony and lose your gaze on the view of the Douro River and the monumental Alfândega do Porto or end your day watching the sunset on the beach.

The space
Equipped for up to four people, the apartment was recently renovated to provide you with the necessary conditions for a comfortable stay. Located on the second floor of a typical Porto building, without elevator, it consists of a beautiful living room with a dining area and a fully equipped kitchenette with all the necessary appliances for a pleasant stay - a refrigerator, stove with oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker and washing machine - and a modern bathroom complete with shower. Two modern and c
column7:
Located in the Historic Center of Porto, on the banks of the Douro River, in front of the Alfândega do Porto building, the apartment provides a comfortable and peaceful stay. Parking (paid) is available 80 meters away.

The renovated building incorporates the set of traditional architecture from Porto. Keeping traces of its original architecture, the apartment has a modern and vintage decor and is fully equipped.

In the vicinity, there is a wide variety of local restaurants, shops and bars with terraces. Porto's nightlife centre, Galerias Paris, is a 20-minute walk away. Crossing the D. Luis I Bridge, 500 meters away, guests can visit the famous Port Wine Cellars.

The apartment is a 5-minute walk from Ribeira do Porto, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The emblematic Alfândega do Porto Exhibition Center is 10 meters away. 10 minutes walk from Rua das Flores. The iconic Torre dos Clérigos and Livraria Lello are a 20-minute walk from the property and a 5-minut
column28: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

Porto Cinema Apartments are set on an historical building from nineteenth century, completely remodeled in 2016, and located in Santa Catarina Street (main commercial street downtown), where you will spend unforgettable moments!
The apartments are on top of an historical Bookshop (Latina), right in the corner with Batalha Square, with its highlight monument like S. João Theater, Sto. Ildefonso Church and Batalha Cinema, and have the most unique views to the iconic Clérigos Tower.

The space

Localizado numa das ruas mais dinâmicas e centrais do Porto, o apartamento fica a pouca distância a pé dos principais pontos de referência histórica e atracções da cidade. Além disso, com o metro (Marquês) a alguns metros de distância também se torna fácil chegar a qualquer lugar da cidade em pouco tempo. Para além da localização fantástica, o Santa Catarina Prime Studios II tem tudo para uma estadia de alta qualidade e com todo o conforto.

Maravilhosamente decorado e com tudo o que necessita para a sua estadia, o apartamento fica no 2º andar de um prédio sem elevador. É a escolha ideal para casais que procuram alguns dias confortáveis e relaxantes no Porto, devido à sua fantástica localização.

column7:
A Rua de Santa Catarina, uma artéria comercial com 1500 metros de comprimento, é o principal centro comercial do Porto. Esta rua é absurdamente elegante e romântica, com boutiques de bom gosto, caminhos de pedra listrada e multidões animadas. É o lar do salão de chá mais ornamentado do Porto, do Café Majestic, em estilo art nouveau, e da extraordinária Capela das Almas, enfeitada com azulejos.

Encontrará a maioria das lojas internacionais, mas se desejar aventurar-se nos becos pequenos em ambos os lados da rua, vai encontrar muitas lojas tradicionais. Pode até tentar resistir às pâtisseries de dar água na boca e não resistir ao pão porque o pão Português é uma experiência! Vai voltar para mais… Experimente "A Pérola do Bolhão", uma mercearia na Rua Formosa, 279 ou a padaria Arcadia na Rua do Almada, 63. E enquanto estiver em modo compras, tente uma das lojas de sapatos para obter algo confortável, porque vamos levá-lo a lugares com este guia!

Ao lado da Rua de San

Santa Catarina street is the most important commercial street in Oporto and a must see place in this town.
It is 700m away from both Bolhão metro station and Trindade (mainstation) metro station.

Here you can find shops, restaurants, cafes, grocery stores, malls and landmark sites - at walking distance!

You can visit close by Mercado do Bolhão, Avenida dos Aliados, Ribeira, Torre dos Clérigos, Coliseu do Porto, Palácio da Bolsa...

We will be more than glad to give you some extra tips on what to visit or where to eat!

포르투에 처음 온 순간 포르투의 매력에 흠뻑 빠졌고

column5: Eco Penthouse in downtown with rooftop & parking
column6:
Eco friendly Penthouse with 180° views of the city from its 13sqm sunny rooftop terrace, two-bedrooms, big open space living & kitchen area equipped and decorated to the highest standards. The historical building was totally rehabilitated in 2020 preserving its traditional beauty. We offer one parking spot at the property… a Truly Heaven in downtown Porto…

The space
We are a German / Brazilian couple dividing our time between Germany, Portugal and Brazil. We love coming down to Portugal to relax & recharge. With that intention in mind we created our sanctuary, that we would like to share with you when we aren’t around.

When you enter the Paraiso property (which means Paradise in Portuguese) you will understand what we are talking about. This property used to be the main house of a wine-growing estate that covered the slopes north from the medieval town of Porto. As the city grew, the owners sold most of their land to develop the 19th century neighborh

column5: Eco Garden Hut in downtown Porto
column6:
Eco friendly 30sqm garden hut with excellent sunny outside area. Our hut is inserted in the middle of a 1.000sqm lush manicured gardens with tropical species, an old wine making presser, picnic tables, Brazilian nets where you can rest after a long day sightseeing through Porto, just reading or hearing the sounds of birds and the water from the fountain... a Truly Heaven in downtown Porto…

The space

column6:
Localizado numa das ruas mais dinâmicas e centrais do Porto, o apartamento fica a pouca distância a pé dos principais pontos de referência histórica e atracções da cidade. Além disso, com o metro (Marquês) a alguns metros de distância também se torna fácil chegar a qualquer lugar da cidade em pouco tempo. Para além da localização fantástica, o Santa Catarina Prime Studios II tem tudo para uma estadia de alta qualidade e com todo o conforto.

The space
￫ Edifício
Maravilhosamente decorado e com tudo o que necessita para a sua estadia, o apartamento fica no 3º andar de um prédio sem elevador. É a escolha ideal para casais que procuram alguns dias confortáveis e relaxantes no Porto, devido à sua fantástica localização.

￫ Quarto
O apartamento tem um quarto com uma confortável cama de casal.

￫ Casa-de-Banho
O apartamento possui uma casa de banho com chuveiro.

￫ Sala de Estar / Jantar
A sala tem uma TV de ecrã plano,
column7:
A Rua de Santa Catarina, uma artéria comercial com 1500 metros de comprimento, é o principal centro comercial do Porto. Esta rua é absurdamente elegante e romântica, com boutiques de bom gosto, caminhos de pedra listrada e multidões animadas. É o lar do salão de chá mais ornamentado do Porto, do Café Majestic, em estilo art nouveau, e da extraordinária Capela das Almas, enfeitada com azulejos.

Encontrará a maioria das lojas internacionais, mas se desejar aventurar-se nos becos pequenos em ambos os lados da rua, vai encontrar muitas lojas tradicionais. Pode até tentar resistir às pâtisseries de dar água na boca e não resistir ao pão porque o pão Português é uma experiência! Vai voltar para mais… Experimente "A Pérola do Bolhão", uma mercearia na Rua Formosa, 279 ou a padaria Arcadia na Rua do Almada, 63. E enquanto estiver em modo compras, tente uma das lojas de sapatos para obter algo confortável, porque vamos levá-lo a lugares com este guia!

Ao lado da Rua de San
column14:
Founded by travel enthusiasts (just like you) BnBird wants to connect guests, with new traveling experiences in Portugal, while offering an unique hosting approach.
Being natural born Portuguese, and Lisbon lovers, we found that our country, is one of the best places in the World to do it. That’s why we founded BnBird, to give our guests the opportunity to discover our country, its history and charm, with a more local perspective.

column5: Apartment with 3 bedrooms in São Félix da Marinha, with furnished terrace and WiFi - 500 m from the beach
column6:
This apartment, located in São Félix da Marinha, is ideal for 7 vacationers. It offers 3 bedrooms, a furnished terrace and WiFi.

The space
This apartment, located in São Félix da Marinha, is ideal for 7 vacationers. It offers 3 bedrooms, a furnished terrace and WiFi.
The lounge is perfect for unwinding after a day in the sun. Curl up on the comfortable sofa and enjoy a good book in front of the fireplace or take advantage of the amenities on offer, including WiFi.
The kitchen is well-equipped for cooking up your favorite meals. Enjoy your feast around the dining table which seats 4 or outside, on the terrace.
The apartment has 3 comfortable bedrooms, 1 including a double bed and a private bathroom with a shower and toilet and 2 including a double bed. Several bathrooms are available, one with a bathtub, a shower and a toilet and one with a shower and a toilet.
The apartment features a vacuum cleaner, cleaning products and a fan.
No
column7: This apartment enjoys a privileged location that will allow you to enjoy your stay in the area. Many activities await you in the surroundings, such as Hiking, Cycling and Mountaineering.  Do Brito beach is 500 m away from the apartment.
column14:
¡ Expertos en la gestión de alquileres vacacionales y apasionados por el sector del turismo durante muchos años, nuestra agencia ofrece alojamiento de calidad que cumplirá con sus expectativas !
Nuestro equipo internacional responderá a todas sus preguntas y lo asesorará durante la reserva.

Nuestro objetivo: ofrecerle unas vacaciones inolvidables y el deseo de volver.



Spécialistes de la gestion de location de vacances et passionnés du secteur du tourisme depuis de nombreuses années, notre agence vous propose des logements de qualité qui sauront satisfaire vos attentes !
Notre équipe d’ambassadeurs internationaux saura répondre à vos questions et vous accompagner tout au long de votre réservation.

Notre objectif : vous offrir des vacances réussies et l’envie de revenir !

column6:
This hostel is located in the Aliados area in downtown Porto. It is 300 metres from the Porto Train Station and includes free Wi-Fi for all guests. Each has a shared bathroom and a balcony. A free buffet breakfast is served every day. There is also a shared kitchen as well as barbecue facilities on-site. A spacious outdoor terrace is available for all guests. The Rivoli Cinema Hostel is 250 metres from the Aliados Metro Station and just over 800 metres from the banks of the River Douro.

The space
This hostel is located in the historical Aliados area in downtown Porto, in a restored 1930’s Art Deco building. The bright rooms at the Rivoli Cinema Hostel have wooden floors and are all individually designed with film-inspired decor. Each has a shared bathroom and a balcony. There is also a shared kitchen as well as barbecue facilities on-site. A spacious outdoor terrace with an inflatable swimming pool in summer is available for all guests.

column5: Francos' Relaxing Apartment - long term rental
column6:
Very bright and relaxing apartment very close to the Francos metro station - direct to the city center (8 min) or airport (20 min)!
This 2 bedrooms apartment it's located in a calm area near Boavista.
Modern and conveniently located with all the comfort for a nice stay.
With free parking in garage included, fast Wifi in all areas, equipped kitchen, etc.
19579/AL

The space
Este apartamento é muito confortável e moderno, estando apto para o máximo de 4 hóspedes, com:
* Uma cama de casal no quarto principal (1,40m x 2,00m) com grande armário embutido
* Uma cama de solteiro no quarto mais pequeno (0,90m x 1,90m)
* Um sofá-cama para um hóspede na sala de estar (1,18m x 2,05m)
* Cozinha equipada com: torradeira, máquina de café, máquina de lavar loiça, frigorífico com congelador, placa de fogão, forno, varinha mágica, jarro eléctrico para aquecer água e micro-ondas.
* Área de refeições: na cozinha (com 2 cadeiras altas) e
column7:
Este apartamento está situado numa área muito calma e, apesar desta atmosfera relaxante dentro do apartamento, encontra-se muito próximo do moderno centro da cidade e do centro histórico (baixa). Fica localizado na zona nova da Boavista, sendo possível deslocar-se a pé à famosa Casa da Música (de Rem Koolhaas) e à agradável área comercial e Mercado do Bom Sucesso aí existentes ou mesmo apanhar o metro até ao centro histórico.
Daqui pode facilmente chegar a:
* supermercado a 5 minutos a pé
* estação de metro (Francos) a 200 metros/2 min. a pé
* Rotunda da Boavista e Casa da Música a 10 min. a pé
* Mercado do Bom Sucesso a 15 min. a pé
* mar/praia a 5 km de distância (ideal para nadar, apanhar sol, esplanadas, surfar, andar a pé, ...)
* shopping center (com marcas boas e famosas) a 10 min. de distância
Se vem de carro, facilmente acede ao nosso apartamento, já que este fica próximo dos acessos às principais auto-estradas (A1, A28, A29, A4, A3, etc
column14:
I'm 37 and I love to know about other cultures by meeting new people in my beloved city - Porto. 
I have been working in the tourism area for more than 12 years and been also a home host for over 6 years in other properties in Porto. I am happy to help you not only with the accommodation but also with suggestions and tips during your stay. 
I can speak Portuguese, English, German, French and Spanish.
My husband Hugo is my co-host and we're both very happy to welcome you in this wonderful city!
column28: Ramalde

column5: Apartamento com Varanda no Coração do Porto
column6:
Estúdio totalmente equipado e renovado, situado no coração da cidade do Porto com uma ótima localização para quem quer conhecer a cidade!
Com um quarto duplo, uma kitchenette totalmente equipada e uma calorosa sala de estar, os nossos hóspedes têm o prazer de desfrutar de uma magnífica experiência. Vai poder usufruir de incríveis momentos na nossa sossegada varanda.

The space
Os apartamentos Sweet Porto são a escolha ideal para sua próxima viagem à "cidade invicta", seja em casal ou em grupo. Apesar de a maioria destes se encontrarem em edifícios históricos que mantiveram o traço e a característica de identidade da cidade, todos foram recentemente renovados para se sentir sempre em casa.
Com todos os apartamentos extremamente bem localizados e com fácil acesso, só terá de decidir qual é a escolha perfeita para si :)

O apartamento possui ar condicionado no quarto e nas áreas de refeição/estar, sofá-cama, TV a cabo, WI-FI, kitchenette com equipamentos novos, 1 casa de banho e 1 WC de serviços. 12345/AL
column7:
O Bonfim, no Porto, vai das Fontaínhas às Antas e foi considerado pelo The Guardian um dos 10 bairros "mais cool da Europa". Na rua que dá nome à freguesia, vive-se um ambiente de “Regresso ao Futuro”. Subir a Rua do Bonfim até ao cimo da igreja com o mesmo nome é como viajar para um tempo ao qual o boom imobiliário não chegou. Os poucos edifícios requalificados coexistem com prédios devolutos e lojas fechadas.

O burburinho do comércio local faz lembrar o Bonfim da década de 1980. Do Campo 24 de Agosto à igreja do Bonfim, ainda é possível ver a oficina de carros, a tabacaria onde se compra o jornal, o restaurante típico com o prato do dia ou a mercearia onde se fazem as compras do quotidiano.

Esta autenticidade quase melancólica do Bonfim é vivida ainda um pouco por toda a freguesia. O velho e o novo, o antigo e o renovado vivem lado a lado.

column5: O porto wine loft Appartement with swimming pool
column6:
Located in Vila Nova de Gaia, famous for its Port wine cellars, its magnificent view of the Douro from the boat trips and the Ribeira district separated by the famous Dom Luís bridge. The apartment is perfect for those who want to discover Porto and its surroundings ...
The "General Torres" metro station is located 500m from the apartment and will take you to Porto city center in less than 5 minutes.
Well equipped to accommodate up to 3/4 people, with a communal swimming pool.

The space
The apartment is located in a condominium with a communal pool. It is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers and families (with children). With the general torres metro located a 5 minute (uphill) walk from the apartment, you can easily visit the main tourist attractions of Porto and Gaia as well as the new wow museum. Porto city center is less than 5 minutes by metro. The apartment is on the first floor without a lift. Possibility of cot on request The
column14: I am Romain and I come from France. After visiting Portugal, I decided to settle in Porto. It will be a pleasure to welcome you in Porto and to share with you my love for this charming city.

column14:
I am Eliana, a Portuguese girl that loves Porto, owner and Architect of Casa Amarela. It is a traditional house, from late 19th Century, that attracted me for its design and perfect location, with the main Underground Station around the corner and downtown Porto within few minutes walking.

I had been living and working  in London. During this project, my routine  consisted in booking lots of flights, exchanging numerous emails, designing more and more details and making endless phone calls. Of course this wouldn’t be possible without the help of an extremely competent professional team: Project Manager Isabel Mateus and Jaime Guimaraes Ltd. as Main Contractor, together with my restless parents to whom I couldn’t be more grateful!

Casa Amarela was built and refurbished with extreme care and detail, respecting the existing quality of the building and making it dialogue with a contemporary intervention.

All the flats offer all the requirements for a lovely stay.

We hope you enjoy staying in the house as we loved achieving our dream!
